ngei hih Abraham jâisuon, David jâisuon Jisua Khrista richibulngei an ni.
Abraham renga Rêng David tena, anuoia anghin richibulngei hah adônin mintâng ani: Abraham'n Isaac a neia, Isaac'n Jakob a neia, Jakob'n Judah le a lâibungngei a neia; hanchu Judah'n Perez le Zerah a nei ngeia, (an nu chu Tamar ani) Perez'n Hezron a neia; Hezron'n Ram a neia, Ram'n Amminadab a neia, Amminadab'n Nahshon a neia; Nahshon'n Salmon a neia; Salmon'n Boaz a neia, (a nu chu Rahab ani) Boaz'n Obed a neia, (a nu chu Ruth ani) Obed'n Jesse a neia; Jesse'n Rêng David a nei ani.
<range>
<range>
<range>
David zora renga Israel mipui ngei Babylon suoka intânga an om tena anuoia anghin an richibulngei hah adônin mintâng ani: David'n Uriah lômnu leh Solomon a neia; Solomon'n Rehoboam a neia; Rehoboam'n Abijah a neia; Abijah'n Asa a neia; Asa'n Jehoshaphat a neia; Jehoshaphat'n Jehoram a neia; Jehoram'n Uzziah a neia; Uzziah'n Jotham a neia; Jotham'n Ahaz a neia; Ahaz'n Hezekiah a neia; Hezekiah'n Manasseh a neia; Manasseh'n Amon a neia; Amon'n Josiah a neia; Josiah'n Jehoiachin le a lâibungngei a nei ngei ani.
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Hanchu, Babylon suoka an intâng suonûk renga Jisua suok tena hi anuoia angin richilbulngei adônin mintâng ani: Jehoiachin'n Shealtiel a neia; Shealtiel'n Zerubbabel a neia; Zerubbabel'n Abiud a neia; Abiud'n Eliakim a neia; Eliakim'n Azor a neia; Azor'n Zadok a neia, Zadok'n Achim a neia; Achim'n Eliud a neia; Eliud'n Eleazar a neia; Eleazar'n Matthan a neia, Matthan'n Jacob a neia; Jacob'n, Joseph, Mary inneipuipu hah a neia; ha Mary renga han Jisua Messiah an ti hih ajuong inzir ani,
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Masikin, Abraham renga David tena ruol sômleiminli ania; David renga Babylon tieng suoka an tuong ngei tena ruol sômleiminli ania; ma renga hah Messiah ânzir tena ruol sômleiminli ani.
Mahih Jisua Khrista ajuong inzir tie chu ani. A nu Mary hah Joseph han ava bieka, in-annei mân, Ratha Inthiengin nâi a vonga,
Joseph hah zoratina mi diktak ani sikin mipui rietin Mary hah mâimôkshak rang nuom maka; masikin inrûktên an inbiekna setin mâkchien rangin a mintuo ani.
Hima roi hah a mindon lâitakin, a ramangin Pumapa Vântîrton inkhat a kôm a juong inlâra, a kôm han, “Joseph, David jâisuon, Mary hih lômnua nei rang chi no roh. Amanu nâivong hih Ratha Inthieng renga kêng ani.
Amanu han Nâipasal nei a ta, male a riming Jisua ni phuo rang ani. Ama han a mingei an nunsienangei renga a sanminring ngei rang sikin,” a tia.
Atûn hin Pumapa'n dêipu manga a lei misîr hah adikin ahong tung theina ranga hima ngei murdi hih ahong oma,
“Dôngmate inthienghiei hah inrâi a ta nâipasal nei atih, male a riming Immanuel phuo an tih,” (ma omtie chu, “Ei kôm Pathien aom tina ani.”)
Masikin, Joseph ânthoi lehan, Pumapa vântîrtonin a tipe anghan, Mary hah lômnûn a nei zoi.
Aniatachu, a nâivong hah a nei mâka chu ompui mah. Hanchu, Joseph'n a riming hah Jisua a phuo zoi ani.
Rêng Herod ânlal lâihan Judea rama Bethlehem khopuia Jisua ajuong inzira. Ânzirsuo, harenghan, ârsi tienga lekha inchû ngâi mivârngei senkhat nisuotieng renga Jerusalema an juonga
“Khotieng mo Judangei rêng ajuong inzir nâitesen hah a om? Nisuo tienga ama ârsi kin mua, ama chubaimûk rangin kin juong ani,” an tia.
Ma roi hah Rêng Herod'n a rietin chu, a mulungjîng sabaka, Jerusalema mi murdi khom an mulung ajîng sa ani.
Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei murdi munkhatin a koibûm ngeia, an kôm han, “Khotieng mo Messiah ânzir rang?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Hanchu, anni han a kôm, “Judea ram Bethlehem khopuia,” tiin an thuona, Dêipu'n hi anghin a lei mizieka:
“Judah ram sûnga Bethlehem, nangma Judah khopuilienngei lâia achîntak ni tet mak che; na sûng renga ruoipu alân zir rang ani, ki mi Israelngei ruoi rangpu hah.”
Masikin Herod'n nisuo tienga mivârngei hah a koi ngeia, ârsi ânlang zora tak hah anni renga a man theina rangin inrûktên ântongpui ngei zoi.
Hanchu hi chong hih bê'n anni hah Bethlehem'a a tîr ngei: “Se ungla, nâite hah asadimin va rok ungla, nin mûn chu mi hong ril nôk roi, masikin keima khom ama chubaimûk ke se theina rangin,” a tia.
Hanchu an mâka, male an lampuia an sea, nisuo tienga ârsi dên hah an mu nôka. Ârsi hah an mûn chu an râiasân sabaka, idôr taka râisân mo an ni zoi! Nâite omna chung ridîn aphâk mâka chu inngam loiin an moton a ruoi ngei banga.
<range>
Insûnga an va lûta, male a nu Mary leh nâite hah an va mua, khûkinbilin chubai an mûk zoi. Neinunpêk ranga an chôi, rângkachak, bero le myrrh (murrah) an kaisuoa, a kôm an pêk zoi.
Hanchu, Herod kôm tieng se nôk khâiloi rangin an ramangin Pathien'n inningna a pêk ngei sikin lampui danga an ram tieng an kîrnôk zoi.
Hanchu, anni ngei hah an mâk suole chu, Pumapa vântîrton inkhat Joseph kôm ramangin ajuong inlâra, a kôm han, “Herod'n nâite that rangin a rok rang kêng. Masikin inthoi inla, nâite le a nu hah tuong inla, Egypt rama rotpui ngei roh, hong nôk rangin nang ki ril mâka chu mahan omchien roi,” a tia.
Joseph ânthoia nâite le a nu a tuong ngeia, hani jân renghan Egypt ram an pan kelen zoi.
Herod thi mâka chu mahan an omchien zoi. Pumapa'n dêipu bâia, “Ka nâipasal chu Egypt ram renga ko koi suok,” a lei ti hah ajuongtung dikna rangin maha ahong om ani.
Herod'n nisuo tienga mivârngei han an huong ti a rietin chu a ningathik sabaka. Mivârngei kôm renga ârsi ânlang zora roi a riet dungjûiin Bethlehem le a revêla nâipang pasal kumnik nuoitienga murdi chu that riei rangin chong a pêk zoi.
Dêipu Jeremiah'n a lei misîr:
“Ramah khuoa in-iek miring rietin aoma, Rangâisie taka chap miring hah. Rachel'n a nâingei ranga a châ; amanu hah tâi thei khâi mak an thi pe zoi sikin,” ti hah ahongtung zoi ani.
Herod a thi suole chu, Pumapa vântîrton inkhat Egypt rama Joseph kôm ramangin ânlâra,
a kôm, “Inthoi inla, nâite le a nu hah tuong inla, Israel rama se nôk ta roi, nâite that ranga bôkngei hah an thi zoi,” a tia.
Hanchu, Joseph ânthoia, nâite le a nu a tuonga Israel rama an se nôk zoi.
Aniatachu, Archelaus a pa Herod ruthûlin Judea rama rêng a chang ti Joseph'n a rietin chu ha taka se hah a chia. A ramangin rilin a om nôka, masikin Galilee ramhuol tiengkâng han an sea
khopui inkhat Nazareth an tia han anva om zoi. Hanchu dêipungeiin, “Ama hah Nazareth mi tîng an tih,” tia an lei ti hah adikin ahongtung ani.
Ma zora han Baptispu John, Judea ramchâra a honga male tânghâi a phuta,
“Nin nunsienangei renga inhei ta roi, Invân Rêngram anâi zoi,” a tia.
John hih ani, Dêipu Isaiah'n: “Ramchâra mi inkhat tânghâi han, ‘Pumapa rang lamlien sin ungla, a lôna rang lampui khom mintûn roi!’” tia a chungroi a lei misîr hah ani.
John a puonsilngei hah ût mula sin ania, savun kongkhit a khita, a sâk ngâi chu khâimimsiengei le rama khuoilutui ani.
Jerusalem renga, Judea ramhuol pumpui renga, le Jordan tuidung revêla ramtin renga mingei a kôm an honga.
An nunsienangei an phuonga, male ama'n Jordan tuidunga a Baptis ngei zoi.
John'n Phariseengei le Sadduceengei tamtak a kôm Baptis chang rangin an hong a mu lehan an kôm, “Murûl richingei, Pathien sepna juong chulna rang renga hih rotpai theina rangin tumo nangni ril?
Nin sietna renga nin inhei zoi ti riettheina rangin sinngei hah tho roi.
Male Abraham richisuonpârngei kêng kin ni tiin sepna renga rotpai thei rangin mindon no roi. Nangni ki ril, Pathien'n hi lungngei khom hih Abraham richisuonpârngei a min chang thei!
Thingkungngei a ruzung renga phûr rangin reipui min râkchien sai kêng ani zoi; thingkung murdi mara sân ânra loi kai chu phûr an ta, meia vôrpai an tih.
Keima'n chu nin insîr zoi ti rietna rangin tuiin nangni ka Baptis ngâia, aniatachu ku nûka juong rangpu'n chu Ratha Inthieng le meiin nangni baptis a tih. Ama chu keima nêka roiinpui uol ok ani; keima chu a kekok chôi rangin luo inhoi mu-ung.
Bungei jâpna rangin relei a dôna, a ruijôl jâp minsâi liei a ta, a butakngei kai chu sapang sûnga thun a ta, arishi chu mei thithei ngâiloia hâl minmang a tih,” a tia.
Ma zora lâihan John kôm Baptis chang rangin Jisua'n Galilee ram renga Jordan dunga a honga,
Aniatachu, John'n khap rang a bôka, a kôm, “Nangman kêng mi ni Baptis anânga,” John'n, “kho angin mo ko kôm te no honga!” a tia.
Hannirese Jisua'n a kôm, “Atûn hin asa ti chien roh. Ma angdênin Pathien'n a minnângngei murdi chu ei tho rang ani,” tiin a thuona. Hanchu John a jôt zoi ani.
Jisua Baptis a chang suo, harenghan, tui renga a hong jôka. Hanchu ama rangin invân ajuon onga, male Pathien Ratha hah vasu angin a juongchuma a chunga chuongin a mua.
Hanchu, invân renga rôl ajuon ringa, “Mahih ka Nâipasal moroitak, a chunga ku mulung atâiriem ani,” a tia.
Male Jisua hah Diabol methêma a om rangin Ratha'n ramchâra a tuong zoi.
Sûn sômminli jân sômminli sâk sâkloiin a om suolechu Jisua hah a vonchâm zoia.
Hanchu Diabol a honga, a kôm, “Pathien Nâipasal ni nîn chu, hi lungngei hih vâipôl chang rangin chongpêk roh,” a tia.
Hannirese, Jisua'n a kôm han, “Pathien Lekhabu'n Miriem hi vâipôl korongin ring no nia, Pathien bâia chong hongsuokin kêng an a ring rang ani,” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Diabol'n Jisua hah, Khopuilien Inthieng Jerusalema a tuonga, Biekin sîpinsângtaka a mindinga,
male a kôm, “Pathien Nâipasal ni nîn chu nangma nethenin inchôm inla, Pathien Lekhabu'n ati anghan: ‘Nu chungroia chu Pathien'n a vântîrtonngei chongpêk ngei a ta; an kutngei leh nang lei modong an tih, masikin ne kengei luo khom lunga nên sûi loina rangin,’ ” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Aniatachu Pathien Lekhabu'n, Pumapa na Pathien minsin no roh, ti khom ânziek sa,” tiin a thuona.
Male, Diabol hah muol insângtaka a tuonga rammuola rêngramngei murdi le an roiinpuinangei a min mua.
A kôm, “khûkinbilin chubai mi ni mûkin chu hi ngei murdi hih nang pêk let ki tih,” a ti pea.
Male Jisua'n a kôm, “Soitan, rotpai roh! Pathien Lekhabu'n, ‘Pumapa na Pathien vai chubaimûk inla, ama sin vai tho roh a ti!’” tiin a thuona.
Masuole chu Diabol'n Jisua a mâka; male vântîrtonngei an juonga, ama an juong san zoi.
Jisua'n, John an sûr ti a riet lechu, Galilee rama a thengpata.
Nazareth a mâka, Capernaum khopuia ava om zoia, mahah Galilee Dîl pang Zebulun le Naphtali ramhuola om ani.
Mahi dêipu Isaiah lei ti hah ahongtung adikna ranga ani:
“Zebulun ram le Naphtali ram, tuipui panna lampuia, Jordan râl kângkhat tieng, Galilee, Jentailngei ram!
Ijîng nuoia om mingei han vâr roiinpuitak mûng an ta. Thina ram ijîng nuoia omngei chunga han vâr hah hong êl atih.”
Ma zora renga hah Jisua'n, “Nin nunsienangei renga inhei ta roi, Invân Rêngram hih anâi zoi sikin!” tiin thurchi misîr a phut kelen zoi.
Jisua'n Galilee dîl pang rûla a chai anghan ngasûrpungei lâibungsa inik a mu ngeia, Simon (Peter an ti) le anâipa Andrew, dîla lên leh nga an sûra.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ko kôm hong ungla, miriem sûrna chang nangni minchu ki tih,” a tipe ngeia.
Voikhat rengin an lênngei an mâkraka, an jûi kelen zoi.
Ava se nôk uol vietin chu lâibungsa adang, Zebedee nâipasalngei Jacob le John ava mu ngei nôka. Anni ngei hah an pa Zebedee leh an rukuong sûnga an lei oma, an lênngei an lei sina. Jisua'n a koi ngeia,
male voikhat rengin rukuong le an pa mâkrakin, an jûi kelen zoi.
Jisua'n Galilee ram pumpuia a sea, synagog in sûng ngeia a minchua, Rêngram Thurchi Sa a misira, mingei lâia natna le damloina jât tamtak a mindama.
Ama chungroi hah Syria ram pumpuia ânthang zoia, masikin mingei han damloi murdi, natna jât tamtak le intaknangei renga an hong tuong ngeia: ramkhori sûrngei, risangol inveingei, phalkhatthi ngei, hah Jisua'n a lei mindam ngei pak ani.
Galilee ram le Khopui Sôm ngei renga, Jerusalem renga, Judea ram renga le Jordan râla ramngei renga mipui tamtak ama an jûi zoi ani.
Jisua'n loko ngei hah a mûn chu muol chunga a kala, mahan ânsunga. A ruoisingei a kôla an hong intûpa,
male anni ngei hah a minchu phut zoi:
“Ratha tienga inrienga ânriet ngei chu satvur anni; Invân Rêngram an ta ani sikin.
Rathanvâingei chu satvur anni; Pathien'n rathanngamna a pêk ngei rang ani!
Rangâiinchînngei chu satvur anni; Pathien chonginkhâm an la man rang ani!
Pathien'n a minnângngei sin ranga ôina lientak dônngei chu satvur anni; Pathien'n mulungchukna a pêk ngei rang ani!
Mulungjûrpuina dôn ngei chu satvur anni; Pathien mulungjûrpuina an chang rang ani!
Mulung inthiengngei chu satvur anni; Pathien an la mu rang ani!
Inngêina ranga sintho ngei chu satvur anni; Pathien'n ama nâingei tiin a la koi ngei rang ani!
Pathien'n a minnângngei sin sikin nuomlona tuong ngei chu satvur anni; Invân Rêngram an ta ani!”
“Ku nûkjûingei nin nina sika min nangni an êroa, an nunuom nangni an loa, milak saloi ngeiin nangni an nôn tika chu satvur nin ni.
Nin râiminsân ungla, nin ta rangin râisânman lientak invâna darin aom sikin. Nin motona lei om dêipungei hah khom nunuomlona an lei tuong ngâi ani.”
“Mitin ta rangin michi angin nin ni. Aniatachu michi hih a âlna ahong dongin chu min âl nôk thei ni khâi mak. Mangmunboi ahong changa, masikin an paia, mingeiin an sirpol ngâi ani.
“Nangni ngei hah rammuol pumpui rangin vâr angin nin ni. Tângsîpa khopui aom chu inthup thei ngâi mak.
Tutên châti mochokin khuriâi nuoia dar ngâi mak ngei; manêkin chu in sûnga mi murdi a êlminvârna rangin châtidarna kêng an dar ngâi ani.
Ma angdên han nin vâr hah mingei makunga vâr ngêt rese, hankêng nin neinun sa tho ngei hah mûng an ta, male invâna om nin Pa minpâk thei an tih.
“Moses le Dêipungei Balam minchûnangei minboi ranga juongin ni be no roi. Ma ngei hah minboi ranga juong ni mu-unga, an minchûnangei ajuongtung dikna ranga kêng ki ni.
Pilchung le invân a om kâr chu Balam chong ânziek ahâng chînte mo, miziek dukriekte mo hi boi no nih, neinunngei murdi mongna ahongtung mâka chu ti hi riettit roi.
Masikin tukhomin hi chongpêkngei lâia achîntak khom jômloiin, ma angdênin tho sa rangin midangngei khom a minchûn chu invân Rêngrama chu mi chîntak nîng a tih. Nikhomrese tukhomin Balam a jôma, ma angdênin tho sa rangin mi a minchûa anin chu invân Rêngrama chu mi lien nîng a tih.
Hanchu, Pathien lungdo sinna lama Balam minchupungei le Phariseengei nêkin taksôn-omin nin om vaiin kêng invân Rêngrama nin lût thei rang tiin nangni ki ril ani.
“Tienlâia mingei kôm chu, ‘Mi that no roh; tukhom mi that chu roijêkna makunga inding a tih,’ tiin an ril ngâi ti nin riet.
Ania, atûn keiman chu: Tukhom a lâibungpa chunga a taksîn chu roijêkna makunga tuongin om a tih, tukhom a lâibungpa kôm, ‘Mangmunboipa!’ ti chu roijêkna makunga tuongin om a tih, male tukhom a lâibungpa kôm mangmunboi, amopa ti chu meidîla se rangin ichi aom ani.
Masikin mâichâm motona Pathien kôm neinunpêk ne pêk rang lâitak khomin na lâibungpa'n nu chunga mulung hoiloina a dôn iti ni riettitin chu,
mâichâm motona ne neinunpêk ne pêk rang hah mâk inla, inrangin sênla, na lâibungpa leh inngêina va sin bak inla, masuole chu hongkîr nôk inla Pathien kôma ne neinunpêk rang hah pêk roh.
“Mîn dabi thôn nang an doia roijêkna muna nang an tuongin chu zora ala om sûngin nin bâiinkhamna hah inngêipui roh, roijêkna mun nin tung mân. Amuna voikhat pai na va tungin chu, ama'n roijêkpu kuta nang bâng a ta, misûrngei kuta nang bâng a ta, male jêl-ina khum nini rang ani.
Nangni ki ril, poisate tena luo lei nu thuon mâka chu ma muna han om tit ni tih.
“Inrê no roh, an lei ti hah nin riet.
Ania, atûn Keiman chu: tukhomin nupang midit enin a ena, amanu hah luo rang a nuomin chu a mulungrîla amanu leh han an inrêa, theiloi changin aom zoi, tiin nangni ki ril ani.
Masikin ni mit chang tieng han nang aminpalin chu kêlpai inla, vôrpai kelen roh! Na takpum, pumpuia meidîla se nêkin chu na takpuma abâk inkhat ânsam hah chu nata rangin asa uol.
Nu kut changtieng nang aminpalin chu tanpai inla, pai kelen roh! Na takpum, pumpuia meidîla se nêkin chu na takpuma abâk inkhat ânsam hah chu nata rangin asa uol ani.”
“‘Tukhom a lômnu a mâkin chu mâkna lekha a pêk rang ani,’ an ti sa.
Hannirese atûn Keiman chu: tukhom pasalin a lômnu hah roi danga niloiin, taksôn omloina sika a mâka anin chu a lômnu hah inrê a minchang ani; male mi lômnu mâksai inneipui nôkpu chu amanu hah a inrêpuiin theiloi a changsa ani, ti nangni ki ril ani.
“Tienlâia mingei kôm chu, ‘No chonginkhâm hah set nôn la, Pumapa makunga nên khâmna hah tho roh,’ an ti, tiin nin riet sa.
Aniatachu atûn keiman chu, chonginkhâm nin sin zorân inkhâmna ite mang no roi. Invân sâmin khom, khomâkinsâm no roi, Pathien Rêngsukmun ani sikin;
pilchung sâmin khom, khomâkinsâm no roi, a ke darna ani sikin. Jerusalem sâmin khom, khomâkinsâm no roi, ma khi Rêng roiinpuitak khopui ani sikin.
Nin lu sâmin khom khomâkinsâm no roi, samsang inkhat luo hih nin minchek thei le nin minhâng thei aom loi sikin.
‘Ani’ nônchu ‘Nimak’ vai ti roi, mapêna nin ti hah chu Saloipa Inkhat renga hong kêng ani.”
“‘Mit ruthûla mit,’ ‘hâ ruthûla hâ,’ an ti hah nin riet.
Aniatachu atûn keiman chu: nin chunga asaloi tho ngei chunga phubaluok no roi. Tukhomin ni bieng chang tieng a bênin chu, voi tienga ni bieng khom minbên sa roh.
Tukhom nu sûng kancholi lâk rang a râivala roijêkna muna nang tuong rang a bôkin chu na kâncholiinchuol khom pêk sa roh.
Mi'n a puok kilometer khat pêl rangin nang a tiin chu kilometer inik pêlpe roh.
Mi'n neinun imini nang a zong zorân chu, maha a kôm pêk roh; mi lâkâi nang a zongpu hah lei min pûk roh.”
“Na malngei lungkham inla, na râlngei mumâk roh,” an ti iti nin riet.
Aniatachu atûn keiman chu: nin râlngei lungkham ungla, an nunuom nangni lo ngei hah chubai tho pe roi,
masikin invâna nin Pa nâingei nin hongni theina rangin. Ama'n misiengei le misangei chunga a nisa hah ân-angbangin a min suok ngâia, asa sinngei le asie sinngei chunga khom ruo a min juong pe ngei ngâi.
Nang lungkhamngei vai nu lungkham ngeiin te ithomo Pathien'n râisânman nang a pêk ranga? Mahah chu sum rusuongpungei khomin an tho ngâi!
Hanchu, nin malngei kôm vai nin chongin te imo aliek nin tho uola? Mahah chu sonongngei khomin an tho ngâi!
Invâna nin Pa asa akipphar anghan nangni khom nan satna hah akipphar ngêt rang ani!
“Nin sakhuo sintumngei nin sinngei hah miriem mitmua, mi mu rangin sin no roi. Ma neinunngei hah mi mu rangin nin sinin chu, invâna nin Pa kôm renga ite râisânman man no tunui.
“Masikin miriem a nângngei neinun nin pêkin, maha alienin minlang no roi, asarothol ngeiin mi minpâkna an chang theina rangin inkhôm inngeia le lamlienngeia an tho ngâi anghan tho no roi. Nangni ki ril an râisânman chu an man suozoi.
Hannirese, nangni chu miriem intakngei nin sanin, nin ruol satakngei khomin an riet loi rang lamin tho roi.
Hanchu, inrûka sin tho nîng nin ta, male inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu nan Pa han râisânman nangni pêk a tih.”
“Chubai nin tho zorân, asarotholngei angin tho no roi! Mîn an mu theina rangin inkhôm inngeia le lamlien sîrngeia indinga chubaitho an minlut ngâi, adiktakin nangni ki ril, an râisânman chu pêkin an omsuo zoi.
Aniatachu nangni chu chubai nin thôn, nin khâltana lût ungla, inkhâr khâr ungla, male mita mutheiloi nin Pa kôm chubaitho roi. Hanchu, inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu, nin Pa han râisânman nangni pêng a tih.”
“Chubai nin tho zorân, sonongngei anghan chongkâmboi ngei mang no roi, anni ngei han an chubai tho sôt sikin an pathien'n riet uol rangin an mindon ngâi ani.
Anni angin om no roi. Nin ngên mân nin Pa'n nin nâng chu a rietsai kêng ani.
Hanchu, mahi nin chubai tho rang lam chu ani: ‘Kan Pa invana mi: Nirming inthieng mirit om rese.
Na Rêngram juong tung rese; nu lungdo invâna mîn an sin angin nuoia mîn sin rese ngei.
Anîngtina kin nâng ngâi dôr sâk avien hin mi pêk roh.
Kin chunga sin minchâingei kin ngâidam anghan, nang khomin kin minchâinangei mi ngâidam roh.
Sietna ranga methêmna tieng mi tuong nônla, Asaloina renga chu mi mojôk roh,’ tiin.
“Nin chunga midangngei tho minchâi ngei nin ngâidamin chu, invâna nin Pa khomin nangni ngâidam a tih.
Aniatachu midangngei nin ngâidam nônchu, nin tho minchâina ngei nin Pa'n nangni ngâidam no nih.
“Bu nin ngêi zorân, asarotholngei anghan inngûi mêl pêl no roi. Anni chu mi mitmua bu ngêia an inlang theina rangin an inngûi ngâi ani. Adiktakin nangni ki ril, an râisânman chu an man suozoi.
Nangni chu bu nin ngêi zora khomin nin mâi phie ungla, nin sam khûi roi,
hankêng nin bungêi hah midangngeiin riet thei noni ngeia, mita mutheiloi nin Pa vaiin riet a tih. Male inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu nin Pa han râisânman nangni a pêk rang ani.”
“Pila, arenge le aêkin asiet theina, inrungeiin an murûk theina hin ninta rangin rochon mintûp no roi.
Manêkin invâna, arenge le thîr-êkin asiet thei khâiloina le inrungei khomin an murûk thei khâiloina muna ninta rangin rochon mintûp roi.
No rochon omna muna han zoratin nu mulungrîl om atih.”
“Mitngei hih takpum ranga châti angin ani. Nin mitngei hah asân chu nin takpum pumpui vârin sip a ta;
Aniatachu nin mitngei hah asa nônchu nin takpum pumpui ajîngkhap rang ani. Masikin nin sûnga vâr hah ajîng nisenla, kho dôra jîngindên mo ani rang!”
“Tutên puma inik tîrlâm chang thei noni ngei; ama han inkhat mumâk a ta; inkhat lungkham a tih, aninônchu, ama han inkhat midituol a ta, inkhat heng a tih. Pathien le sum sintho molop thei no tunui.
“Masika han, nangni ki ril, nin ringna rangin imo ka sâkin ke nêk rang, aninônchu takpum rangin imo ki sillin ko bom rang tiin nin kângmindoi no roi. Sâknêk rangin ringna alut uol ok nimak mo? Sil le bom nêkin takpum alut uol nimak mo?
Chunga vuong vangei khi en roi; chimu tû mak ngeia, bu ât uol mak ngeia, sasiera bu mintûp uol mak ngei; hankhoma Invâna om nin Pa'n a donsui ngei tit ngâi! Nangni vâng chu, vangei nêkin nin lut uol ok nimak mo?
Tumo nin ringna chungroia a kângmindoi sika a ringna minsei uol thei rang nin ni?
“Ithomo sil le bom rang sikin nin mulung nin min kâng? Rama pârngei insôn tie so en ta u: an ta rangin sin khom tho uol mâk ngeia, puon khom không mak ngei.
“Aniatachu, nangni ki ril, Rêng Solomon luo a neina murdi leh ânvô khomin hima pârngei mêlsa inkhat dôr hih enhoi mak.
Ram sûl avien a oma, nangtûka aboi nôka lungthu meia tuorip rang sûl luo hah ma angtak han Pathien'n a minvôn anînle, sil le bom khom nangni pêk uol ngêt no ni mo? Idôra taksônna chîn dôn mo nin ni!
“Masikin, khotieng renga mo ka sâk, ke nêk rang le ki sil ko bom rang ahong suok rang? Tiin nin kângmindoi no roi.
“(Sonongngei chu ma neinunngei vai hah kêng an mindon ngâi.) Ma neinunngei murdi hah nin nâng tiin invâna nan Pa'n a riet let ngâi ani.
Manêkin chu, neinun dang dangngei nêkin Pathien Rêngram le nangnia a minnângngei hah mindon bak ungla, hanchu, ma neinunngei murdi ha chu nangni a pêk sa rang ani.
Masikin nangtûka rangin nan kângmindoi no roi; maha khom kângdoinangei ahun rang dôr a dôna. Sûn zeta intaknangei a hongchôi ngâi pêna chu bôk rang nâng mak.”
“Mi chungroi jêk no ungla, Pathien'n nin chungroi jêk no nih,
mi chungroi nin jêk angdênin Pathien'n nin chungroi jêk a ta, male midangngei chunga balam nin mang anghan nin chunga khom a mang rang ani.
Hanchu, ithomo ni mita thingbong om hah mindon loiin nu sûngsuok mita ronok chînte om hah nu mu hi?
Inmo ni mita thingbong om chienin nu sûngsuok kôm, ‘Rangâihoitakin, ni mita ronok chînte hah nang pai pe rong,’ ni ti ngam?
Nangma asarothol! Ni mita thingbong hah pai bak inla, hanchu, nu sûngsuok mita ronok chînte aom pai rangin ânthârlakin mu thei ni tih.
“Uingei kôm neinun inthieng hah pêk no ungla, hong inhei an ta nangni pêt an tih. Vokngei makunga khom nin lungmantam hah vôr no roi, an kên chîlpol an tih.”
“Zong ungla pêkin om nin tih, rok ungla man nin tih; tôk roi, inkhâr nangni mo-ong pe nîng atih.
Tukhom a zong kai chu pêk nîng an ta, a rok kaiin chu man an ta, a tôk kai chu inkhâr mo ong pe nîng atih.
Nangni pangei lâia tukhomin nin nâingei vâipôl nangni zong senla ngei, lung nin pêk rang mini?
Aninônchu, nga nangni zong senla ngei, murûl nin pêk rang mini?
Nangni misie ngeiin luo nin nâingei neinun sa pêk nin rietin te, invâna nin Pa vângin chu a zongngei kôm neinun sa a pêk mintam bâk rang na!
“Mîn nin chunga an sin rang nin nuom tak hah mi chunga khom sin roi: mahi Moses Balam le dêipungei minchûna omtie chu ani.”
“Mokot ân-epa han lût roi, meidîl mokot chu ânzara, a lampui khom ahoia, a se khom tamtak an ni sikin.
Aniatachu ringna mokot chu ân-epa, asena lampui khom ântaka, aman ngei khom mi tômte an ni.”
“Dêipu dikloingei renga indîn roi; pêntieng chu belri angin nin kôm an honga, ania an sûngtieng chu melangngei tatak angin an ni.
Ma ngei hah chu an sinthoa riet kelen nin tih. Riling rângngei han grape inra ngâi maka, riling kungngeia khom theichangngei inrâ ngâi maka.
Thingkung asa chu amara khom asa ngâi, thingkung saloi chu amara khom asiet ngâi ani.
Thingkung adamin chu amara siet ngâi maka, thingkung adamloiin chu amara sa ngâi mak ani.
Thingkung murdi amara saloi chu an phûra meia an vôrpai ngâi.
Masikin dêipu dikloingei chu an sinthoa riet thei nin tih.
“Pumapa, Pumapa, mi ti papai murdi invân Rêngrama lût noni ngeia, invâna ka Pa lungdo sinngei kai kêng an lût rang ani.
Roijêk Nikhuo ahong tungin chu mi tamtakin, ‘Pumapa, Pumapa! Ni rimingin Pathien thurchi kin misîr ngâia, ramkhoringei kin rujûl ngâia, sininkhêl khom mun tamtaka kin sin ngâi!’ la tîng an tih.
Ma tikin chu keiman an kôm, ‘Nangni riet tet ngâi mu-ung. Ko kôm renga rotpai roi, nangni misiengei!’ la tîng ki tih.
“Masikin tukhomin hi ko chongngei hih a rieta jôm chu mivâr lungpui chunga in sinpu angin ani.
Ruo ajuonga, tui ahong liena, phâivuo ahong râta, ma in hah ahong nama. Aniatachu inlet mak, lungpui chunga sin ani sikin.
“Hannirese, tukhom hi ko chongngei a rieta, jômloi chu amo sietsâi chunga in sin angin ani.
Ruo ajuonga, tui ahong liena, phâivuo ahong râta, ma in hah ahong nama, ânleta. Ânlet tie khom ana sabak ani!”
Jisua'n ma neinunngei hah a misîr suole chu loko ngeiin a minchuna hah an kamâm sabak ani.
Ama chu Balam minchupungei angin niloiin; manêkin chu, rachamneina leh mi a minchu ani.
Jisua hah tâng renga a juong chum lehan chu mipui tamtakin an jûia.
Hanchu a kôm mi phâr inkhat a honga, a makunga khûkinbilin, “Pu, nu nuomin chu, mi ni minthieng thei,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kut a hongsôna, a tôna, “Ku nuom, Inthieng ta roh!” tiin a thuona. Harenghan a phâr hah ahon thieng kelena.
Male Jisua'n a kôm han, “Rangâi roh! Tute ril no roh, hannirese, Ochai kôm thengpat inla, va min en roh; hanchu mi murdîn na damzoi, ti an rietna rangin Moses'n inbôlna pêk ranga a lei khâmsai hah va pêk roh a tipea.”
Jisua capernaum khuoa a hong lûtin chu, Rom râlmi ruoipu ahon tongpuia san rangin ânvûia:
“Pu, ki tîrlâm damloiin insûnga jâlmuna sînginsa theiloiin ana sabakin aom,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Hong ka ta mindam ki tih,” a tia.
Ruoipu han a kôm, “O Pu, ma anghan nimak,” tiin a thuona. “Ki ina chu nu lûtna ngâi jât nimak. Chongbâi korongin tiin la ki tîrlâm dam kelen a tih.
Kei khom ruoipu inchungtak rachamneina nuoia om ki nia, male ku nuoia khom râlmingei an oma. Mi inkhat kôm, ‘Se roh!’ tiin chong ke pêkin chu a se ngâia, midang inkhat kôm ‘Hong roh!’ tiin chong ke pêkin chu a hong ngâi; male ki tîrlâm kôm khom, ‘Mahi sin roh!’ ki tiin chu a sin ngâi.”
Jisua'n ma chong hah a rietin chu a kamâm sabaka, loko a jûingei kôm han, “Nangni ki ril, Israelngei lâia khom tute hima dôra taksônna dôn hi chu la mu tet ngâi mu-ung.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, nisuo tieng le nitâk tieng renga mi tamtak hong an ta, Abraham, Isaac, Jacob ngei kôm invân Rêngrama ruolhoia insung an tih.
Aniatachu Rêngram nâingei hah chu pêntieng ijînga paiin om an ta, male mahan chap le hâ rielin om an tih.”
Male Jisua'n râlmi ruoipu tîrlâm kôm han, “Ni ina se ta roh, ni iem angin nata rangin sin nîng atih,” a tia. Hanchu ma mit misim kongkâr han râlmi ruoipu tîrlâm hah a dam zoi.
Jisua hah Peter ina a sea, Peter tarpi jâlmuna jâlin ritun damloiin a juong mua.
Amanu kut hah a tôn pea, a mintun hah a mathâna, male ânthoia a sin a tho pe zoi ani.
Kholoi ahong nînchu, mipui ngeiin, Jisua kôm ramkhori sûr mi tamtak an hong tuonga. Jisua'n chongbâiin ratha saloi ngei hah a notpaia, male damloi murdi khom an dam sa zoi.
Dêipu Isaiah'n, “Ama lelên ei natna ngei a lâk paia, ei damloina ngei a pêl zoi,” tia alei misîr hah ahong tung adik theina rangin maha a tho ani.
Jisua'n mipui ngei an hong ûm a mûn chu, dîl râl tienga inkân rangin a ruoisingei chong a pêk ngeia.
Balam minchupu a kôm ahonga. “Minchupu,” “Ne sena muntina nangma leh se rangin inthoksai ki ni zoi,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm han, “Sialngei kuo an dôna, vangei khomin rubu an dôna, aniatachu Miriem Nâipasal chu a lu minngamna rang luo dôn mak,” tiin a thuona.
Midang inkhat, ruoisi lâia mi han a kôm, “Pu, insûnga mi min se nôk inla, ka pa la vaphûm bak hi rong,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm han, “Ni jûi roh, mithi ngeiin an mithi champui chu phûm rese ngei,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua rukuong chunga a chuonga, a ruoisingei khom ama leh an se sa.
Inningloiin phâivuopui râttak hah dîl ahong dea, male rukuong hah ngîm rang dôrin tuidâr ânsoka. Aniatachu Jisua chu a lei inphara.
Ruoisingei hah a kôm an sea, an va kaithoia. “Pumapa, mi sanmojôk ta roh! kin thi rang kêng ani zoi!” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm han, “Ithomo nin chi bâka?” “Nin taksôna dôn khom hi idôrtaka chîn mo ani zoi!” tiin a thuona. Hanchu ânthoia, phâivuopui le tuidârinsok hah mong rangin chong a pêka, male chu ânthim ngung zoi.
Mi murdi'n an kamâm sabaka, “Hi mi hih kho anga miriem mo ani hi? Phâivuopui le tuidârinsok ten khom a chong an jôm hi!” an tia.
Dîl râl tieng Gadara rama Jisua a hongtung lehan, ramkhori sûr mi inik thân renga hongsuok ngeiin an intongpuia, Ma ngei hah chi an om sikin ma lampuia han tute se ngam ngâi mak ngeia.
Harenghan anni hah an in-ieka, “Pathien Nâipasal, imo mi lo rang ni ti? Zora khâm atung mân dûk mi tho ranga juong mo ni ni?” an tia.
Ala bâkloina han vok pâlpa sâk rok an oma.
Masikin ramkhoringei han, “Mi ni rujûl rangin chu vok pâlngei sûnga son mi min se roh,” tiin Jisua an ngêna.
Jisua'n, “Se roi,” a tipe ngeia; hanchu an jôka, vokngei sûnga an va lûta. Vok pâl murdi hah dîl rakham rôlsora an tânna, dîla an tâkriei zoi ani.
Vok donsûi mingei hah an tânna, khopui sûnga an sea, a thurchi anrêngin an va misîra, ramkhori sûrngei chunga neinun omtie ngei murdi khom hah an va misîr zoia.
Masikin khopui renga mi murdi Jisua intongpui rangin an suoka; male an va mua anin chu, an ram renga jôkpai rangin an ngên zoi.
Jisua rukuonga a chuonga, dîl râl rakânin a omna khopui tieng a kîr nôka,
mahan mi senkhat ngeiin phalkhatthi a jâlmun leh a kôm an hong rojôna. Jisua'n taksôn an dôntie hah a mua, phalkhatthipa kôm han, “Ka nâipasal rathanngam takin om roh! na nunsiengei ngâidam ani zoi,” a tia.
Hanchu Balam minchupu senkhat ngeiin an mulungrîlin, “Hi mi hin Pathien a rilsiet kêng!” an tia.
Jisua'n an mulungrîla an mindon ngei hah a lei rieta, masikin an kôm han, “Ithomo ma anga neinun saloi hah nin mulungrîla nin mindon?
‘Nu nunsiengei ngâidam ani zoi,’ nônchu, ‘Inthoi inla, lôn ta roh,’ ti hih kho hi mo a ti abai uol?
Miriem Nâipasal hih pilchunga nunsiengei ngâidam theina rachamneina a dôn, ti nangni lei min mu rong” a tia. Masikin phalkhatthipa kôm han, “Inthoi inla, na jâlmun luok inla, ni ina se ta roh!” a tipea.
Ha mi hah ânthoia male a ina a se zoi.
Mipui ngei han maha an mûn chu, an chia, miriemngei kôma ma anga rachamneina pêkpu Pathien an minpâk zoi ani.
Jisua'n ha mun hah a mâka, a senân sum rusuongpu inkhat a riming Matthew an ti, a sukmuna ânsung lâitak a mua, a kôm, “Ni jûi roh,” a tipea. Matthew hah ânthoia, a jûi kelen zoi.
Jisua hah Matthew ina bu a nêk lâitakin, sum rusuongpu tamtakngei le mitelloi ngei an honga, Jisua le a ruoisingei dosânga bu an nêkpui ngei sa zoi.
Pharisee senkhat ngeiin maha an mûn chu a ruoisingei kôm han, “Ithomo nangni minchupu'n hi anga mingei leh bu a nêka hi?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
Jisua'n an chong hah a lei rieta, an kôm han, “Mi dam ngeiin doctor nâng ngâi mak ngeia, mi damloi ngei vaiin kêng an nâng ngâi.
Pathien lekhabu'n: ‘Lungkhamna kêng ku nuom, inbôlna sa ngei nuom mu-ung,’ a ti hih, se ungla a omtie va riet roi. Midikngei ralam ranga juong ni mu-unga, midikloingei ralam ranga juong kêng ki ni,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Male, Baptispu John nûkjûi ngei Jisua kôm an honga, “Ithomo keini le Phariseengei hin bungêi kin tho bang ngâia, na ruoisingei rêkinte an ngêi tet ngâi loi?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm han, “Inneina sâknêk thona taka khuolmingei hah moipumapa an kôm aom sûngin an beimindong rangin nin mindon mini? Ni thei no ni! Hannirese, an kôm renga moipumapa an tuong pai pe nikhuo la tung ata, ma tikin chu bu la ngêi an tih.
“Tutên puon muruo hah puon thar hâr leh chitpho ngâi mak ngeia, puon thar hah inchirup ata, puon an ongna hah manêkin lien uol nôk atih.
Tutên uain thar savun ûm muruoa thun ngâi mak ngeia, thun ngân senla, uain thar han savun ûm hah mûtkhoi ata, uain le savun ûm hah mangnaboi chang atih. Manêkin chu uain thar chu savun ûm thara an thuna, an ruonin asa ngâi a tia.”
Jisua'n hi chong hih a misîr lâitakin, Juda ruoipu inkhat a honga, a makunga, khûkinbilin a kôm han, “Ka nâinupang atûn renghan a thia; aniatachu hong inla, a chunga nu kut minngam inla, hong ring nôk a tih,” a tia.
Masikin Jisua ânthoia male a jûia, a ruoisingei khom ama leh an se sa.
Nuvengte inkhat kum sômleinik hulloia damloinu han Jisua nûka a honga male a puonmor a tôna.
Amanu nanâkin “A puon morte luo khom tôn inlang chu dam kelen ki tih,” a tia.
Jisua ânhei titira male amanu hah a mua, a kôm, “Ka nâinupang rathanngam takin om roh! na taksônna hih na dampuina ani,” a tia. Ha mit misim kongkâr han nuvengtenu hah a hong dam zoi.
Hanchu, Jisua hah ruoipu ina han a lûta. Berlem tum ngâi ngei le mithi-uop mipui kuorchok omngei hah ava mûn chu an kôm han,
nin rêngin “Jôkpai roi! Nupangte hih athi nimaka, a in kêng!” a tia. Hanchu anni han ama hah an munuisana.
Hannirese, mipui ngei an notpai ngei suole harenghan, Jisua hah nupangte omna khâltana han a lûta a kut a sûr pea nupangte hah a hon thoi zoi.
Ma roi hah ma ram pumpuia han ânthang zit zoi.
Jisua'n ma mun hah a mâka, ava sên chu mitcho inikin an jûia, “David Nâipasal, inrieng mi mu roh!” tiin ân in-ieka.
Jisua insûnga a lûtin chu, mitcho inik ngei hah a kôm an honga, male Jisua'n an kôm, “Nangni mindam thei ki tih, ti nin iem mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “O kin iem, Pu!” tiin an thuona.
Male Jisua'n an mitngei a tôna, an kôm, “Nin iem anghan nin chunga tung rese!” a tia.
Hanchu an mit ahong vâr pe ngei zoi. Jisua'n, “Mahi tute kôm ril no roi!” tiin chong a be ngei sabaka.
Hannirese, anni ngei hah an sea, ma ram pumpuia han Jisua chungroi hah an va mazarzit zoi ani.
Ha mingei hah an mâkin chu, mi senkhat ramkhori sûr chong theiloi inkhat Jisua kôm an hong tuonga.
Aniatachu ramkhori hah notpai ani suole, harenghan ma miriem hah a hong chong thei zoia, mi murdi'n an kamâm sabak zoi. “Israelngei lâia hima anga mi reng hih la mu ngâi mak me!” an tia.
Aniatachu Phariseengeiin chu, “Ramkhoringei an ulientakpa'n kêng Jisua hih ramkhori rujûl theina ranak a pêk ani hi,” an tia.
Jisua'n khopuingei le khuo chîn ngeia a chai titira. Synagog inngeia a minchua, Rêngram Thurchi Sa a misîra, damloi murdi le natna jât tamtakngei a mindama.
Mipui ngei hah a mûn chu, a mulungrîla anni ngei inriengmunân a sipa, belringei ahôlpu boi angin, kângdoiin le san rang boiin an om anni sikin.
Masikin a ruoisingei kôm han, “Bu ât rang chu atam sabaka, aniatachu, a mintûp ranga sinthopungei chu tômte an ni.
Masikin a bu ât ranga sinthopu ngei a juongtîrna rangin bu pumapa kôm han chubai tho roi,” a ti.
Jisua'n a ruoisi sômleinik ngei hah a koitûp ngeia, ratha saloi ngei rujûlpai theina le damloina le ri murdi mindam theina ranak a pêk ngeia.
Tîrton sômleinik ngei riming chu hi ngei hih an ni: Amotontaka Simon (Peter an ti) le a nâipa Andrew; Jebedee nâipasal inik Jacob le a nâipa John,
Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas le chôiruol rusuongpu Mathew; Alphaeus nâipasal Jacob le Thaddaeus;
Canan mi Simon le a minsûrpu Judas Iscariot ngei an ni.
Hi miriem sômleinik ngei hih Jisua'n a tîr ngeia, an kôm hi angin a ril ngeia: “Jentailngei rama le Samari mingei khopuingeia chu se no roi.
Manêkin, Israel mingei lâia belri inmangngei kôm nin se rang ani.
Se ungla, ‘Invân Rêngram chu anâi zoi!’ tiin va misîr roi.
Damloingei mindam ungla, athi ngei kaithoi ungla, aphârngei minthieng ungla, ramkhoringei rujûlpai roi. Manboia nin man ania, manboi nanâkin pêk roi.
Nin pepa rângkachak sumdâr mo, ruphâi mo, sumsen mo chôi no roi;
nin chaina rangin cholite mo, kancholi bob mo, kekok bob mo, khiengrol bob mo chôi no roi. Sinthopungei chu an nângngei hah pêk rang ani.
“Khopuia mo, khochinna mo nin lûtin nangni mintung rang nuoma nangni lei phâm mi rok ungla, ma mun hah nin mâknôk mâka chu ama kôm han om tit roi.
Insûng nin lûtin chu, ‘Nin chunga rathanngamna om rese,’ ti roi.
Ma ina omngei han nangni an lei modômin chu nin rathanngamna chibaimûkna hah an chunga tung rese; hannirese nangni an lei modôm nôn chu nin chibai chongbâi hah lâk mikhîr nôk roi.
Male, kho in khoma, kho khuo khoma nangni an lei phâm noa, nin chong an rangâi nôn chu ma mun hah mâkrak ungla, nin kea pildi hah không mathâk roi.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, Roijêk Nikhuon chu ha khopuia mingei tuong rang nêkin chu Pathien'n Sodom le Gomora khopuia mingei tuong rang chu inriengmuna minlang uol a tih!”
“Rangâi roi! Melang pâl kâra belri om angin nangni ki tîr ani. Murûlngei anghan vârin le vasu-ngei anghan nuninêmin nin om ngêt rang ani.
Aniatachu indîn roi, nangni sûra, roijêknamuna nangni tuonga, synagog inngeia nangni vîk rang an om rang sikin.
Keima sika roijêkpungei le rêngngei makunga lân ding nin tih, anni le Jentailngei Thurchi Sa nin misîr pe ngei theina rangin.
Nin chung roijêk ranga nangni an tuong tika, imo nin ti rang aninônchu kho angin mo nin ti rang lei mindonin nan kângmindoi no roi; azora ahong tungin chu nin ti rang hah pêkin om nin tih.
Chong nin ti rang ngei hah nangni nin chong nino nia; nin Pa Ratha renga juongin nangnia a chong rang ani.
“Miriemngeiin an lâibungngei nanâk khom that rangin la minsûr an ta, ma angdên han pangei khomin an nâingei la minsûr sâng an ta; nâingei khomin an nulepangei doi an ta male that ngei an tih.
Keima sikin mitinin nangni mumâk an tih. Aniatachu tukhom among dêna tuongdierpu chu sanminringin om an tih.
Khopui inkhata an nuom nangni an lôn chu khopui danga rotpat roi. Adiktakin nangni ki ril, Miriem Nâipasal a juong mân Israel rama khopuingei murdia nin sintho zoi no tunui.
“Inchulâi hah a minchupu nêkin lien uol mak; suok khom a pu nêkin lien uol mak.
Masikin inchulâi hah a minchupu angin hong om rang hah a mulung a minchuk rang ani, tîrlâm khom a pu angin hong om rang hah a mulung achuk rang ani. In pumapa luo Beelzebul, tiin an koiin te, a in mingei vang chu khodôra riming saloi uolin mo an koi rang ni zoi!”
“Masikin miriemngei hah chi no roi. Atûna thupa om murdi lân lang let ata, ippa om murdi la phuong nîng atih.
Ajînga nangni ki ril hih sûnkhovâra misîr ungla, kuor kunga nin riet hih inchungsîpa chuongin tânghâi roi.
Taksa thata ratha that theiloi ngei chu chi no ungla; manêk han Pathien meidîla taksa le ratha anruona that theipu hah chi roi.
Invâ inik poisakhatin nin rochôk thei, nikhomrese, an lâia inkhat luo nin Pa rachamin ninôn chu pilchunga tak noni ngei.
Ma anghan nangni rang khom nin samsang tena khom tellet kêng ani.
Masikin chi no roi; invâ tamtakngei nêkin nin lût uol ok kêng!
“Tutu loko rieta ni thop kai chu kei khom invâna ka pa makunga thop ki tih.
Aniatachu tutu loko rieta ni heng kai chu invâna ka Pa makunga heng ki tih.
“Rammuola hin inngêina minlêng ranga juongin mi mindon no roi. Inngêina minlêng ranga juong ni mu unga, khandai minlêng ranga juong kêng ki ni.
Nâipasalngeiin an pangei mindoi rang, nâinupangngeiin an nungei mindoi rang, moi ngeiin an tarpingei mindoi ranga juong kêng ki ni;
na râl saloitakngei chu ni insûng mingei nanâk nîng an tih.
“Tutu keima nêka an nungei mo, an pangei mo lungkham uol ngei chu ku ruoisi rangin chuk mak ngei; tutu keima nêka an nâipasalngei mo, an nâinupangngei mo lungkham uol ngei chu ka ruoisi rangin chuk mak ngei.
Tutu an khros ruputa ku nûk jûiloi ngei chu ku ruoisi rangin chuk mak ngei.
Tutu an ringna man rang bôk ngei kaiin chu machân an ta; aniatachu, keima rang sika an ringna machân ngei kaiin chu man uol an tih.
“Tukhom nangni modôm chu keima ni modôm ani, tukhom keima ni pom chu mitîrpu a pom ani.
Tukhom Pathien tîrlam hah Pathien tîrlam anina sikin a lei modômin chu Pathien tîrlam, râisânman chang sâng a tih. Tukhom misa hah misa anina sikin a lei pomin chu misa râisânman chang sâng a tih.
Tukhom ku nûkjûi ngei lâia a chîntak khom ka ruoisi anina sikin tuidâi kilât khat khom lei min nêk chu, nangni ki ril, râisânman chu man ngêt a tih,” a tia.
Jisua'n hi rilnangei hih a ruoisi sômleinik ngei kôm a pêk suolechu, ma mun hah a mâka, male a revêla khopuingeia minchu rang le thurchi misîr rangin a se zoia.
Baptispu John'n Jisua sintho ngei hah jêl ina a lei rietin chu, a ruoisingei senkhat Jisua kôm a tîra.
Jisua kôm han, “Ni ril roh, ‘John'n a juong rangpu a ti hah nini mo?’ Aninônchu mi dang kin la sabei rang mo?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Se nôk ungla, neinun nin mu le nin riet ngei hih John kôm va ril roi:
mitcho ngeiin an mu thei zoi, kholrangeiin an lôn thei zoi, vun ri saloitak ngei minthieng ani zoi, kuorsêtngei khom an riet thei zoi, athi ngei minring nôk ani zoi, inriengngei kôm Thurchi Sa misîr ani zoi.
Tutu ku chungroia mulungokchâna neiloi ngei chu satvur an ni!” tiin a ani thuon ngeia.
John ruoisingei hah an se nôkin chu, Jisu a'n lokongei kôm han John chungroi a misîra: “John kôm ramchâra nin se lâihan imo mu rangin nin sabei ha? Phâivuo'n sûlngei asêm minkûm hah mo?
Imo en rangin nin se? Mi puon innêmngei leh invo mo? Ma anga ânvo ngâi mingei chu rêng-ina kêng an om ngâi!
Ni ril roi, imo en rangin nin se? Dêipu mo? Ani tatak, aniatachu, dêipu nêka lien uol ok nin mu hi te.
John chungroi rang hi kêng Pathien Lekhabu'n, ‘Pathien'n ki tîrlam no motona na lampui mo-ong rangin tîr ki tih,’ a lei ti hah ani.
Adiktakin nangni ki ti, Baptispu John nêka lien uol tute lân zir ngâi mak ngei. Hannirese, invân Rêngrama a chintakpu khom John nêkin chu alien uol ani.
Baptispu John'n a thurchi a misîr lâi renga aviensûn tena invân Rêngram chu rangrâta doina ngei atuong ngâia, mi tukdullien ngeiin ma ram hah lâk rang an pût ngâi.
Dêipungei murdi le Moses Balam chong han John juong om dênin, Rêngram Thurchi an misîra;
an thurchi misîr nin iem nuomin chu, a juong rang chongphuonga lei om chu, John hih Elijah ani.
Hanchu, kuor nin dônin chu rangai roi!
“Atûn lâia thoitharngei hih ile mo ki mintêk rang? Nâipangngei bazar muna insungngei angin an ni, pâl khatin pâl dangngei an mi-ieaka,
‘Inneina miringhoi nangni kin tum pea, aniatachu, lâm mak cheia! Chûlna la kin tho khomin chap mak chei!’
John a juong lâihan bu a ngêia, uain nêk maka, mitinin, ‘Ama chu ramkhori sûr kêng an tia!’
Miriem Nâipasal chu a juonga, a sâka, a nêka, mitinin, ‘Hi mi hih en ta u! Bu mudupa le uain mudupa, sum rusuongngei leh midikloi ngei malpa so!’ an tia. Nikhomrese, Pathien vârna chu adik iti a mara han minlangin aom ani,” a tia.
Jisua'n sininkhêl a thona khopuingeia mingei han an nunsienangei renga inhei mak ngeia, masikin ha khopuingei hah a ngo ngeia.
“Korazin, nu chungroi arik bah na! Bethsaida, khom nu chungroi arik bah na! Nangnia sininkhêl sina omngei hah Tyre le Sidon'a lei sin nisenla chu, ma taka mingei han an nunsiena ngei renga an inhei minlangnân thoilapuon insilin ruvuta an inbuolna sôt atih zoi!
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, Roijêk Nikhuon chu Pathien'n nangni nêkin chu Tyre le Sidon mingei chunga mulungjûrpuina minlang uol atih!
Nangma, Capernaum rang khom! nangma nethenin invân dênin indomsâng rang nu nuom mini? Meidîla vôrpai nîng ni tih! Nu sûnga sininkhêl sina omngei hah Sodom'a lei sin nisenla chu aviensûn tena hin la om tit atih!
Nang ki ril, Roijêk Nikhuon chu Pathien'n nangma nêkin chu Sodom chunga mulungjûrpuina minlang uol atih!” a tia.
Ma zora lâihan Jisua'n, “Pa, invân le pilchung Pumapa! mivâr, mitheingei kôma ni ip hah mi inmôlngei kôm ni minlang sikin no kôm râisânchong ki ril.
Ani, Pa, ma anga hongni rang hah nu lungdo tak ani.
“Neinunngei murdi ka Pa'n ni pêk zoi. Pa tiloiin chu tutên Nâipasal hah riet mak ngei, male Nâipasal tiloiin chu tutên Pa khom riet mak ngei, Nâipasalin ân phuongna ranga a thang ngeia tiloiin chu.
“Nangni, puok rik pêla sôlngei, nin rêngin ko kôm hong ungla, keima'n inngamna nangni pêk ki tih.
Ki ringkol lâk ungla pêl roi, male ko kôm inchû roi, ratha han nuninnêm tak le rangâiinchîn tak ki ni sikin; inngamna man nin tih.
Ki ringkol nangni ke pêk rang chu apêl ahoia, ku puok khom ajânghiei ani,” a tia.
Sûn sôtbâkloi suolechu Sabbathnin Jisua bubilngeia a lôna. A ruoisingei an von achâma, masikin buvûingei chinin an chipa.
Phariseengeiin an mu'n chu, Jisua kôm, “En ta, Sabbathnia nu ruoisingeiin an tho hih ei Balamin ai khap ani!” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “David le a mingeiin an vonchâm lâia an tho hah nin la pore tet ngâiloi mo?
Ama hah Pathien ina a lûta, ama le a mingeiin Pathien kôma pêksai vâipôl, an sâk ranga Balamin ai khap ochaingei vaiin an sâk ranga phala omngâi vâipôl hah an sâk ani.
Aninônchu, adiktakin Sabbathni racham ochai Biekina omngâi ngeiin Sabbathni balam an minchâi ngâia, hannoma, theiloiintum ngâi mak ngei ti Moses Balam lekhabu nin la pore loi mo?
Nangni ki ril, mahin neinun imini Biekin nêka roiinpui uol aom.
Pathien lekhabu'n, ‘Inbôlna nuom mu-unga moroina kêng ku nuom,’ ai ti hih a omtie nin riet minthâr tatak nisenla chu minchâinaboi mingei hah theiloi mintum no tunui;
Miriem Nâipasal hih Sabbathni Pumapa ani sikin,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha mun hah mâkin synagog ina a lûta,
mahan mi inkhat kut phalkhatthi alei oma. Mi senkhat Jisua a tho minchâi tia nôn nuom ngei an lei om sa, masikin anni han a kôm, “Sabbathnia mi mindam hih ei Balamin a khap mo?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nin lâia tumakhatin belri inkhat dôn senla male Sabbathni han khur inthûka tâk pe senla, juong rûtin nin kelsuo loi rang mo?
Miriem chu belri nêkin a lut uol ok ani! Masikin, Sabbathnia tumini san rangin ei Balamin mi phal ani,” tiin a thuona.
Male kut phalkhatthipa kôm han, “Nu kut phar roh,” a tipea. A kut a phara, kângkhat tienga angin a hong dam phar zoi.
Hanchu Phariseengei hah an rota male Jisua that rangtie an mintuo zoi.
An that rangtie an phan chungroi hah Jisua'n a rietin chu ha mun renga hah a rota; lokongeiin a nûk an jûi zoi. Damloi ngei murdi a mindam ngeia
male ama chungroi tute kôm misîr loi rangin chong a pêk ngeia.
Masikin, Pathien'n dêipu Isaiah kôma alei ti hah ajuong tung adik theina rangin mahi a tho ani:
“Mahi ki tîrlâm, ka thangsaipu hah, ku lungkhampu, le a chunga ku mulungtâiriempu hah ani. A chunga ka ratha tîr ka ta, male ama'n namtinngei kôm ko roijêkna phuong a tih.
Ama chu makhal nonia, hanchu in-iek uol nonia; aninônchu lamlienngeia khom ruhulum tho noni.
Ama'n sûl ânkûichara om hah khiekpai nonia, hanchu châti athi vavâng hah khom thatrip no nih. Roijêkdikna han a zoi mâka chu khan tit a ta,
male mingei murdi'n ama chunga han an sabeina minngam an tih.”
Hanchu mi senkhat ngeiin Jisua kôm han mi inkhat a mitcho le ramkhori sûr sikin chong theiloi an hong tuonga. Jisua'n ama hah a mindama, masikin ama hah a chong theia, a mu thei zoi ani.
Jisua sintho hah lokongei murdi'n an kamâm sabaka, “Ama hih David Nâipasal ni thei ni mo?” tiin an rekela.
Maha Phariseengeiin an rietin chu, “Hi mi hin ramkhoringei a rujûl theina chu an rêngpa Beelzebul'n ranak a pêk sikin ani,” tiin chong an mele.
Jisua'n imo an mindon hah a rieta, masikin an kôm, “Kho ram khom apâlpâlin an insema an indoi inlômin chu sôi ngâi mak. Kho khopui khom, aninônchu insûngmingei khom apâlpâlin an insenna an indoi inlômin chu an inlet rang ani.
Masikin soitan rama khom pâl khatin pâl dang an doiin chu, pâl an insen tina nîng ata, male ânlet kelen rang ani!
Beelzebul'n ranak ni pêk sikin ramkhori ngei ku rujûl thei nin tia. Asa, nônchu, nin nûkjûi ngei hah tumo ranak a pêk ngeia anni ngei han an rujûlpai ngâi? Nin nûkjûingei nanâkin an lei tho ngâi han nin tho minchâina a minlang ani!
Nimak, mahi Beelzebul nimaka, Pathien Ratha kêng ramkhori rujûlpai theina ranak ni pêk, mahin Pathien Rêngram nin kôm a juong tung zoi ti a minlang ani.
“Tutên mi rât ina lûtin a neinunngei lâk pe thei no nih, mi rât hah a khit bak nônchu; hanchu a in hah minram pe thei a tih.
“Tutu keima ranga niloi kai chu atatakin mi doi ani; tutu a mintûp ni sanloipu chu ataktakin chekaminchâi ani.
Masikin nangni ki ril, mingei an sietna murdi le Pathien doia asaloi an ti ngei murdi chu ngâidam thei nîng ata; aniatachu, Ratha Inthieng doia asaloi an ti ngei chu ngâidam nino nih.
Tutu Miriem Nâipasal doia asaloi an ti ngei chu ngâidam thei nîng ata; aniatachu, tutu Ratha Inthieng doia asaloi an ti ngei chu atûn le tuonsôtin ngâidam nino nih.
“Mara sa dôn rangin chu thingkung adam nin dôn ngêt anâng; thingkung damloi nin dônin chu mara saloi dôn nin tih. Thingkung chu a marân riet thei ani.
Murûlngei nangni asaloi lei ni chienin kho-angin mo chongsa nin tho thei ranga? Mulung sûnga sipa liem hah kêng bâiin ai suo ngâi ani.
Mi sân a rochonkok renga neinun sa a kaisuo ngâia; mi saloiin chu a rochonkoka neinun saloi a kaisuo ngâi.
“Nangni ki ril, Roijêk Nikhuon chu mitinin chongkâmboi an tho ngei hah la misîr let an tih.
Minchâinaboi mo ni ni aninônchu theiloiintum mo ni ni minthârna rangin no chongngei hah mangin nu chungroi jêk nîng atih.”
Hanchu Balam minchupu senkhat le Pharisee senkhat ngeiin a kôm, “Minchupu, sininkhêl no tho mu rang kin nuom,” an tia.
Jisua jâminzalin an kôm, “Atûnlâia mingei idôrtaka saloi le Pathien dônloi mo nin ni zoi!” Sininkhêl tho rangin mi nin ngêna? Nimak! Dêipu Jonah sininkhêl tho tiloiin chu sininkhêl dang nangni pêk ni no nih.
Jonah hah sûnthum jân thum ngapui vonsûnga a oma, ma angdên han Miriem Nâipasal hih sûnthum jân thum pil inthûk sûnga aom rang ani.
Roijêk Nikhuon chu Nineveh mingei hah inding an ta, nangni nôn an tih; anni chu Jonah thurchi misîr an rieta; an sietnangei renga an inhei sikin; male nangni ki ril, Jonah nêka lien uol mahin aom!
Roijêk Nikhuon chu Rêngnu Sheba hah inding a ta, nangni nôn a tih, Rêng Solomon vâr minchûna rangâi rangin a ram latak renga a hong sikin; adiktakin nangni ki ril, Solomon nêka lien uol mahin aom!
“Ratha saloi hah mi sûng renga a jôkin chu inngâmna mun rokin tui boina rama a chai titira, aman loi tika chu,
‘ki ina kîr nôk ki tih’ a tia. Hanchu a kîr nôka, a in atongrieiin, phiet minsâivarin, le cherêl irin ava mua.
Hanchu, a jôkpaia ratha dang sari ama nêka puoloi uol a hong tuong ngeia, mahan an lûta, an om zoi. Masuole chu ha miriem nunchan hah aphuta nêkin a puoloi uol ok zoi. Hima ang hin atûnlâia mi saloi ngei chunga ala tung rang ani,” a tia.
Mipui ngei kôm han Jisua ala chong lâitakin, a nû le lâibungngei an hong tunga. Ama chongpui nuomin, pêntieng an indinga.
Masikin ha muna mi inkhatin a kôm, “En ta, nu nû le na lâibungngei nang chongpui rang an nuoma pêntieng nang an ngâk,” a ti pea.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Tumo ku nû? Tumo ka lâibungngei?” tiin a thuona.
Male a ruoisingei tieng a khînna, “En roi! Hi ngei hih ku nû le ka lâibungngei an ni!
Tutu invâna Ka Pa lungdo sinngei hih ka lâibungngei, ka sarnungei, ku nû ngei an ni,” a tia.
Mani sûn nanâk han Jisua hah in mâkin dîl rakham tieng a sea, mahan minchu rangin ânsunga.
Loko ahong intûp hah an tamrai sikin rukuonga ânsunga, loko ngei chu dîl rakhama an indinga.
Chongmintêkngei mangin neinun tamtak a misîr pe ngei. “Rangai ta u, voikhat chu mi inkhatin burît rangin a sea.
Loilâia sachi a rethea, senkhat lampui kôla achula, vâ ngei an honga an sâkripa.
Senkhat lungpherpha chunga pil inphânna achula, pil abitloi sikin a hongkei kelena.
Aniatachu nisa ahôn sânga, alumin bukung innoinarte hah a em minthêma, aruzung mathâk hah ânthûkpe loi sikin achârrip zoi.
Sachi senkhatngei chu riling râng kâra achula, riling hah ahong insôna, adîp min mang riei zoi.
Aniatachu, senkhat chu pil sana achula, senkhat razan, senkhat sômrukin, senkhat sômthumin ahong inra zoi.”
Male Jisua'n chongkhârnan an kôm, “Kuor nin dônin chu rangâi roi!” a tia.
Hanchu ruoisingei hah Jisua kôm an honga, mipui ngei kôm thurchi ni misîrin “Ithomo chongmintêk na mang ngâia?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Invân Rêngram chonginthup roia rietna chu nin kôm pêk ani zoia, midang ngei kôm chu pêk nimak.
Tukhom neinun imini a dônsai kai chu pêk sa nîng ata, masikin ahundôr nêka tam dôn a tih; hannirese tukhom neinun ite dônloi chu a dônsai te hah khom lâk pe rip nîng a tih.
An kôm chongmintêk manga ko chongpui ngei ngâina abitak chu an ena an mu loina rang, le an rangâia, aniatachu an rietthei loina ranga ani.
Masikin dêipu Isaiah lei ril hah an chunga ahong tung ani: ‘Hi mingei hin rangâi an ta aniatachu rietthei noni ngei; en, en an ta aniatachu mu thei noni ngeia,
an mulungngei alên môl zoia, an kuorngei an lei min sêt zoia, male an mitngei khom an lei sîng zoi sikin. Ninosenla, chu an mitin mûng an ta, an kuorin riet an ta, an mulungbôk ngeiin rietthei an ta, Pathien'n, ko kôm an hon heia, ke lei mindam ngei duoi mo tâk,’ a tia.
“Nangni rangin, idôra satvur mo nin ni zoi! Nin mitin a mua, nin kuorin a riet ani.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, nin mu hih dêipu tamtakngei le Pathien mi tam takngei mu rang an nuom sabaka, aniatachu mu thei mak ngei, nin riet khom hih a riet an nuom sabaka, hannirese riet thei mak ngei ani.”
“Hanchu, rangâi ungla, sachirethepa chongmintêk omtie hih inchu roi.
Tutu khom Rêngram thurchi rieta, aniatachu rietminthârna dônloi chu sachi lampui kôla chul angin an ni. Misie hah a honga, an mulungrîla rethea om hah a lâkpai pe ngei ngâi.
Sachi lungpherpha chunga pil inphânna chul chu thurchi hah a riet lehan râisântaka pom kelen ngei hih an ni.
Aniatachu ruzung inthûk amathâk loi sikin om sôt ngâi maka; ma thurchi sikin imokhat intakna mini nuomlona mini ahong om tena chu an mâk nôk kelen ngâi.
Sachi, riling râng kâra chul chu thurchi lei rietsai ngei an ni; hannirese hi taksa ringnuna hoina le nei rang nuomna roia kangdôina ngeiin chongtak hah adîpa, mara dôn ngâi mak ngei.
Hanchu sachi pil sana chul chu thurchi hah an rieta, male a rietthei ngei hah an ni. An mara ngei senkhat razan, senkhat sômrukin, senkhat sômthumin an hong pung ngâi,” a tia.
Jisua'n chongmintêk dang a rilngei nôka: “Invân Rêngram chu ma ang hin ani. Mi inkhatin a loia sachi sa rethepa leh mintêk ani.
Jân khat chu mi an inriei suole, a râl ahonga, bu lâia han bu rothol arthea, a rotpat nôka.
Hanchu bu hah a hong mônga, ahong vuiin chu bu rothol khom ahong inlang sa zoi.
Loi pumapa tîrlâmngei hah an honga, a kôm, ‘Pu, no loia sachi sa nerthe hah; bu rothol so kho renga hong om mini?’ an tia.
Ama'n an kôm, ‘mahah chu râlngei lei tho kêng,’ tiin a thuona. Anni han, ‘bu rotholngei so va chuon unglang nu nuom mo?’ tiin an rekela.
‘Nâng mak,’ bu rothol nin chuonin chu butak khom nin phôidelsa rang kêng tiin a thuon ngeia.
Bu ât zora dên mâka chu butak le arothol anruonin munkhatin insôn rese ngei. Hanchu bu ât ngâingei kôm bu arothol hah phoipaia, khita, hâl baka masuole butak hah ka sasiera thun rangin chong la be ta rong a tia.”
Jisua'n chongmintêk dang a misîr pe ngei nôka, “Invân Rêngram chu min ancham ru a chôia, a loia a rethe ang hi ani.
Mahi chimuru murdi lâia a chîntak ani, aniatachu, ahong lien tikin chu chimu dang ngei nêka alientak ani ngâi. Thingkung ahong changa, masikin vâ ngei an honga, amachanga han rubu an phan ngâi,” a tia.
Jisua'n chongmintêk dang a misîr nôka: “Invân Rêngram chu nuvengte inkhatin chol a lâka vâipôl her sômminli leh athoi mâka tâidôna a minpola a bil angin ani,” a tia.
Ha ngei murdi hah Jisua'n lokongei kôm chongmintêkin a ril ngeia; chongmintêk mang loiin chu an kôm han ite misîr mak.
Mahi a thona bi chu dêipu'n alei misîr: “An kôm chong ki rillin chongmintêk mang ka ta; Khuonsieng renga neinun inthupngei hah misîr pe ngei ki tih,” ti hah ahong tung adikna ranga ani.
Jisua'n lokongei hah mâkin insûnga a lûtin chu a ruoisingei an honga, a kôm, “Loia bu rothol chongmintêk roi hah khoi tina mo mi ril roh,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Mi sachi sa rethepu hah Miriem Nâipasal ania;
loi chu rammuol hih ani; Sachi sa chu Rêngram nâingei hih an ni, bu rothol chu Misie nâingei an ni;
male râl, bu rothol rethepu hah chu Diabol ani. Bu ât zora chu rammuol mongna rang nikhuo ania, bu âtpu ngei hah vântîrtonngei an ni.
Bu rotholngei hah an mintûpa, meia an hâl angdên han rammuol mong tika chu ala tung rang ani:
Miriem Nâipasal'n a vântîrtonngei hah tîr a ta, a Rêngram renga mi sietna sin ngâi ngei le saloi sin ngâi ngei chu minchun an ta,
mei thithei ngâiloia han pai ngei an ta, mahan chap an ta, an rakam riel an tih.
Hanchu Pathien mingei chu an Pa Rêngrama nisa angin vâr an tih zoi. Rangâi roi, kuor nin dônnin chu!
“Invân Rêngram chu mi inkhatin loilâia rochon phûm inrûkten amu suoka; a phûm nôka, a râisân rai sikin a sea, a dônngei murdi ava juor leta, a kîr nôka male ma loi hah a rochôk angin ani.
“Invân Rêngram chu mi inkhatin lungmantam satak a roka,
lungmantam satak hah a mûn chu, a sea, a dônngei murdi ava juor leta, male ma lungmantam hah a rochôk angin ani.
“Invân Rêngram chu ngasûrpu senkhat ngeiin an lên dîla an vôra, nga jât da-dang an sûr angin ani nôk.
Lên hah asipmat tena chu dîl rakhama an kaisuoa, mahan nga insem rangin an insunga: asa murdi chu koka an thuna asaloi kai chu an paia.
Rammuol mong tika chu ma anghan la nîng atih: vântîrtonngei juong suok an ta, misangei lâi renga misaloingei hah mintûp an ta
mei thithei ngâiloia han pai an ta, mahan chap an ta, an hâ riel an tih,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ma neinungei murdi hah nin rietthei mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “O, kin rietthei,” tiin an thuona.
Ama'n an kôm, “Ma omtie chu, Balam minchupungei murdi invân Rêngrama ruoisi changngei kai chu, in pumapa a rochondarna khâltan renga neinun thar le neinun muruo a kaisuo angin ani,” a tia.
Jisua'n ma chongmintêkngei hah a misîr suolechu ma mun hah a mâka,
a omna ngâi khopui tieng a kîr nôka. synagog ina a minchua, a thurchi misîr ariet murdi'n chu an kamâm sabaka, “Hima anga vârna hih kho renga a man mo?” male “Sininkhêl sintheina hih kho renga a man mo?” tiin an rekela.
“Hi mi hih thing kutthiempu nâipasal hah nimak mo? Mary hah a nu nimak mo? A lâibungngei khom, Jacob, Joseph, Simon le Judas ngei nimak mo?
A sarnungei khom hitaka om nimak ngei mo? Kho renga mo hi ngei murdi hih a man?”
Male ama hah an heng zoi. Jisua'n an kôm, “Dêipu chu a khopui sûnga le a insûngmingei lâia tiloiin chu muntina an mirit ngâi,” a tipe ngeia.
Taksônna an dônloi sikin ma mun han chu sininkhêl sin mintam ok mak ani.
Ma zora han Galilee rama, rêng Herod'n Jisua chungroi a lei rieta.
A sinthopu ulienngei kôm han, “Hi mi hih Baptispu John, a hong ring nôk ngêt ani rang.” “Masikin kêng hi sininkhêl sintheina ranak hih a dôn,” a tia.
Motona han Herod'n John hah a lei minsûra, a khita jêl-ina alei khum ani. Ma anga a thona bitak chu a lâibungpa Philip lômnu Herodias sika ani.
Baptispu John han Herod kôm, “Herodias lômnua ne nei hih dik mak!” a lei tipea.
Herod'n ama hah that rang a jôta, aniatachu Juda mipui ngei a chi ani, John hah Dêipu'n an lei be sikin.
Herod suokni han Herodias nâinupang hah mipui ngei makunga a lâma. Herod hah a râisân tataka
a kôm han chonginkhâmin, “Ikhom no zong kai chu nang pêk rangin chong kên khâm!” a tia.
Hanchu a nû'n a tipe lam angin, “Hi muna hin atûn mâirânga Baptispu John lu mi pêk roh!” tiin Herod kôm han a ngêna.
Rêngpa han a mulungdûk atong sabak zoia, nikhomrese, a khuolmi ngei makunga chong a lênkhâm zoi sikin, a ngên lam anghan tho pe rangin chong a pêk ngeia.
Hanchu jêl-ina han John lu hah a min tan ngei zoi.
A lu hah mâirânga an hong chôia, nupangte kôm an pêka, amanu han a nû kôm a chôi zoi.
John ruoisingei an honga, a ruok hah an chôia, an phûm zoi; hanchu an sea, Jisua an va misîr pe zoi ani.
Jisua'n John chungroi a rietin chu, ma mun hah a mâka, rukuongin a theivaiin mun inthimngangna a se zoi. Ma roi hah mipuingeiin an rieta, masikin an khopuingei ha mâkin ama omna tâng tieng an jûia.
Jisua rukuong renga a jôka, mipui ngei hah a mu'n chu inrieng amu ngei tataka, male damloi ngei hah a mindama.
Mani kholoi han a ruoisingei an honga a kôm, “Nisa laka ase ok zoia, mahi mun inthimngang kêng ani; Mipui ngei hih tîrpai ngei inla, khosûngngeia se rese ngei, anthenin sâk rang rochôk rese ngei,” an ti pea.
Jisua'n an kôm, “An se rang nâng maka, nangnin an sâk rang imakhat pêk ngei roi!” tiin a thuona.
Anni han a kôm, “Hitaka kin dôn chu anrêngin vâipôl rangnga le nga inik vai kêng,” tiin an thuona.
Hanchu Jisua'n, “Hin ko kôm hong chôi roi,” a tia.
Mipui ngei hah durba chunga insung rangin chong a pêk ngeia; hanchu, vâipôl rangnga le nga inik hah a lâka, invân tieng tangin Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila. Vâipôlngei hah a khoia, ruoisingei kôm a pêka, male ruoisingei han mipui ngei kôm an sem zoia.
Mi murdi'n an sâka, an khoptanga, an sâk minieng tabong sômleinik an la rût minsipa.
Asâkngei mijôn chu nupangngei le nâipangngei telloiin mi isâng rangnga dôr an ni.
Male Jisua'n mipui ngei hah a minchînna, a ruoisingei rukuonga a min chuong ngeia, dîl râl kângkhat tieng alei min se ngeia.
Mipui ngei a min se ngei suolechu a thenin tâng chunga chubaitho rangin a sea. Kholoi a hongnin chu, mahan Jisua atheivaiin a oma;
ma zora han rukuong hah dîla alazanna a om zoia, phâivuo'n ale tieng asêm sikin, tuidârinsokin kângkhat tieng khom, kângkhat tieng khom a soka.
Jînga dâr thum le dâr ruk kongkâra Jisua tui chunga lônnin, a ruoisingei kôm a honga.
Tui chunga a hong lôn an mûn chu an chia. “Mirluoi kêng!” tiin, ichin an iniek rarâka.
Jisua'n a hong rokôkngei kelena, “Nin rathamathâk no roi!” chi no roi, “Keima kêng ki ni!” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu Peter a hong chonga. “Pumapa, nangma ni ni tatakin chu, tui chunga no kôm hong rangin chong ni pêk roh,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Hong roh!” tiin a thuona. Masikin Peter hah rukuong renga a jôka, Jisua kôm panin tui chunga a lôn phut zoia.
Hannirese, phâivuo rât hah a mûn chu a chia, tuia a ngim phut zoi. “Pumapa, ni mojôk roh!” tiin a chapa.
Jisua a hong tung kelena male a muturap kelen zoia, a kôm, “Na taksônna dôn hah achîn bâkna! Ithomo ni iem zoi loi?” a tipea.
An ruonin rukuong sûnga an lûta, phâivuo khom ânthim ruoi zoi.
Male rukuong sûnga ruoisingei han Jisua chubai an mûk zoi. “Pathien Nâipasal tatak kêng ni ni!” an tia.
Dîl râl tieng an inkânin chu Genesaret ram an hong tunga,
Ma taka mingei han Jisua hah an lei riet kelena. Masikin ma revêla ram murdia han mi an tîra, damloi murdi hah Jisua kôm an hong tuonga.
Damloi ngei hah a puon morte luo mintôn ngei rangin an ngêna; male a tôn murdi chu an dam pak zoi ani.
Hanchu Jerusalem renga pharisee le Balam minchupungei senkhat Jisua kôm an honga male a kôm.
“Ithomo nu ruoisingeiin ei pipungei chongmâk ngei hih an jôm ngâiloi? Sâk an sâk rang khomin balam angin an kut rusûk ngâi mak ngei!” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ithomo Pathien chongpêk jômloiin nin theia chongmâk nin jûi hih?
Pathien'n, ‘Nu nû le na pa mirit tho roh,’ male ‘Tukhom a nû mo, a pa mo, khomâksâm chu that rang ani,’ a ti ani.
Hannirese, nangnin chu tutu a nu mo, a pa mo, sanna rang imini neinun a dôna, aniatachu, ‘Mahi Pathien ta kêng ani zoi a tiin chu,’
a nû mo, a pa mo mirit a tho rang nâng khâi mak nin ti ngâia. Ma ang han, nin chongmâk nin jôm theina rangin Pathien chongpêk chu itên nin be ngâiloi ani.
Nangni asarotholngei! Isaiah'n nin chungroi alei misîr hah adik bâkna!”:
“Hi mingei hin an chongbâiin min mirita, aniatachu an mulungrîl chu adiktakin kei renga alazan.
An miriem minchuna balamngei hah ka balamngei anghan an be sikin min biekna hih anni rangin kamnângloi kêng ani, Pathien'n a ti!” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Jisua'n lokongei hah a kôm a koi ngeia, an kôm, “Rangâi ungla, rietthei roi!
Mi bâia lût han a minnim ngâi ni maka; manêkin chu a bâi renga hong suok han kêng a minnim ngâi,” a tia.
Male a ruoisingei an honga, a kôm, “No chong han Phariseengei mulung amophop ti ni riet mo?” an tia.
Jisua'n, “Kung murdi invâna ka Pa phun niloi chu phôipaiin om an tih,” tiin a thuona.
“An chungroia nin kângmindoi no roi! Anni ngei hah mitcho ngei ruoipu mitcho an nia; mitcho hah mitcho nanâkin a kairuoiin chu an ruonin khura tâk an tih,” tiin a thuona.
Peter a chonga, “Ma chong omtie hih mi rilminthâr pe roh,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Midangngei nêkin atûnten la vâr uol mak chei.
Nin rietthei loi mo ani? I neinun khom miriem bâia lût murdi chu a phûnga a lûta, masuole chu a nômsena ajôkpai ngâi ani.
Aniatachu neinunngei bâi renga hong suok chu mulungrîl renga hong suok ania, ma neinunngei hah kêng miriem minnim ngâi.
A mulungrîl renga mindonna saloi ngei ahong suoka, mangei han kêng a ruoia mi thatnangei, inrênangei, hur inditnangei, inrunangei, mi huongnangei le adikloi teta midang êronangei a musuok ngâi ani.
Hi neinunngei hih, miriem minnim ngâi chu ani. Aniatachu an ti anghan nin kutngei rusûk loia sâknêk nin sâk hin chu miriem minnim ngâi mak,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha mun hah mâkin Tyre le Sidon khopuilienngei kôla ramhuol revêla a sea.
Ha rama om Canaan nuvengte inkhat a kôm a honga, “David Nâipasal! Inrieng ni mu roh, pu! Ka nâinupang ramkhori'n a sûra, changrangintak sabakin aom ani,” tiin ânieka.
Hannirese, Jisua'n chongbâi khat luon thuon mak. A ruoisingei a kôm an honga, “Hi nu hih tîrpai ta roh! Ei nûk mi jûia, michok chuchur!” tiin an ngêna.
Male Jisua'n, “Israel mingei lâia belri inmangngei kôm vai kêng tîr ki ni,” tiin a thuona.
Ha chong hah nuvengtenu han a rietin chu a honga, a ke bula an boka. “Pu, ni san roh!” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Nâingei vâipôl lâk pea uingei kôma pêk chu dik mak,” tiin a thuona.
Nuvengtenu han a kôm, “Pu, maha chu adik, aniatachu uingei khomin an pungei dosâng nuoia vâipôl hâr atâk chu an sâk ngâi mo ka ta,” tiin a thuona.
Masikin Jisua'n a kôm, “Nuvengtenu taksônna lientak dôn ni ni! Nu nuom tak hah na ta rangin sinin om a tih,” a tipea. Male a nâinupang hah ma zoratak han a hong dam pe zoi ani.
Jisua'n ha mun renga hah a sea, Galilee dîl kôla a lôna. Tânga a kala male ân sung zoi.
Mipui tamtak a kôm an honga, kholra, mitcho, achôp, chongtheiloi le damloi dang tamtak Jisua ke bula an hong tuonga; a lei mindam ngei leta.
Mipui ngei han chongtheiloi hong chong, ân-ûng a hong dam, kholra hong lônthei le mitcho hong muthei ngei hah an mûn chu an kamâm sabaka, hanchu Israel Pathien an minpâk zoi ani.
Hanchu Jisua'n a ruoisingei a koia, an kôm, “Mipui ngei hih sûnthum ko kôm an om zoia, atûn hin ite sâk rang an dônloi sikin ku lungkham ngei tatak. Bungêiin tîrpai ngei rang nuom mu-ung, aninôn chu lampuia châmsôl invei an tih,” a tia.
Ruoisingei han a kôm, “Hi dôra mipui vâi minkhopna rangin hi ramchâra hin khonmo sâknêk ei man ranga?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n, “Vâipôl idôrmo nin dôn?” tiin a rekela; Anni han “Vâipôltâp sari” le “ngate atômte,” an tia.
Masikin Jisua'n mipui ngei hah nuoia insung rangin chong a pêka.
Male vâipôltâp sari le nga hah a lâka, Pathien kôm râisânchong rilin a khoia, ruoisingei kôm a pêka; male ruoisingei han mipui ngei kôm an pêka.
An rêngin an sâka an khoppaka. Hanchu ruoisingei han an sâk minieng arnôi tabông sari an rût minsipa.
Asâkngei hah nupangngei le nâipangngei telloiin mi isâng minli an ni.
Masuole chu Jisua'n mipui ngei a tîrpai ngei suolechu rukuonga a chuonga, Magadan ramhuol tieng a se zoi ani.
Pharisee le Sadducee senkhatngei Jisua kôma hong ngeiin ama min-ôk rang an nuoma, masikin Pathien'n ama a pom, tih riet theina rangin sininkhêl thôn minlang rangin an ngêna.
Nikhomrese, Jisua'n an kôm, “Nisa ahong tâkin chu, ‘kôlkung asen sikin khuo ahoi rang kêng nin ti ngâi.’
Male jînga chu, ‘Kôl asena, invân ânnîm sikin ruo ajuong rang kêng,’ nin ti ngâi. Invân enin khuohoi rang le hoiloi rang nin leiphuong theia, aniatachu, atûnlâia minsinnangei hi chu minlen thei mak chei!
Atûnlâi mingei hih idôrtaka saloi le pathienboi mo an ni zoi! Minsinna mi nin zong na? Nimak! Jonah minsinna hi vai kêng nin kôma minsinna nangni pêk rang chu ani zoi,” tiin a thuona. Masikin a mâk ngeia male a rotpat zoi.
Ruoisingei hah dîl râl an rakânin chu, vâipôl chôi rang an hong mingila.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Singthei roi; Phariseengei le Sadduceengei chol renga indîn roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Anni han, “Vâipôl ei hong chôi loi sika mahi a ti ani,” tiin an lâia an injêk phut zoi.
Jisua'n an misîrngei hah a rieta, an kôm, “Ithomo nin vâipôl hong chôi loi roi hah nin lâia nangni nanâkin nin jêk bang? Idôra taksônna chîn dôn mo nin ni zoi!
Nin la rietthei tet loi mini? Mi isâng rangnga ngei ta ranga vâipôltâp rangnga ko khoi lâia hah nin riet khâiloi mo? An sâk minieng tabong izetmo nin rût minsip ha?
Mi isâng minli ngei ranga vâipôltâp sari chungroi rek ha te? An sâk minieng tabong izetmo nin rût minsip ha?
Nônte ithomo nin kôm vâipôl roi misîr mu-ung ti nin riet thei loi? Nangni nanâkin Phariseengei le Sadduceengei chol renga indîn roi!” a tia.
Male ruoisingei han vâipôla chol mang ngâi renga indîn rang ni loiin, Phariseengei le Sadduceengei minchuna renga indîn ranga inningna ani ti an riet thei zoi.
Jisua hah Caesarea Philippi khopui kôla ramhuola a sea, mahan a ruoisingei kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hih mingeiin tumo ani an ti?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
“Senkhatin chu Baptispu John ani,” Adangngeiin chu “Elijah ani,” senkhat nôkin chu “Jeremiah aninônchu dêipu tumakhat mini, nang an ti,” tiin an thuona.
“Nangnîn rêkte?” ama'n, “Tumo ki ni nin ti?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Simon Peter'n a kôm, “Messiah, Pathien ring Nâipasal hah ni ni,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Simon John nâipasal, na ta rangin asa bâk na! Hi chongtak hih munisi renga no kôm ahong nimaka, invâna om ka Pa'n adiktakin nang a pêk ani.
Masikin Peter; lungpui ni ni, ti nang ki ril. Hi lungpui chunga hin ko koiindang minding ka ta, thina khomin mene no nih.
Invân Rêngram chabi nang pêk ka ta; pilchunga na khap kai chu invâna khom khap nîng a ta, pilchunga na phal kai chu invâna khom phal ani rang ani,” a tipea.
Male Messiah ani ti tute ril loi rangin ruoisingei hah chong a pêk ngei zoi.
Ma zora renga chu Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm ânthârlakin a misîr phut zoia, an kôm, “Jerusalema ke se ngêt rang ani, upangei, Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei kuta tuong ok ki tih. Thatin om ka ta, nikhomrese, sûnthum suolechu aringin kaithoiin om ki tih,” a tipe ngeia.
Peter'n ama hah atheiin a tuonga, a kôm, “Pathien'n maha akhap, Pumapa!” ama'n, “Mahah nu chunga tung tet no nih!” tiin a ngoa.
Jisua ânheia Peter kôm, “Soitan, ko kôm renga rotpai roh! ka lampui ni ni chakal, ni mindonngei hih Pathien renga hong suok ni maka, munisi nina renga ani sikin,” a tia.
Male Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, “Tutu mi jûi a nuomin chu ama taksa rang mingilin a khros ruputin mi jûi rese.
Tukhom a ringna mojôk a nuom kaiin machân an ta; aniatachu, keima sika an ringna machân kaiin man an tih.
Mi'n rammuol hih apumin dôn senla, an ringna chu machân ta senla ngei, imo alâp an man ranga? Man noni ngei! An ringna man nôkna rangin ite pêk rang an dôn loi sikin.
Miriem Nâipasal hih a Pa roiinpuinan invôn a vantîrtonngei leh a juong rang kêng ani zoi, ma tikin chu mitinin an sintho dungjûiin râisânman a pêk rang ani.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, hi taka om senkhatngei hih Miriem Nâipasal Rêng angin a juong an mu mâka chu thi loi rang an om,” a tia.
Sûnruk suole chu Jisua'n Peter le a lâibungngei Jacob le John a tuong ngeia, an theivaiin muol insângna a se pui ngeia.
An mit muchungin Jisua mêl a hong inthûla: a mâi nisa angin a hong vâra, a puonsilngei khom ântêrrakin ahong cheka.
Male ruoisingei inthum han Moses le Elijah ngeiin Jisua an chongpui an mua.
Hanchu Peter'n Jisua kôm, “Pumapa, hitaka om hih ei ta rangin idôra asa mo ni zoi! Nu nuomin chu puon-in inthum sin ka ta, nangma rang inkhat, Moses rang inkhat male Elijah rang inkhat,” a tia.
Ala chonglâitakin, sûm vârin ajuong mukhu ngeia, sûmlâi renga rôl ajuon ringa, “Ama hih ka Nâipasal moroitak, a chunga ku mulungtâiriem ani, a he rangâi roi!” a tia.
Ruoisingei han rôl hah an rietin chu, an chi rai sikin pila an inbokraka.
Jisua an kôm a honga, a tôn ngeia, “Inthoi roi, chi no roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Masikin an ena, Jisua telloiin chu tute adang mu mak ngei.
Muol chung renga an juong chumin chu, Jisua'n an kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hih thina renga ânthoinôk mâka chu nin neinun mu hih tute ril no roi,” tiin chong a pêk ngei zoi.
Male ruoisingei han Jisua kôm, “Ithomo Balam minchupungeiin Elijah a juong bak rang ani, an ti?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n, “Adiktakin Elijah a juong bak rang ani,” male “jâttin ama'n cherêl let a tih.
Hannirese, nangni ki ril, Elijah chu a juongsai piel kêng ani zoi, mingeiin lei riet mak ngei, an nunuom an lei lo zoi. Ma angdênin Miriem Nâipasal khom an nunuom an lo rang ani,” tiin a thuona.
Male ruoisingeiin Baptispu John chungroi an kôm a misîr ani, ti an hong riet zoi.
Mipui ngei kôm an kîr nôkin chu mi inkhat Jisua kôm a honga, a makunga khûkinbilin,
male “Pu, ka nâipasal chunga inriengmu roh! Ama chu risangol invei ania, a tuong ok zoia, voizet mo meia le tuia ânlet zoia.
Nu ruoisingei kôm ko hong tuonga, aniatachu mindam thei mak ngei,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Kho anga iemnaboi rai le mi dikloi mo nin ni zoi! Idôr sôt mo nin kôm ko om rang? Idôr sôt mo nangni ko donsui thei ranga? Pasalte hah ko kôm hong tuong roi!” a tia.
Jisua'n ramkhori hah chong a pêka, male pasalte sûng renga hah a hong jôkpaia, ma zoratak han a dam kelen zoi.
Male ruoisingei hah Jisua kôm an honga, “Ithomo keinin te ramkhori hah kin rujûlpai theiloi?” tiin mi riet loiin an rekel chiena.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Taksônna ahundôr nin dônloi sika ani.” “Adiktakin nangni ki ti, taksônna ancham ru te dôr nin dônin chu hi muol kôm hin, ‘Hi renga hih soson vânthon roh!’ tîng nin ta, inthon atih. Neinun nâm nin thothei let rang ani!
Aniatachu, hi anga hih chu chubaithona le bungêi tinôn chu itên rujûlpai thei nimak,” tiin a thuona.
Ruoisingei hah an rêngin Galilee rama munkhatin an hong suokin chu, Jisua'n an kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hih mingei kuta min sûrin om a ta,
anni han ama that an tih; aniatachu sûnthum suole chu aringin kaithoiin om a tih,” a tia. Ruoisingei chu beidong takin an om zoi ani.
Jisua le a ruoisingei Capernaum an hong tungin chu biekin chôiruol rusuongpu ngeiin Peter kôm an honga, “Nangni Minchupu hin biekin chôiruol a chôi ngâi mo?” tiin an rekela.
Peter'n “A chôi ngâi,” tiin a thuona. Peter hah insûnga a lûtin chu, Jisua'n a lei rokôk masa, “Simon kho angin mo ni mindonlam? Hi rammuola rêngngei kôm hin tumo choîtumngei aninônchu chôiruolngei a chôi ngâi? A ramsûngmingei mo, ramdangmingei mo?”
Peter'n, “Ramdangmingei,” tiin a thuona. Jisua'n, “Asa, mahah aomtie chu a ramsûngmingei chu an chôi nâng mak, tiin chong a mele ani.
Aniatachu hi mingei mulunghoiloi rang hi nuom mak me. Masikin dîla senla rukuoi vavôr roh. Nga no thok masatak bâia han nangma le keima rang biekin chôiruol rukbak rang sumthîr man ni tih. Mahah hong chôi inla, ei chôitum hah an kôm pêk ngei roh,” a tia.
Ma zora han ruoisingei Jisua kôm an honga, “Invân Rêngrama tumo alientak?” tiin an rekela.
Masikin Jisua'n nâipangte a koia, an makunga a minding pe ngeia, an kôm,
“Adiktakin nangni ki ti, nin hong inthûla, nâipangte ngei angin nin om nônchu invân Rêngrama lût thei tet no tunui.
Invân Rêngrama alientak chu amananâkin nuninêma hi nâipangte anga hong om hih ani.
Male tukhom ki riming sika hi nâipangte anga lei modôm chu keima mi modôm an ni.”
“Tukhomin ka chunga taksônna dônngei lâia nâipangte inkhat khom hih a minpalin chu a ringa bu nôina lung lienpa minlîn tuikhanglien inthûk taka inchôm senla ata rangin sa uol atih.
Mingei an taksônna minmang pe ngâi neinunngei sikin rammuol rangin ichi aom bâk na! Inpalna ngei chu om bang a ta, aniatachu, inpalna ngei min ompu chungroi chu ichi aombâk na!
Nu kutin mo, ne ke'n mo, nang aminpalin chu tan pai inla, pai kelen roh! Kut inik mo, ke inik mo dôna kumtuong meidîla nang pai nêkin chu kut boi mo, ke boia mo ringna han lût chu na ta rangin asa uol.
Ni mit khomin nang aminpalin chu kêlpai inla, pai kelen roh! Mit inik dôna meidîla nang pai nêkin chu inkhat vai dôna ringna taka lût chu na ta rangin asa uol ani.”
“En roi, hi mi chînte ngei lâia inkhat luo hih mumâkloi rangin indîn roi. Invâna an vântîrtonngei hih invâna ka Pa makunga an om tit ngâi ti nangni ki ril.
Miriem Nâipasal hi ânmang ngei roka, sanminring rang piela juong ani.
“Mi inkhatin belri razakhat dôn senla, an lâia inkhat inmang rese, kho angin mo a tho rangin nin mindôn? Sômkuoleikuo ngei hah muol panga bu min sâk a ta, male sêng a ta, ânmangpu hah va rok a tih.
Nangni ki ril, ava manin chu sômkuoleikuo ânmangloi ngei nêkin inkhatpu chunga han a râisân uol ok a tih.
Ma angdênin, hi mi chînte ngei lâia inkhat inmang khom hih nin Pa invâna omin nuom mak.
“Na lâibungpa nang doiin sietna a sinin chu, senla a minchâina min mûn la, dâirekin nin ruona riet rang vaiin ril roh. No chong a rangâiin chu na lâibungpa hah ne mene nôk nîng a tih.
Aniatachu no chong a rangâi nôn chu midang inkhat mini, inik mini tuong sân la, masikin Pathien lekhabu'n a ti anghan, saloinônna chong nâm hah rietpuipungei mi inik mo, inthum mo bâia mindet ani theina rangin.
Hanchu an chong khom arngâi non chu, neinun murdi koiindang kôm min tung roh. Azoinataka chu koiindang chong khom a rangâi nuom nôn chu ha mi hah chu sonong anghan mini, sum rusuongpu angin mini be roh.
“Masikin nin rêngin nangni ki ril: pilchunga nin khap kai invâna khap nîng a ta, pilchunga nin phal kai invâna phal nîng atih.
“Nangni ki ril uol sa: pilchunga hin mi inikin nin ngênna han nin inruolin chu, invâna ka Pa'n nangni tho pe a tih.
Mi inik mo, inthum mo ki riminga an hong intûpna muna han anni leh ko om ngâi sikin,” a tia.
Male Peter hah Jisua kôm a honga, “Pumapa ka lâibungpa'n ku chunga sietna sin bang senla, voizet mo ka ngâidam rang? Voi sari mo?” tiin a rekela.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Nimak, voi sari ni loiin, voi sômsari mun sari tena,” tiin a thuona,
