“Invân Rêngram chu, voikhat chu rêngpa inkhatin a tîrlâmngei kôm an sum thurchi enmindik ranga masatpu angin ani sikin.
A hong enmindik phutin chu mi inkhat talent isângsôm intâng a kôm an hong tuonga.
Ma tîrlâm han a lakâi pêk rang ahundôr a dônloi sikin rêngpa han ama, a lômnu, a nâingei leh a dôn murdi juorin, a lakâi thuon rangin chong a pêka.
Tîrlâm han rêngpa makunga khûkinbilin ânboka. ‘Ka chunga nu phûkminsei viet inla, anrêngin nang thuon let ki tih!’ tiin ânvûia.
Rêngpa han inrieng a mua, hanchu a lakâi hah a ngâidam phara, a min se zoi.
“Hanchu ha mi hah a jôkpaia, a tîrlâm champui ngei lâia inkhat duli razakhat intâng ava mua. Ava sûrrapa, a ringôn a sôm pea, Na lakâi hah ni thuon ta roh!” a tia.
A tîrlâm champui hah ânbôka, “Ku chunga nu phûkminsei viet inla, nang thuon ki tih!” tiin ânvuia.
Hannirese nuom maka; manêkin a lakâi a thuon mâka chu intâng ina a khum zoi.
Tîrlâm dang ngeiin a sintho lam hah an mûn chu an mulunghoi maka, rêngpa kôm an sea, neinun nâm an va misîr pea.
Masikin rêngpa han tîrlâm hah a koia, a kôm, Nangma tîrlâm kâmnângloi! nên vûi sikin na lakâi murdi nang ka ngâidam ani.
Keiman nu chunga moroina ko dôn anghan, nang khomin ni tîrlâm champui chunga moroina no dôn rang kêng ani, a tipea.
Rêngpa hah atakasi sabaka, male ha tîrlâm hah a lakâi a thuon suo mâka rangin intâng ina a khum zoi.
Jisua'n, “Ma angdênin mitinin nin lâibungngei nin mulungrîl tatak renga nin ngâidam nônchu invâna ka Pa khomin nin chunga ma angdênin thông a tih,” tiin chongkhârnân a ti ani.
Jisua'n ha chongngei hah a misîr suole chu Galilee ram renga a suoka, Jordan Tuidung râla Judea rama a sea.
Mipui tamtakin an jûia, male ma muna han a mindam ngeia.
Pharisee senkhatngei a kôm an honga, ama min ôk rang pûtin, “I-ihsika khomin min a lômnu a mâk hih ei Balamin aphal mo?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Aphut renga miriemngei Mizirpu'n Pasal le nupang a sin, a ti hah nin pore ngâiloi mini?
Mapêna, Pathien'n, ‘Hi sika hin pasalin a nu le a pa mâk a ta, a lômnu leh inruol an ta, male, an ruonin takpum khat hongni an tih,’ a ti ani.
Masikin mi inik nikhâi mak ngeia, pumkhat kêng an ni zoi. Pathien'n munkhata a mozomsai chu miriemin an sensâi tet rang nimak,” tiin a thuona.
Phariseengei han a kôm, “Nônte ithomo Moses'n pasalin inmâkna lekha miziekin a lômnu a pêkin chu inmâk a phalin amanu hah tîrpaiin aom ngâia?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Moses'n nin lômnungei mâk rang nangni a phal pena chu nin mulung ânngara minchu nin intak rai sika ani. Hannirese, sinphuta han chu ma anghin nimak.
Hanchu, keima nangni ki ril chu, tukhom pasalin a lômnu hah roi danga niloiin, taksôn omloina sika a mâka anin chu a lômnu hah inrê a minchang ani; male mi lômnu mâksai inneipui nôkpu chu amanu hah a inrêpuiin theiloi a chang sa ani,” a tia.
A ruoisingeiin a kôm, “Lômpa le lômnu kongkâra ma anghan anin chu innei loi asa uol,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Hi minchuna hih mitin chunga mang rang nimaka, Pathien'n a pêk ngei chunga vai mang nîng atih, tiin a thuona.
Pasalin innei theiloina abi chu adadang aom: senkhat, chu neiloi rang piela suok an ni; senkhat chu ha anga ranga miriemin an sin khom an om; senkhat chu invân Rêngram sikin an neiloi ani. Tukhom hi minchuna pom thei kaiin chu pom rese ngei,” tiin a thuona.
Mi senkhatin nâipangtengei Jisua kôm an chunga a kut a minngam theina rang le chubai tho pe ngei theina rangin an hong tuonga, aniatachu, ruoisingeiin an lei ngoa.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nâipangtengei ko kôm min hong ungla khap no roi, invân Rêngram chu hi anga mingei ta ani sikin,” a tia.
An chunga a kut a minngama male chu a se zoi.
Voikhat chu mi inkhat Jisua kôm a honga, “Minchupu, kumtuong ringna ka man theina rangin imo sin sa ki sin rang?” tiin a rekela.
“Ithomo asa thurchi mini rekel?” Jisua'n, “Asa chu mi Inkhat vai kêng aom. Ringna han lût nu nuomin chu chongpêkngei hah jôm roh,” tiin a thuona.
Ama han, “Kho chongpêkngei ha mo?” tiin a rekela. Jisua'n, “Mi that no roh; inrê no roh; inru no roh; dikloitakin mi nôn no roh;
nu nû le na pa mirit roh; nangma nên lungkham angin nu bungmingei lungkham roh,” ti ngei hi tiin a thuona.
Ruolthartepa han, “Ma chongpêkngei nâm ha chu ko jôm suolet zoi. Imo ki sin rang ala nâng?” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Asa akiphara om nu nuomin chu senla, no dôn murdi juor inla, ma sum hah inriengngei kôm pêk roh, male chu invâna rochon dôn ni tih; masuole chu hong inla, mi hong jûi roh,” a tipea.
Ruolthartepa'n ha chong hah a rietin chu ngâisiet takin a rot zoi, mi neipa ani sikin.
Hanchu Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, “Adiktakin nangni ki ril: mineingei rangin chu invân Rêngrama lût ântak sabak rang ani.
Nangni ki ril nôk: mineingei Pathien Rêngrama lût nêkin chu ût simphuoi kuora lût bai uol atih,” a tia.
Hi chong hih, ruoisingeiin an rietin chu, an kamâm tataka, “Nônte, tumo saminringin aom thei rang?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n anni enlakin an kôm, “Mahih miriem rangin chu nithei maka, aniatachu Pathien rangin chu neinun murdi anithei let,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Male Peter a hong chonga. A kôm, “En roh, keinin jâttin mâkin nang kin jûia. Imo kin man rang?” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Adiktakin nangni ki ril, Ruol Thar hong om ranga Miriem Nâipasal a rêngsukmun roiinpuitaka ânsung tikin chu nangni ku nûkjûi ngâi sômleinik ngei khom rêngsukmunngeia insung nin ta, Israel jât sômleinik ngei chunga roijêk nin tih.
Hanchu tutu keima sika inngei mo, lâibungngei mo, sarnungei mo, pa mo, nu mo, nâingei mo, loi ngei mo, amâkpu ngei chu abâk razakhatin man an ta, kumtuong ringna khom pêk sa nîng an tih.
Aniatachu, atûna amasatakngei khom nûkintatak la nîng an ta, male nûkintatak ngei khom amasatak la nîng an tih,” a tia.
“Invân Rêngram chu mi inkhatin a grapebila mi senkhat inloa sintho rang rokin jîng renga ajôkpai angin ani.
Ama'n a sinthopungei hah asûna duli pêk ngei rangin a jôta, male a grapebila sintho rangin a tîr ngei zoi.
Jîng dâr kuo ânringin chu bazar muna a se nôka, mahan mi senkhat ite tho loia an inding ava mua,
masikin an kôm, ‘Nangni khom se ungla, grapebila va sin ungla, rathaman asadên nangni pêk ki tih,’ a tipe ngeia.
Masikin an se zoi. Hanchu sûn dâr sômleinik le chonûk dâr thuma khom ma angdênin a thoa.
Kholoi dâr rangnga ânring rangtôn bazar muna ava se nôka, mi senkhat ite sin loia ânding chien ava mu ngei nôka. An kôm, ‘Ithomo ite sin loiin mahin sûn nin min hek?’ tiin a rekel ngeia.
Anni han a kôm, ‘tutên mi min lo mak ngei,’ tiin an thuona. Asa, hanchu, nangni khom se ungla grapebila sin va tho roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Kholoi ahong nîn chu, a pumapa han a sum vongpu kôm han, “Sinthopu ngei hah koi inla, anûktaka hong inlopu ngei renga phutin amasataka hong inlopu ngei dênin an rathaman pêk ngei roh,” a tia.
Kholoi dâr rangnga sintho koppu ngei ha chu duli chit pêk an nia.
Masikin motontaka sintho koppu ngei hah an hongin chu atam uol man rangin an mindona; hannirese anni khom duli chit kêng pêk an ni.
An sum hah an lâka, a pumapa chunga an chier phut zoi.
“Hi mi nûktaka hôn lo ngei hi chu dâr khat vai an sinna ania, keini chu nisa luma sûntuonin kin sina, hannoma, keini mi ni pêk dôr nanâk anni khom ne pêka!” an tia.
A pumapa han, an lâia inkhat kôm han, “ ‘Rangâi ta, mal,’ nang huong mu-ung. Ikhomnirse asûna duli loa sintho ranga no jôt ani.
Atûn na rathaman lâk inla, ni ina se roh. Nangma nang ke pêk dôr hih hi anûktaka a hon lopu khom hih pêk ku nuom ani.
Ka sum chu ki ti lamtaka mang rangin rachamneina dôn mu-ung mo? Aninônchu ka mannarloi sikin na narsa mini?” a tipea.
Hanchu Jisua'n, “Masikin anûktak ngei hah amotontak la nîng an ta, amotontak ngei hah anûktak la nîng an tih,” tiin chongkhârnân a tia.
Jisua Jerusalem tena se lâihan, ruoisingei sômleinik hah an theiin a tuong ngeia, lampuia an lôn pumin inrûkten an kôm,
“Rangâi ta u, Jerusalema ei se rang ania, mahan Miriem Nâipasal hi Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei kuta minsûrin om a tih. Thi rangin theiloimintum an ta,
hanchu Jentailngei kuta pêk an ta, anni han munui inzanân mang an ta, vîk an ta, khrosa jêmdel an tih; hannirese sûnthum suole chu aringin kaithoiin om a tih,” a tia.
Hanchu Jebedee lômnu hah a nâipasal inik ngei leh Jisua kôm an honga, amakunga khûkinbilin, a lungkhamna a zonga.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Imo nu nuom?” tiin amanu hah a rekela. Amanu han, “Hi ka nâipasal inik ngei hih Rêng nini tika na chang tieng inkhat no voitieng inkhat min sung rangin chong mênkhâm pe roh,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n, nâipasalngei kôm han, “Nin zong hih nin riet loi ani, Tuongna kilât ki nêk rang hih nin nêk thei rang mo?” a tia. “Thei kin tih,” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ki kilât chu nêk tatak nan ta,” hannirese, “tumo ka chang tieng le ko voi tienga ânsung rang chu keiman zen rangin racham dôn mu-ung. Hi munngei hih chu ka Pa'n a mintuo pe ngei ta rang kêng ani,” a tia.
Ruoisi dang sômngei han ma chong hah an rietin chu, lâibung inik ngei chunga an ningathik zoia.
Masikin Jisua'n an rêngin a koitûp ngeia, an kôm, “Jentailngei chunga roijêkpua an phunngei chu an chunga an inlaltatak ngâia, an ruoipungei khom an chunga rachamneina an dôn ok ngâi iti nin riet.
Nikhomrese, nin lâia chu ma anghin ani rang nimak. Tukhomin alien a nuomin chu, nin tîrlâm ani bak ngêt rang ani;
Mapêna, nin lâia tukhomin amotontak ani nuomin chu nin tîrlâm a chang bak ngêt rang ani.
Miriem Nâipasal luo mana min a sin an tho pe rangin juong maka, mi sin tho pe rang le mi tamtak rattan ranga a ringna pêk rangin kêng a juong ani,” a tia.
Jisua le a ruoisingei Jericho hah an mâkin chu, mipui tamtakin an jûia.
Mitcho inik lampui kôla insungin Jisua a hongvun iti an rietin chu, “David Nâipasal! Kin chunga inrieng mi mu roh, Pu!” tiin an in-ieka.
Mipui ngei han dâirek rangin an ngo ngeia. Aniatachu anni han, “David Nâipasal! Kin chunga inrieng mimu roh, Pu!” tiin an iniek minring uola.
Jisua ânngama a koi ngeia, “Imo nangni rangin ni min tho nin nuom?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
“Pu, mitvârna mi ni pêk rang hih kin nuom ani!” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an chunga inriengmuna a dôna, an mitngei hah a tôn pe ngeia, voikhatrengin an hong mu thei kelena, a nûk an jûi zoi ani.
Jisua le a ruoisingei Jerusalem an hongtung rangtôn Olive Muola Bethphage khuo an hongtunga. Mahan Jisua'n a ruoisingei lâia mi inik a tîr ngeia,
an kôm, “Nin motona khuo son se ungla, sakuording, akôla ate leh ânthung mu kelen nin tih. Sût ungla, ko kôm hong kai roi.
Tukhomin nin kôm imini an ti khomin, ‘Pumapa'n amin nâng kêng,’ tiin ril ngei roi; hanchu nangni hong min chôi kelen a tih,” a tipe ngeia.
Dêipu'n a lei ti sai ahongtung dik theina ranga mahah ahong om ani:
“Zion khopuilien hah ril roh, En ta, ne rêng hah no kôm a hong zoi ani! Ama hah rangâiinchîn takin sakuording chunga chuongin, male sakuording ate innoi chunga chuongin,” ti hih.
Masikin ruoisingei hah an va sea, Jisua'n tho ranga a tipe ngei ang han an va thoa:
Sakuording leh ate hah an hong kaia, an chunga han an puonngei an dâpa, male Jisua a chuonga.
Mipui tamtakin lampuia an puonngei an dâpa; adangngeiin thingbuo an tuka, lampuia an dâpa.
Mipui Jisua moton tienga lônngei le a nûk tienga jûingei han, “David Nâipasal minpâkin om rese! Pumapa riminga juongpu chu Pathien'n satvur rese! Pathien minpâkin om rese!” tiin an in-ieka.
Jisua hah Jerusalem a lûtin chu, khopuilien pumpui anrêngin anin tirnata, “Hi mi hih tu mini?” tiin mipui ngeiin an rekela.
Lokongei han, “Hi mi hih Dêipu Jisua, Galilee ram Nazareth renga ani,” tiin an thuona.
Jisua hah Biekina a lûta, Biekin sûnga neinun juorngei le rochôkngei murdi a rujûlpai ngeia. Sumthûlngei dosângngei le pharvali juorngei sukmunngei khom a nammelet pe ngeia,
male an kôm, “Pathien lekhabua Pathien'n, ‘Ki in chu chubaithona in tîng an tih,’ tiin ânziek ani. Hannirese nangnin chu inru ngei inthupna khûrin kêng nin sin hi!” a tipe ngeia.
Biekina han mitcho ngei le kholrangei a kôm an honga, a lei mindam ngeia.
Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungeiin sinkamâmruoi a sinngei le nâipangngei Biekina, “David Nâipasal kôm Hosanna, Minpâkin om rese!” tia an in-iek hah an mûn chu an ningathik zoia.
Masikin Jisua kôm, “Hi mingei an ti hih ni riet mo?” tiin an rekela. Jisua'n, “Adiktakin ki riet, Minpâkna akipphar pêk rangin nâipangngei le nâitesenngei nin minchu zoi, ti hih nin la pore tet ngâiloi mini?” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Jisua'n anni ngei hah a mâka, khopuilien renga Bethany'a a sea, mahan jân a riek zoi.
Anangtûk jînga chu khopuilien tieng a kîr nôkin Jisua a vonchâm zoia.
Lampui kôla theichang kung ava mua, male ava pana, hannirese abuongei tiloiin chu ite man mâka. Masikin theichang kung kôm han, “Inra nôk tet khâi no roh!” a tipea. Voikhat rengin theichang kung hah ahong thêm zoi.
Ruoisingeiin maha an mua, an kamâmzala, “Kho angin mo theichang kung hih athêmpiel kelen hi?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Adiktakin nangni ki ril, iemna nin dôna mulungokchâna nin dôn tet nônchu hi theichang kung chunga ko tho ang hin tho thei nin tih. Mahi vai niloiin hi muol kôm khom hin, ‘Inthon inla, tuikhangliena juon pai roh,’ ti ungla juon pai atih.
Nin iemin chu, chubaithoa nin ngên murdi chu man nin tih,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua hah Biekina a hong nôka, a minchu lâitakin, Ochaisingei le upangei an honga a kôm, “Tu rachamin mo hi neinunngei hih ni sin? Tumo hi racham nang pêk?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongrekel inkhat kei khomin nangni lei rekel rong, ni nin thuon theiin chu, tu rachamin mo hi neinunngei hih ki sin nangni ril ki tih.
John Baptisma hah kho renga rachamneina mo: Pathien renga mo, miriem renga mo?” a tia. Anni le anni an inkhal zoia, “Imo ei ti rang hi? ‘Pathien renga tiin ei thuon lakin,’ ama'n ei kôm, ‘Ithomo John hah nin iem loi?’ mi tîng a ta.
‘Miriem renga ei ti lakin,’ mipui ngeiin imo minlo rang ei chi, mipui ngeiin John hah Dêipua an be sikin,” an tia.
Masikin Jisua kôm, “Riet mak me.” tiin an thuona. Jisua'n an kôm, “Kei khomin tu rachama mo hi neinunngei hih ki sin, nangni ril uol noning,” a tipe ngeia.
“Atûn, Imo nin mindon? Tienlâia han mi inkhatin nâipasal inik a dôna. A nâi ulienpu kôm ava sea, a kôm, ‘Ka Nâipasal, avien chu grapebila senla, sin va tho roh,’ a tia.
‘Ama han nuom mu-ung,’ tiin a thuona, aninâka chomolte suole chu a mindon a thûla male a se zoia.
Male inkhat kôm han khom a sea, ma angdênin ava ti nôka. Ama han, ‘O, Pa,’ sêng ki tih, tiin a thuona. Hannirese se maka.
Ha mi inik ngei han tu ha mo an pa nuomlam a sin uol?” a tia. “Ulienpu han,” tiin an thuona. Masikin Jisua'n an kôm, “Nangni ki ril: sum rusuongpungei le notizuorngei hin Pathien Rêngrama lût nangni an khêl rang ani hi.
Baptispu John'n lampui dik nin jûi rang nangni a juong min mua, ama lei iem mak cheia; sum rusuongpungei le notizuorngeiin chu an lei iem ani. Nangni chu nin mu suonûk khomin nin mulungbôkngei thûlin ama iem mak chei.”
Jisua'n an kôm nanâk, chongmintêk dang rangâi nôk roi a tia. “Voikhat chu tu mini ram pumapa a oma, hah mi han grapebil a thoa, bêr a minkula, grape epna rang khur a choia, a ngâkna rang in insâng a sina. Hanchu grapebil hah inlo mingei ngâk rang ngei kuta bângin, ram danga khuolchai a se zoia.
Grape mara pot zora ahong tungin chu, ânlo mingei kôm han a chang rangtum va lâk rangin a suokngei a tîra.
Ânlo mingei han a suokngei hah an lei sûra, inkhat an jêma, inkhat an thata, inkhat lung leh an dênga.
Atharin suok dangngei motona nêka tam uolin a tîr nôka, motona ngei angdênin an lei tho nôk rêka.
Anûktaka chu, ‘Ka nâipasal hi chu lei jâ ngêt an tih,’ tiin a nâipasal hah an kôm a tîra.
Hannirese, ânlo mingei han a nâipasal hah an lei mûn chu, ‘Hi mi hih a pumapa nâipasal ani. Hong roi lei that rei u, male a rochon ei man rang ani!’ an tia.
Masikin an sûra, grapebil pêntieng an vôrpaia, ama hah an that zoi.”
“Atûn, grapebil pumapa a hong tikin, ha ânlo mingei hah imo hong lo ta nih?” tiin Jisua'n a rekela.
Anni han a kôm, “Ha mi saloi ngei hah that ngei ngêt a ta, grapebil hah ânlo mingei adang, amara pot zora diktaka changrangtum a pêk ngâi rangpu kôm pêng a tih,” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, Pathien Lekhabu'n, “In sinpu ngeiin lung mangmunboi anga an hengpai hah, akila lung kâmomtak achang zoi. Ma hah Pumapa tho ania; ei mitmua hin kamâmom ani! a ti hih nin pore ngâiloi mo?” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua'n a bôksa nôka, “Masikin nangni ki ril, Pathien Rêngram hih nin kôm renga lâkpai nîng ata, amara musuo rang mingei kôm pêk nîng atih.
Tutu hi lung chunga ânpal chu ahârhârin om an ta, hi lungin adel vâng chu innôichit an tih,” a tia.
Ochaisingei le Phariseengeiin Jisua chongmintêk misîr hah an rietin chu, an chungroi a misîr ani ti an riet zoia.
Masikin ama sûr rang an pût zoi. Aniatachu anni ngei han mipui ngei an chia, mipui ngeiin Jisua hah dêipu'n an be sikin.
Jisua'n mipui ngei a rokôka, chongmintêk a mang nôka.
“Invân Rêngram chu rêngpa inkhatin a nâipasal ranga inneina ruolhoi tho leh mintêk ani.
Bukhalâi ot rangin a mîsiel ngei koi rangin a tîrlâmngei a tîra, hannirese hong nuom mak ngeia.
Masikin tîrlâm dangngei a tîr nôka, a mi sielngei kôm hi anghin ti rangin chong a be ngeia: ‘Atûn hin bukhalâi ot rangin ki sinsiem suozoi; ke sechalngei le ke serâttuoi vai minthâi ngei ka thata, neinunngei murdi sinsiem suo ani zoi. Inneina bukhalâi ot rangin hong ta roi!’ ti rangin.
Aniatachu siela omngei han itên lei be mak ngeia, male an sadâi chita an sina: inkhat a loia a sea, inkhat chu a dôra a sea.
Midang ngeiin tîrlâmngei hah an sûrrapa an jêm ngeia, an that ngei zoi.
Rêngpa hah a taksi sabaka; masikin a râlmingei a tîra, ha mithatpungei hah a min thatngeia, male an khopuilien khom a min hâl pe ngei zoia.
Hanchu a tîrlâmngei a koia, an kôm, Inneina bukhalâi chu minsûk suo ani zoia, aniatachu ki mi sielngei hah a nêk ruo nimak ngei.
Atûn chu lamliena se ungla, mi nin mu murdi bukhalâi ot rangin hong koi roi, a tipe ngeia.
Masikin tîrlâmngei hah lamlienngeia an sea, mi an mu murdi, misa le misie; an hong koibûma, inneina in hah mipuiin an sip zoia.
“Rêngpa hah khuolmingei en rangin ava lûta, inneina puon insil loi mi inkhat ava mua.
Rêngpa han a kôm, ‘Mala, inneina puon insil loiin khoangin mo asûnga no hong lût?’ tiin a rekela. Hannirese ha mi han ite ti maka.
Male rêngpa han a tîrlâmngei kôm, ‘A kut le ke khit ungla, pêntieng ajîngna vôrpai roi. Mahan chap a ta a hâ riel a tih,’” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n, “Mi siela om chu tamtak an nia, aniatachu, thanga om chu atômte kêng an ni,” tiin chongkhârnân a tia.
Phariseengei hah an jôkpaia male Jisua chongrekelin min ôk rang chang an mintuo zoi.
Hanchu an ruoisi senkhatngei le Herod pâla mi senkhatngei a kôm an tîra, ha mingei han, “Minchupu, chongtak ni misîr ngâi ti kin riet. Tute lunghâng tho uol ngâi mak chea, tute mindona chungroia khom kângdoina dôn loiin miriemngei ta rangin Pathien lungdo chongtak hah ni minchu ngâia.
Hanchu, ni ril ta, imo ni mindon? Roman Rêng Ceasar kôma chôiruol pêk hih ei Balamin ânkal mo, ânkal loi mo?” an tia.
Nikhomrese, Jisua'n asaloi an mintuo hah a riet chiena, an kôm, “Nangni Asarotholngei! ithomo ni min ôk rang nin pût hi?
Chôiruol chôi ranga sumthîr hah ni min en ta u!” a tia. Sumthîr hah a kôm an hong chôia,
male a rekel ngeia, “Tu mâi rimil le tu riming ngei mo an ni hi?” a tia.
Anni han “Ceasar” tiin an thuona. Masikin Jisua'n an kôm, “Asa, hanchu, Ceasar ta chu Ceasar kôm pêk ungla, Pathien ta chu Pathien kôm pêk roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Mahi an rietin chu an kamâm tataka; ama an mâka an rotpat zoi ani.
Mani sûn nanâk han, Sadducee senkhatngei Jisua kôm an honga mingei hih thina renga inthoi nôk no ni ngei an tia.
Anni han, “Minchupu, ‘Moses'n mi nâi neiloiin a lômnu thisan senla, a nâipa'n ha meithâi hah luo nôk ngêtin a upa ta rangin nâi a nei pe rang ani,’ a tia.
Atûn hin, kin lâia lâibungrêng sari an oma; ulientakin in a neia, nâi neiloiin a thia, masikin a lômnu hah a nâipa kôm a mâka.
A nâipa iniknapu chunga khom ma anghan a hong om nôka, a inthumnapu chunga khom, azoinataka sarinapu dênin an luo paka.
Anûktaka chu nupangnu khom a thi zoia.
Atûn, mithi ngei inthoi nôk tika han tu lômnu tak mo ani rang ani zoi? An rêngin laka an luo paka,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Idôra dikloi ngei mo nin ni zoi! Pathien Lekhabu nônchu Pathien sinthotheina nin riet loi sika kêng ani.
Mithi ngei aringin an inthoinôk tika chu invâna vântîrtonngei angin om an ti zoi, innei khâi noni ngei.
Atûn ithingei aringa an inthoinôkna roi: Pathien'n nangni a misîr pe hah nin la pore tet ngâiloi mini?” a tia
Pathien'n, “Keima Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, Jacob Pathien ki ni,” a tia. “Ama chu iringngei Pathien kêng ani, ithingei Pathien nimak,” tiin a thuona.
Mipui ngei han mahi an rietin chu, a minchûna hah an kamâm tatak zoi ani.
Jisua'n Sadduceengei hah a makhal mindokngei tih Phariseengeiin an rietin chu a pâlin an honga,
an lâia Balam minchupu inkhatin chongrekelin min ôk rang a bôka.
“Minchupu, Balama hin kho chongpêk tak himo a roiinpuitak?” tiin a rekela.
Jisua'n a kôm, “ ‘Pumapa na Pathien chu nu mulungrîl murdi'n, na ratha murdi'n, nu mulungbôk murdi'n lungkham mu roh iti hi,’ ani tiin a thuona.
Mahih chongpêk roiinpuitak le a kâmomtak ani.
Chongpêk inikna kâmom nôk ân angpui chu: ‘Nangma nên lungkham anghan nu bungmingei lungkham mu roh’ iti hih ani.
Moses Balam pumpui le dêipungei minchûna ngei murdi khom hi chongpêk inik chunga hin ânngam let ani,” a tia.
Pharisee senkhatngei munkhatin an intûp laiin, Jisua'n an kôm,
“Messiah chungroi hih imo nin mindon? Tu richisuonpâr mo ani?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “Ama chu David jâisuona mi ani,” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nônte, ithomo Ratha han David hah ‘Pumapa’ tiin a min koi? David'n,
‘Pumapa han ka Pumapa kôm a tia: Ka chang tieng insung tit roh Na râlngei ne kepha nuoia ka dar suo mâka chu,’ a ti ani.
David'n, ‘Pumapa’ tiin a koiin te, i angin mo Messiah hah David richisuonpâr ani thei rang?” a tia.
Tutên Jisua hah thuon thei mak ngeia, male mani sûn renga chu tutên ite chongrekel rang ngam khâi mak ngei.
Hanchu, Jisua'n mipuingei le a ruoisingei kôm chong a rila.
“Balam minchupungei le Phariseengei hih Moses Balamngei rilminthârpu ngei ni ranga phal an ni.
Masikin itho ranga nangni an be murdi chu nin jômin nin jûi rang ani; Hannirese, an omchan chu jûi no roi, an misîr ngei hih an mang ngâi loi sikin.
Puok arik le apêl intak takngei an siema, mingei chunga an bâng ngâia, aniatachu, ha mingei sanna rangin an kutpârngei luo mang nuom ngâi mak ngei.
An sintho murdi khom miriem mu rangin kêng an sin ngâi. An machalngei le an bânngei khitna hih Pathien chong miziek ngei hih en ta u, an inrol bâk na! An kâncholiinchuol minvona ngei khom hih en ta u, asei bâk na!
Ruolhoi thona muna munhoi tatakna ngei le synagog ngeia sukmun asa an ngên ngâia;
Bazar mun ngeia min chubai an mûk le ‘Minchupu’ tia an koingei an minlut ngâia.
Nangni chu ‘Minchupu’ tiin koi ni tet no tunui, urêng korong nin nia, minchupu inkhat mang nin dôn sikin.
Pilchung hin tute O, Pa, ti no roi, Pa inkhat mamang invâna nin dôn sikin.
‘Ruoipu’ ti khomin koi ni no tunui. Messiah mang hih nin ruoipu ani sikin.
Nin lâia a roiinpuitak chu nin tîrlâm ani rang ani.
Tutu a omlien kai chu chîn an ta, a omchîn kai chu minlutin om an tih.”
“Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Invân Rêngram inkhâr hah mingei nin khâr pea; nangni laka lût uol mak cheia mi a lût rang ngei khom nin khap ngâi.
Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Meithâingei sum nin sâk pea, mi huongnân asôt zazan chubai nin tho ngâi; masikin nin dûk tuong rik uol ok atih!
Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Mi inkhat insîrna rangin tuikhanglien le ram pumpui nin sir ngâia; a hong inletin chu ha mi hah nangni nêka bâknika dûkmuna se rangin nin tho ngâi!
Nangni ruoipu mitcho, Tukhom Biekin dêna khomâkinsâm chu ite nâng ngâi maka; aniatachu tukhom Biekina rângkachak dêna khomakinsâm chu anângna aom.” Ti ngâi ngei nin chung arik.
Mitcho inmôlngei! Imo akâm aom uol, rângkachak mo aninônchu rângkachak inthieng Biekin hah mo?
Mapêna Tukhom mâichâm dêna khomakinsâm chu ite anângna omaka, ania mâichâm chunga neinunpêk dêna khomakinsâm chu anângna aom, nin ti sa ngâi.
Idôra mitcho nin ni! Imo akâmaom uol, neinunpêk minthieng ngâipu mâichâm ha mo, mo neinunpêk ha mo?
Masikin tukhom mâichâm le a chunga neinunpêk aom murdi'n ânsâmdelsa ani.
Tukhom Biekin dêna khomâkinsâm kaiin chu Biekin leh a sûnga Pathien om hah dênin ân sâm ania;
male tukhom invân dêna khomâkinsâm chu Pathien sukmun le a chunga insungpu dênin ân sâm ani.
Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Sâkruo avâng ngâi chimungei, lêngmesêr le sâkbakhêr tenah khom sômakhat nin pêk ngâia, hannirese, Balama akâm aom uol, dikna ngei le mulungjûrpuina le iemomna ngei jôm rangin chu lunghâng tho ngâi mak chei. Hi ngei hih nin jôm rang ani, adangngei khom mathân uol loiin.
Ruoipu mitcho ngei! Nin tui nêkna thoihir chu nin rithît minsâia, ania saringsei chu nin movol ngâi ani.
Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Nin kilât le nin mâirâng pêntieng nin minsâia, a sûngtieng chu, inrûksâkna le indînloi nân ai sip ani.
Pharisee mitcho ngei! Kilât sûngtieng hah minsâi bak ungla, hanchu apêntieng khom sâi sâng atih!
“Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Thân lung, nôtminvâra apêntieng chu en ahoi zata, hannirese, asûngtieng chu ru le ruok athûa sip angha nin ni.
Ma anghan mitin mitmua pêntieng chu asa anghan nin inlanga, hannirese, nin sûngtieng chu asarotholna le sietnangeia sipmat nin ni.
“Nangni Balam minchupungei le Pharisee asarotholngei! Nin chung arik! Dêipungei thân nin sinsiama, midikngei riettit nân lungngei nin minvo ngâia;
male ei richibulngei om lâia han ei lei omsai nikhom senla, dêipungei thisen an musuok han chu inchel no ih, nin ti ngâi.
Masikin Dêipungei lei that ngei richia mi nin ni ti nin minlang chak ani.
Se ungla, nin richibulngeiin an lei phut hah minzoi roi.
Nangni murûlngei le murûl nâingei! Dûkmuna se ranga jêkmasatna renga inmo jôk thei rangin nin insabei?
Masikin nangni ki ril, nin kôm dêipungei, mivârngei, minchupungei juongtîr ka ta, an lâia senkhat chu that nin ta, senkhat chu jêmdel nin ta, senkhat chu synagog ngeia jêm nin ta, khopui ankhat renga khopui ankhata rujûlpai nin tih.
Masikin midiktak Abel thisen renga Biekin le mâichâm kâra Barakia nâipasal, theiloinaboi, Zakaria nin that thisen tena han, pilchunga midikngei thatna sika dûktuongna chu nin chunga la chul atih.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril: ha mingei thatna sika dûktuongna ngei murdi chu atûna mingei chunga chul let atih.
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Dêipungei thata, Pathien'n no kôma thangthei a hongtîr ngei lung leh a dêng thatpu! Ârpuinu'n ate ngei a mantha nuoia ai opbûm ngâi anghan ni mingei anrêngin voizet mo ka bân nuoia opbûm rang ko bôka, hankhoma nuom mak che!
Masikin nin Biekin hah mâkrakin, a korongin om atih.
Nangni ki ril, ‘Pumapa riminga hong chu Pathien'n satvur rese,’ nin ti mâka chu atûn renga ni mu nôk khâi no tunui a tia.”
Hanchu, Jisua hah a jôka, Biekin renga a se lâiin Biekin min en rangin a ruoisingei a kôm an honga.
Ama han an kôm, “En roi, Adiktakin nangni ki ril, hitaka lung inkhat luo khom hih amuna om no nih; anrêngin paiin om riei an tih,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua Oliv tângah ânsung lâiin, a ruoisingeiin a theiin an hong intongpuia. “Mi ril ta, hi ngei hih itika mo ai tung rang,” male “Nu juong nôkna rang le rammuol mongna rang minsinna hah imo ai ni rang,” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm han, “Tutên nangni an huong loina rangin, indîn roi.
Mi tamtakin, ‘Messiah hah ki ni!’ tiin keima riming songin hong an ta, mi tamtak lei huong an tih.
Nin kôla indoina roi riet nin ta, ala takna indoina roi inthang la riet nin tih, nikhomrese, nin jâmminzal no roi. Ha neinunngei hah chu ahongtung ngêt rang ani, nikhomrese amongna chu lani no nih.
Nam le nam indoi an ta, ram le ram indoi an tih. Muntina mâitâm chul ata, ningnu innîk atih.
Ha ngei hah nâiha aphut chak ang hah ani.
Hanchu, dûk nangni min tuong rang le nangni that rangin nangni la sûr an tih. Keima sikin nam tinin nangni la mumâk an tih.
Ma tika chu mi tamtakin an taksônna la mâng an ta, lân sûr inlôm an ta, lân mumâk inlôm an tih.
Male, dêipu dikloi tamtak hong suok an ta, mi tamtak la huong an tih.
Hanchu, sietna ala pung rang sikin mi tamtak lungkhamna la dâi atih.
Nikhomrese, tutu among dêna diera tuong chu sanminringin om an tih.
Male, hi ‘Rêngram Thurchi Sa’ hih namtin rietna rangin rammuol pumpuia misîrin la om a ta; male, amongna hong tung atih.”
“Hanchu, ‘Intakna Ichiom Tak,’ dêipu Daniel ramanga lei misîr hah mûng nin ta, mun inthienga han inding a tih.” (Apore murdi'n aomtie riet rese ngei!)
“Male Judea rama om ngei hah tânga rot ngêt rese ngei.
Mi a inchunga om khom insûnga a neinun kaisuo rangin chum no rese.
Mi loia om khom a puon lâk rangin kîr no rese.
Ha ni han chu nâivongngei le nu nâite pomlâingei chung chu ântak bâk rang na!
Nin rot rang zora hah phalbia mo, sabbathni'n mo ani loina rangin Pathien kôm chubaitho roi.
Ha zora dûktongna ichiruoi inthang om rang ha chu rammuol insieng renga atûn tena la om ngâi maka, om nôk tet khâi no nih.
Nikhomsenla, Pathien'n ha sûn ngei hah a minbong zoi; ni no senla vang chu tute ringsuok thei noni ngei. A mi zenngei sikin Pathien'n ha sûn ngei hah minbong a tih.
“Male, tukhomin nin kôm, ‘En ta, Messiah chu hin a om!’ aninônchu ‘Soson a om!’ an ti khomin iem no roi.
Messiah rothol ngei le dêipu dikloi ngei an la suok rang ani; ha ngei han thei vang senla ngei chu Pathien zen mingei luo an huong theina rangin minsinna sininkhêl le sin kamâmruoi thông an tih.
Rangâi roi! Azora ahongtung mân nangni ki lei ril ani.
Aninônchu, nin kôm, ‘En ta, ramchâra aom!’ an ti khomin mahan se no roi; aninônchu hin ânthup an ti khomin iem no roi.
Miriem Nâipasal juong nôk rang chu kôlinleka dapdaptingei sak tieng renga thang tieng tenah ahonginlek anga han ani rang sikin.
“Kho munah khom saruok omna murdia sêlkuru khom intûp an tih.”
“Ha intakna nikhuongei zoiin chu nisa jîng a ta, thâ vâr khâi nonih, invân renga ârsi ngei tâk a ta, invân sinthotheina ngei hah inphêthet'n om an tih.
Masuole chu Miriem Nâipasal minsinna hah invâna inlang ata; pilchunga mi murdi'n Miriem Nâipasal invâna sûm chunga sinthotheina le inlal taka juong an mu tikin chu chap an tih.
Bekul miring inring tak tum nîng ata, hanchu, a vântîrtonngei hah rammuol rikil minlia tîr a ta, kôlkung renga kangkhat tienga kôlkung dênin a mi zenngei mintûp atih.”
“Ha chongmintêk hah theichang kunga inchu roi. Amachang ahong ringa, ahong innoia, abuo ahong incherin chu kholum ahong nâi zoi tiin nin riet ngâi.
Ha angdênin, ma neinunngei murdi hah nin mu'n chu, a zora ahong nâi zoi, ânphut rang ani zoi ti riet roi.
Atûnlâia mingei hih an thi riei mân, hi ngei nâm hih tung let atih ti riettit roi.
Pilchung le invân boi a ta, ko chong chu boi no nih.”
“Hannirese, ha nikhuo le a zora ha chu Pa telloiin chu tutên riet mak ngei; Invâna vântîrtonngei khomin, Nâipasal khomin.
Miriem Nâipasal juong nôkna chu Noah damlâi angdên han nîng atih.
Tuilien mân, sûn ngeiah han chu Noah rukuonga a lût ni dênin an sâka an nêka, lômnu, lômpa an innei ngâia.
Tui ahongliena, an rêngin an inmang riei mâka chu imo ahongtung ite riet mak ngei. Miriem Nâipasal juong nôkna chu ha ang takah han nîng atih.
Ha tikin chu mi inik loia sin an ta inkhat tuongin om a ta, inkhat mâkin om a tih.
Nupang inik sasum kunga sângsukin om an ta, inkhat mâkin om a ta, Inkhat tuongin om a tih.
Masikin inning chien roi, itiknimo nin Pumapa a juong rang riet mak chei.
In pumapa'n inru hong rang zora hah riet senla chu, lei meng a ta, a neinunngei min muruk no nih, ti hih riet roi.
Masikin nangni khom intûng chienin om roi, nin tûng loi zora takin Miriem Nâipasal a juong rang sikin.”
“Tîrlâm taksônom avâr tak, a pun a insûng cherêla, tîrlâm dangngei zora tina an sâk sem pe ranga ulien a minchang chu tumo nini?
A pu'n a honga, ha anga sin thoa tîrlâm a hong mu ha chu a râisân ani,
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, a pu han a neinun murdi chunga ajêkpu minchang a tih.
Hannirese, tîrlâm saloi anîn chu, a mulungin ‘Ku pu chu hong vak no nih’ tîng a ta,
a tîrlâm champuingei lei jêm a ta, ju inrûingei kâra lei nêkin lei sâk a tih.
Male, ha tîrlâm hah a tûng loi lâitak le a riet loi zora takin a pu hong suok pe atih.
A pu han ât nôinek a ta, asarotholngei chang anga han minchang a tih, Mahan chap a ta, a hâ riel a tih.”
“Ma tikin chu, Invân Rêngram hah dôngmate sôm ngei an châtingei chôia, moipumapa don ranga se ngei leh mintêk nîng atih zoi.
An lâia mi rangnga hah an inmôla, mi rangnga hah an vâr ani.
Ânmôlngei han, an châtingei an chôia, a tui chôi sa mak ngeia,
avârngei han chu an châtingei an chôia, a ûma han a tui khom an chôi sa.
Moipumapa hah a juong innu sikin an in alênmua, an lei inphara.
Jânchimrip takah chu ‘Moipumapa a juong zoi! Adon rangin hong suok ta roi’ tia iniek rahang a juong om zoia;
hanchu, dôngmate sôm ngei hah an inthoia, an châtingei an minsûka.
Male, ânmôlngei han avârngei kôm han, ‘Nin châtitui hah mi pêk sa roi ba! kin châti athi rang kêng’ an tia.
Avâr rangnga ngei han, ‘Nangni pêk thei noning ung. Keini leh nangni rangin chu hun nonih. Dôrah se ungla, va rochok roi,’ tiin an thuona.
Hanchu, dôngmate inmôlngei hah châtitui rochôk rangin an sea, hanchu an se kârin moipumapa hah a juong zoia. Dôngmate rangnga ânthok ngei chu ama leh inbiek ruolhoi tho rangin an lûta, in an khâr zoi.
Nûkah chu dôngmate dangngei khom an hongtung zoia, O pu, o pu, mi min lût roh! Tiin an in-ieka.
Moipumapa han, Nangni minlût tet no ning! Nangni riet ngâi mu-ung tiin a thuona.”
Male Jisua'n chongkhârnân, “Intûng chienin om roi, a nikhuo le azora hah nin riet loi sikin,” a tia.
“Ma tikin chu Invân Rêngram hah mi inkhat khuol a chai rangtoa, a tîrlâmngei a koia, a rochonngei enkol leh mintêk nîng atih zoi.
An thei lam ang chitin a pêka, inkhat kôm sum isâng rangnga a pêka, inkhat isângnik a pêka, inkhat kôm isâng khat a pêka. Hanchu, khuolchai rangin ânphet zoi.
Tîrlâm isâng rangnga changpu ha chu a se kelena, ava minpunga, isâng rangnga dang ava suo nôka.
Ha anga han tîrlâm isâng nik a changpu ha chu a sea, adang isâng nik a muphung nôka,
hannirese, tîrlâm isângkhat a changpu ha chu a sea, khur a choia, a pu sum hah athupa.
Asôtzan suoleh chu tîrlâmngei an pu hah a hongkîr nôka, an kôm a sum thurchi a minthâr zoia.
Tîrlâm, isâng rangnga changpu hah a honga, isâng rangnga dang a hong pêka, o pu isâng rangnga mi ni pêk hah en ta! hi isâng rangnga adang ke lei man nôk hi a tia.
A pu han a kôm, No tho minsa, nangma tîrlâm asa le iemom, atômte chunga taksônomin no om sikin, atampa chunga khom a enkolpu'n nang minchang ki tih. Hong inla, ka râisânna hong chang sa roh! a tia.
Hanchu tîrlâm isâng nik changpu hah a honga, O pu, isâng nik mi ni pêk hah en ta! Hi isâng nik dang ke lei man nôk hi! a tia.
A pu han a kôm, No tho minsa, nangma, tîrlâm asa le taksônom! Atômte chunga taksônom ni ni sikin, atampa chunga khom a enkolpu'n nang min om ki tih. Hong inla, ka râisânna hong chang sa roh!” a tia.
Hanchu tîrlâm isâng khat changpu hah a honga, O pu, mi inngartak ni ni ti ki riet; nu tu loina khoma na ât ngâia, sachi ne rethe loina munna khom bu ni mintûp ngâia.
Ki chia, masikin ke sea, pil rilah nu sum hah ka va thup ani. En ta hi nata nanâk hah, a tia.
A pu han a kôm han, “Nangma tîrlâm puoloi le thaboipa! Ka tu loina khoma ka âtta, sachi kerthe loina khoma bu ki mintûp ngâi ti ni riet na?
Ha anghan aninte, ithomo ku sum hah sumsiena inah ne lei sie loi, nino senla chu, ko hong nôka hin ku sum hih apung leh ka man rang kêng ai ni.
Atûn chu sum hih a kôm renga lâk ungla, isâng sôm dônpu kôm pêk roi.
Tutu a dôn chu pêk mintam uol nîng a ta, dôn ok a tih; tutu a dôn loi kai chu ai dôn chêtte khom lâk pe rip nîng a tih.
Hi tîrlâm mangmunboi hih pêntieng ajîngna vôrpai roi; mahan chap a ta, a hâ riel a tih,” tiin a rila.
“Miriem Nâipasal hih vântîrtonngei murdi leh inlal taka a juong tikin chu Rêngsukmuna insung a ta,
male a makunga namtina mingei intûp an tih. Hanchu, belrihôlpu'n kêl le belri a sensâi anghan pâl nikin sensâi a tih.
Midikngei hah a changtieng dar a ta, adangngei hah a voitieng dar a tih.
Hanchu Rêng han a chang tienga mingei kôma han, Hong roi ka pan sat ai vur ngei! Hong ungla, rammuol inzir renga nin ta ranga rêngram minsûk hih hong luo ta roi.
Ko von achâmin sâk mi nin pêka, ku tuiânrâlin nêk rang mi nin pêka; khuolmi ki nîn nin ina mi nin mintunga.
Dierboiin ko omin puon mi nin min sila; ka damloi zorân mi nin donsûia, intâng ina ko om khomin mi nin pan ngâi,” la tîng a tih.
Midikngei han, “Pumapa tikhanmo no vonchâmin nang kin mua, sâk nang kin pêka, tui inrâlin nang kin mua nêk rang nang kin pêk?
Tikhanmo khuolmin nang kin mua, kin inah nang kin mintunga, dierboiin nang kin mua, puonsil rang nang kin pêk?
Tikhanmo damloiin mo, intâng ina mo nang kin mua, nang kan pan ngâia?”
Rêng han an kôm, “Nangni ki ril, hi ku sûngsuok achîntak ngei lâia mi inkhat chunga nin sin hah ku chunga nin sin ani,” tiin la tîng a tih.
“Hanchu a voi tienga mingei kôm han chu, Nangni chu Pathien khomâksâmna nuoia om roi! Diabol le a tîrtonngei ta ranga sin kumtuong meiah han se ta roi!
Ko von achâmin sâk mi pêk mak cheia, ku tui ânrâlin nêk rang mi pêk mak cheia;
Khuolmi kinîn nin inah mi mintung mak cheia, dierboiin ko omin puon ni min sil mak cheia, damloiin le intâng ina ko om khomin mi pan ngâi mak chei,” la tîng a tih.
Hanchu anni han an kôm, “Pumapa tikhanmo no von achâmin mo, tui ânrâlin mo, khuolmin mo, dierboiin mo, damloiin mo, intâng ina mo nang kin mua, ni sin nang kin tho pe ngâi loi?” Tiin la thuon an tih.
Rêng han an kôm, “Nangni ki ril, hi mi chînte ngei lâia inkhat chunga nin sin nuom loi chu ku chunga nin sin loi ani,” la tîng a tih.
“Hi mingei hih kumtuong dûktuongna sêng an ta, hannirese, midikngei chu kumtuonga ringna han sêng an tih,” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n ha chongngei murdi hah a ril zoiin chu a ruoisingei kôm,
“Sûnnik suoleh, Kalkân kût hong om atih iti nin rieta. Miriem Nâipasal hih jêmdel rangin pêk nîng atih,” a tia.
Hanchu ochaisingei le Upangei hah Ochai Inlal Caiaphas inpuia intongna an neia,
inrûkin an sûra, an that rang lam an mintuoa.
Nikhomrese, “Kût sûngin chu ni no rese, mipui lâia injêlna tete om duoi nih,” an tia.
Hanchu, Jisua hah Bethany'a aphârpa Simon inah a oma.
Jisua bu a nêk lâitakin, nupang inkhat alabaster bilôrin sariek mirimhoi man luttak ahong chôia, a luah a buok pea.
Ruoisingeiin an mu inchu an ningathika. “Irangmo hi anga a inchek hi?
Hi mirimhoi hih man tamtaka zuora, inriengngei kôma sem thei kêng ani,” an tia.
Jisua'n an ti ngei hah a rieta, an kôm, “Ithomo hi nupangnu hih nin rokôk? kata rangin sin asa le enhoi tak ai tho ani.
Inriengngei chu nin kôma om tit an nia, hannirese, kei chu nin kôma om bang noning.
Hi sariek mirimhoi ka takpuma ai buok hih phûm ranga ni sinsiamna ranga ai tho ani.
Atûn, chongdiktak nangni ki ril, rammuol pumpuia thurchisa an misîrna nâma, hi nupangnu sintho khom hih ama riettitna rangin misîr sa ngâi an tih,” a tia.
Masuole Ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia inkhat a riming Judas Iscariot an ti hah ochaisingei kôm a sea
Male ama'n, “Jisua nangni ki minsûr inte imo mi nin pêk rang?” a tia. Anni han sumdâr sômthum an tela ama an pêka.
Masuo renga chu Judas han Jisua an kuta a pêk theina rangin chuminrên a rok tit zoi.
Cholboivâipôl Kût ni sûn motontakah han, ruoisingei an honga, Jisua kôm, “Kalkân Kût hih khotieng mo va minsûk unglang nu nuom?” tiin an rekela.
Ama han an kôm, “khopuiliena mi inkhat kôm se ungla, a kôm. ‘Minchupu'n ko zora anâi zoia; ku ruoisingei leh Kalkân Kût ni inah mang kin tih,’ a ti va ti roi,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm he a be lam angtakin an thoa, Kalkân Kût hah an va minsûk zoia.
Kholoi ahong nînchu, Jisua le ruoisi sômleinik hah khalâi ottin an insung lâiin.
Khalâi an ot lâitakin Jisua'n an kôm, “Nangni ki ril, nin lâia mi inkhat hin ni minsûr a tih,” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu ruoisingei mulung dûkatonga, a kôm, “Pumapa, keima mo mi ni ti?” tiin inkhat inkhatin an rekel paka.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Khênga vâipôl mi pûrpuipu hin ni minsûr a tih.
Pathien Lekhabu'n ai ti anghan, Miriem Nâipasal hih thîng a tih, nikhomrese, Miriem Nâipasal minsûrpu chung chu arik bâk rang na! Ha miriem ha chu ânzir tetloi nisenla ata rangin sa uol a tih,” a tia.
A minsûr rangpu Judas hah a hongchonga, “Minchupu, keima mo mini ti tatak?” tiin a rekela. Jisua'n a kôm, “Nên ti hate” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu an sâk lâitakin, Jisua'n vâipôl a lâka, râisânchong a ril zoiin chu a khoia, a ruoisingei kôm a pêka, an kôma, “Lâk ungla, sâk roi, hi hih ka taksa ani,” a tia.
Masuole chu, kilât a lâka, Pathien kôm râisânchong a ril zoiin chu an kôm a pêka, “Nêk roi, nin rêngin;
ma hih ki thisen mi tamtak nunsie ngâidamna ranga suok rang, Pathien chonginkhit mindet rang chu ani.
Nangni ki ril, Ka Pa Rêngrama nangni leh uain thar ke nêk ni atung mâka chu hi uain hih nêk nôk khâi no ning,” a tia.
Masuole chu la inkhat an thoa, an tho suolechu Oliv tâng tieng an se zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n an kôm, “Avien jân lelea hin nin rêngin rot let nin ta, ni mâk riei nin tih, Pathien Lekhabu'n, ‘Pathien'n belrihôlpu hah that an ta, belringei hah chekinchâi chit an tih,’ a ti sikin.
nikhomrese, kên thoinôk suoleh Galilee rama nin motona lei sêng ki tih,” a tia.
Peter'n a kôm, “Adangngeiin nang mâk riei khomrese ngei, keiman chu nang mâk tet no ning!” a tia.
Jisua'n Peter kôm, “Nang ki ril, avien jân ârkhuong mân nangma'n voithum keima hih riet ngâi mu-ung ni tîng ni tih,” a tipea.
Peter'n a kôm, “Ni thina thisa rang khom nînlang ma anghan ti tet no ning,” tiin a thuona. Ruoisi dangngei khomin ha angdên han an ti paka.
Hanchu Jisua hah a ruoisingei leh munkhatin Gethsemani an tina han an sea, Jisua'n an kôm, “Soson chubai ka va tho sûngkâr chu hin lên sung roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Peter le Jebedee nâipasal inik ngei hah a tuonga, Rathainvâina le mulungdûk tongnân ahong sipa,
male an kôm, “ka mulungdûk atong raia athi rang dôrin kêng ki ni zoi. Hin om ungla mên ning pui roi,” a tia.
Hanchu, mântieng ava se uol vieta, pila ânboka, chubai a thoa, “O Pa, anitheiin chu, hi tuongna kilât hih ko kôm renga ni khâi pai pe roh! Nikhomrese, keima racham niloiin nangma racham ni rese,” a tia.
Masuole chu a hongkîr nôka, ruoisi inthum ngei hah an inin a hong mua; Peter kôm, “Inmo nangni inthum hite dârkâr khat luo khom mi inningpui thei loi tie hi?
Huongna nin lût loina rangin intûng chienin chubai roi. Ratha'n chu a nuoma, taksa'n ai phari loi ani” a tia.
Hanchu, avoiniknân Jisua a se nôka, a chubai nôka, “O pa hi tuongna kilât hi ke nêk loia pai thei aninônchu nangma racham ni rese,” a tia.
A hong nôkin chu ruoisingei hah ain dênin a mu nôka; an mitngei reng an meng zoi loi sikin.
Jisua'n a mâk ngei nôka, a voithumnân a ti nanâk hah tiin chubai a tho nôka.
Male ruoisingei kôm a hong nôka, an kôm, “Atûn tena inngamin nin la in bang na? En ta u, Miriem Nâipasal hih mi nunsiengei kuta pêk rang zora ahongtung zoi.
Inthoi ungla, sêng ei ti zoi. En ta u, ni sûr rangpu hih ahong nâi zoi!” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua a chong la mong loiin ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia Judas hah a hong tunga. Ama lômin Ochaisingei le Upangei hongtîr mipui, khandai le tôkmol chôiin an hong sa.
A minsûr rangpu han, “A bieng ku tum takhah nin rokpu nîng a tih, sûr kelen roi!” tiin minsinna a lei pêksai ani.
Judas hah Jisua kôm a se pata, a kôm, “Minchupu, nu chunga rathanngamna om rese,” tiin a bieng a tuma.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Mal, no hongna abi tho kelen roh!” a ti pea, Hanchu an honga, Jisua hah an sûr zoi.
Jisua kôma om ngei lâia inkhatin a khandai a leka Ochai Inlaltak, a tîrlâmpa kuor a tukthâk pea.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Na khandai hah a koka thun nôk ta roh. khandai a lek ngei chu khandai nanâkin thîng an tih.
Ka Pa kôm sanna ko zong theia, ama'n voikhatrengin vântîrton isâng ruk pâl sômleinik nêka tam a juongtîr thei iti ni riet loi mini?
Nikhomrese, ngên ta inlang, i angin mo Pathien chong hih hi anga hong iom rang hih ai tung thei ranga?” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua'n lokongei kôm han, “Khandai leh tôkmol chôiin inru sûr rang leh in-ang bangin misûr rangin nin hong na? Nîngtin Biekinah kên sunga, ki minchu ngâia, mahan misûr mak cheia.
Nikhomrese, dêipungei chong miziek ngei hah ahong tung dik theina rangin, hi ngei murdi hih a hong iom ani hi,” a tia. Hanchu, ruoisingei murdi'n ama an mâk raka an rêngin an rot riei zoi.
Hanchu, Jisua sûrngei han, Ochai Inlaltak Caiaphas inah Balam minchupungei le Upangei lei intûpna han an tuong zoia.
Peter'n alazanin a jûia, Ochai Inlaltak in khalâi dênin a jûia. Khalâidung a lûta a mongna mu rang nuomin a rungpungei kâra han ânsunga.
Jisua an that theina rangin Ochaisingei le roijêkpu murdi han theiloi an mintum theina rang abi an roka;
nikhomrese, mu mak ngei, mi tamtak hongin a chungroia milak ril khom senla ngei. Anûktakah mi inik an honga,
male, “Hi mi hin, Biekin hih setin sûnthumin ki sin nôk thei,” a ti an tia.
Ochai Inlaltak hah ândinga, Jisua kôm, “Hi nang an nônna roia hin ite thuonna ni nei loi rang mo?” a tia.
Nikhomrese, Jisua chu a dâireka. Ochai Inlaltak han arkôk nôka, “Pathien aring rimingin nang ki ti; ni ril roh, Pathien Nâipasal Messiah hah nini mo?” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Ni na ti hate. Mahah ninôn khom nang ki ril; atûn renga Miriem Nâipasal hih Râtinchung chang tienga, insunga, invâna sûm chunga juong la mûng nin tih,” a tia.
Ochai Inlal han a puonsilngei a potkhêra, “Pathien a rilsiet zoi; Rietpuipu dang nâng khâi mak meh! Pathien a rilsiet tie chu nin riet zoi!
I angin mo nin mindon?” a tia. Anni han, “A tho minchâi, athi ngêt rang ani” an tia.
Hanchu a mâia an michila male an jêma; senkhatin,
“Ni ril roh, Messiah, Tumo nang a jêm?” tiin an bêna.
Hanchu, Peter hah rukul sûng khalâiah ânsunga, Ochai Inlaltak tîrlâm dôngmate inkhat a honga, a kôm, “Nang khom, Jisua Galilee rama mi kôm no om ngâi,” a tipea.
Hannirese, an rênga makunga a minlêma. “I thurchi mo nin misîr reng riet mu-ung” tiin a thuona.
Rukul mokot pêntieng ava jôka, tîrlâm dôngmate dangin a lei mu nôka. Ha takah omngei kôma han, “Hi mi hih, Nazareth Jisua kôma a om ngâi” a tia.
Peter'n a minlêm nôka, “Khomâk insâmin ki ti ani, ha mi hah riet mu-ung!” a ti nôka.
Chomolte suoleh chu hataka inding ngei hah Peter kôm an honga, a kôm, “Nang khom an lâia mi nini khet, No chong lam renga hin ei riet thei!” an tipea.
Male Peter'n an kôm, “Chongdik rillin khomâk kên sâm ani! Adik nônchu Pathien'n dûk ni mintong rese! Ha mi hah riet tet mu-ung!” a tia. Masuolechu âr akhuong kelen zoi,
male Peter han, Jisua'n a kôma, “Âr akhuong mân voithum ni minlêm ni tih,” ai tipe chong hah a hong rietsuok nôka. A jôka a chap ngu-ngui zoi.
Jîng ahongnin chu Ochaisingei murdi le Upangei han Jisua that rang lampui an sinna.
Zingjirûiin an khita, an tuonga, Pilat, Rom râiôt kôm an pêka.
A minsûrpu Judas han, Jisua theiloi an mintum ti a riet inchu ânsîra, a sumdâr sômthum hah Ochaisingei le Upangei kôm a hongchôi nôka.
“Midik thi ranga ki minsûr ha chu ki minchâi sabak kêng ani zoi,” a tia. Anni han a kôm han, “Mahah kan ta rangin imo asena. Maha chu nangma sintho kêng!” an tipea.
Judas han ma sumdâr hah Biekin sunga a paia, a rota; hanchu, a sea, avan khâi that zoi.
Ochaisingei han sum hah an rûta, “Mahih chu thisen man sum ani sikin Biekina sum darna munna dar rangin chu inthieng mak” an tia.
Hanchu, an inruola, ramdangmingei phûmna mun rangin Bêlvuokpu mun an rochôka.
Masikin ma mun hah atûn tena (Akeldama) “Thisen Mun” an ti tit zoi.
Hanchu Dêipu Jeremiah'n, “sumdâr sômthum hah an lâka Israelngeiin ama man ranga adôr an masat hah,
male Pumapa chongpêk anghan, bêlvuokpu mun man rangin sum hah an mang zoi,” ai ti hah ahong dik zoi ani.
Jisua hah Rom râiôt makunga ândinga, râiôt'n, “Judangei rêng nini mo?” tiin chong a rekela, Jisua'n, “Ni ni, ni ni ti zoi hate,” tiin a thuona.
Hannirese, Ochaisingei le Upangeiin an nônna roia chu itên thuon mak.
Masikin, Pilat'n a kôm, “Nang an nônna roi hih ni riet loi mini?” a tia.
Nikhomrese, bâikhat luo khomin thuon maka, Râiôt chu asân a kamâma.
Hanchu Rom râiôt han Kalkân Kût zora racham mi intâng inkhat lokongei an ti tak a mojôk pe ngei ngâia,
Ha lâia han mi intâng, riming inthang tak Barabbas an ti hah a oma.
Masikin lokongei an hong intûp inchu Pilat han an kôm, “Tu himo nangni mojôk pe inlang nin nuom? Barabbas himo, Jisua Messiah an tipu himo?” tiin a rekela.
Juda rachamneipungei han Jisua hah an narsa sika a kutah an hong pêk ani ti ânthârtakin a rieta.
Hanchu Pilat hah roijêkna munah ânsung lâitakin a lômnûn, “Ha midik chunga han ite tho no roh, jânin han ka ramangin ama sikin ku tuong ok kêng” tiin chong a hong bea.
Ochaisingei le Upangeiin Barabbas mojôka Jisua that ranga Pilat kôma ngên rangin mipui ngei an methêma.
Hannirese Pilat'n mipui ngei kôm han, “Hi mi inik ngei lâia hin tu himo nangni mojôk pe ronga nin nuom?” tiin a rekela. Anni han, “Barabbas” tiin an thuona.
Pilat'n an kôm, “Hanchu, Jisua Messiah an ti hih, imo ko lo rang ani zoi?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “Khrosa jêmdel roh” tiin an thuona
Nikhomrese, Pilat'n an kôm, “Imo ai tho minchâi?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “Khrosa jêmdel roh!” tiin an rât dodôrin an inieka.
Pilat'n ite anêmna om no nia, injêlna vai kêng ai suok rang ti amun chu tui a lâka, lokongei makunga a kut a rusuka, an kôm, “Hi miriem thina hin ite theiloina dôn mu-ung! Mahih nin sintho kêng ani!” a tia.
Loko murdi'n, “Hi mi thina sika dûk chu keini le kin nâingei chungah chul rese!” an tia.
Hanchu Pilat'n Barabbas hah a mojôk pe ngeia; male Jisua hah a jêm suolechu Khrosa jêmdel rangin an kutah a pêk ngei zoi.
Hanchu, Pilat râlmingei'n Jisua hah râiôt inpuia an tuonga, an pâla mi murdi a kôla an intûpa.
A puonngei an lîk pea, puon senduk an minsila.
Male, riling tapor an phana, an min khuma, a kut chang tieng khiengrol an min chôia; a makungah khûkinbilin, “Juda ngei Rêng ring sôt roh!” tiin an phengsana.
An michila, a khiengrol hah an suta, a luah an tôka.
Hanchu, an phengsan suolechu puon senduk hah an lâk nôka, ama puon dên hah an minsil nôka. Hanchu, Khrosa jêmdel rangin an tuong zoi.
Hanchu, an se lâiin Cyrene khuo mi inkhat a riming Simon an tonga, râlmingei'n Jisua Khros ruput rangin an dândea.
Golgotha, “Luru Mun” an ti hah an hong tunga,
Mahan Jisua hah uain, tuikha leh inpol an pêka, a tem zoiin chu nêk nuom maka.
Hanchu, Khrosa an jêmdela, male, taruosânin a puonsilngei an insema.
Masuole chu, mahan insungin, an enna.
A lu chungah an nônna miziek, “Hi mi hih Jisua, Judangei Rêng ani,” tiin an târa.
Hanchu, ama leh lômin inru inik a voitieng inkhat, a changtieng inkhat an jêmdel sa.
Hanchu, ânlôi murdi'n an lu thukin Jisua an deia.
“Biekin set na ta, sûnthumin ni minding nôk rang na! Pathien Nâipasal ni nîn chu ne theiin insaninjôk roh! Khros lêr renga juong chum ta roh!” an tia.
Ma angdên han, Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei le Upangei khomin ama an deia:
“Mi dangngei laka a minjôk ngâia, ama chu injôk thei maka! Israelngei rêng ni mak mo? Atûn Khros lêr renga juong chum rese chu iem ei tih!
Pathien a iema, Pathien Nâipasal'n ânbea. Tho lei en rei u, Pathien'n atûn a minjôk nuom mo!” an tia.
Inru, ama leh an jêmdel ngei khomin ha angdênin an dei sa.
Hanchu sûn dâr sômleinik renga kholoi dârthum tenah chu rammuol ajîng khapa.
Dârthumin chu Jisua rôl inring takin ânieka, “Eloi, Eloi, lema Sabacthani?” a tia. Mahah aomtie chu, “Ka Pathien, Ka Pathien, ithomo nina mâksan?” tina ani.
Ha munah ânding senkhat ngeiin mahah an rieta, “Elizah ai koi kêng” an tia.
Hanchu, an lâia mi inkhatin a tâna sponj a lâka, uain thûra a michia, tôkmol mongah a târa, hong min nêk rang a thoa.
Hannirese, mi dang ngeiin, “La ngâk roh, a minjôk rangin Elizah mo a juong lei en bak hi rei” an tia.
Jisua rôl inring takin âniek nôka, arang achat zoi.
Hanchu, Biekina puonjâr hah alu renga among dênin akêr pata. Masuole chu pilchung ânnîka, lungpuingei an koia,
thânngei ahôn onga, Pathien mi tamtak alei thi ngei hah kaithoiin an oma.
Thânngei hah an mâka, Jisua, thina renga ân thoinôk suoleh Khopuilien Inthiengah an lûta mahan mi tamtak kôm an inlâr zoi.
Râlmi ulien le a kôla râlmi aom Jisua thîr ngei han, ningnu innîk le neinun om tie ngei hah an mûn chu an chia, “Hi mi hih Pathien Nâi ani khêt!” an tia.
Ma munah han nupang tamtak, Galilee ram renga Jisua nûkjûia asan ngâi ngei han alazanna renga an thîra.
Ha ngei hah Mary Magdalene ngei Jacob le Joseph nu Mary ngei le Jebedee lômnu ngei an ni.
Kholoi ahong nin chu mineipa Arimathea khuo mi a riming Joseph a hong tunga; ama khom Jisua ruoisi a lei nia.
Pilat makunga ava sea Jisua ruok hah ava zonga, ruok hah Joseph kôm pêk rangin Pilat'n chong a pêka.
Masikin Joseph han ruok hah a musuma puoninnêm athar leh a thoma,
male thân lunga iver zoisuobila han a min jâla. Hanchu thân bâi hah lung alienpa leh a hîp zoiin chu a sea.
Mary Magdalene le Mary dang hah thân tieng mâithakin an insunga.
Anangtûkah Sabbathni sûnin chu Ochaisingei le Phariseengei hah Pilat kôm an honga,
male a kôm, “O pu, ha milaka han aring lâiin, ‘Sûnthum suoleh chu inthoinôk ki tih’ a ti kin riet.
Masikin thân hah sûnthum sûng chu asadima ngâk rangin chong pêk roh, a ruoisingeiin an sea, an va muruka, mipui lâia, ‘Thina renga ânthoinôk zoi’ an ti thei loina rangin. Ma anghan aninônchu hi huongna nûktak hih motona nêkin siet uol nih,” an tia.
Pilat'n an kôm, “Râlmi tuong ungla,” male “se ungla thân hah nin thei lam dôra asân min ngâk roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu an sea, thân lung hah sîn thôn, a ngâk rang ngei hah an min ngâk ngei zoi.
Sabbathni ahong heka, Pathienni jînga khuo ahongvâra, Mary Magdalene le Mary dang hah thân en rangin an sea.
Inningloiin ningnu râttak ahong innîka, invân renga Pumapa Vântîrton a juonga; lung hah a muluoi paia a chungah ânsunga.
A mêl chu kôlinlek ang ania, a puonsilngei khom rodokang anga chek ani.
Râlmi a ngâkngei han an chi rai zoi sikin an innîka, athi anghan an oma.
Vântîrton han nupangngei kôm, “Nangni chu chino roi, Jisua an jêmdelpu hah nin rok ani ti ki riet.
Hin om khâi maka; ai ti anghan ân thoinôk zoi. Hin hong ungla, a jâlna hih hong en roi.
Atûn inrangtakin se ungla, a ruoisingei kôm, Thina renga ân thoinôk zoi, Galilee rama nin motona a lei se; mason mûng nin tih! Nangni ki ril hih riettit roi” a tia.
Hanchu, ichi le râisânna sipin, thân renga an se lalaia, ruoisingei varil rangin an tân zoi.
Inningloiin Jisua'n anni hah a tonga, an kôm, “Nin chunga rathanngamna om rese” a tia. Hanchu, a kôm an honga, a kepha an sûra, chubai an mûka.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chino roi, se ungla, Galilee rama se rangin ku sûngsuokngei varil roi; mason ni mûng an tih” a tia.
Nupangngei hah lama an lôn lâitakin thân ngak râlmi senkhatngei hah khopuiliena an kîr nôka, neinun om tie murdi hah ochaisingei an va rila.
Ochaisingei hah Upangei leh anin mua lungvâr an thoa; râlmingei kôm han sum tamtatak an pêka,
an kôm, “Jâna kin inkârin a ruoisingei an honga, a ruok an hong muruk ani, tiin misîr roi.
Râiôt han ha thurchi hah a lei riet lekhom, theiloina dôn mak chei tiin nangni rilpui kin ta, ite nin mulung nin minjîngna rang omak,” an tia.
Râlmingei han sum hah an lâka, chong an be lam angtakhan an tho zoi. Masikin atûn tenah ha thurchi hah Judangei lâia an la ril minlum bang ngâi ani.
Hanchu ruoisi sômleikhat ngei hah Galilee rama tâng inkhata Jisua'n se roi a tipe ngeina han an sea.
Ama an mûn chu chubai an mûka, senkhatin iem tatak no khom senla ngei.
Jisua'n ahong nâia, an kôm, “Pilchunga le Invâna rachamneina murdi ko kôm pêk ani zoi.
Hanchu, muntina mingei murdi kôm se ungla, ku ruoisîn sin ngei ungla: Pa, Nâipasal le Ratha Inthieng rimingin Baptis ngei ungla,
chong nangni ke pêk murdi jôm rangin ril ngei roi. Male Keima zoratin rammuol mong dênin nin kôma om tit ki tih,” a tia.
Pathien Nâipasal Jisua Khrista Thurchi Sa chungroi chu mahi ani.
Dêipu Isaiah Lekhabua: “Pathien'n, ‘Na lampui sinsiem rangin ka thangtheipu no motona tîr ka ta.’
Ramchâra mi inkhat tânghâi han, ‘Pumapa lamlien sin ungla; a lôna rang lampui mintûn roi!’” tia ânziek anghan ânphut ani.
Masikin John hah Baptis tho le thurchi misîrin ramchâra han a juong ani. Mingei kôm han, “Nin sietnangei renga insîr ungla, baptisma chang roi,” hanchu, “Pathien'n nin sietnangei nangni ngâidam atih” tiin a misîr ngâia.
Judea ram le Jerusalem khopui renga mi tam tak John thurchi misîr rangâi rangin an sea. An sietnangei an phuonga, male ama'n Jordan dunga a Baptis ngei zoi.
John'n ûtmul puonngei ânsila, savun kongkhit a khita, a sâk chu khâimimsie, le rama khuoilutui ani.
Mingei kôm han, “Ku nûka juong rangpu hi chu keima nêka roiinpui uol ok ania, kei chu inkûna a kekokrûi sût rang luo inhoi mu-ung.
Keima chu tui leh nangni ka Baptis ngâia, ama'n chu Ratha Inthiengin nangni Baptis atih,” a tia.
Galilee ramhuola Nazareth khuo renga Jisua hongna la sôt bâkloiin, Jordan dunga John'n Baptis a thoa.
Jisua hah tui renga a hong jôk harenghan, invân ân-onga male Ratha Inthieng pharvali angati a chunga juong chum a mua.
Male invân renga rôlin, “Nangma ka Nâipasal moroitak ni ni, nu chunga ka râiasântatak ani” ti chong ajuong tunga.
Voikhatrengin Ratha'n ramchâra a min se zoia,
mahan Soitan methêmin sûn sômminli a oma. Mahan ram sângei khom an oma, aniatachu vântîrtonngei han an juong san ngâi.
John hah intâng ina an khum suole chu, Jisua hah Pathien renga Thurchi Sa misîr rangin Galilee rama a sea.
“Azora diktak hah ahongtung zoi,” male, “Pathien Rêngram khom anâi zoi! Nin sietnangei renga insîr ungla male Thurchi Sa hi iem ta roi!” tiin a misîra.
Jisua'n Galilee dîl panga a lôn lâiin ngasûrpu inik Simon le a nâipa Andrew lên lei vôr hah a mua.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ni jûi ungla, miriem sûr rangin nangni minchu ki tih” a tipe ngeia.
Marenghan an lênngei an mâkraka male an jûi kelen zoi.
A se nôk uol vietin chu lâibungsa dang Zebedee nâipasalngei, Jacob le a nâipa John a mu nôka. An lênngei sinsiemin rukuong chunga an lei oma.
Jisua'n anni ngei hah a mu ngei lehan, a koi ngeia; an pa Zebedee hah inlo mingei kôm rukuonga an mâka, male Jisua leh an se kelen zoi.
Jisua le a ruoisingei hah Capernaum khopuia an honga, Sabbathni sûn anîn chu Jisua Synagog taka a lûta, male mi a minchu kelen zoia.
A minchu lam ariet mingei han kamâm aom sabak an tia, Balam minchupungei angin niloiin; manêkin, rachamneitakin anni ngei ha a minchu sikin.
Masuole han, ramkhori sûr mi inkhat synagog han a honga an iek raka,
ha mi han, “Nazareth Jisua, keini renga imo na nuom aom? Mi minmang ranga hong mo ni ni? Nang ki riet Pathien thangtheipu inthieng ni ni!” a tia.
Jisua'n ratha kôm han, “Dâirek inla, male ha miriem sûng renga hah hong jôk pai roh!” tiin chong a pêka.
Ratha saloi han amapa hah anîkbit suole chu inringtakin ân ieka, male a sûng renga a hong jôk pai zoia.
Mingei han kamâm aom sabak an tia, “Ma hih imo ani hi? Mahi minchuna thar mo ani? Ratha saloingei khom rachamneitakin chong a pêk ngeia, male a chong an jôm kelen hi?” Inkhat le inkhat anin rekel inlôma.
Masikin Galilee ramhuol pumpuia Jisua thurchi ânthang zit zoi.
Jisua le a ruoisingei, Jacob le John telsân Synagog renga an jôka, male Simon le Andrew ina rangin an thengpata.
Simon tarpi hah ritun damloiin jâlmuna a lei oma; Jisua ava tungin chu harenghan, amanu damloi roi hah an lei rila.
Amanu kôm han a sea, a kuta a mutua, sanin a kaithoia. Amanu mintun hah a dama, male amanu han an sin a tho pe ngei zoi.
Masuole chu kholoi ahong nia male nisa ahong tâkin chu, mingeiin Jisua kôm damloi murdi le ramkhori sûr ngei an hong tuonga.
Khopui sûnga mingei nâm inkot kôla an hong intûpa.
Jisua'n ri jât tamtak ngei a mindama male ramkhori tamtak a rujûlpaia. Ramkhoringei han ama an riet sikin, ite an ti rangin phal ngei mak.
Anangtûk jînga chu avâr mân rengin Jisua ânthoia, in renga hah a jôka. Khopui renga mun inthimna a sea, mahan chubaithona ava manga.
Hannirese Simon le a champuingei han ama an hong roka,
male an va mu lehan, a kôm, “Mitinin nang an rok,” an tipea.
Hannirese Jisua'n an kôm, “Hi revêla khuo dangngeia khom hin ei se ngêt rang ani. Hi ngei hin khom thurchi ki misîr rang anâng ani, maha ku juongna abi ani sikin,” tiin a thuona.
Masikin synagogngeia thurchi misîrin le ramkhoringei rujûlpaiin Galilee ram pumpuia a chai zoia.
Jisua kôm mi inkhat vun ri dôn a honga, khûkinbilin, male san rang a ngêna, “Nu nuomin chu mi ni minthieng thei,” a tia.
Jisua'n inriengmunân asipa, male a kut ahong sôna, male a tôna, “Ka nuom,” hong, “Inthieng ta roh!” tiin a thuona.
Voikhatrengin a pangphâr hah ahong boi kelena, male ânthieng zoi.
Jisua'n chongnazatin a tipea, a tîr kelena,
a kôm a ti suole, “Rangâi roh, hi roi hih tute ril tet no roh duo. Hannirese ochai kôm thengpat inla va min mu roh; masuole chu mitinin nên thieng nôk zoi ti an riet minthârna rangin Moses chongpêka inbôlna pêk ranga ati hah pêk roh” a tipea.
Hannirese amapa hah a jôka, ma thurchi hah muntina a phuong minzara. Adikin, a ril minlum rai sikin Jisua chu ânlangin khopuia lût thei khâi maka, mun inthim ngeia a va oma, male muntin renga a kôm mingei an hong ngâi ani.
Sûn tômte suole chu Jisua Capernaum taka a se nôka, male ina a om ti roi ânthanga.
Masikin mi tamtak an hong intûpa, inkhâr pêntieng luo mun tong khâi maka. Jisua'n an kôm thurchi a misîr lâitakin
phalkhatthi inkhat mi minlîn a kôm an hong rojôna.
Nikhomrese loko an tam rai sikin a kôma hong tungpui thei mak ngeia, masikin Jisua omna ridîn taka inchung an phêna. An phên zoiin chu phalkhatthipu hah a jâmpher leh an juong musuma.
Jisua'n an taksôn tie hah a mua, phalkhatthipa kôm han, “Ka nâipasal, ni sietnangei ngâidam ani zoi,” a tia.
Balam minchupungei senkhat ma muna insung ngei han an mindonna,
“Hi mi hin ithomo hi anga a chong ngam hi? Pathien a rilminsiet ani! Pathien vai ke sietnangei ngâidam thei!” an tia.
Harenghan Jisua'n an mindon hah a rieta, an kôm, “Ithomo ma anghan nin mindonna?
Phalkhatthi kôm han, ‘Ni sietnangei ngâidam ani zoi,’ ti le ‘Inthoi inla, na jâmpher luok inla lôn ta roh,’ ti hih kho hi mo a ti abai uol?
Hanchu, philchung hin Miriem Nâipasal'n sietnangei ngâidam theina racham a dôn ti nangni lei min mu rong” a tia. Masikin phalkhatthi kôm han,
“Inthoi inla, na jâmpher luok inla, ni ina se ta roh!” tiin nang ki ril a tia.
An rêngin an enchungchakin ama hah ânthoia, a jâmpher a luoka, a se kelen zoia. An rêngin an kamâm sabaka, Pathien an minpâka, “Hima anga neinun hih chu la mu tet ngâi mak me!” an tia.
Jisua Galilee dîl panga a se nôka. Loko ngei a kôm an sea, male a minchu ngei phut zoia.
A sena sumrusuongpa Levi Alphaeus nâipasal, a office taka ânsung a mua. Jisua'n a kôm, “Ni hong jûi roh,” a tipea. Levi ânthoia, male ama a jûi zoi.
Chomolte suole chu Levi ina bukhalâi an ota. Sumrusuong ngâi mi tamtak le mitelloingei Jisua an jûia, male mi tamtakin Jisua le a ruoisingei bukhalâi otna dosânga an inchela.
Phariseengei le Balam minchupungei senkhatin, Jisua chu mitelloingei le sumrusuongpungei leh bu a nêk an mûn chu a ruoisingei kôm, “Khoitho mo ma anga mingei lâia bu a nêk?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an chong hah a lei rieta, an kôm, “Adamngeiin doctor nâng ngâi mak ngeia, aniatachu adamloi ngei chu doctor an nâng ngâi. Midikngei ralam ranga juong ni ma-unga, mitelloingei ralam ranga juong ke ki ni,” tiin a thuona.
Zora khat chu Baptispu John nûkjûingei le Phariseengei han bu an ngêia. Mingei senkhatin Jisua kôm an honga, a kôm, “Ithomo John nûkjûingei le Pharisee ruoisingei hi bu an ngêi ngena, aniatachu nu ruoisingei hi an ngêi ngâi loi?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Inneina khuolmingei ha bungêi rangin nin lei sabei mini?” Ni thei no ni! Mâkpa hah an kôma aom kâr chu bungêi no ni ngei.
Hannirese an kôm renga mâkpa ha an tuong pai nikhuo la tung a ta, ma tika chu la ngêi an tih.
“Tutên puon muruo chitphonân puon thar relek mang ngâi mak ngei, mang ngân khom senla athar han amuruo hah minchîrup a ta chet uol atih.
Tutên uain thar khom savun ûm muruo taka thun ngâi mak ngei, thun ngân khom senla, uain thar han savun ûm hah mût khoi a ta, uain le savun ûm le mangmunboi chang atih. Manêkin, uain thar chu savun ûm thara ngêt thun nîng atih” tiin a thuona.
Sabbathnin Jisua bubilngei senkhata a lôna. A ruoisingeiin ama leh an lôn pumin buvûingei ha an china
Masikin Phariseengeiin Jisua kôm, “En ta, nu ruoisingeiin Sabbathnia an tho hi! Mahi ei Balamin akhap ani,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “David'n sâk rang ânsam lâihan a tho hah nin la pore tet ngâi loi mini? Ama le a miriemngei an vonchâm sabaka,
masikin David han Pathien ina a lûta, Pathien kôma pêksai vâipôl hah a sâka. Mahi Abiathar Ochai Inlaltak a chang lâihan ani. Ei Balam dungjûiin chu ha vâipôl hah Ochaingei vai ke an sâk thei ngâi ani, aniatachu David'n a sâka male a miriemngei khom a sem ngei sa.”
Male Jisua'n, “Sabbathni chu miriemngei sana ranga sin ania, miriem chu Sabbathni ranga sin nimak.
Masikin Miriem Nâipasal hih Sabbathni a Pumapa khom ani” tiin chong a khâr zoi.
Hanchu Jisua ha Synagog a se nôka, mahan mi inkhat a kut phalkhatthi a lei oma.
Sabbathni ani sikin Jisua râlngeiin a tho minchâia an nôn theina rangin; Sabbathni mi a mindam pupui mo tiin mi senkhat ngeiin an en richika.
Jisua'n kut phalkhatthi kôm han, “Moton tieng hong inding roh,” a tipea.
Hanchu Jisua'n mingei kôm han, “Ei Balamin Sabbathnin imo ei tho rangin mi phal? San rang mo, aninônchu minna rang mo? Mi ringna mojôk rang mo, aninônchu mi minmang mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia. Hannirese ite ti mak ngeia.
Jisua'n an tieng a en ngeia a taksi oka, aniatachu an mulungngar raina le an dikloi raina hah a riet sikin asân a jâm a manzala. Hanchu amapa kôm han, “Nu kut lâng roh” a tipea. A kut a lânga male a dam nôk zoia.
Masikin Phariseengei hah synagog renga an jôka, Herod pâla mi senkhatngei leh an intonga, Jisua an that rang lam mintuonangei an sin zoia.
Jisua le a ruoisingei ha Galilee dîl tieng an se kelena, male loko tamtakin ama an jûi sa. Anni ngei ha Galilee ram renga, Judea ram renga,
Jerusalem renga, Idumea ram renga, Jordan râl nisuo tieng renga, male Tyre le Sidon khopuilienngei kôlrevêla hong ngei an ni. Hi mingei murdi hih Jisua neinun tho ngei an lei riet sika hong an ni.
Lokongei an tam rai sika han ama an neng loina rangin Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, ama rang rukuong inkhat lei dar rangin chong a be ngeia.
Mi tamtak a mindama, male ana ngei murdi ama an tôn theina rangin an inbûmlula.
Male an sûnga ramkhori dôn ngei khomin ama an mu racham inbokin, “Nangma ha Pathien Nâipasal ni ni!” tiin an iniek ngâi.
Jisua'n ramkhoringei kôm han, tumo ani ha tute kôm an misîr loina rangin chongnazatin, chong a pêk ngei zoi.
Hanchu Jisua muol chunga a kala, ama'n a nuom ngei kai a koia. Anni ngei ha an jûia,
male sômleinik ngei a thanga, “Mangei ha tîrtonngei tiin riming a phuoa, an kôm, ko kôma om rangin nangni ka thang zoi ani,” male, “Thurchi misîr rang khomin nangni tîr suok ka ta,
male ramkhoringei rujûlpai theina rachamneina khom dôn nin tih,” tiin a ril ngeia.
Sômleinik a thang ngei ha hi ngei hih an ni: Simon (Jisua'n, Peter tia riming a phuo pe ha);
Zebedee nâipasal Jacob le a nâipa John (Jisua'n, Boanerges tia riming a phuo pe ngei ha, maha aomtie chu “Khuonri Miriemngei tina ani”);
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus nâipasal Jacob, Thaddeaus, Canan mi Simon (an ram lungkham le inpâkpui ngâipu,)
male a minsûrpu Judas Iscariot.
Hanchu Jisua ha in tieng a kîr sir zoia. Lokongei hah an juong intûp nôka, Jisua le a ruoisingei ha sâknêk zora luo man mak ngeia.
Mingeiin, “Achâng ke ani zoi!” an ti roi ha a insungmingei an riet lehan, ama tuong rangin an inthoka.
Balam minchupu senkhat Jerusalem renga juong ngei han, “A sûnga Beelzebul a dôn ani! Ramkhoringei ulientak kêng, ramkhori rujûlpai theina rangin sinthotheina a kôma pêk ngâi” an tia.
Masikin Jisua'n anni hah a koia, chongmintêkin a chongpui ngeia; “Kho angin mo Soitan'n Soitan a rujûl thei ranga?
Rambung khom athenin apâlin insenin inkhat le inkhat an indoi inlômin chu, ma rambung hah inlet atih.
Insûngkuo khom athenin apâlin insenin inkhat le inkhat an indoi inlômin chu, ma insûngkuo hah inlet atih.
Masikin Soitan rêngram khom athenin apâlin an insenin chu, ma hah asôt dier no nia, inlet a ta male ânmang rang ani.
“Tutên mi rât ina lûtin a neinunngei lâk pe thei ngâi mak ngei, mi rât hah an khitbel masa vaiin ke; a neinunngei an muruk thei ngâi.
“Adiktakin nangni ki ril mingei hih an sietnangei murdi le asaloi neinunngei an ti ngei murdi chu la ngâidam thei nîng a ta.
Aniatachu tukhom Ratha Inthieng doia asaloi neinunngei a ti ngei hah chu ngâidamin om tet no ni, kumtuonga sietna a sin ani sikin” a tia.
(Mahi Jisua'n mingei senkhatin, “Ratha saloi a dôn” an ti sika a ti ani.)
Hanchu Jisua nû le lâibungngei an hongtunga. Khalâia an indinga, ama koi rangin mi an tîra.
Jisua rihîlin lokongei an insunga, male ha ngei han a kôm, “En roh, Nu nû le na lâibungngei le na sarnungeiin nang an roka, khalâia son an oma, nang intongpui rang an nuom,” an tipea.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Tu mo ku nû? Tu ngei mo ka lâibungngei?” Tiin a thuona.
A rihîla an sung ngei hah a en ngeia, an kôm, “En ngei roi! Hi ngei hih ku nû le ka lâibungngei an ni!
Tukhom Pathien nuom lama sintho ngei kai chu ka lâibungngei, ka sarnungei, le ku nûngei an ni” a tia.
Galilee dîl kôla Jisua'n a minchu nôka, mipuingei a kôma juong intûp ngei hah an tam rai sikin rukuonga a chuonga, ânsunga, mipuingei hah chu tui rakham asortea tânga han an indinga.
Anni ngei minchuna rangin chongmintêkngei mangin neinun tamtak ngei a misîr pe ngeia, an kôm han:
“Rangâi roi! voikhat chu mi inkhatin burît rangin a sea.
Loia han sachi a rethea, senkhat lampui kôla achula, vângei an honga male an sâk ripa.
Senkhat lungpherpha pil ânphâna chunga achula, pil ânphân sikin ahong mông kelena,
Hanchu, nisa ahong insângin chu akung innoinar ngei ha a em minjuota, aruzung amathâk hah ânthûk loi sikin akângrip kelena.
Senkhat chu riling kâra achula, riling han akungngei ha adîpa, male inra thei khâi mak ngei.
Aniatachu senkhat chu pil sana achula, akungngei ahong kêia, ahong insôna, avûia: senkhat sômthumin, senkhat sômrukin, male senkhat raza khatin ahong pung zoi” a tia.
Male Jisua'n a chongkharnân an kôm “Kuor nin dônin chu rangâi roi!” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua athenin aom lehan, a ruoisingei sômleinik le midang senkhat ngei ma chong riet ngei han a kôm an honga male ha chongmintêkngei hah rilminthâr pe ngei rangin an ngêna.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Pathien Rêngram chonginthup riettheina nin kôm pêk ani zoi.” Hannirese, “Midangngei pêntienga omngei rangin chu, neinunngei murdi chongmintêkngei vaiin misîr pe an nia,
‘Masikin an en, an en khomin an mu loina rangin le; an rangâi an rangâi khomin, an rietthei loina rangin. Ma anghan an thôn chu, Pathien tieng inhei nôk an ta, male ama'n lei ngâidam ngei thei atih’” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n an kôm, “Hi chongmintêk hih nin rietthei loi mo? Hanchu, kho angin mo chongmintêk dangngei ngân khom nin rietthei ranga?
Sachirethêpa han Pathien chong a rethe ngâi.
Mi senkhat ngei chu, sachi lampui kôla chul angin an nia; chong hah an riet harenghan, Soitan a honga an mulungrîla om hah a lâk pe ngei ngâi.
Midang senkhat ngei chu sachi lungpherpha chunga chul angin an ni. Thurchi hah an riet harenghan, râisântakin an pom kelen ngâia.
Hannirese, ruzung inthûk an mathâk loi sikin om sôt ngâi maka. Thurchi sika intakna mini nuomlona mini, ahong om lehan chu anin let nôk kelen ngâi.
Mi senkhat ngei chu sachi riling kâra achul angin an ni. Ma ngei hah chu thurchi rangâipu ngei hah an nia,
aniatachu an ringnuna kângdoinangei, rammuol hoina le neinangei le jât dadang an ôinangei ahong lûta chong hah adîpa, amara musuo ngâi mak.
Hannirese mi senkhat ngei chu pil asana achul ngei angin an ni. Chong hah an rieta, an poma, male ânra ngâi: senkhat sômthumin, senkhat sômrukin, senkhat raza khatin an hong pung zoi, a tia.”
Jisua'n a chong a la zombanga, “Tumo châti hongchôia adarna muna dar loiin, bêl nuoia mo, aninônchu jâlmun nuoia mini a dar ngâia? adarna munna ke an va dar ngâi nimak mo?
Ânthup murdi tâng la musuo nîng a ta, hîpa om ngei murdi lîkpai la nîng atih.
Hanchu, kuor nin dônin chu rangâi roi!” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua nanâkin an kôm, “Nin chong rangâi hih asadimin mindon roi! Midangngei nin jêkna balamngei nanâk hah Pathien'n nangni jêkna rangin mang a tih, manêkin nangni min rik pe uol a tih.
Tu tukhom imini dônpu ngei chu bôk pêk sa nîng a ta, male tukhom ite dôn loi ngei chu an dôn viette khom ha lâk pe rip nîng atih,” a tia.
Jisua'n thurchi a la misîr banga, an kôm, “Pathien Rêngram chu hi anghin ani.” Mi inkhatin a loia chimu a rethea.
Hanchu a sea, a van ngama jânna a inna, ânthoia sûn ngei ha a va manga, a riet loi kârin chimu hah ahong kêia, ahong insôn zoia.
Pil ha athenin akungngei hah aminsôna, amara amin dôna; amotona akung ahong inlang ngâi, hanchu avûia, male anûktaka aramala sip buvûi ahong oma.
Bu hah amin tena chu, ha mi han ât zora ahong tung zoi sikin a kôite lâkin bu ât aphut ngâi anghan ani, a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Pathien Rêngram hih imo a-ang ei ti rang ân zoi? Khoi chongmintêk mangin mo ei rilminthâr rang ani zoi?
Mi inkhatin ancham ru rammuola chimu murdi lâia achîntak ramal khat a lâka, pila a tua.
Chomolte suole chu ahong mônga, chimu murdi lâia alientak ahongni ngâi. Machang lientak ngei ahong dôna, male vângei an honga male adâilîm han rubungei an phana mahan an riek thei ang ha ani” a tia.
Ma anghin Jisua'n mingei kôm han chongmintêk tamtak mangin, an rietthei rang do-dôrin a thurchi a misîr pe ngei ngâia.
Chongmintêk niloiin chu an kôm, thurchi misîr ngâi maka; hannirese, a ruoisingei leh vai an om zorân chu jâttin a rilminthâr pe ngei ngâi ani.
Mani nanâka han kholoi ahongnin chu Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, “Dîl râl tieng son vân kân ei ti u” a tia.
Masikin lokongei ha an mâka; Jisua a lei insungna rukuonga han ruoisingei hah an lûta, ama khom an tuonga. Mahan rukuong dangngei khom an om sa.
Inningloi rengin phâivuopui râttak ahong thoa, tuidârinsok khom hah rukuonga a lûta asip vâng zoia.
Jisua chu lukham khamin rukuong remei tienga han a lei ina. Ruoisingei han an kaithoia male a kôm, “Minchupu kin thi rang ani zoi, itên ni mindon loi mini?” an tia.
Jisua ânthoia, phâivuopui hah a ngoa, “Mong roh!” male tuidârinsok kôm han, “Omchien roh!” a tia. Phâivuopui hah amonga, male adâingang zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm “Ithomo ma angtaka nin chi hi? Taksônna reng nin la dônloi mo?” a tia.
Aniatachu an chi sabaka, male inkhat le inkhat kôm, “Hi mi hih tumo ani hi? Phâivuopui le tuidârinsok tena khomin a chong an don hi?” anin ti inlôma.
Jisua le a ruoisingei hah Galilee dîl râl kângkhat tieng, Gerasa ram an hong tunga.
Jisua hah rukuong renga a hong jôk harenghan, mahan thânngei renga hong suok mi inkhatin ântôngpuia. Ha mi hah a sûnga ratha saloi dôn ania
male thânngeia om ngâi ani. Tutên Zingjirûi lienpa leh luo khit thei mak ngeia;
Vêl tamtak a kutngei le a kengei an lei khita, aniatachu a kengei an khitna Zingjirûingei le thîrkolngei hah a pot sata, a khiek chit ngâia. A rât rai sikin tutên an mene theiloi ani.
Sûna le jâna, thânngeia le tângngeia han ân ieka, amananâkin lungngei leh an ât ngâi.
Alazan renga Jisua a hong mua; masikin a hong tânna, amakunga ânboka,
male rôl inringtakin ân ieka, “Jisua, Pathien Ânchung Tak Nâipasal, khoimo mi lo rang ni ti? Dûk mi tho tet loi rangin, Pathien rimingin nang ke ngên!” a tia.
(Mahi a tina abi chu Jisua'n, a kôm, “Ratha saloi amapa sûng renga hih hong jôk roh!” a lei ti zoi sika ani.)
Masikin Jisua'n a kôm, “Imo ni riming!” tiin arkela. A kôm han, “Ki riming chu ‘Mob’ kin tam sabak ani” tiin a thuona.
Male ha ram renga hah ratha saloingei a rujûlpai loina rangin Jisua kôm han a ngênrîta.
Ma mun kôla muol panga han vok pâl tamtak sâk rok an oma.
Masikin ratha saloingei han, “Vokngei kôm son mi tîr inla, male an sûnga mi min lût roh” tiin Jisua kôm an ngêna.
A min se ngeia, male ratha saloingei hah amapa sûng renga an jôk paia, vokngei sûnga han an va lûta. Vokpâlngei hah anrêngin isângnik dôr an nia, anrêngin rôlsora an tânna, dîla an inchôma, an thi let zoi.
Vok donsûipungei hah an tânna, khopui le vokvâinamun ngeia han ma thurchi hah an va misîra. Mingei han neinun ahongtung ha en rangin an se zoia,
male Jisua kôm an tung lehan, ramkhoringei an sûrpu hah puon silin mulungbôk sing vanga insungin an va mua; male anrêngin an chi zoi.
Amupu ngei han ramkhori sûrpa chunga neinun ahongtung le vokngei chungroi ha mingei an lei rila.
Masikin anni ngei han Jisua hah an ram mâk rangin an ngên zoia.
Jisua rukuonga a chuong rangtôn ramkhoringei sûrpa han Jisua kôm, “No kôm hong rong ba!” tiin a ngêna.
Hannirese Jisua'n phal maka. Manêkin, “Ni insûngmingei kôm senla, Pumapa'n sin nang a tho pe tie le idôrmo nang lungkham tie hih va ril ngei roh” a tipea.
Masikin amapa hah a sea, Khopui Sôm ngei han a chaia, Jisua'n ata ranga sin a tho pe ngei hah a misîra, ha a misîr a riet ngei murdi'n kamâmruoi sabak an tia.
Jisua'n rukuong leh dîl râl kângkhat tieng rakânin a se nôka, dîl panga loko tamtak a kôm an hong intûpa.
Synagog taka ulienpu a riming Jairus a hongtunga, male Jisua a mu lehan, Jisua ke kunga ânboka, a kôm,
male “Ka nâinupangte hih ana sabaka. Masikin rangâihoitakin juong inla, a hong dam nôka a ring theina rangin a chunga nu kutngei ni juong minngam pe roh!” tiin a ngênrîta.
Hanchu Jisua hah ama lehan an sea. Loko tamtakin an jûia, an ep rai sikin an innengin an innenga.
Mahan nuvengte inkhat kum sômleinik thisuoka damloi a oma,
doctorngei tamtakin an donsûi suonûk khomin la dam thei maka. A sum dôn murdi a heklet zoia, hannirese dam nêkin inrikin ânrik pe uola.
Hanu han Jisua chungroi a rieta, masikin lokongei kâra Jisua nûka a honga,
a mulungrîlin, “A puonngei luo khom tôn inlang, dam kelen ki tih” a tia.
Amanu han a puonmor a tôna, male a thisuok ha harenghan among pita; a natna hah mindam ani zoi tiin, ânriet kelen zoia.
Jisua'n a sûng renga sinthotheina ajôk ti a riet kelena, masikin lokongei tieng a hônheia, an kôm, “Tumo ku puonngei a tôn?” Tiin a rekel ngeia.
