A ruoisingeiin a kôm, “Lokongeiin madôr nang an neng hih nu mu nimak mo; itho mo tumo ku puon a tôn ni ti hih?” an tipea.
Hannirese Jisua'n chu a puon tônpu mu rangin a en titira.
nuvengtenu han a chunga neinun ahongtung hah ânrietin chu, chi leh innîk pumin a honga, a ke kunga khûkinbilin, male a thurchi hah adiktakin a ril leta.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Ka nâinupang, na taksônnân nang amindam zoi, rathânngamtakin senla, na natna renga hong damriem ta roh,” a tipea.
Jisua ala chonglâitakin, thangtheipungei senkhat Jairus in renga an honga, Jairus kôm, “Na nâinupang chu athi suo zoi, ithomo Minchupu na la minjêl banga?” an tia.
Jisua'n chu an chong hah lunghâng tho maka, Jairus kôm han, “Chi nônla, iem ngit roh” a tipea.
Hanchu Peter, Jacob le a nâipa John telloin chu tute ama jûi rangin phal maka.
Jairus ina an va tungin chu, Jisua'n rahang râttaka chap ngei le an ieka, ânrum ngei hah a va mu ngeia.
In sûnga a lûta, an kôm, “Itho mo nin chapa? Ithomo nin inngûia? Hi nupangte hi athi nimaka a in kêng ani!” a tia.
Anni han ama an munuisana, masikin an rêngin a nottuor ngei leta, nupangte a nû le a pa male a ruoisi inthum ngei leh nupangte jâlna khâltana han an lûta.
Nupangte kut hah a sûra male a kôm, “Talitha koum” a tia, maha, “Nupangte, inthoi roh nang ki ti!” tina ani.
Hanchu, ha nupangte hah harenghan a hong inthoia, a lôn thei kelen zoia. (Amanu hah kum sômleinik nupangte ani.) Ha anghan ahongni lehan, an kamâm sabaka.
Aniatachu Jisua'n tute ril tet loi rangin chongpêk inngartak a pêk ngeia, male “An kôm han a sâk rang imakhat pêk roi,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha mun hah a mâka, a omna ngâi khopui tieng a se nôka, a ruoisingei khomin an jûi tita.
Sabbathnin chu Synagog taka mi a minchua. Mahan mi tamtak an oma; male a chongril hah an riet lehan anrêngin kamâm aom tatak an tia, “Hi mi hin hi ngei nâm hih kho renga mo a man hi?” an tia. “A kôm, khoi vârna mo pêkin aom hih? Kho angin mo sininkhêlngei a sin thei hi?
Mary nâipasal, mistri sin ngâi, a lâibungngei khom Jacob, Joseph, Juda le Simon ngei nimak mo? A sarnungei khom ei kôma an om ngâi nimak ngei mo?” an tia. Male chu ama hah an hengpai zoia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Dêipungei chu an omna ngâi khopui le a sûngsuokngei le a insûngmingei lâia tiloiin chu muntina an jâ ngei ngâi a tia.”
Ha muna han chu mi damloi ngei tômte chunga a kutngei minngamin a mindam tiloiin chu ite sininkhêlngei sin thei khâi mak.
Mingei han taksônna an dôn loi sikin a jâmminzal sabaka. Hanchu Jisua'n ha revêla khuongei han a chai titira, mingei ha a minchu tira.
Ruoisi sômleinik ngei hah a koi mintûp ngeia inik, inikin a tîrsuoka. Ratha saloingei chunga rachamneina a pêk ngeia,
male an kôm, “Nin khuolchaina khiengrol tiloiin chu ite vâipôl khom, kutdo choli khom, nin pepngeia sum khom chôi no roi.
Kebunngei chu bun ungla, hannirese, kâncholi inshak chu chôi no roi” tiin chong a pêk ngeia.
Amananâkin an kôm, “Nangni an lei modômna ina han om ungla ma mun hah nin mâk, mâka chu madên han om tit roi.
Hanchu tu khopui khom mingeiin nangni an modôm noa, nin chong an rangâi nônchu mâkrak ungla, nin ke rabab akop ngei hah không liei roi. Maha anni rangin inning roi tina nîng atih.”
Masikin an sea, male mingeiin an sietnangei renga an insîr theina rangin thurchi an misîra.
Ramkhoringei tamtak an rujûl pâia, male damloi tamtak ngei olive sariek an pola an mindam ngei zoi.
Hanchu Jisua riming muntina ânthang zit zoi sikin Rêng Herod'n a lei rieta. Mingei senkhatin chu, “Baptispu John hah a hong ring nôk zoi! Masika han hi sininkhêlngei sin theina ranak hi a dôn ani,” an tia.
Nikhomrese, adangngeiin chu, “Ama hih Elijah ani” an tia. Midangngei an ti nôk chu “Tiena dêipungei angin, ama hih dêipu inkhat ani” an tia.
Mahah a lei rieta, Herod'n chu, Baptispu John ani! “A lu ka tana nikhomrese, a hong ring nôk ani!” a tia.
Herod lelên John hah a minsûra, khitbelin jêl ina a lei khum ani. Herod'n ma anga a thona chu, Herodias hi a nâipa Philip lômnu nikhomsenla a lômnu a minchang sika ani.
John'n Herod kôm, “Na nâipa lômnu in ne neipui nôk hih Balam nimak!” tiin a lei ril tit ngâia.
Masikin Herodias han John a mumâka that ngêt rang a bôka hannirese, Herod sikin that thei maka.
Herod'n John hah mi sa le mi inthieng ani ti a riet sikin a chia, masikin a mojôk ngâi ani. John chongril a riet racham asân injêlpui ngâi khomsenla, a chongril rangâi rang a nuom ngâi ani.
Azoinataka chu Herod suokni ahong tungin chu, sorkar ulienngei, râlmi ulienngei le Galilee rama mi lienngei rangin bukhalâi otna a minsûka, ha ni han chu Herodias'n chuminrên a mana.
Herodias nâinupang a hong lûta, a lâma, Herod le a khuolmingei râiaminsân pe ngei oka. Masikin rêngpa han nupangte kôm han, “Imo dôn rang nu nuom? Nu nuom tak nang pêk ki tih” a tia.
Chonginkhâm tamtak dônin a kôm, “Kho khoi khom mi ni zong kai chu ke rêngram phalkhat tena khom nang pêk rangin chong kên khâm!” a tia.
Masikin nupangte hah a jôka, a nû kôm, “Imo mo ko zong rang?” tiin a va rekela. A nu'n, “Baptispu John lu” tiin a thuona.
Nupangte hah innottakin a kîra, rêngpa kôm han, “Atûn Baptispu John a lu mâirânga mi ni pêk rangin ku nuom” tiin a zonga.
Masikin rêngpa hah ân ngûikhak zoia, aniatachu a khuolmingei makunga inkhâmnangei a lei tho sika han mângti thei khâi maka.
Masikin rêngpa han a rungpu inkhat a tîr kelena, John lu hong lâk rangin chong a pêka. Rungpu han ânphêt kelena, male jêl ina a sea. John lu ava tana;
hanchu mâirânga a hong chôia, nupangte kôm a pêka, nupangte han a nû kôm ava pêk zoia.
Ma roi hah a ruoisingeiin an riet lehan an honga, John ruok hah an chôia, male an phûm zoi.
Tîrtonngei hah an kîr nôka male Jisua an intongpuia, male an sintho murdi le an minchu sai murdi Jisua kôm an rila.
Mingei ha ase le ahong an tam rai sikin Jisua le a ruoisingei chu bunêk zora luo man mak ngeia. Masikin an kôm, “Tho ei theivaia ei om theina rangin mun senkhata chomola nin inngam theina rang muna se rei u” a tia.
Masikin mun inthimngangna panin an theiviekin rukuonga an se zoia.
Nikhomrese, mingei tamtakin an selâi an mua, anni ngei ti an riet kelena; masikin khopuingei murdi renga mingei hah tâng tieng renga an tânna, Jisua le a ruoisingei hah an lei chomtan ngeia.
Jisua hah rukuong renga a juong chum lehan, loko tamtak a mu ngeia, male belri a hôlpu boi angin an ni sikin, anni ngei rangin a mulungrîla inriengmuna leh asipa. Masikin neinun tamtak ngei a minchu ngei phut zoi.
Kholoi ahongni lehan, a ruoisingei hah Jisua kôm an honga, male a kôm, “Mahi mun inthimngang ke ania, nisa khom ase ok zoia.
Mingei hih tîr pai ngei inla, male akôl kienga loingeia mo, khuongeia mo, anninanâkin an sâkruo imakhat an rochôk theina rangin” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nangnin sâkruo imakhat pêk ngei roi,” tiin a thuon ngeia. Annin a kôm, “Anni ngei vâi theina rangin vâipôl chunga duli razannik kin va thâm rangin nu nuom mo?” tiin an rekela.
Masikin Jisua'n an kôm, “Vâipôl kho dôr mo nin dôn? Se ungla, va en roi” tiin a rekel ngeia. An dôn dôr hah an riet lehan, “Vâipôl rangnga le nga inik” tiin an rila.
Hanchu Jisua'n mingei nâm hah apâl apâlin sensâi ungla, durba chunga min sung ngei rangin ruoisingei a ril ngeia.
Masikin mingei hah apâl apâlin, raza khat pâlin le sômrangnga pâlin an min sung ngeia.
Hanchu Jisua'n vâipôl rangnga ngei le nga inik hah a lâka, invân tieng tangin Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila. Vâipôl hah a khoia, mingei hah sem pe ngei rangin a ruoisingei kuta a pêk ngeia. Nga khom hah anrêngin sem ngei rangin a pêk ngei sa zoi.
Mitinin an sâka male an khop chita.
Hanchu an sâk minieng vâipôl hâr le nga ronôi hah tabong sômleinik ruoisingeiin an rût min sipa.
A vâi ngei mijôn hah mi ulien kai isâng rangnga an ni.
Lokongei a minchîn suole harenghan varâl tienga Bethsaida khuoa, a motona lei se rangin a ruoisingei rukuonga a min chuong ngeia.
Mingei hah chonghoiin a mathân suole chu chubaitho rangin muol chunga a se zoia.
Kholoi ahongni lehan, rukuong hah dîl ânlâina taka aoma, Jisua chu atheivaiin tânga han aoma.
Phâivuo hah anôk tieng asêm sikin, a ruoisingeiin an rukuong jâp hah an mulungjîng okin a mua; masikin jîng kôlinsaluom rangtôn dîl chunga lônin an tieng a hong pana, anni ngei khêlpai rang angin aoma,
hannirese anni han tui chunga a lôn an mua. “Mirluoi kêng ani!” tiin an mindonna, male an iniek raka.
Ama an mu lehan an rêngin an rathatâka. Harenghan Jisua'n an kôm, “Hâitakin om roi!” ama'n, “Keima ke ki ni, chi no roi!” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu an kôm rukuonga han a chuong sa zoia, male phâivuo hah amonga. Ruoisingei chu an kamâm sabaka,
mi isâng rangnga a vâina roi aomtie diktak hah an rietthei loi sikin; an mulungbôkngei han amanphâk loi ani.
Dîl râl an inkânna, Genesaret rama an tunga, mahan an rukuong an thunga.
Rukuong renga an chuma, mingeiin harenghan Jisua ani ti an riet kelena.
Ha ram pumpuia mingei hah an hong tân leta; a omna an rietna tena a kôm damloingei an jâmphera jâl pumin an hong rojôna.
Male Jisua a sena muntina, khuongeia mo, khopuingeia mo, loingeia mo, bazar munngeia khom damloingei an hong tuonga, a puonmor luo tôn thei rangin phalna an ngênna. Male a tôn ngei murdi chu an dam pak ani.
Jerusalem renga hong phariseengei le Balam minchupungei senkhat ngeiin Jisua kôla an hong intûpa.
Ha ngei han a ruoisingei senkhatin kut innima sâk an sâk an mua, maha, Phariseengeiin mingei an tho ranga an tipe lamtaka an rusûk loi sika ani.
(Phariseengei le Judangei murdi'n chu an pipungei renga an man chongmâk hah an jûia: an kutngei, balam takin an rusûk noa anin chu ite sâk ngâi mak ngeia;
bazar renga neinun an hong chôi ngei murdi khom an rusûk masa nônchu sâk ngâi mak ngei. Male balam adang tamtak an man ngei hah an sûr mindet tit khom aom sa; ma ngei hah kilâtngei, bêlngei, sumsen khuriâingei, male jâlmunngei rusûk min sâi rang ti ngei ha ani.)
Masikin phariseengei le Balam minchupungei han Jisua kôm, “Ithomo nu ruoisingeiin pipungei chongmâk jôm loiin kutngei innim pumin sâk an sâk hi?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Isaiah'n nin chungroi a leiphuong hah adik ani!” A miziek anghan, asarotholngei nin ni: “Hi mingei hin an chongbâingei leh min minpâka, aniatachu an mulungrîlngei chu keima renga alazan ani.
Miriem minchuna balamngei hah ka balamngei anghan an mindon sikin chubai min mûkna hih anni rangin kâmnângloi kêng ani, Pathien'n a ti, tia lei inziek anghan!”
“Pathien chongpêk nin henga, miriem minchunangei nin jôm ani hi” a tia.
Male a la zombanga an kôm, “Nin minchuna nin jôm theina ranga Pathien chongpêkngei nin heng hi chu vârna lampui nin dôn ani hi.
Moses'n, ‘Nu nû le na pa jâ roh,’ male ‘Tukhom a nû mo a pa mo khomâksâm chu that ning atih,’ tiin chong a lei pêka.
Aniatachu nangni rêkin chu, mîn a nû mo, a pa mo imini san rang anângin chu ‘Ma hih Korban ani’ tiin nin minchu ngâi, (maha aomtie chu, Pathien ta ani zoi tina ani),
an nû mo an pa ngei rangin mo khoite sintho rangin jôt khâi ngâi mak choia.
Ma angdên han balam muruo nin minchu banga hin Pathien chong amin mang ngâia. Hi anga sin nin tho adang khom tamtak ala om sa” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n lokongei hah vêlkhat a koi nôk ngeia, an kôm, “Nin rêngin ko chong rangâi ungla, male rietthei roi.
Pêntieng renga miriem sûnga lûta ama minnim thei ite omak. Manêkin miriem sûng renga hong suok ngei hi ke miriem minnim ngâi ani.”
<range>
Lokongei hah mâkin insûnga a lût lehan, ha chong hah rilminthâr rangin a ruoisingeiin an ngênna.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Midangngei nêkin la vâr uol mak chei.” “Ite pêntieng renga nin sûnga lûtin nangni aminnim thei om mak, ti hih nin la rietthei loi mo? a tipe ngeia,
asikchu nin mulungrîla lût loiin, nin phûngpuia a lûta, male nin nôm sena tieng ajôk ngâi” a tia. (Ma hih Jisua'n sâkruo murdi chu ânthieng let tia minthârnân a ti ani.)
Male a la ti banga, “Nin sûng renga hong suok ha ke nangni minnim ngâi.
Asûng tieng renga, nin mulungrîl renga kêng, mindonna saloi ahong suoka nunchan saloi neinunngei tho rangin nangni ruoi ngâia, inruna, mi thatna,
inrêna, inruokna, saloi murdi tho nuomna; huongna, hurna, narsana, êrona, inpâkna, le inmôlna ngei aminsuok ngâi,
ma saloi neinunngei murdi hah nin sûng tieng renga ahong suoka, male nangni aminnim ngâi ani” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n Galilee ramhuol mâkin Tyre khopuilien kôla a sea. In inkhata a lûta, tutên an riet rang khom jôt maka, aniatachu ama hah inthupin om thei maka.
Nuvengte inkhat, a nâinupang a sûnga ratha saloi dôn han, Jisua thurchi a riet lehan harenghan a honga a kebula ânboka.
Ma nuvengtenu hah Jentail mi ania, Syria rama Phoenikia ramhuol sûnga suok ania. Amanu han a nâinupang sûnga ramkhori rujûlpai pe rangin Jisua kôm a ngênna.
Hannirese, Jisua'n a kôm, “Nâingei khop bak rese ngei. Nâingei bu lâk pea male uingei kôma vôr chu dik mak,” tiin a thuona.
Nuvengtenu han a kôm, “Pu” ani chu ani, hannirese, “nâingeiin dosâng nuoia bu ramal an mathâk hah uingeiin an sâk ngâi nimak mo!” tiin a thuona.
Masikin Jisua'n amanu kôm han, “Ma thuona chongbâi sikin, ni ina se nôk inla, na nâinupang chu ramkhori mâkin va mu ni ti zoi!” a tipea.
Amanu hah a ina a sea, a nâinupang chu ramkhori mâkin jâlmuna jâlin ava mu zoi.
Hanchu Tyre ram renga Jisua a jôk nôka, Sidon khopui sirin Khopui sôm ngei ramhuol hah palin Galilee dîl a tunga.
Mi senkhatin kuorsêt le chongloi a kôm an hong tuonga. Amapa chunga han a kutngei minngam rangin Jisua an ngênna.
Masikin amapa hah Jisua'n lokongei lâi renga atheivaiin a tuonga, a kutruolngei leh a kuor sûng ngei hah a tôn pea, a michil pea, a melei khom a tôn pea.
Hanchu Jisua'n invân tieng enin phûkasâna ânhûmma, a kôm, “Ephatha” a tia, mahah “In-ong roh!” tina ani.
Harenghan, a kuorngei a hongvâra, a melei inkhitna ngei ahong insûta, ânthar vangin a chong thei zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n mingei kôm han tute ril tet loi rangin chong a pêk ngeia; hannirese misîr loi ranga a khap ngei dôr hah an ril minlum uola.
Male ariet ngei murdi'n kamâmruoi sabak an tia, “Neinuntin a sin murdi hih idôra asa mo ani zoi!” anni han, “Kuorsêt khom a minvâr pea, chongloi khom a min chong thei hi, kamâm aom bah!” an tia.
Chomolte suole chu loko dang tamtak an hong intûp nôka. Ite an sâk rang an dônloi sikin Jisua'n a ruoisingei a koia, an kôm,
“Hi mingei hih ko kôm sûnthum an om zoia, male atûn hin ite sâk rang an dôn khâiloi sikin lungkham ku mu ngei tataka.
Bungêiin an ina ki min se ngei lakin lamlâia chamsôlinvei an ta, senkhat vâng chu an hongna alazan ani sikin” a tia.
A ruoisingeiin a kôm, “Hi ramchâra hin hi mingei vâina rangin tumo sâk an hun rang dôr aman zoi ranga?” an tipea.
Jisua'n, “Vâipôl kho dôr mo nin dôn?” tiin a rekel ngeia. Anni han “Vâipôl tâp sari” tiin an thuona.
Ama han lokongei hah pila insung rangin chong a pêk ngeia. Hanchu vâipôl tâp sari hah a lâka Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila, a khoia, lokongei sem pe rangin a ruoisingei kôm a pêk ngeia; male a ruoisingeiin an sema.
Nga chînte atômte khom an dôn sa. Jisua'n ma chunga han khom râisânchong a ril nôka, male sem pe ngei rangin a ruoisingei kôm a pêk sa zoi.
Mitinin an khop dodôrin an sâka, asâk ngei ha mi isâng minli dôr an ni. Hanchu an sâk minieng arnôingei hah tabong sari an la rût min sipa. Jisua'n mingei ha a tîr pai ngeia
<range>
male a ruoisingei leh rukuonga an chuong kelena Dalmanutha ramhuola an se zoi.
Pharisee senkhat ngei Jisua kôm an honga, an inkhalpuia. Ama min ôk rang an nuoma, masikin Pathien'n ama a pom ti minlangna rangin sininkhêl min mu ngei rangin an ngêna.
Hannirese Jisua'n a mulungrîl sûnga a chapa, “Ithomo atûnlai mingei hin sininkhêl an ngên hi? Nimak, nangni ki ril! Atûnlai mingei kôm hin ma anga riet theina reng hi pêk ni no nih!” a tia.
Anni hah a mâka, rukuonga a chuong nôka, male dîl varâl tieng ân kân zoi.
Ruoisingei han vâipôl an hun rang dôr chôi rangin an mingila male rukuonga han vâipôl tâp khat vai an dôna.
Jisua'n, “Singthei roi,” male “Phariseengei le Herod chol renga indîn roi” tiin inningna a pêk ngeia.
Anninanâk han, “Vâipôl ei dôn loi sika, mahi a ti kêng ani rang,” tiin an lâia an injêk khôm phut zoia.
Jisua'n an ti hah a lei rieta, an kôm, “Ithomo vâipôl nin dônloi roi nin injêk khôma? Nin la rietthei tet loi mini? Nin mulungbôkngei ânmôl sabak zoi mini?
Mitngei nin dôn chakin nin mu thei loi mini? Kuorngei nin dôn chakin nin riet thei loi mini? Nin riettit khâiloi mini
mipui isâng rangnga ngei ta rangin vâipôl tâp rangnga ko khoi lâi ha? An sâk minieng vâipôl ronôingei tabong izet mo nin rût minsip ha?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “Tabong sômleinik” tiin an thuona.
Male Jisua'n an kôm, “Mipui isâng minli ngei ta rangin vâipôl tâp sari ko khoi lâihan,” an sâk “minieng vâipôl ronôingei hah tabong izet mo nin rût minsip ha?” tiin a rekel ngei nôka. “Tabong sari” tiin an thuon nôka.
Male ama'n “Atûn ten nin la rietthei loi mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Bethsaida taka an hong tunga, mahan mingei senkhatin Jisua kôm mi mitcho an hong tuonga, male a tôn pe ngei rangin an ngênna.
Jisua'n mitchopa kut hah a sûra, khuo pêntieng a se puia. A mitngei a michil pe suole chu, Jisua'n a chunga a kutngei a minngama male a kôm, “Nu mu thei mo ni zoi?” tiin a rekela.
Ha mi hah a tanga, “O, miriemngei chu ku mua, hannirese, thingkungngei an lôn titir anghan ke ku mu” a tia.
Jisua'n mitchopa mitngei han a kutngei a minngam nôka. Ma zora han chu mitchopa han a en ngita, a mitngei ahong vâr zoia, male jâttin a mu minthâr thei let zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n, “Khuo sûnga hin lût khâi no roh” tiin chong a bêa, in tieng a tîr zoi.
Hanchu Jisua le a ruoisingei hah an jôka, Caesarea Philipi kôla khuongeia han an sea. Lampuia han an kôm, “Mi ril roi, mingeiin tumo ani min ti?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Anni han, “Senkhatin chu Baptispu John ani,” male “midangngei chu Elijah ani, senkhatngei nôkin chu dêipu inkhatlam ani” nang an ti, tiin an thuona.
Hanchu, an kôm han, “Nangni rêkte tumo ani mi nin ti?” tiin a rekel ngeia. Peter'n a kôm, “Messiah ni ni” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Jisua'n an kôm han, “Ku chungroi hih tute kôm ril no roi” tiin chong a pêk ngei zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n a ruoisingei a minchu ngeia, an kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hi la tuong sabak ngêt a ta, upangei, ochaisingei le Balam minchupungeiin hengpai an tih. That an ta, aniatachu sûnthum suole chu aringin inthoinôk atih,” a tia.
Ma roi hih ânthârvangin a ril ngeia. Masikin Peter'n ama hah athenin a tuonga, a ngoa.
Hannirese Jisua'n ânheia, a ruoisingei tieng a ena, male “Soitan, keima renga rotpai roh,” ama'n, “Ni mindonngei hih Pathien renga niloiin miriem nina renga ke ani,” tiin Peter a ngoa.
Hanchu Jisua'n lokongei le a ruoisingei a koia, an kôm, “Tutu khom mi jûi a nuomin chu ama le ama inmingil ngêtin a khros ruputin mi jûi rese.
Tukhom a ringna mojôk a nuomin chu machân a ta; hannirese, tukhom keima sika le thurchisa sika a ringna machân ngei chu mojôk nîng an tih.
Mîn rammuol hih apumin dôn senla, a ringna chu machân senla, ata rangin imo an lâpna aom ranga? Mangmunboi ani!
Mîn a ringna a man nôkna rangin ite a pêk thei rang om mak.
Tukhomin atûnlâi nikhuo saloi le pathienboi mingei kôma keima le ki minchuna chong inzakpui chu, Miriem Nâipasal a Pa roiinpuina insila a vântîrton inthieng ngei leh an juong tika chu ha mi hah inzakpui atih” a tia.
Male a la ti banga an kôm han, “Nangni ki ril, hi taka om senkhat ngei hih chu Pathien Rêngram hah a sinthotheina leh a juong tung an mu mâka chu thi no ni ngei” a tia.
Sûnruk suole chu Jisua'n Peter, Jacob le John a tuong ngeia, an theivaiin an omna muol insânga han a ruoi ngeia. An mitmu chungchakin Jisua mêl ahong inthûla,
male a puonsilngei khom achekin ântêrdapa rammuola mîn tutên madôr ha rusûk minsâi thei no ni ngei.
Hanchu ruoisi inthum ngei han Elijah le Moses'n Jisua an chongpuilâitak an mua.
Peter'n Jisua kôm, “Minchupu, hi taka om hi ei ta rangin idôra asa mo ni zoi! Puon in inthum sin kin ta nangma rang inkhat, Moses rang inkhat, Elijah rang inkhat sin kin tih” a tia.
Ama le adangngei ha an chi rai sikin a ti rang tak khom riet mak ngeia.
Hanchu sûmphâi ajuong oma anni ngei hah sûmphâiin ajuong mukhu ngeia, sûmphâi renga hah chong ajuong inringa, “Ama hih ka Nâipasal moroitak ani, a chong rangâi roi!” a tia.
Inrangin an en titira hannirese tute an kôla adang mu khâi mak ngeia; Jisua vai ke an kôm aom zoi.
Muol chung renga an juong chuma Jisua'n an kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hi thina renga ânthoinôk mâka chu nin neinun mu hi tute kôm ril no roi duo” tiin chong a bê ngeia.
A chongbe ha an jôma, aniatachu ma roi ha an lâia, “‘Thina renga inthoinôk’ ti hih khoi tina mi hi?” tiin an injêk khôm phut zoi.
Male anni han Jisua kôm, “Ithomo Balam minchupungeiin, Elijah a juong bak rang an ti?” tiin an rekela.
Ama'n an kôm, “Neinun murdi cherêl rangin Elijah chu a juong bak ngêt rang ani. Hankhoma, ithomo Pathien Lekhabu'n, Miriem Nâipasalin la tuong ok a ta, hengpaiin la om atih, a tia?
Nikhomrese, nangni ki ril Elijah chu a juong suo kêng ani zoi, male a chungroi Pathien Lekhabu'n ati anghan mingeiin a chunga an nuom lamtakin an lo zoi,” a tia.
Ruoisingei kôm an juong tungin chu an kôla loko tamtak ngei le Balam minchupungei senkhatin an lei inkhalpui lâitak an juong mua.
Mingei han Jisua an mu lehan an kamâm sabaka, male ama tieng an tânna chibai an va pêka.
Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, “Anni ngei lehan khoi thurchi mo nin lei inkhal ha?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Lokongei lâia mi inkhatin a kôm, “Minchupu, ka nâipasal ratha saloi a dôna male a chongloi sikin no kôm ko hong tuong tiin a thuona.
Ratha saloi ahong tôn racham nuoia ânlet kelen ngâia, a cherhuon a suoka, a hâ a riela, angarjêt ngâi. Ratha saloi ha rujûlpai rangin nu ruoisingei ke ngênna, aniatachu thei mak ngei,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Kho anga mi iemnaboi mo nin ni! Idôrsôt mo nin kôm omin nangni ko donsûi thei ranga? Pasalte hah ko kôm hong tuong roi!” a tia.
Ama ha Jisua kôm an hong tuonga. Ratha saloi han Jisua a hong mûn chu pasalte hah a nunuom alo bita, masikin nuoia ân leta, a vânluoi ahônluoia, a cherhuon a suoka.
Jisua'n a pa kôm, “Hi anga a om phutna hih khotik renga mo ani zoi?” tiin a rekela. “Nâipang a chang renga” tiin chong a melea.
“Ratha saloi hin ama that rang pûtin vêl tamtak meia le tuia a meleta. Ne thei ngâiin chu inrieng mi mu inla, mi san roh!” tiin a rila.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Ani,” “nangmananâkin ni ni theiin chu! Taksônna dôn mingei ta rangin chu neinuntin anithei let,” a tia.
A pa han harenghan, ân ieka, “Taksônna ko dôn, hannirese hun zoi mak. Taksônna ko dôn uol theina rangin mi san roh!” a tia.
Jisua'n lokongei ama tieng an hong nâi titir a mua, masikin ratha saloi kôm han, “Ratha kuorsêt le chongloi,” ama han, “Pasalte sûng renga hong jôk roh, male a sûnga lût nôk tet khâiloi rangin chong nang ke pêk!” a tia.
Ratha saloi hah ân ieka, pasalte hah a vôrra a nunuom a lo bita, male a hong jôk paia. Pasalte hah athi angin angarzata, male mitinin, “Ama hih athi zoi!” an tia.
Hannirese Jisua'n a kuta a sûra, a kaithoia, male ânding zoi.
Masuole Jisua in sûnga a lûta, a ruoisingeiin inrûkten an rekela, “Ithomo keinin ratha saloi ha kin rujûlpai theiloi?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ma jât hi chu chubaithona niloiin chu, itên rujûl thei nimak,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Jisua le a ruoisingeiin ha mun hah an mâka male Galilee ram palin an sea. Jisua'n a omna tutên an riet rangin nuom maka,
“Miriem Nâipasal hih a that rangpu ngei kuta bangin om atih. Nikhomrese, sûnthum suole chu aringin inthoinôk atih” ti chong hih a ruoisingei a minchu ngei sikin.
Aniatachu hi minchuna aomtie hih rietthei mak ngeia, male ama rekel rang khom an chia.
Hanchu Capernaum an hong tunga, insûnga an lût suole chu a ruoisingei kôm, “Lampuia han khoi roi mo nin rila nin inkhal hah?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Hannirese anni han thuon mak ngeia, lampuia an hong inkhalna hah ei lâia hin tumo alientak rang? ti roi hah ani sikin.
Jisua ânsunga, ruoisi sômleinik ngei hah a koia, male an kôm, “Tukhom alientak ani nuomin chu achîntak changin mi murdi tîrlâm ani masa ngêt rang ani” a tia.
Hanchu nâipangte a koia, an motona a minding pe ngeia, a kuo ira, an kôm,
“Tukhom ki riming sika hi anga nâipangte inkhat khom a modômpu chu, keima mi modôm ania; male tukhom keima mi modômpu chu, keima mi modôm vai niloiin ni tîrpu khom a modôm sa ani” a tia.
John'n a kôm, “Minchupu, mi inkhat ni riminga ramkhoringei rujûl kin mua, male ei pâla mi ani loi sikin kin hong khap” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ama ha khap rang pût no roi,” tute ki riminga sininkhêl a sina harenghan ku chungroia neinun saloi ngei ti thei kelen rang reng omak ngei, tiin a ril ngeia.
Tukhom mi chakal loi chu ei tienga kop ani.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril, tukhom ki mi nin ni sika tuidâi kilât khat khom nangni a min nêkin chu râisânman a man ngêt rang ani.
“Tukhom keima taka taksônna dôn mi achînte ngei lâia inkhat khom a taksônna minmang pe chu a ringa bunôinalung lienpa orrin tuikhangliena inchôm senla ata rangin sa uol atih.”
Masikin nu kutin na taksônna aminmangin chu tan pai roh! Kutngei inik dôna dûkmun meidîla, mei thi tet ngâiloia se nêkin chu kut boia ringna taka lût nata rangin asa uol.

Male ne kengei han na taksônna aminmangin chu, tan pai kelen roh! Kengei inik dôna dûkmuna paia om nêkin chu ke boia ringna taka lût chu nata rangin asa uol.
<range>
Male ni mitin na taksônna aminmangin chu kêl pai roh! Mitngei inik dôna dûkmuna paia om nêkin chu mit inkhat dôna Pathien Rêngrama lût nata rangin asa uol.
Ha muna han chu anni ngei sâk ngâi, “rulungngei ha khom thi tet ngâi mak ngeia, mei khom thi tet ngâi mak.”
“Inbôlna michi alin aminthieng ngâi anghan mi murdi meiin la minthieng nîng an tih.”
“Michi hih a ala; aniatachu a alna hah adongin chu ile mo nin min al nôk ranga? “Nin lâia malinchangna michi dôn ungla, male insûk irrin om roi” a tia.
Hanchu Jisua'n ha mun hah a mâka, Judea ramhuola a sea, male Jordan Tuidung râl ânkânna lokongei apâlpa a kôm an hong intûp nôka, a tho tit ngâi anghan anni ngei ha a lei minchu ngeia.
Phariseengei senkhat an honga, ama min ôkna rangin, “Mîn a lômnu mâk rangin ei Balamin aphal mo?” mi ril roh, tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Moses'n inmo Balam nangni a pêk?” tiin chongrekel leh a thuon ngeia.
Anni han, “Moses'n chu pasalin inmâkna lekha a mizieka male a lômnu tîr pai rangin inmâk hih a phal ngâi ani” ti hih an thuona chu ani.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Minchu nin intak rai sika Moses'n hi Balam hih nangni rangin a miziek, a tipe ngeia.
Aniatachu rammuol insieng phut renga Pathien Lekhabu'n ati anghan, ‘Pathien'n pasal le nupang’ a sin ngei ani.
‘Masika han pasalin a nû le a pa mâk a ta, male a lômnu leh inlop an ta,
male inik hah takpum inkhat hongni an ti zoi.’ Masikin inik ni khâi mak ngeia, inkhat an hongni zoi ani.
Hanchu Pathien'n munkhata a minzom sai chu miriemin an minsen rang nimak,” a tia.
In sûng an lût lehan a ruoisingeiin ma roi hah Jisua an rekela.
Ama han an kôm, “Tukhom a lômnu a mâka, male nupang dang inneipui chu a lômnu doiin a inrê ani.
Ma angdênin, nupang khomin a pasal mâkin pasal dang inneipui chu a inrê ani,” a tia.
Jisua'n an chunga kutngei a minngama satavur theina rangin mi senkhatin a kôm nâipangtengei an hong tuonga, aniatachu ruoisingeiin mingei hah an lei ngokhuma.
Jisua'n maha a mu lehan a ningathika, a ruoisingei kôm, “Nâipangtengei ko kôm min hong ungla, khap no roi, Pathien Rêngram chu hi anga mingei ta ani sikin.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril tukhom nâipangte angin Pathien ram a modôm nônchu Pathien Rêngram lût tet no ni,” a tia.
Hanchu nâipangtengei a kuoa, an chung chita a kutngei minngamin, male satavur ngei zoi.
Jisua'n se nôk ranga kalchôichakin, mi inkhat a hong tânna, amakunga khûkinbilin, a kôm, “Minchupu Sa, ringinlon ka chang theina rangin imo ki sin rang?” tiin a rekela.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Ithomo asa mi ni tia?” “Pathien pêna chu tute mi sa om mak ngei.
Balam chongpêkngei ha chu ni riet duo: ‘Mi that no roh; inrê no roh; inru no roh; adikloitakin tute bâtu tho no roh; mi huong no roh; nu nû le na pa jâ roh ti ngei hih’” a tia.
Hapa han a kôm, “Minchupu ma Balam chongpêkngei nâm ha chu ka nâipangte renga ke lei jôm sai kêng” a tia.
Jisua'n amapa hah a en ngita, lungkhamna tak dônin a kôm, “Inkhat mamang na lân sam. Senla no dôn murdi zuor inla, male a sum hah inrieng ngei pêk inla, male invâna rochon dôn ni tih; hanchu hong inla, mi hong jûi roh” a tipea.
Amapa han ha chong hah a riet lehan, a mâimôk pe oka, mineipa ani sikin, innguikhakin a rot zoi.
Jisua'n a ruoisingei a vêng ngeia male an kôm “Anei ngei Pathien Rêngrama lûtna rangin khodôra ântak mo ani zoi!” a tia.
Ruoisingei han a chongril hah jâmzal aom sabak an tia, hannirese Jisua'n a la tibanga an kôm, “Ka nâingei, Pathien Rêngrama lût rang hi idôra ântak mo ani zoi!
Minei ngei Pathien Rêngrama lût nêkin chu simphuoi kuora ût lût rang bai uol ok atih” a tia.
Haten hanchu ruoisingeiin an jâmânzal phar zoia, male inkhat le inkhat annin rekel inlôma, “Hanchu, tumo sanminjôkin aom thei rang?” an tia.
Jisua'n anni ngei hah a en ngita, an kôm, “Maha miriem rangin chu nitheimaka, aniatachu Pathien rangin chu anithei ani; Pathien rangin chu neinuntin hih anithei let ani” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Peter'n a kôm, “En ta, keini chu neinuntin kin mâka, male nang kin jûi ani hi” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ani,” nangni ki ril tukhom keima sika le thurchisa sika, in mo, lâibungngei mo, sarnungei mo, nû mo, pa mo, nâingei mo, loingei mo amâk ngei chu,
hi damsûng renga hin inngei mo, lâibungngei mo, sarnungei mo, nûngei mo, pangei mo, nâingei mo, loingei mo, abâk razan man a ta, male mi nuomlonangei khom tuong sa a ta; male zora la hong tung ranga ringinlon khom man sa atih.
“Aniatachu atûna amotontaka om mi tam ngei chu anûktaka la om an ta, male anûktaka om mi tam ngei chu amotontaka la om an tih,” a tia.
Jisua le a ruoisingei Jerusalem tena se rangin lampuia an oma, Jisua moton ânsa, ruoisingei hah kamâmnân an sipa; a nûkjûi mingei han an chia. Jisua'n, ruoisingei hah an theiviekin a tuong ngei nôka, male a chunga neinun ahongtung rang ngei hah a misîr pe ngei nôka.
“Rangâi roi, Jerusalem tena ei se rang ania, mahan Miriem Nâipasal hi ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei kuta bangin om atih. Thi rangin theiloimintum an ta masuole chu Jentailngei kuta bang an ta,
anni ngei han innuinân mang an ta, michil an ta, jêm an ta, that an tih; hannirese sûnthum suole chu aringin inthoinôk a tih” a tia.
Hanchu Zebedee nâipasalngei Jacob le John, Jisua kôm an honga, “Minchupu, imini sin mi ni tho pe rangin kin nuom aom,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Maha imo ani?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Anni han, a kôm, “Ne Rêngram roiinpuitaka ne rêngsukmuna nên sung tika na changtieng inkhat voitieng inkhat mi ni min sung rangin kin nuom ani” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nin ngên hi nin riet loi ani. Dûktuongna kilât ke nêk ngêt rang hi nin nêk thei rang mo? Ka baptisma chang rang khom nin chang thei rang mo?” a tipe ngeia.
Anni han, “Thei kin tih” tiin an thuona. Jisua'n an kôm, “Ki kilât nêk rang chu nêk nin ta, ka baptisma chang rang khom chang thei nin tih.
Aniatachu ka changtieng mo, ko voitieng mo tumo an sung rang thang rangin chu rachamnei mu-ung. Ha munngei hah chu Pathien'n tu ngei rang mo a minsûk pe ngei kôm han pêk ngei atih,” tiin a tipe ngeia.
Ma roi hah ruoisi dang sôm ngeiin an lei rieta Jacob le John chunga an lei nuor zoia.
Masikin Jisua'n anrêngin munkhatin a koi ngeia, an kôm, “Jentailngei chunga roijêkpu an phun ngei chu an chunga an inlal sabak ngâia, male an ruoipungei khom an chunga racham an nei tatak ngâi ti khom nin riet.
Nikhomrese, nin lâia chu ma anghin ani rang nimak. Nin lâia tukhomin alien rang a nuomin chu nin tîrlâm ani bak ngêt rang ani;
male nin lâia tukhomin amotontak ani nuomin chu mi murdi suok ani bak ngêt rang ani.
Miriem Nâipasal luo mana mîn a sin an tho pe rangin juong maka; mi sin tho pe rangin le mi tamtak ngei ratan ranga a ringna pêk rangin ke a juong ani” a tia.
Jericho an hong tunga, Jericho renga Jisua le a ruoisingei leh loko tamtak ngei mâkin an se lâiin kutdo Timaius nâipasal Bartimaeus lampui kôla a lei insunga.
Nazareth Jisua ani ti a riet lehan ân ieka, “Jisua! David Nâipasal, inrieng mi mu roh ba!” a tia.
Mi tamtakin dâirek rangin an ngokhuma, aniatachu ama'n, “David Nâipasal, inrieng mi mu roh!” tiin ânring uolin ân ieka.
Jisua ânngama male, “Ama hah hong koi roi” a tia. Masikin mitchopa hah an va koia, a kôm, “Tâihieiin om roh!” anni han, “Inthoi roh, nang a koi!” an tipea.
Masikin a puon a vôr paia, inrangtakin ân chôma, male Jisua kôm a hong zoi.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Khoimo nang ko tho pe rangin nu nuom?” tiin a rekela. Mitchopa han a kôm, “Minchupu, mu nôk thei rangin ku nuom” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Se ta roh, na taksônnân nang amindam zoi ani” tiin a rila. Voikhatrengin a mu thei kelena, male lampuia han Jisua a jûi zoi.
Jerusalem an hong tung rangtôn Bethphage le Bethany khopuingei kôla Olive Muol an hong tungin chu Jisua'n a ruoisingei lâia mi inik an motona a tîr ngeia,
hi rilnangei leh an kôm, “Nin motona khuo son se ungla, nin tung harenghan, sakuordingte inthung, tute la chuongna ngâiloi mu nin tih. Sût ungla, mahin hong kai roi.
Male tukhomin itho mo ma anghin nin thoa, tiin nangni an rekel khomin, Pumapa'n a min nâng kêng, hong thak nôk kelen a tih ti roi” a tia.
Masikin an sea lamliena inkhâr pêntienga sakuordingte inthung an va mua. Maha an sût lehan,
hataka ânding senkhat ngeiin, “Ithomo sakuordingte hah nin sûta?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
Jisua'n a ril ngei anghan an thuona, male lokongei han an min se ngei zoi.
Sakuordingte hah Jisua kôm an hong kaia, a chunga an puonngei an dâpa male Jisua a chuonga.
Mi tamtakin an puonngei lampuia an dâpa, adangin loilâija sasôl an va tuka an dâp sa zoi.
Amoton tienga se ngei le a nûk tienga a jûi mingeiin, “Hosanna! Pumapa riminga juongpu chu Pathien'n satvur rese!
Rêng David Rêngram juong tung rang ha, ei pa'n satvur rese! Pathien minpâkin om rese! Ânchungtaka khin Hosanna!” tiin an inieka.
Jisua'n Jerusalem a tungin chu Biekin sûnga a lûta, male neinun nâm a ena. Aniatachu kholoi ahongni zoi sikin ruoisi sômleinik ngei leh Bethany taka an se zoi.
Anangtûka chu Bethany renga an hong kîr nôka, Jisua a von ahong cham pea.
“Alazana renga theichang kung abuongei hah ava mua, masikin amara tete mo ka man” tiin ava pana. Hannirese ava tungin chu, theichang ânra zora ani loi sikin abuongei tiloiin chu ite adang mu maka.
Jisua'n theichang kung kôm han, “Tutên na mara sâk man khâi no rese ngei!” a tia. Male a ruoisingei khomin a chong ha an rieta.
Jerusalem an tung lehan, Jisua Biekina ava lûta, Biekina neinun juorngei le rochôkngei hah a rujûlpai ngeia. Sum thûlngei dosângngei le pharvali juorngei sukmunngei khom a nammelet pe ngeia,
male Biekin khalâidung han tutên neinun chôi rangin phal khâi maka.
Hanchu mingei kôm han Pathien Lekhabua, “‘Ki Biekin chu namtinngei ta ranga chubaithona in ani,’ tiin ânziek nimak mo? Aniatachu nangni ngei rêkin chu inrungei inthupna in ke nin minchang hi!” tiin a minchu ngeia.
Mahi ochaisingei le Balam minchupungeiin an rieta, masikin Jisua thatna rang lampui an rok zoia. Lokongei ha a minchuna hah kamâm aom sabak an ti sikin ama hah an chia.
Hanchu, kholoi ahongni lehan, Jisua le a ruoisingei hah khopuilien an mâk zoia.
Anangtûk jînga chu ha lampuia an lôn chungin theichang kung hah aruzungngei dênin athîn an mua.
Peter'n neinun ahongtung ha a riet nôka male a kôm, “Minchupu, en ta theichang kung khomâk na sâm hah athi phar zoi!” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Pathien taksôn roi,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Adiktakin nangni ki ril; tukhomin hi tâng hih, “Inthon inla tuikhangliena van pai roh” ti senla, mulunglâiinlakna boiin iemtakin a tiin chu, a ti anghan hongtung atih, ama rangin sinin om atih.
Masika han nangni ki ril: i-ih khom chubaithoa nin ngên ngei murdi chu maha nin man sai angin iem ungla, male nin zong ngei murdi chu pêkin om nin tih.
Male chubaitho ranga nin inding tika, “Tu chunga khom nourna nin dôn khomin ngâidam roi, masika han invâna nin Pa khomin nin minchâinangei hah nangni a ngâidam rang ani.”

Jerusalema an tung nôka. Biekina a lônlâitakin ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le upangei Jisua kôm an honga
a kôm, “Tu rachamin mo hi neinunngei hih ni sin? Ma anga rachamneina hi tumo nang pêk?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Kei khomin chongbâi khat nangni rekel ka ta, male mi nin thuonin chu, tu rachamin mo hi neinunngei hih ki sin nangni ril ki tih, tiin a thuon ngeia.
Ni ril roi, John Baptisma tho theina racham hah kho renga mo: Pathien renga mo miriem renga mo?”
An lâia anninanâkin an inkhal phut zoia: “Imo ei ti rang? ‘Pathien renga,’ tiin ei thuon lakin, ama'n ‘Itho mo, John hah nin iem loi?’ Mi tîng a ta.
Aniatachu, ‘Miriem renga, ei tiin chu’ ” (Mitinin John hah dêipu tatakin an lei bê sikin, mipuingei laka an chia.)
Masikin Jisua an thuona chu, “Riet mak meh,” an tia. Jisua'n an kôm, hanchu, “Kei khomin tu rachamin mo hi neinunngei hih ki sin nangni ril uol no ning,” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu Jisua'n chongmintêkin an kôm a misîra, “Voikhat chu mi inkhatin grapebil a thoa, bêr a minkula, grape epna rang khur a choia, male angâkna rang in insâng a sina. Hanchu inlo mingei kôm a chuon inlo rangin a pêk ngeia, ram danga khuolchai a se zoia.
Grape pot zora ahongnin chu a chang rangtum lâk rangin inlo mingei kôm a suok inkhat a tîra.
Inlo mingeiin a suok hah an lei sûra, an jêma, kut korongin an min se zoi.
Hanchu a pumapa'n suok dang a tîr nôka; inlo mingei han a lu an lei mophop pea mâimôk an lei shak bita.
A pumapa han suok dang a tîr nôk rêka, amapa hah chu an lei thata; male ma angdênin adang tamtak ngei khom senkhat an lei jêma, senkhat an lei thata.
Ha mi han tîr ranga a dôn chu a nâpasal lelê a moroitak vai ha ani zoia; ‘Ka nâipasal hi chu lei jâ ngêt an tih’ tiin a nâipasal hah anûktaka a tîra.
Hannirese ha inlo mingei han inkhat le inkhat kôm, ‘Hipa hih a pumapa nâipasal ani hi. Hong roi, ama hih that rei u, male a rochon hih ei ta ani rang!’ an tia.
Masikin a nâipasal hah an sûra, an thata a ruok khom grapebil pêntieng an paia.
“Hanchu, kho angin mo grapebil pumapa han a lo ngei rang ni zoi?” tiin Jisua'n a rekela. “Hong a ta, ha mingei hah that a ta, grapebil hah donsûi rangin midangngei kut chunga pêk ngei atih.”
Adiktakin hi Pathien lekhabu hih nin pore loi mini? “‘In sinpungeiin lung mangmunboi anga an hengpai hah akila lung kâmnâng tak achang zoi.
Maha Pumapa tho ania; ma hih ei mitmua kamâmaruoi sabak na!’” ti hih a tia.
Ma chongmintêk hah anni ngei demnân a misîr ani ti an riet sikin; Juda ruoipungeiin Jisua sûr rangin an pûta. Hannirese lokongei hah an chia, masikin ama an mâka, male an rot zoi.
Chongrekelngei leh min ôk rangin phariseengei senkhat le Herod pâla mi senkhat ngei a kôm an tîra.
Anni ngei hah a kôm an honga, “Minchupu, chongtak ni misîr ngâi ti kin rieta, mingeiin imo an mindon rang kângdoi loiin, tute dingmun lunghâng tho loiin, hannirese mingei rangin Pathien lungdo ni minchu ngâia, Rom Rêng Caesar kôma chôiruol pêk rangin ei Balamin ânkalpui mo? Kin pêk ngei rang mo, kin pêk ngei loi rang mo?” mi ril roh, an tia.
Aniatachu Jisua'n an huongvâr tho hah a riet chiena, male an kôm, “Ithomo ni min ôk rang nin tho hi? Duli sumthîr inkhat hah hong chôi ngân hi roi, lei en rong,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Inkhat an hongchôi pea, an kôm han, “Tu mâisuo le tu riming mo ani hi?” tiin a rekel ngeia. Anni ngei han, “Caesar” tiin an thuona.
Masikin Jisua'n an kôm, “Asa, hanchu Ceasar ta chu Caesar pêk ungla, male Pathien ta chu Pathien pêk roi,” a tipe ngeia. Male Jisua chunga han an kamâm sabak zoi.
Hanchu mingei inthoinôkna omak ti ngâi Sadduceengei Jisua kôm an honga, male
“Minchupu, Moses balam hih kin ta rangin a mizieka: ‘Mîn nâingei nei loiin a lômnu a thisanin chu, a nâipa han ha meithâi hah a luo ngêt rang ani, nâingei an neia athipu ulienpa nâingeia bê ani theina rangin.’
Voikhat chu lâibung sari an oma; ulientakin in a neia male nâingei nei loiin a thia.
Hanchu inikna han ma nupang ha a luo nôka, male nâingei nei loi dênin a thi nôka. Lâibung inthumna khom ma angdên ania,
male anrêngin: ma lâibung sari ngei han ma nupang hah an luo paka, tutên nâingei nei pui loiin an thisan rieia. Anûktaka chu nupangnu khom hah a thia.
Atûn, mithi ngei nâm aringin an inthoinôk nikhuo tikin tu lômnu tak mo ani rang ani zoi? Ma sari ngei laka han amanu hah anrêngin an luo paka” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Idôra dikloi mo nin zoi! Male itho sika mo nin riet mo?” Ma ha Pathien lekhabu le Pathien sinthotheina nin riet loi sika ani.
Athi ngei aringin an inthoinôk tika chu, invâna vântîrtonngei angin om an ta, innei no ni ngei.
Atûn mithi ngei kaithoia an om rang roi chu, Moses lekhabua chîmbuka meichuong chungroia han Pathien'n Moses kôm, “‘Keima Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, Jacob Pathien ki ni,’ tia ânziek hah nin la pore tet ngâi loi mini?
‘Ama chu aring ngei Pathien ke ani, mithi ngei Pathien nimak. Nin minchâi phar zoi!’” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Balam minchupu inkhatin an injêkhômna hah a rieta. Jisua'n Sadduceengei hah thuonna satak a pêk ngei hah a mûn chu a honga, masikin Jisua kôm, “Chongpêkngei murdi lâia khotak hi mo akâmomtak?” tiin arkela.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Akâmomtak chu ma hih ani: ‘Israelngei rangâi roi! Pumapa ei Pathien vai hih Pumapa ani.
Pumapa na Pathien chu nu mulungrîl murdi leh, na ratha murdi leh, nu mulungbôk murdi leh, na râtna murdi leh lungkham roh.’
Inikna chongpêk akâmom nôk chu ma hih ani: ‘Nangma nên lungkham anghan nu bungmingei lungkham roh’ ti hi. Hi Chongpêk inik ngei nêka roiinpui uol reng omak” tiin Jisua'n a thuona.
Balam minchupu han Jisua kôm, “Ani ai duo, Minchupu! Mahi adik, ni ti anghan, Pumapa vai hih Pathien ania male ama pêna chu pathien dang reng omak.
Male Pathien chu nu mulungrîl murdi leh, nu mulungbôk murdi leh, na râtna murdi leh nu lungkham ngêt rang ania; male nangma nên lungkham anghan nu bungmingei hah nu lungkham ngêt rang ani. Pathien kôma mâichâma sâ pumhâl inbôlnangei le inbôlna adangngei nêkin khom ma chongpêk inik ngei jôm hih akâmom uol ani” a tia.
Jisua'n inthârtakin a thuon ti a rieta, male a kôm, “Pathien Rêngram renga la mak che,” a tipea. Masuole chu tutên Jisua kôm chongrekel rangin ngam khâi mak ngei.
Jisua'n Biekina a minchu ngei lâihan an kôm, “Kho angin mo Balam minchupungeiin Messiah chu David richisuonpâr ani rang an ti thei?”
David ha Ratha Inthieng mangin: “Pumapa'n ku Pumapa kôm: Ka changtieng insung tit roh na râlngei ne kepha nuoia ka dar mâka chu” a ti ani.
David han ama hah “‘Pumapa’ a tia; masikin kho angin mo Messiah hih David richisuonpâr ani thei ranga?” a tia. Loko tamtakin Jisua chongril hah râisântakin an rangâia.
A minchu ngei anghan, an kôm, “Balam minchupungei renga indîn roi, anni chu kâncholiinchuol hâka lêng an nuom ngâia, bazar muna mîn an jâ ngeia chibai an pêk ngei rangin an nuoma,
Synagogngeia sukmun asatak ngei, le khohoithona munngeia, mun hoitak ngei an thang ngâi.
Meithâingei sum an sâka an inngei an muruka, male mi huongna rangin asôt tatakin chubai an tho ngâia. Masika han an dûktuongna hah intak uol ok atih” a tia.
Jisua Biekina sumsiena kôla ânsunga, mingeiin asûnga an tholôm thâk ngei hah a ena. Minei tamtakin sum tam tatak an thâka;
hanchu meithâi inriengte a honga male damali inik a thâka, maha poisa khat dôr ani.
A ruoisingei a koitupa male an kôm, “Nangni ki ril; tholôm dôngna tholôm thâk ngei murdi nêkin hi meithâi inriengte hih a thâk min tam uol tak ani.
Midangngeiin chu an nei minieng, an mang minieng ngei an thâka; aniatachu amanu hih chu, ânrieng anghan, a dôn nâm a thâkripa—a ringna ranga a dôn nâm te hah a pêkrip zoi,” a tia.
Jisua Biekin renga a hong jôk lâihan a ruoisingei lâia mi inkhatin a kôm, “Minchupu, en ta! Lungngei le inngei kamâm aom tie hi!” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Hi in roiinpui ngei hi nu mu na? Lung inkhat luo amuna hin mâkin om no nia; anrêngin misim zit la nîng atih,” a tia.
Jisua chu Biekin mâi tienga Olive Muola ânsung lâihan a kôm, Peter, Jacob, John le Andrew inrûkin a kôm an honga.
“Mahi khotika mo ahong om rang? Male ma neinunngei ha ahongtungna rangin imo minsina aom rang? Mi ril roh,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Tutên nangni an huong loina rangin inning roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Mi tamtakin, “Khrista ki ni!” tiin ki rimingin hong an ta, mi tamtak huong an tih.
Male anâina mo, alazana mo râl ruhu thurchi ngei nin riet khomin nin jâmminzal no roi. Ma anga neinunngei hah chu aom ngêt rang ani, hannirese amongna chu la ni tak no ni.
Jâtngei le Jâtngei lân doi an ta, ramngei le ramngei lân doi an tih, rêngramngei le rêngramngei lân doi an tih. Muntina ningnungei hong a ta, mâitâmngei la chul atih. Ma neinunngei ha nâiha aphutna ngei angin ani rang.
“Nangninanâkin nin inning ngêt rang ani. Sûrin la om nin ta, male roijêknamuna tuongin la om nin tih. Synagogngeia jêmpol la ni nin ta; keima jârin rêngngei le roijêkpungei makunga Thurchi Sa misîr pe ngei rangin lân ding nin tih.”
Aniatachu amongna ahong tung mân, Thurchisa hih mi murdi kôm misîrin aom bak ngêt rang ani.
Male sûrin nin oma, male roijêknamuna tuongin nin om tikin, nin ti rang lei mindonin azora aphâk mân nin jâmminzal no roi; azora taka, i-ih khom nangni pêka aom tak hah ti roi. Chong nin ti rang ngei hah nangni nin chong ni no nia; anni ngei hah Ratha Inthieng renga ajuong rang ani.
Mîn a lâibungngei nanâk khom that rangin la minsûr a ta, male pa khomin ma angdênin a nâingei la minsûr sa a ta, nâingei khomin an nulepangei doi an ta, male that an tih.
Keima sikin mitinin nangni la mumâk an tih. Aniatachu tukhom among dêna tuongdierpu chu sanminringin om atih.
“‘Intakna Ichi Omtak’ ha ânding loina rang muna ânding la mu nin tih.” (aporepungei ranga minrietna: mahi aomtie rietthei rese ngei!) “Hanchu Judea rama om ngei hah tângngei chunga han rot ngêt rese ngei.”
In chunga ompu khomin chumin a chôi rang a in sûnga neinun juong lâk rangin azora minhek tet no rese.
Loia ompu khomin a puon va lâk rangin in sûnga kîr tet no rese.
Nupang nâivong ngei le nâitesen pomlâi nûngei rangin chu ma nikhuongei hah khodôra ichiruoi mo ani rang!
Ma zora hah phalbia atung loina rangin Pathien kôm chubaitho roi.
Ma nikhuongeia intaknangei ha chu Pathien'n rammuol a sinphut renga avien sûn tena rammuolin a lei riet ngâi murdi nêkin ânchungtak ani rang sikin. Ma anga neinun ha chu khotiklâi khomin om nôk tet khâi no ni.
Aniatachu ma nikhuongei hah Pumapa'n a minbong ania; ninorese chu tute ring thei no ni ngei. Nikhomrese, a thangsai a mingei sikin ma nikhuongei hah a minbong ani.
“Hanchu, tukhomin nin kôm, ‘En ta, hin Messiah aom!’ aninônchu, ‘En ta, son aom!’ an ti khomin maha iem no roi.
Messiah rotholngei le dêipu dikloingei an inlang rang sikin. Pathien'n a thangsai a mingei tena khom anitheiin chu an huong theina rangin sininkhêlngei le kamâmruoi neinunngei tho an tih.
Nangni chu inningchienin om roi! Azora ahong tung mân khokhoi khom nangni ke lei ril let zoi ani.
“Ma intakna nikhuongei le azora avun suo nûkin chu nisa hah hong jîng a ta, tha khom vâr khâi no nia,
ârsingei khom invân renga joungtâk an ta, male munronga sinthotheinangei khom an omnangei renga inthîn pai atih.
Hanchu Miriem Nâipasal hih sinthotheina inlaltak le roiinpuitak leh sumngei lâia khin juong inlang atih.
Ama'n philchung kôlkil minlia, kôlmong kângkhat renga kôlmong kângkhat dênin rammuol pumpuia, Pathien'n a thangsai a mingei mintûp rangin a vântîrtonngei tîr atih.
“Theichang kungin nangni minchu rese. Amachangngei ahong ema, ahong innoia male abuongei ahong incherin chu kholum hih anâi zoi ti nin riet ngâi.
Ma angdênin, nangni khomin ma neinunngei hah ahongtung nin mu tika chu azora ahong nâi zoi, ânphut rang ani zoi tiin nin riet rang ani.
Ma neinunngei murdi hah atûnlâia mingei hih an thi riei mân ahongtung rang tiin riettit roi.
Pilchung le invân inmang pai a ta, hannirese ko chongbâingei chu inmang pai tet no ni.
“Nikhomrese, anikhuo aninônchu azora chu khotika mo ahongtung rang, invâna vântîrtonngei khomin, Nâipasal khomin, tutên riet mak ngei; Pa vai kêng a riet ani.
Azora hah khotika mo ahongtung rang nin riet loi sikin, inningchien ungla, intûngchienin om roi.
Maha chu mîn a in a mâka, a tîrlâmngei rachamneina a pêk ngeia, an sintho rang a pêk ngei chita, inkhârôtpu khom inningchiena om ranga chong a mâk pea, ram lataka khuolse angin ani.
Masikin inningchienin om roi, in pumapa hong rang zora hah kholoia mo, jânchima mo, ârkhuona mo, jînga mo, ahongtung rang nin riet loi sikin.
Inningloiin a hong duoi khomin, a inin nangni hong mu tet no rese.
Hanchu, nin kôma ki ti hih mi murdi kôm ki ti ani: inningchienin om roi!” a tia.
Kalkân kût le Cholboi Vâipôl Kût rang sûnnik motona ochaisingei le Balam minchupungeiin Jisua inrûktea sûra male that rang lampui an rok banga.
“Khohoi sûngin chu ei tho tet rang nimak,” aninônchu “mingei lâia injêlna om duoi ni,” an tia.
Jisua chu Bethany taka Simon phârpa ina a oma, Jisua bunêk lâitakin, nuvengte inkhat nard sariek mirimhoi man luttak alabaster bilôr sipmat a hongchôia. Amanu han bilôr hah a khoia male a lu chunga a buoka.
Ha muna om mingei senkhatin chu an ningathika, “Khoitho mo hi sariek mirimhoi hih an minpâmchien hi?
Duli razan thum nêka tama juora asum hah inrieng ngei pêk thei ke ani duo!” an tia. Male amanu hah asân an chierkhum zoi.
Hannirese, Jisua'n an kôm, “Amanu hah atheiin mâk roi! Khoitho mo nin jêl hi? Ka ta rangin neinun satak le enhoitak a tho ani.
Mi inrieng ngei chu nin kôma an omtit rang an nia, male nin nuom titika nin san thei. Aniatachu keima chu nin kôm hin omtit no ning.
Amanu hih a theidôrin a tho ania; ka takpum hih phûm ranga lei cherêla mirimhoi a lei buok ani.
Atûn hin, adiktakin nangni ki ril, rammuol pumpuia Thurchisa an misîrna muntina hinu sintho khom hi an riettitna rangin misîr sa ngâi an tih,” a tia.
Hanchu ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia mi inkhat, Judas Iscariot han Jisua a minsûr theina rangin ochaisingei kôm ava sea.
A ti rang an lei rieta an râiasân sabaka, male sum pêk rangin an inkhâma. Masikin Judas han Jisua ha an kuta a bâng theina rangin chuminrên a rok zoi.
Khohoia Cholboi Vâipôl bukhalâi otni sûn masatak han, Kalkân Kût bukhalâi otna ranga belritengei an that ngâi ni han a ruoisingeiin a kôm, “Nangma rangin Kalkân Kût bukhalâi hih khonmo nang va minsûk pe unglang nu nuom?” tiin an rekela.
Hanchu a ruoisingei mi inik hi rilnangei lehin a tîr ngeia: an kôm, “Khopuiliena se ungla, male pasal tui-ûm rokot nangni intongpui atih. Ama hah jûi ungla
a lûtna taka in pumapa kôm han: ‘Minchupu'n, khonmo ku ruoisingei le Kalkân Kût kin sâkna rang khâltan hih?’ a ti, va ti roi.
Hanchu ama rengin khâltan chunginchuon inzar lienpa, neinun aom sai, mintuodir sai nangni min mûng a ta, mahan eini rangin va minsûk roi,” a tia.
Ruoisingei ha an inphêta, khopuilien han an sea, Jisua'n a ril ngei anghan neinun murdi ha an va mua; Kalkân Kût bukhalâi hah an va minsûk zoi.
Kholoi ahongni lehan, Jisua hah ruoisi sômleinik ngei leh an se zoia.
Dosânga bukhalâi an ot lâitakin Jisua'n, “Nangni ki ril; nin lâia mi inkhat, ko kôma sâk mi sâkpuipu lelê hin ni minsûr atih” a tipe ngeia.
Ruoisingei an mulungdûk atông pe ngeia, male inkhat suole inkhat adônin, “Adiktakin keima mo mi ni tina?” tiin an rekel paka.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nangni sômleinik ngei lâia inkhat, mâirânga a vâipôl mi michie puipu hi ani.
Pathien Lekhabu'n, Miriem Nâipasal hih a thi ranga a lei ti anghan a thi rang ania; hannirese Miriem Nâipasal minsûrpu chungroi chu ântak sabak rang! Ma miriem rangin chu ânzir loi nisenla chu ama rangin asa uol rang ani!” tiin a thuon ngeia.
An sâk lâitakin, Jisua'n vâipôl hâr a lâka, chubaithôn râisânchong a rila, maha a khoia, male a ruoisingei kôm maha a pêk ngeia. “Lâk ungla sâk roi,” ama'n, “ma hih ka taksa ani,” a tia.
Hanchu kilât a lâka, Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila, male maha a pêk ngeia; male anrêngin an nêk pak zoi.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ma hih ki thisen mi tamtak ranga asuok, Pathien chonginkhitna athar mindetna ani.
Nangni ki ril, Pathien Rêngrama uain thar ke nêk ni atung mâka chu hi uain hih nêk nôk khâi noning” a tia.
Hanchu minpâkna lâ inkhat an thoa, Olive Muola an se zoi.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nin rêngin rot riei nin ta, ni mâk riei nin tih, Pathien lekhabu'n, ‘Pathien'n belrihôlpu hah that a ta, belringei ha chekinchâi chit an tih’ ati sikin.
Aninâkachu aringin kên thoinôk suole chu Galilee rama nin motona lei se ki tih,” a tia.
Peter'n a kôm, “Adangngei nâmin nang mâksan riei khomsenla ngeia, keiman chu nang mâksan tet no ning!” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n Peter kôm, “Nang ki ril avien jân voinik ârkhuong mân nangman voithum mi ipdel ni tih,” a tipea.
Peter'n chong angar uolin a thuona, a kôm, “Ni thina thisa rang khom ni ronga nang ipdel tet noning!” a tia. Male ruoisi adangngei nâm khomin ma angdênin an ti paka.
Gethsemani an ti mun hah an hong tunga, male Jisua'n a ruoisingei kôm, “Chubai ko tho sûngkâr chu mahin lei insung roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Peter, Jacob le John ngei hah a kôm a tuong ngeia, asân rathânvaiin a mulungdûk atong tataka,
male an kôm, “Ku mulungdûk ana rai sikin thi rang angin ke ko om zoi. Mahin om ungla male inningchienin om roi” a tipe ngeia.
Amoton tieng ava se uol vieta, pila ânboka, male ha tuongna rang zora ha anitheiin chu a lôi theina rangin chubai a thoa.
“Pa,” “O ka Pa! Nangma rangin chu neinunngei murdi anithei let. Hi tuongna kilât hih ko kôm renga mi khâi pai pe roh. Aniatachu keima ka racham niloiin nangma na racham tak nirse,” tiin chubai a thoa.
Hanchu a hongkîra, male ruoisi inthum ngei hah an innin a hong mu ngeia, Peter kôm han “Simon, na la in tit mo? Konta khat luo amengin nin om thei loi mo?”
Male an kôm, “Huongna nin lût loina rangin inningchienin om ungla, male chubaitho roi. Ratha'n chu a nuoma, hannirese taksân chu phâri mak” a tipe ngeia.
Vêlkhat a va se nôka, male chongbâingei a ti dên hah va tiin chubai ava tho nôka.
Hanchu a ruoisingei tieng a hongkîr nôka, male an lei in dênin a hong mu ngei nôka; an mitngei reng meng thei khâi maka. Male a kôm ti rang khom riet khâi mak ngei.
Avoithumna a hongkîr nôkin chu an kôm, “Atûn ten khom sôlinngamin nin la in dêna? Ahun zoi! Azora ahong tung zoi! En ta u, atûn Miriem Nâipasal hih mi nunsiengei sinthotheina kuta bangin aom rang ani.
Inthoi ungla, se ei tih u zoi. En ta u, mahin mi minsûr rangpu hih a hong nâi zoi!” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua a la chong lâitakin, a ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia Judas hah a hongtung kelena. Ama leh ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le upangei leh lokongei an hongtîr ngeia, khandaingei le molbongngei chôiin an hongtunga.
A minsûr rangpu han, “A bieng ku tum tak hah nin rokpu hah ani, sûr ungla male tuong kelen roi, enkol roi” tiin minsinna a lei ril ngei sai ani.
Judas a hongtung harenghan, Jisua kôm ava se kelena, “Minchupu!” tiin a bieng a tum pea.
Masikin Jisua hah an sûra male an khitbel zoi.
Hataka inding ngei lâia mi inkhatin a khandai a kêlsuoa male Ochai Inlaltak suok, a kuor a tukthâk pe zoi.
Hanchu Jisua'n anni ha a rokôka, an kôm “khandaingei le molbongngei chôiin balampalpu sûr rang angin mi sûr rangin nin hong mo hi?
Anîngtin Biekina nangni minchu rangin nin kôm ko om ngâia, hannirese mi sûr mak choia. Aniatachu Pathien Lekhabungei ahongtung adik ngêtna ranga ani hi,” a tia.
Hanchu a ruoisingei han ama an mâk raka, male an tân khip zoi.
Ruotharte inkhat, rosompuon leh vai invôn Jisua a jûia. Ama khom sûr sa rang an pûta,
hannirese a puon hah mâkrakin a korongin a tânpat zoi.
Hanchu Jisua hah Ochai Inlaltak ina an tuonga, mahan ochaisingei nâm le Balam minchupungei le upangei khom an hong intûp sa kelena.
Peter'n alazanna renga a jûia, Ochai Inlaltak khalâidung dênin a sea. Mahan a rungpungei lâia mei ava uota.
Ochaisingei le roijêkpungei murdi han Jisua an that theina rangin a minchâina an man theina rang abi an mazama, aniatachu ite man mak ngei.
Rietpuipungei tamtakin Jisua doiin milakin an nônna, hannirese, an nônna thurchingei hah intok thei mak.
Mi senkhat an indinga male Jisua doiin milakin an nônna:
“Hi mi hin, miriemin an lei sin ‘Biekin hih set ka ta, male sûnthumin adang inkhat kuta sin niloi in minding ki tih’ a ti kin riet” an tia.
Nikhomrese, ma an nônna thurchingei hah khom intok uol maka.
Ochai Inlaltak hah an renga an moton han a vândinga, male Jisua kôm chong a rekela, “Nang an nônna roia hin ite thuonna no dôn loi rang mo?” a tia.
Aniatachu Jisua chu a dâireka, male chongbâi khat luo ti maka. Avêlin Ochai Inlaltak han a kôm, “Nangma ha Satvura om Pathien Nâipasal, Messiah hah ni ni mo?” tiin a rekel nôka.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Ki ni,” male, “Miriem Nâipasal hih Râtinchung chang tieng insungin, invâna sûmngei lâia juong nin rêngin la mûng nin tih!” tiin a thuona.
Ochai Inlaltak han a puonsilngei a potkhêra, male “Rietpuipu adang reng nâng khâi mak meh!
Pathien ânti le a rilsiet ti chu nin riet zoia. Imo nin roimasat?” a tia. An rêngin ama an doia: ama hih theiloina a dôna male that rang piel ani an ti paka.
Senkhat ngeiin a mâi an michil phuta, a mâi an hîp pea, male an jêma. A kôm, “Mi ril roh tumo nang a jêm!” an tia. Male rungpungei han an tuonga male ama an bên zoi.
Peter hah thangtienga khalâidunga a la om lâihan Ochai Inlaltak tîrlâm dôngmate inkhat a honga.
Peter mei lei uot hah a mu lehan a enririna, a kôm, “Nangma, khom Nazareth Jisua leh munkhata om ngâi ni ni nah” a tipea.
Hannirese Peter'n a ipdela, “Riet mu-ung Khoimo ni ti reng rietthei mu-ung,” tiin a thuona, male mokot pêntieng ava jôka. Masuole han âr akhuong kelen zoi.
Tîrlâm dôngmate han a va mu nôka, a kôla inding ngei kôm han, “Hipa hih khom an lâia mi inkhat ani sa!” a ti nôka.
Aniatachu Peter'n a ipdel nôk rêka. Chomolte suole chu a kôla inding ngeiin Peter kôm, “Galilee rama mi ni ni sa sikin nang khom an lâia mi ni ni khet,” tiin an deia.
Hanchu Peter'n an kôm, “Chongtak rilin khomâk kên sâm ani! Adik nônchu Pathien'n dûk ni tho rese! Ma miriem nin ti chungroi hah riet reng riet tatak ngâi mu-ung!” a tia.
Masuole han âr voinikna ahong khuong nôk zoia, male Jisua'n Peter kôm han, “Âr voinik akhuong mân nangman voithum keima hi riet ngâi mu-ung ni ti rang,” a tipe chong hah a hong rietsuok nôka. Male a mulungakoi pea, a chap ngu-ngûi zoi.
Jînga inmânin innottakin, ochaisingei ha upangei le Balam minchupungei, le Roijêkpungei murdi leh an intônga male mintuonangei an sina. Jisua ha zingjirûi leh an khita an tuong paia, male Pilat kuta an bânga.
Pilat'n chong a rekela, a kôm, “Judangei rêngpa ni ni mo?” a tia. Jisua'n, “Nangman ke mi ni ti duo” tiin a thuona.
Ochaisingei han abi tamtakin Jisua an nônna,
masikin Pilat'n Jisua kôm chong a rekel nôka, “Nangman nu thuonloi rang mo? nang an nônnangei nâm hih rangâi roh!” a tia.
Avêlin Jisua'n chongbâi khat luo ti rang nuom maka, male Pilat'n a kamâm sabak zoia.
Pilat'n chu Kalkân Kût zora zeta mi intâng ina aom inkhat mingeiin an ngên tak ha a mojôk pe ngei ngâi a baisi ani.
Ma zora han mi inkhat a riming Barabbas hah, mi ânhelngei pâla mi, le loko injêlna kâra mi that sika intâng ina a oma.
Lokongei an intûpa male anni ranga a lei tho pe ngei ngâi anghan tho rangin an ngên lâihan,
Pilat'n an kôm, “Judangei rêngpa hih nangni mojôk pe inlang nin jôt mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Ochaisingei han an narsa sika Jisua hah a kut chunga an hong bâng ani ti a riet minthâra.
Aninâkachu Ochaisingei han mipuingei hah Barabbas a mojôk pe ngei ranga ngên rangin an misiet ngeia.
Hanchu Pilat'n an kôm, “Aninte, Judangei rêngpa nin tipu hih imo ko lo rang ani zoi?” tiin a rekel ngei nôka.
Anni han, “Khrosa jêmdel roh!” tiin an iniek nôka.
Hannirese Pilat'n an kôm, “Imo a tho minchâi?” tiin a rekel ngei nôka. Anni ngei han, “Khrosa jêmdel roh!” tiin ânring uolin an inieka.
Pilat'n lokongei râiminsân a nuoma, masikin Barabbas hah a mojôk pe ngeia. Hanchu Jisua hah a vîka male Khrosa jêmdel rangin an kuta a bâng zoia.
Râlmingei han Jisua hah râiôt inmâi khalâidunga an tuong lûta, an champui ngei murdi an koi mintûpa.
Jisua hah puon senduk an minsila, riling amachangngei hah tapor an phana, male a lua an minkhuma.
Hanchu ama chibai an pêka: “Judangei Rêngpa, ringsôt roh!” an tia.
A lua tôkmol leh an jêma, an michila, khûkinbilin chibai an mûka.
Munuiinjanân an sin suole chu puon senduk hah an lîka, male a puonngei nanâk hah an minsil nôka. Hanchu khrosa jêmdel rangin an tuong zoi.
Hanchu lampuia mi inkhat ram renga khopuilien hongpan a riming Simon an intôngpuia, male râlmingeiin Jisua khros ruput rangin an dânderita. (Simon hah Cyrene Kurini mi, Alexander le Rufus ngei an pa ani.)
Jisua hah Golgotha an ti muna han an tuonga maha aomtie chu “Luru Mun” tina ani.
Ha muna han a pang ânhipna rangin uain murra loi leh ânpol pêk rangin an pûta, aninâkachu Jisua'n nêk jôt mâka.
Hanchu khrosa an jêmdela, male a puonsilngei hah an insema, kho ahâr ha mo an chang rang chit rietna rangin taruo an sânna.
Jisua an jêmdel zora hah jîng dâr kuo inringa ani.
Ama doia an nônna minrietna chong hah “Judangei Rêngpa” tiin a lu chunga an târra.
Jisua leh munkhatin mi inru inik a changtieng inkhat, male a voitieng inkhat an jêmdel sa.
Ma angdên han, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Ama khom mi puoloingei lâia telsân aom zoi” ati hah ahong tung zoi ani.
Hataka mingei ânloi murdi'n an lu an thuka Jisua an êroa, “Ohoi! Biekin set na ta, sûnthumin ni minding nôk rang na!
Atûn khros renga juong chum inla, nethenin insan mojôk roh ba!” an tia.
Ha angdênin ochaisingei le Balam minchupungei khomin Jisua an phengsana, “Midangngei chu a mojôk thei ngâia, hannirese ama le ama chu insan mojôk thei mak!
Tho atûn chu Messiah, Israelngei rêngpa hih khros lêr renga a juong chum lei en rei u, male ama ei iem rang ani!” an tia. Ama leh an jêmdel sa mi inik ngei khomin Jisua an êro sa zoi.
Sûnchima konta inthum sûng chu rammuol ajîng khapa.
Chonûk dâr inthum inring han chu Jisua rôl inringtakin ân-ieka, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani?” a tia, maha, “Ka Pathien, ka Pathien, Ithomo mi ni mâksana?” tina ani.
Ha muna omngei senkhatin a he an rieta, male “Rangâi ta u, Elijah a koi ke!” an tia.
An lâia mi inkhat a tânna, patjôn, uain thûra a michiejûta, tôkmol monga a târra. Hanchu Jisua ner a hong min tônna, male “La ôt rei u! Khros renga ama musum rangin Elijah mo a juong pe lei en rei u!” a tia.
Jisua'n rôl inringtakin ân-ieka, a rangachat zoi.
Hanchu, Biekina puondal dûnga om hah inikin achung renga among dênin akêr phata.
Râlmi ulien khros motona ândingpu hah Jisua a rangachat tie hah a mua “Hi mi hih Pathien Nâipasal ani khet!” a tia.
Ha muna, nupang senkhat ngei khom alazanna renga thîrin an oma; ma ngei hah Mary Magdalene, Mary Jacob nâipang le Joseph ngei an nû, le Salome ngei an ni.
Ma ngei hah Jisua Galilee rama a om lâihan an jûi ngâia, male an san ngâi ani. Nupang tamtak Jerusalema ama leh a se ngei khom hah an om sa.
Kholoi ahongnin chu Arimathea mi Joseph a hongtunga. Ama hah Roijêkpungei lâia jâ omtak ania, Pathien Rêngram juong tung rang lei ngâkpu ani. Maha Incherêlni (maha, Sabbathni motona sûn hah ani), masikin Joseph'n hâitakin Pilat kôm a va sea Jisua ruok ha ava zonga.
<range>
Pilat'n Jisua chu a thi zoi tiin a riet lehan a kamâm tataka, râlmi ulien inkhat a koia, Jisua thina asôt zoi mo? tiin a rekela.
Râlmi ulien bâi renga chong ânthârin a riet suole chu a ruok hah Joseph chôi rangin a phal pe zoia.
Joseph'n rosompuon a rochôka, ruok hah a musuma, rosompuon lehan a tuoma, lungpuia hel thânkhura han a min jâla. Hanchu thân kotbâi hah lung lienpa muluoiin a hîpa.
Mary Magdalene le Joseph nû Mary han Jisua ruok an min jâlna hah an ena, an mu chien zoi ani.
Sabbathni avun suole chu Mary Magdalene, Jacob nû Mary, le Salome ngei han Jisua ruok sariek va pol rangin mirimhoi an rochôka.
Pathienni jînga nisa suok chakin thâna an va sea.
Lampuia han, “Thân kotbâia lung hah tumo mi muluoi pai pe rang hi?” tiin annin kereng inlôma.
Maha lung lienpa ani sikin. Hanchu an hong ena, lung hah lei muluoi saiin an mua.
Masikin thân sûnga han an lûta, ruotharte inkhat puonchek insilin chang tienga insungin an mua, male an inlâiraka.
Ama'n an kôm, “Inlâirak no roi,” Nazareth Jisua an jêmdelpu hah nin rok ani ti ki riet. Ama hah mahin om khâi maka, ânthoinôk zoi! En ta u, an min jâlna hi.
Atûn, se ungla, hi thurchi hih a ruoisingei le Peter kôm han: “Galilee rama nin motona se a ta; ‘nangni a lei ril sai anghan mason mu nin tih’ tiin va ril ngei roi” a tipe ngeia.
Masikin an jôk paia, beidong le rathatâk pumin thân renga an tânna. An chi rai sikin, tute kôm ite ti mak ngei. [
Masuole chu Pathienni jînga thina renga ânthoinôka Mary Magdalene, a sûng renga ramkhoringei sari a rujûlpai pe nu kôm han amotontaka Jisua ânlâra.
Amanu hah a sea, a champuingei ava ril ngeia. Anni ngei hah ngâisie le chapin an lei oma;
male amanu han Jisua chu aring nôk zoia, male mu khom ku mu khet, a tipe ngei lâihan anni ngei han amanu hah iem mak ngei.
Masuole han an lâia mi inik ram tieng panin an sea, lampuia mêl dang uolin an kôm ânlâra.
Anni hah an hongkîra, ruoisi dangngei an hong rila, aniatachu maha khom anni ngei han iem uol mak ngei.
Anûktaka chu, Jisua'n ruoisi sômleikhat ngei bu an nêk lâitakin an kôm ânlâr nôka. Ânthoinôk suole amu ngei chong taksôn loiin an mulung angar sabak sika le iemna reng an dôn loi sikin a ngo ngeia.
Ama'n an kôm, “Rammuol pumpuia se ungla, mi murdi kôm Thurchisa hih va misîr roi a tipe ngeia.
Tukhom ama iema Baptisma chang ngei chu sanminjôkin om an ta; tukhom a iem loi ngei chu theiloi intumin om an tih.
Iempungei chu sininkhêlngei sintheina ranak pêk nîng an ta: ki rimingin ramkhoringei rujûlpai an ta; chong tharin chong an tih;
an kutngei leh murûlngei an sûr khomin, aninônchu tûr an nêk khomin itên minna ngei thei no nia; mi damloi ngei chunga an kutngei minngam an ta, male dam kelen an tih” a tia.
Pumapa Jisua'n a chongpui ngei suole chu, invâna khin lâkpaiin aoma, Pathien chang tieng a hong insung zoia.
Ruoisingei hah an sea male muntina thurchi an va misîr zoia, male Pumapa khomin anni ngei lehan sin a thopui ngeia, an thurchi misîr hah adik ti rietnân sininkhêlngeiin a mindet tir zoi.]
Moroitak Theophilus, ei lâia roi juong tung, mi tamtak ngeiin theidôr miziek rangin an pûta.
Aphut renga ha neinunngei amu ngeiin kin lei ril le chong lei phuong anghan an miziek ani.
Masikin nangma Mirittak, abul renga jâttin ânthârlaka sûiin adônin inthârlakin nata rangin miziek ronga ki ti ani.
Tienna thurchi nang an lei ril hah adiktak ani iti na riet theina rangin.
Judea rama Herod rêngin an lallâiin, ochai a riming Zakariah a oma, ama hah ochai Abijah rûia mi ania, a lômnu riming chu Elizabeth ania, Aaron ochairûia mi ani.
An ruonin Pathien mitmun mi diktakin an omma, demnaboiin Pumapa balam le a chong jômin an om ani.
Hannisenla Elizabeth aching sikin nâi nei maka, an ruonin an tar ok zoia.
Hanchu sûnkhat chu Zakariah hah nîngtina asin ngâi angin Biekina ochai sin a thoa.
Ochaingei balam angin mirimhoi hâl rangin taruo sânin ama hah thangin a oma, masikin Pumapa Biekina a sea.
Mirimhoi a hâl lâiin mipui ngeiin apêntieng chubai an lei thoa.
Mirimhoi hâlna mâichâm changtienga han, Pumapa vântîrton indingin a kôm a juong inlâra.
Zakariah'n amu lehan rolo innîkin a chia.
Hannisenla, vântîrton han a kôma, “Zakariah chi no roh, ne ngênna Pathien'n a rieta, no lômnu Elizabeth'n nâi nang nei pe a ta a riming John ni phuo rang ani.
A suokin chu nangma le mi tamtak mulungrîl râisân atih.
Pumapa mitmûn milien nîng a ta, uain le jûngei reng nêk no nia. A suokni renga Ratha Inthiengin sip a ta,
Isreal mi tamtak Pumapa an Pathien tieng hong tuong nôk a tih.
Dêipu Elijah anghan rât le hâitakin Pumapa motona sêng a tih. Pangei le nâingei minmun nôk a ta, chongjômloi mingei mindonna satna tieng min hei a ta, Pumapa mingei ata rangin min thokdiem a tih” a tia.
Zakariah'n vântîrton kôma han, “mahah inmo ki riet rang? keima laka ka tar zoia, ko lômnu khom a tar zoia,” a tia.
Vântîrton han, “Pathien makunga inding ngâi Gabriel ki nia, hi thurchi nang ril rang piela juongtîr ki ni.
Hi chong azora taka juong tung rang ni iemloi sikin, ajuong tung mâka chu chong theiloiin dâirekin om ni tih,” a tia.
Mipui ngeiin kholâia an lei ngâka, Biekin sûnga Zechariah a om sôt rai sikin an lei kamâma.
A hong jôk tena chu a chong thei khâiloi sikin Biekina inlârna ai mu iti an rieta, a kut leh vai a chong zoia.
Biekina a sin rang a zoi suole chu a in tieng a kîr zoia.
Môrkhat suoleh chu a lômnu Elizabeth nâi a vong zoia, thâ rangnga tuol suok loiin a oma.
“Anûktaka Pumapa'n mi san nôk zoi, ki riming siet, sût minthelna rangin” a tia.
Elizabeth nâivong, atha ruk nân chu Pathien'n a vântîrton Gabriel Galilee ram Nazareth khopuia a tîra.
Rêng David rûia mi Joseph lômnu biek dôngmate Mary kôma chong juong ichôiin.
Mary kôma a lûta, “Nu chunga ratha inngamna om rese! Pumapa nu chunga a om, sat nang a vur ok” a tia.
Ha chong hah a rieta anîn chu imo ani zoi, tiin a mulung a minjîng oka.
Hanchu, vântîrton han, “Mary chi no roh, Pathien'n ai minlut tak mi nini.
Nâivong na ta, nâipasal nei na ta, a riming Jisua ni phuo rang ani.
Mi lien nîng a ta, Ânchungtaka Pathien nâi tîng an tih. Pumapa Pathien'n David anghan Rêng minchang a tih.
Jakob richingei chunga rêngin om a ta, ânlalna ramin mong tik nei khâi no nih” a tia.
Hanchu Mary'n vântîrton kôma, “Mahah kho angin mo anithei ranga? dôngmate kêng ka lani hite” a tia.
Vântîrton han a thuona, “Ratha Inthieng nu chunga juong a ta, Pathien Ratha nu chunga om a tih. Masikin kêng nâite inthieng khom Pathien Nâipasala be ani rang.
Nu juorpuinu Elizabeth khom aching an iti hah, a tar ok khoma a nâivongna thâ ruk ani zoi.
Asikchu Pathien chu ite a tho theiloi omak,” a ti pea.
Hanchu, Mary'n, “Pumapa tîrlâmnu ki ni, ni ti lam angtakin ku chunga tung rese,” a tia. Masuole chu vântîrton han ama amâk zoi.
Masuole inrangin Mary ânthoka, Judea rama khopui inkhata a se zoia.
Zakariah ina a lûta, Elizabeth chibai amûka.
Elizabeth'n Mary chibaimûk a riet lehan a sûnga nâite hah singânsa, Elizabeth Ratha Inthiengin a sipa.
Hanchu rôl inring takin ânieka, “Nang chu nupang lâia mi satvur tak ni nia, na nâivong rang khom hih satvur ani.
Ka Pumapa nûn ni na hongpan hih i ang tak mo ai ni zoi hi?
Nu chibaimûk ki riet lehan ku sûnga nâite râisânin ânchôm ani.
Pumapa chongbê na chunga tung rang ni iem sikin mi satvur ni ni” a tia.
Hanchu Mary'n “ka mulungin Pumapa a minpâka,
ki ringnân khom Minringpu Pathien chunga a râisân ok zoi.
A tîrlâmnu intem tie a riettit sikin! Atûn renga chu mitinin satvur ni tîng an tih.
Sinthothei Pathien han ku chunga sin lientak a thoa, A riming khom ânthieng ani.
Ruol athar renga ruol thoithar nôk idênin, Ama mirit ngei chu a moroi ngâia,
A bân ranak an chunga a jâra, Mi inpâk ngei chu an mintuona ngei leh chekaminchâi ngâia.
An sukmun renga rêng alien ngei a kaisuma, Rangâichîn ngei chu a domsâng zoia.
Vonchâmngei chu neinun sân a vâi minkhopa, Ânchongngei chu kut korongin a min rot ngei zoia.
Ei richibulngei kôma a chonginkhâm anghan, A tîrlâm Isrealngei san rangin a juong zoi.
Abraham le a richingei kumkhuon a moroi tie riettitna rangin” a tia.
Mary hah Elizabeth kôm thâ thum a oma, hanchu a in tieng a se nôk zoi.
Elizabeth nâinei zora ahong chukin chu nâipasal a neia,
A bungmingei le a suongsuokngeiin, Pumapa'n lungkham a mu ok iti an rieta, an râisân puia.
Hanchu, sûnriet anîn chu nâite sertan rangin an honga, a pa riming pêlin Zakariah nanâk phuo rang an tia,
Hannisenla, a nûn “nithei nonih, a riming chu John kêng” a tia.
Annin, “Hi anga riming hih nin suongsuokngei lâia khom la om ngâi mak” an tipea.
Maleh a pa kôm han kut leh an chongpuia, nâite riming hah imo ai phuo nuom, tiin an rekela.
Zakariah'n a miziekna rang neinun a zonga, a riming chu John ani tiin a mizieka; an kamâm sabaka.
Harenghan, Zakariah hah a hong chong thei zoia, Pathien a minpâk kelen zoi.
An kôl revêla om ngei murdi'n an chia, ha thurchi hah Judea tângram muntina ânthang zoia.
Ariet nâmin hi nâite hih i ang takin mo a hong ni rang na? Pumapa sinthotheina ranak laka a chunga a oma, an tia.
John a pa Zakariah hah Ratha Inthiengin a sipa, Pathien chong a phuonga.
“Pumapa, Isreal Pathien chu minpâk ei tih u, A mingei san rangin a juonga, a mojôk ngei zoi.
A tîrlâm David richi renga jôkna riki mi pêk zoi.
Zora sôt tak renga dêipungei kôma a lei khâm anga han,
Ei râlngei le mi demngei renga mi mojôka,
A chongkhâm inthieng ei richibulngei kôma minlang rang ai ti riet titin.
Ei richibul Abraham kôma a chongkhâm ei râlngei renga mi san minjôka, chi loia a sin ei tho theina rang le,
<range>
Ei damsûnga a mitmua inthieng le adika ei om theina rangin.
Nangma ka nâi, Ânchungtaka Dêipu nang tîng an ta, A lampui sin rangin, Pumapa motona sêng ni tih.
A mingei an sietna ngâidama omin, Sanminringna chong ril ni tih.
Ei Pathien chu mi lungkham thei le moroithei ania, Masikin ei rangin sanminringna khuovâr mi minsuok pe a ta;
Thina dâilîm ijîngna nuioa omngei, Invân renga êlminvâr a ta, Ei kalchôina rathangamna lampui tieng mi tuong a tih” a tia.
Hanchu, nâite hah taksa le ratha tieng a hong insôn tira, Isreal mingei lâia ânlâr mâka chu ramchâra a om ani.
Malâiahan, Rêng Caesar Augustus Rom sorkar ramop murdi riming miziek rangin chong a pêka.
Hi intelnapui motontak hi syria rama Kuirinius governor chang lâitak ani.
Mitinin anni khopui chita riming miziek rangin an sea.
Joseph khom David inkuo le a richia mi ani sikin, a lômnu biek Mary inrâidîm lehan Galilee ram Nazareth khopui renga Judea ram, David suokna, Bethlehem khopuia riming miziek rangin an sea.
<range>
Hanchu, Bethlehem'a an om lâitakin nâi nei zorân a hong de zoia.
Nâilutîr pasal a neia, puon leh a thoma, khuol tung in an keng khâiloi sikin sa bukhênga a min jâl zoi.
Ma rama han, belrihôlngei jâna an belri ngâkin rajâia an oma.
Pumapa vântîrton a juong inlâra, Pumapa roiinpuina vârin a êla, rolo innîkin an chia.
Vântîrtonin, “chi no roi, Thurchisa râisân omtak ninta rang le mitin ta rang ku juong mintung kêng.
Avien hin David khopuia Minringpu, Pumapa Khrista a suok zoi.
Sîn nin tho theina rang chu, nâitesen, puona thom sakhênga jâlin mûng nin tih,” a tia.
Harenghan, vântîrton kôma han, invân râlmingei tamtak an juong oma, Pathien an minpâka.
“Invân Ânchung taka Pathien Roiinpui rese. Philchunga a râisânna ngei chunga inngêina lêng rese,” an tia.
Hanchu, vântîrtonngeiin an mâk ngei lechu, belrihôlngei han, Pumapa'n mi ril, neinun juongtung a en rangin, Bethlehem'a se ei ti u, an tia.
Hanchu, an se laia, Mary le Joseph le sakhênga jâl nâite hah an va mua.
Vântîrtonin, nâite chungroi ai rilngei hah belrihôlngeiin an ril ngeia,
a riet ngei murdi'n kamâm a om tatak an tia.
Mary'n ha chong ngei hah a mulungrîla mindonin a vong tita.
Vântîrtonin a rilngei lam takin jâttinrêng an va mua, an riet sikin Pathien minpâk pumin an kîr nôk zoi.
Hanchu sertan rang ni sûn riet a hong chukin chu, sûnga a om lâia vântîrtonin ai phuo sai, a riming, Jisua an phuo zoia.
Moses balam chongpêk angin minthieng rang ni ahong chukin chu, Joseph le Mary'n an nâite Pumapa kôma minlang rangin Jerusalem Biekina an hong puia.
Balam lekhabua, “Nâilutîr pasal kai chu Pumapa ta rang ani,” itia ânziek anghan.
Pumapa balam anghan vasu bop khat mo, pharvali bop khat mo, an pêk sa rang ani.
Ma zora han Jerusalema a riming Simeon an ti a oma, ha mi hah mi sa, Pathien minlut mi tak ania, Isreal jôk rang ni ngâkin, a chunga Ratha Inthieng a oma.
Pumapa chonginkhâm, Messiah a mu mâka thi no nih, itia inkhâm ani.
Ratha ruoiin Simeon hah Biekina a sea. Balam anga achunga sin rangin a nû le a pa'n nâite Jisua, Biekina an hong puia.
Simeon'n nâite a poma, Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila;
“Pumapa, atûn chu no chongkhâm angin, Ni tîrlâm hih rathangamin ni na man se rang ani zoi.
Ki mit lelên na sanminringna a mu zoi,
Mitin mu ranga ni mintuo hah.
Nu lungdo, Jentailngei kôma inlang rang vâr le Ni mi Isrealngei roiinpuina rang chu” a tia.
Nâite chungroi Simeon'n ai misîr hah a nu le a pa'n an kamâm sabak ani.
Hanchu Simeon'n, sat a vura, a nu Mary kôma, “Hi nâite hih Pathien ithang, Isreal lâia mi tamtak inmangna rang le jôkna rang ani. Pathien sînthona mi tamtak ngei makhal rang nîng a tih.
Mi mindonna inthup minlang a ta, khandai angai angin ngâisietnân na mulung sunkhoi a tih,” a tipea.
Mahan dêipu meithâi atar inkhat, a riming Anna an ti, Asher rûia mi, Phanuel nâinupang a oma. kum sari vai inneiin a oma, kum sômriet minli meithâiin a oma. Biekin mâk loiin a sûn a jânin bu ngêia Pathien Biekina, chubai thôn a om ngâia.
<range>
Ma zora taka han a hongtunga, Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila, Jerusalem jôkna ranga Pathien lei ngâk ngei kôma khom nâipang Jisua thurchi a misîr pe sa zoi.
Pumapa balam chongpêka, an thotum an tho zoiin chu Joseph le Mary hah Galilee rama, an khuo Nazareth'a an kîr nôk zoi.
Hanchu, nâite hah a hong liena a hong rât tira, vârnân a sipa, Pathien satvurnangei a chunga a oma.
Kumtin, Jisua nû le pa Kalkân kût mang rangin Jerusalema an se ngâia.
Jisua hah kum sômleinik a hong nîn chu, kûta an hong se puia.
Kût aheka anîn chu an juongkîr pui nôka, ania Jisua chu Jerusalema ala châma, a nû le a pa lakin riet mak ngeia.
A lômngei lâia se nîng a tih, tiin an mindona, sûnkhat lam an se suoleh, a ruolngei le an sûngsuokngei kâra an rok titira,
anitachu, mu mak ngeia, a rok rangin Jerusalema an kîr nôka.
A sûnthum nin chu, Biekina Juda minchupungei kôma insungin, an chong rangâi le chong rekelin an va mu zoia.
A vâr taka a chongthuon lam a riet murdi'n an kamâma,
A nû le a pan an va mûn chu an kamâma, a nûn a kôma, “Nâia khoithomo hi anga mi no tho, kângdoi takin na pa leh nang kin lei rok bang kêng ani zoi” a tipea.
“Ithomo minin rok? Ka Pa ina ko om rang hih nin riet loi mini?” tiin a thuona.
Hannisenla a thuonna hah a mindona chang riet mak ngeia.
Hanchu, an kôm Nazareth'a a sea, an chong jômin a oma, a nûn chu neinun omtie ngei nâm a mulungrîla a vong tit ani.
Hanchu Jisua hah taksa tieng le vârna tieng a hong insôn tir tira, Pathien le miriem mitlûtin a hong om tir zoi.
Hanchu, Teberius Caesar Rêng chang a kum sômleirangana, Pontius Pilat Judea rama governor ania, Herod Galilee rama ânlal lâiin, A nâipa Philip, Iturea le Trachonitis rama ânlal lâiin, Abilene rama Lysanias ânlal lâia han,
Annas le Caiaphas ngei hah Ochai Inlal annia. Ma zora lâia han ramchâra Zakaria nâipasal John kôma Pathien chong a juong tunga.
