Hannisenla, Jisua'n nâipangte ngei a kôma a koia, an kôma, “Nâipangtengei ko kôma hong rese ngei, khap no roi, Pathien Rêngram chu hi anga nâipangte ngei ta kêng.
Diktakin ki ti, tutu nâipangte'n Pathien Rêngram ai modôm anga modôm loiin chu asûnga lût tet no nih,” a tia.
Juda ruoipu'n Jisua a rekela, “Minchupu sa, kumtuong ringna ka manna rangin imo ko tho rang?” a tia
Jisua'n a kôma, “Ithomo asa mini ti? Pathien pênna chu tute misa omak.
Chongpêk hah, ni riet duo, Inrê no roh, mi that no roh, inru no roh, dikloiin mi nôn no roh, na nû le na pa mirit roh,” a tia.
Ama han, “Ha chongpêkngei murdi hah chu ka nâipangte lâi renga ko jôm kêng ani” a tia.
Mahah Jisua'n a riet lehan a kôma, “Neinun inkhat tho rang na la nâng, Ne nei murdi juor inla, asum hah inriengngei sem ngei roh, hanchu, invâna rochon nei ni tih, male chu hong inla ni jûi roh,” a tipea.
Mahah ama'n a riet lehan, ânngûi oka, miriem neipa ani sikin.
Hanchu, Jisua'n ânngûi a mûn chu, “Minei ngei Pathien Rêngrama lût rang ântak bah na!
Ut simphuoi kuora lût rang ântak nêkin mineingei invân rêngrama lût rang intak uol a tih,” a tia.
A chongril riet ngei nâmin, “Hanchu tumo sanminjôk nithei ranga?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n, “Miriem ranga nitheiloi hih Pathien rangin chu nithei ani,” tiin a thuona.
Male Peter'n a kôma, “En roh! kin inngei mâkin nang kin jûi hih,” a tia.
Jisua'n an kôma, “O, ani, adiktakin nangni ki ril, tutu Pathien Rêngram sika a in mo, a lômnu mo, a nu le pa mo, a lâibungngei mo, a sarnungei mo, a nâingei mo, mâk kai chu,
anêka tam uolin atûna ringlâi le zora la hong ranga kumtuong ringna khom la man ngêt a tih,” a tia.
Hanchu ruoisi sômleinik ngei hah Jisua'n atheiin a tuong ngeia an kôma, “Rangâi ta u, Jerusalema ei se rang ania mahan, Miriem Nâipasal chungroi dêipungei lei miziek hah tung a tih.
Jentailngei kuta pêk an ta, esêl an ta, munuisan an ta, michilkhum an tih.
Jêm an ta, that an tih, ania, sûnthum suole aringin inthoi nôk a tih,” a tia.
Ania, ruoisingei han a chong reng rietthei mak ngeia, a chong ti hah anni rangin chu chong inthup ani sikin Jisua'n imo ai ti riet mak ngei.
Hanchu, Jisua'n Jericho a tung rangin lampui kôla mitcho inkhat ânsunga, kut a doa.
Mipui rahang a rietin chu, “Imo hi? tiin a rekela.
“Nazereth Jisua a hongvun ani,” an tipea.
Ânieka, “Jisua! David Nâipasal, inrieng ni mu roh” a tia.
Moton tienga om mipui ngeiin, “Dâirek roh” tiin an ngoa. Ania ama'n ânring uolin, “David Nâipasal! inrieng mi mu roh,” a tia.
Masikhan Jisua ân ngama, mitcho hah hongtuong rangin chong a pêka. A hongnâia anîn chu Jisua'n a rekela.
“Imo nang ki tho pe ranga ni nuom?” a tia. “O pu, amu nôk ku nuom,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôma, “Anîn chu muthei roh, na taksôn nân nang a mindam ani,” a tia.
Harenghan a muthei kelen zoia, Pathien minpâk pumin Jisua a jûi zoia. Mipui ngeiin mahah an mûn chu an rêngin Pathien an minpâk zoi.
Hanchu, Jisua'n Jericho lûtin apala.
Mahan sumrusuongpungei ulientak a riming Zacchaeus an ti mineipa a oma.
Jisua hah i-anga mi mini, mu rang a nuoma, ania miriem dungbong ania, mipui tamrai sikin mu thei maka.
Hanchu Jisua'n ma lampui a hongvun rang sikin, mipui moton tieng Jisua mu rangin a tâna, Theichangpui kunga a kala.
Jisua'n ha mun a hong phâka anîn chu a tanga a kôma, “Zacchaeus juong chum lai roh, avien chu ni ina kêng ku tung ngêt rang,” a tia.
Zacchaeus hah innot takin a juong chuma, râisân takin a ina a mintung zoi.
Mipui a mu ngei nâmin an chiera, “Mi nunsie ina kêng tung rangin a se rek zoi so,” an tia.
Hanchu, Zacchaeus ândinga, Pumapa kôma, “Rangâi roh, O Pu! Ke neinun in-ang ânriengngei pêk ka ta, hanchu tutu, lei huong ta khom inlang, abâk minlîn thuon nôk ki tih,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôma, “Avien, hi ina hin sanminringna a tung zoi, hi mi khom hih Abraham richi ani sikin.
Miriem Nâipasal hih ânmangngei roka sanminring rang piela juong ani,” a tia.
Hanchu, ha a chongril an rangâi lâiin Jerusalem anâi zoi sik le Pathien Rêngram juong inlang kelen ranga an sabei sikin chongmintêk a misîra.
Hi chong hih a rila, “Mi lien inkhatin rêng changna roi hong lâka hongkîr nôk rangin ram lâtaka a sea.
A se rangtôn chu a suokngei sôm a koia, rângkachak sumdâr a pêk chita, ‘ko hong nôk mâka lei muphung roi’ a tia.
Ania, a ram mingeiin an hengpaia, a nûka palâi an tîra, ‘Hi mi hih kin rêng rangin nuom makme an ti,’” a tia.
Hanchu, rêng an minchang zoiin a hongkîr nôka, idodôr mo an lei muphung rekel rangin a suokngei hah a makunga a koitûpa.
Amotontakpu a honga, “O, Pu, mina pêk hah rângkachak sumdâr sômin ku muphung,” a tia.
A kôma, “No tho min sa, tîrlâm sa ni ni, neinun tômte chunga iem no om sikin, kholien sôm ngei chunga ulienin nang min chang ki tih,” a tipea.
A tîrlâm inikna a honga a kôma, “O Pu, inkhat mina pêk hah rângkachak sumdâr rangngan ku muphung,” a tia.
Hanchu, ama kôma han, “Nang khom khopuilien rangnga ngei chunga ulienin om roh,” a tipea.
Hanchu, adang a honga, “O Pu, en ta, na rângkachak sumdâr mi na pêk hah mâihûinân ku sûna ka darchien.
Mi inngar tak nini sikin nang ki chi ani. Na darloi khom na lâka, nu tuloi khom na ât ngâi” a tia.
A kôma, tîrlâm saloi ni ni, no chong nanâkin theiloi nang amintum. Mi inngar tak ki nia, ka darloi khom ka lâk ngâia, ku tuloi khom ka ât ngâi ni rieta,
anînte, ithomo ku sum hih a pungna ina ne lei dar loi, ko hong nôka hin apung leh ka man rang kêng ani, a tia.
Hanchu, a kôla inding ngei kôma han, “A rângkachak sumdâr lâk pe ungla, sôm adônpu pêk roi,” a tia.
Hanchu, ama'n a kôma, “O Pu, anîn chu rângkachak sumdâr sôm a dôn mo ka ta,” an tia.
Ama han an kôma, “Nangni ki ril, tutu a nei viet kai chu pêk mintam uol nîng a ta, a nei loi kai chu ai dôn viete khom hah lâk pe rip nîng a tih,” a tia.
“Hi ka râlngei, an rêng ranga minuom loi kai chu hong tuong ungla ka makunga that roi a ti” a tia.
Ma chong hah a misîr zoiin chu Jerusalem panin moton ânsa.
Bethphage le Bethany khuo kôl Olive muol a tungin chu, an motona a ruoisi inik a tîra,
“nin motona khuoa son vase ungla, nin lûtin, tute la chuongna ngâi loi sakuording te inthung mûng nin tih, sût ungla hin hongkai roi.
Tukhomin ithomo nin sût tiin an rekelin chu, Pumapa'n a nâng ani tipe roi,” a tia.
Hanchu, an sea Pumapa'n a ti lam ang takin an va mua,

Hanchu an kôma, “Pumapa'n ai nâng ani,” an tia.

A sena rang lampuia khom an puonngei an dâp tira.
Hanchu, Jerusalem tung ranga Olive muol chum rangin chu a ruoisingeiin a sininkhêl sin an mu sikin rôl inring takin Pathien an minpâka.
“Pumapa riminga hong rêngpa chu Pathien'n satvur rese, invâna inngêina lêngin Pathien roiinpui rese,” an tia.

Jisua'n an kôma, “Nangni ki ril, hi ngei hih an dâirekin chu, lungngei tena luo an iniek rang ani,” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu, an tung rangtôn chu, khopui hah a mua a châa.
“Ratha'nngamna chong hih avienni tena luo hin ni riet nita senla chu O! Aniatate mu thei khâi mak chea.
Zora hongtung a tih, na râlngeiin nu rukul bula pil minpôngin nang huolvêl an ta, kil tina nang khap tit an tih.
Nu rukul sûnga ni mingei le nang minmang chit an tih, nu sûnga lung inchuon reng hôi no ni ngei; nang minring ranga Pathien juonglâi ni riet loi sikin,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua'n Biekina ava lûta, neinun juorngei hah a rujûla.
An kôma, “Lekhabua miziekin Pathien'n, Ki in chu chubai thona in tîng an tih, a tia. Ania nangni rêkin chu inrungei khurin kêng nin sin hi,” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua'n anîngtin Biekina a ril ngei ngâia. Ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le mipui ruoipungeiin that rang an bôka.
Hannisenla, mipui ngeiin ningsiet taka a chongril an rangâia bâikhat luo minsam rang an nuom ngâiloi sikin, a tho rang lam man mak ngei.
Sûnkhat chu Jisua'n Biekina mingei a minchua, Thurchi Sa a misîr pe ngei lâiin, Ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le upangei an honga,
a kôma, “Tu rachamin mo hi sin ngei hih no tho, tumo rachamneina nang a pêk?” miril roh an tipea.

John han, Pathien rachamin mo, miriem rachamin mo mi a Baptis ngâi?” a tia.

Miriem rachamin ei ti lakin, hi mipui ngei hin lungin mi dêng an tih, John hah dêipu ani itia an pom sikin, an tia.
Masikin, riet mak meh” tiin an thuona.
Hanchu, Jisua'n an kôma, “kei khomin tu rachamin mo hi sinngei hih ko tho nangni ril uol no ning,” a tia.
Jisua'n hi chongmintêk hi mipui ngei a rila, “Mi inkhatin grape ruhuon a thoa, a donsûingei kôma a chuon inlo rangin a pêka, asôtzan va châm rangin ram danga a sea.
Hanchu grape ramal zora a hong nîn chu a changtum lâk rangin a enkolngei kôma a tîrlâm inkhat a tîra. A enkolngeiin, a tîrlâm hah an jêma, kut korongin an min se nôka.
Hanchu, tîrlâm dang a tîr nôka, ama khom hah an lei jêma, mâimôk ânsak bita, kut korongin an tîr nôka.
Tîrlâm dang, a inthumna a tîr nôka, ama khom hah an lei mophop nenga, an vôrpaia.
Masuole chu grape ruhuon pumapa han, ‘Inmo ko tho rang ani zoi?’ ka nâi moroitak tîr ka ta, ama chu lei jâ ngêt an tih, a tia.
Hannisenla, ruhuon enkolpungei han an lei mu lehan, ‘Hi mi hih a pumapa nâi ani. That ei ti u, hanchu a rochon ei ta nîng a tih’ tiin an inruola
Hanchu ruhuon pêntieng an kelsuoa, an that zoia. Jisua'n, ‘A pumapa han ruhuon enkolpungei hah imo lo ta nih?’” a tia.
“Hong a ta, ha mingei hah that a ta, grape ruhuon hah a enkolpu dangngei pêk a tih,” a tia. Ha chong hah an rieta anîn chu, “Madôrpa chu tho noni ngei nga” an tia.
Jisua'n a en ngeia, an kôma, “Lekhabu'n ai ti hih imo atina? In sin ngeiin an hengpai mangmunboia an ibe hah, a kila lung kâmomtak a chang zoi,” iti hih.
“Tutu ha lung chunga inpal kai chu koichit an ta, ha lungin a dêng ngei vângchu innôi indichit an tih,” a tia.
Balam minchupungei le Ochaisingeiin ma mun renghan Jisua sûr kelen rang an bôka. Hi chongmintêk hih anni demna ani iti an riet sikin. Ania, mipui laka an chia.
Masikin chuminrên an roka, isûra, racham le ranak dônpu Rom Governor kuta an pêk theina rangin mi senkhat misa anga inlêma, Jisua enrichik rangin mi an tîra.
Mangei han a kôma, “Minchupu, ni ti ngei le ni minchuna ngei hih adik. Tute zenuol nei loiin Pathien lungdo chongtak ni minchu ngâi iti kin riet.
Hanchu, Rom Rêng Caesar kôma chôiruol kin chôi hih ei balamin ani mo, ni mak mo? Mi ril roh” an tia.

Hanchu, mipui makunga ite chong achâina sûr mak ngeia, a chongthuon lam hah an kamâma, an dâirek zoi.
Hanchu Saducees senkhat, inthoinôkna omak ti ngâi ngei an honga, Jisua kôma,
“Minchupu, Moses'n, tukhomin a lâibungpân lômnu nei senla, nâi nei loiin thi ta rese, a nâipa'n, ha nupang hah luo nôkin a ulienpa richi rang a min nei rang ani, tiin a mizieka.
Voikhat chu, urêng pasal sari an oma, a ulientakin lômnu a neia, nâi nei loiin a thia.
A innik nân ma nupang hah a luo nôka,
a inthum nân a luo nôka, ha angdêna han a sarina dênin an luoa, nâi nei loiin an thi rieia.
Anûktaka nupangnu khom hah a thi zoia.
Inthoinôk tikin te atu lômnu tak mo ai ni rang ani zoi? An urêngin laka lômnûn an nei chita,” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n “Atûnlai mingei an innei ngâi,
Hannisenla, thina renga inthoinôk theiruo ngei le zora la hong ranga lêng theiruo ngei chu lômnu lômpa innei khâi noni ngei.
Vântîrtonngei angin om an ta, thi thei khâi noni ngei. Thina renga an inthoinôk zoi sikin, Pathien nâingei nîng an ti zoi.
Moses khomin ânthârlakin athia ânthoinôk rang roi chu chîmbuk akânga han Pumapa chu ‘Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, le Jacob Pathien’ tiin a rila.
Ama chu aring ngei Pathien ania, athi ngei Pathien nimak, ma taka han chu mi murdi an ring let sikin,” a tia.
Balam minchupu senkhatin, “Minchupu, nu thuona adik” an tia.
Masuole chu ite rekel ngam khâi mak ngei.
Jisua'n, Messiah hih inmo David Nâipasal ani thei rangtie?
David lele han Lapuibua, “Pumapa han ku Pumapa kôm, Ka changtieng insung roh;
Na râlngei ki sirphân Ka dar mâka chu” a tia.
“David lele khomin ‘Pumapa’ a ti rêka, hante inmo Messiah hah David suonpâr ani thei rangtie,” a tia.
Lokongei chong an rangâi lâiin, a ruoisingei kôma,
“Balam minchupungei renga singthei roi. Kâncholiinchuol inhaka lêng an nuom ngâia, bazar muna chubai inmûk, Synagog-a sukmun hoi, ruolhoi jôla sukmun asa ngên ngâi anni.
Meithâingei sum an sâka, mi huongnân sôt tatak an chubai ngâi; ha ngei han an tuong rang na uol a tih,” a tia.
Jisua'n a en titira, Biekina chôiruol dôngna, minei ngeiin an chôiruol thâk a mua.
Meithâi inriengte'n sumdâr chînte inik a thâklâi khom a mu saa.
“Mi dadangngei nêkin hi meithâi inriengte hin a thâk mintam uol.
Mi dangngei chu an nei minieng kêng an pêk, ania, ama'n chu ai dônsunte, kêng ai pêkrip,” a tia.
Ruoisi senkhat ngeiin Biekin lung ânvo enhoi tie le Pathien kôma an neinunpêk an misîr lâiin, Jisua'n an kôma,
“Nikhuo la hong tung a tih, nin mu ngei murdi amuna oma, lung inchuon reng om no nih,” a tipe ngeia.
Anni han a kôma, “Minchupu, mahah tika mo ai ni rang? Ahongtung rang zora rietna minsinna imo a om rang?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n, “Nangni an huong loina rangin singthei roi. Mi tamtakin Khrista ki ni, azora atung zoi kêng, keima riming pêlin hong an ta, ha mingei hah jûi no roi.
Hanchu, indoi, insuol roi nin riet tikin chi no roi, mahah a tung masa ngêt rang ani, a zoinatak chu la tung kelen no nih,” a tia.
Nam dang le nam dang, ram dang le ram dang indoi an ta;
Muntina ningnupui, mâitâm, ripui lêng a ta, invâna neinun kamâmruoi le ichiom ngei inlang a tih.
Nikhomrese, ma ngei tungmân han nangni sûr an ta, an nuom nangni lông an ta, synagog taka nin roijêk rangin pêng an ta, lung ina nangni khum an tih. Keima sikin rêngngei, roijêkpungei makunga nangni tuong an tih.
Mahah nin ranga Thurchi Sa rilna zora sa nîng a tih.
Lei riet roi, inmo ênpiel rang, inmo ei thuon rangtie tiin nin kângmindoi no roi.
Nin râlngeiin an sût theiloi rang dôrin chong theina le vârna nangni pêng ki tih.
Nin nû, nin pa, nin lâibung, nin sûngsuok, nin ruolngeiin nangni minsûr an ta, senkhat chu nangni that an tih.
Keima sikin mitinin nangni mumâk an tih.
Ania, nin sam sangkhat te luo inmang no nih,
Adetin inding ungla insaninjôk nin tih.
“Hanchu, râlmingeiin Jerusalem an huol nin mu tikin chu a siet rang ani zoi iti riet ta roi.
Matikin chu Judea rama om ngei chu tânga rot rese ngei, asûnga om ngeiin chu suoksan rese ngei, rama om ngei chu khopuiliena lût no rese ngei.
Lekhabua ânziek atung indikna rangin ha nikhuongei chu, ‘Phuba luok ni nîng a tih.’
Nupang nâivongngei le nû nâi rununêk dônngei rangin chu nikhuo intak inthangtak nîng a tih, dûktongna inthang, hi rama hin a juong tung rang sik le Pathien taksina hi mingei chunga atung rang sikin.
Senkhat khandaiin thîng an ta, Adangngei ram tina suokin tuongin om an tih. Hanchu an zora achuk mâka Jerusalem chu Jentailngei sirdênin om a tih.”
“Hanchu, nisa, thâ, ârsi ngeia khin minsinna om a ta, tuikhanglien rahang le tui insôn sikin pilchunga khom jâttin dengthei, lungjîng mintung a tih.
Pilchung pumpuia ichi juong tung mindonin mingei jâmzalin inzal neng an ta, invân-lâijôla neinun bulpui ngei rujûlpai nîng a tih.
Male Miriem Nâipasal inlang a ta, roineina le roiinpui takin sûm lâia juong a tih.
Hanchu, ha ngei hah a juong tung phutin chu inding ungla, tang roi, nin jôkna rang anâi zoi sikin.”
Hanchu, hi chongmintêk hih Jisua'n a rila, “Theichang kung le thingkung dadang ngei mindon roi.
A hong incher innoi nin mûn chu, kholum anâi iti nin riet ngâi.
Ha anghan, ha ngei hong tung nin mûn chu, Pathien Rêngram a juong tung rang ani zoi iti rieng nin tih.
Atûnlâi mingei an thi riei mân ngêtin hi neinunngei hih juongtung a tih, iti riet roi.
Pil le invân boi a ta, ko chong chu boi no nih.”
“Singthei roi, aninon chu, sâk akhoprai le ju inrûi le ringlâi nunkhohoi mindonnân nin mulung sip rai a ta, ha nikhuo hah juong tungrak a tih,
chânga inôk anghan. Ha anghan pilchung muntina mi murdi chunga tung a tih
Ha intakna juong tung rang adamriema nin pal theina rang, ranak nin dôn theina rang le Miriem Nâipasal makunga nin inding theina rangin indînin khotiklâi khomin chubai tho tit ngâi roi,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha sûnngei hah Biekina minchûn a minhek ngâia, kholoi a hong nin chu Olive muola a jân mang rangin a se ngâi.
Anîngtin, jînga a chongril rangâi rangin a kôma Biekina mi murdi an hong ngâi.
Hanchu, cholboi vâipôl ruolhoi, Kalkânkût ruolhoi an iti hah anâi zoia.
Ochaisingei le Balam minchupungeiin mipui an chi sikin inrûka Jisua that rang lam an roka.
Ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia Judas Iscariot an iti ngâi sûnga Soitan a lûta.
Hanchu Ochaisingei le Inkhomin ulienngei kôm a sea, Jisua an sûr theina rang lam a vân kerengpuia.
Anni han an râisân oka, sum pêk rangin an inkhâma.
Hanchu, Judas a nuoma, mipui riet loi kâra minsûr rang chuminrên a rok zoi.
Hanchu, cholboivâipôl ruolhoi, Kalkân kût khalâiot, belrite that rang ni a hong tunga.
Jisua'n hi chong minchôiin Peter le John a tîra. “Se ungla eini sâk rang Kalkân kût va minsûk roi,” a tia
Hanchu a kôma, “Khonmo kin minsûk rang?” an tia.
An kôma, “khopuilien nin lût lehan, mi inkhat bêla tui chôi tong nin ta, a lûtna ina jûipat roi.
Hanchu, in pumapa kôma, ‘Minchupu'n ku ruoisingei leh Kalkân kût kin sâkna rang khâltan khonmo a ti?’ ti roi.
Hanchu, chunginchuon khâltan inzar tak, neinun nâm omsai, nangni min mûng a ta, mahan minsûk roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu an sea, Pumapa'n an kôma a ti lam angin jâtinrêng an mua, mahan kalkân kût an mintuo zoi ani.
Hanchu, asâk zora ahong nîn chu a tîrton sômleinik ngei leh khalâi a ota.
An kôma, “Ku tuong mân, hi Kalkân kût hih nangni sâkpui rang ku nuom sabak ani.
Nangni ki ril, Pathien Rêngrama a tatakin ani mâka chu sâk khâi no ning,” a tia.
Male, kilât a lâka, Pathien kôma râisânchong a ril zoiin chu an kôma, “Hihi lâk ungla buong roi.
Nangni ki ril, Pathien Rêngram a juong tung mâka chu hi uain hih buong khâi no ning,” a tipe ngeia.
Male, vâipôl a lâka, Pathien kôma râisânchong a ril zoiin chu a khoia, a pêk ngeia an kôma, “Hihi ka taksa, ninta ranga ipêk ani. Mi nin riettitna rangin tho ngâi roi” a tia.
Ha angin, an sâk zoiin chu, kilât a lâka, “Hi kilât hih Pathien chongtung thar ki thisena sînthona, ninta ranga bun suok ani,” a tipe ngeia.
Hannisenla, en ta u, ni minsûr rangpu chu ka khalâi otpuipu hih ani.
Pathien mintuo anghan, Miriem Nâipasal chu thîng a tih, ania, a minsûrpu chung chu ântak bah na!
Hanchu an lâia tutakin mo, ma anga tho rang ai ni rang ani zoi? tiin an inrekel inlôma.
Hanchu, ruoisingei lâia a tutak mo alientaka be rang tiin inkhalna a oma.
Jisua'n an kôma, “Jentail rêngngei chu an mingei chunga racham an neia, racham a nei ngei chu ‘mipui ngei mal’ an ti ngâia.
Ania, nangni chu ha anghan nino tunui, nin lâia alientak chu nâipang uolin om senla, ruoipu rang chu tîrlâm angin om rese.
Tumo alien uol, bu nêk ranga insungpu mo, bukhalâi dôpu mo? Bu nêkpu nîng a tih. Ania, kei chu nin lâia tîrlâm angin ko oma.”
“Huong ranga methêmna ko tong kâra ni ompui ngei nin ni.
Ka Pa'n racham ni pêk anghan, racham nangni pêk ki tih.
Ke Rêngrama ko dosânga sâk nan ta, nêk nan ta, Rêngsukmuna insungin Isreal jât sômleinik ngei chunga roijêk nin tih.”
“Simon, Simon, rangâi ta! Butak le arishi an jâp ngâi anga nangni minsîna asa le sie nangni kidik rangin Soitanin phalna a man zoi.
Hannisenla, na taksônna ânsam loina rangin nangni ku chubai pe, ki tieng ni kîr tikin na lâibungngei ni mindet rang ani,” a tia.
Peter'n a thuona, “Pumapa, no kôma intâng ina intâng rang le athi rang khomin kên phal,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Peter, nang ki ril, avienjân hin, voithum riet ngâi mu-ung ni ti mâka chu âr khuong no nih,” a tipea.
Hanchu, Jisua'n an kôma, “Sumkok, choli, kekok, boia nangni ki tîr lâia han imo nin insama?” tiin a rekela, “Ite insam mak me” an tia.
Jisua'n atûn chu, sumkok, choli, anei khomin chôi ta roi, khandai nei loi khomin a kâncholi zuor senla rochôk rese.
Nangni ki ril, Lekhabu'n, “Ama chu mi nunsiengei lâia telsa ani zoi” itia ku chung roi miziek hah, ku chunga ai tung indik rang ani.
Ruoisingeiin a kôma, “Pumapa, en ta, hin khandai inik a om” an tia. Ahun a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu, a tho ngâi lam angin, khopuilien a mâka, Olive muola a sea, ruoisingei khomin an jûia.
Amun an tungin chu an kôma, “Huongna nin lût loina rangin chubai roi” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu, an kôm renga lunga dêngphâkna tena a vân thîna, khûkinbilin chubai a thoa.
“O Pa, nu nuomin chu hi dengtheina kilât hih ko kôm renga khâi roh. Nikhomrese, keima racham ni loiin, na racham tak ni rese” a tia.
Hanchu, vântîrton invân renga a kôma a juong inlâra, râtna a juong pêka.
Ngâisiet inrikin, ningsiet uolin a chubaia, a rathan khom thisen angin pila a masara.
Hanchu, chubai thona renga inthoiin ruoisingei kôma a sea, sabeidonga a inin a va mu ngeia.
An kôma, “Ithomo nin in? Inthoi ungla, huongna nin tâk loina rangin chubai roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua a la chong lâiin ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia Judas hong tuong mipui an hong tunga, Jisua tum rangin a kôma a honga.
Jisua'n a kôma, “Judas, Miriem Nâipasal hi atumin minsûr rang ni ti mo?” a tia.
Hanchu, a kôma ruoisi om ngei han, neinun omtie an mûn chu a kôma, “Pumapa, kin khandai mang ni ung mo?” tiin an rekela.
Hanchu an lâia inkhatin Ochai Inlaltak tîrlâm a chang tienga kuor a leng pea.
Ania, Jisua'n “Ahun zoi” a tia. Ha mi kuor hah a tôna a mindam pe zoi.
Hanchu, a kôma hong Ochaisingei, Biekin ulienngei, upangei, a sûr ranga hong ngei kôma Jisua'n, “Khandaingei, tôkmolngei ichôiin, puoloi sûr rang leh in-ang bangin nin hong na?
Nîngtin Biekina nin kôm ko oma, ni sûr rang ti mak cheia. Ania, ijîng rachamneinân roi ajêk lâi hih nin sin tho zora ani,” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu, Jisua an sûra, Ochai Inlaltak ina an tuonga, Peter'n alazanin a jûia.
In khalâidung alâitak han mei an thoa, mei rihila insungruma mei uot ngei lâia han Peter khom a vân sunga.
Nupang tîrlâm inkhatin mei kunga ânsung a mua, a mitjuoka, “Hi mi khom hih Jisua kôma om ngâi mi ani,” a tia
Peter'n, “Nupang, ama hah riet luo riet ngâi mu-ung” tiin a minlêma.
Anangkan uola chu mi inkhatin Peter kôma, “Nang khom an lâia mi ni ni” a tia. Peter'n, “Miriem, kei chu ni mu-ung” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu dârkârkhat suole chu midangin, “Ite okchâna boi riekin hi mi khom hih Jisua kôma om ngâi ani, Galilee mi ani sikin” ati ngita.
Ania Peter'n, “Miriempa, ni ti ngei hah riet mu-ung” tiin a thuona. Harenghan a la chong lâi takin âr akhuong zoia.
Hanchu Pumapa hah ânheia, Peter a en ngita. Hanchu, Peter'n Pumapa'n a kôma, “Avien jân âr akhuong mân voithum ni ipdel ni tih,” ai tipe hah a rietsuoka.
Hanchu, Peter a jôkpaia, a chap ngungui zoi.
Hanchu, a sûrngei han Jisua tusiem thonân an manga, an jêma.
A mâi an hîp pea, “Ti roh, tumo nang a jêm?” tiin an rekela.
A chunga demna chong tamtak an thoa.
Hanchu, khuo avâr lehan, upangei, Ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei an intûpa, an roijêkna Jisua an hong tuonga,
a kôma, “Ni ril roh, Messiah nini mo?” an tia. Jisua'n, “Nangni ril khom inlang iem no tunui,” tiin a thuona.
“Chong nangni rekel khom inlang ni thuon no tunui.
Ania, atûn renga Miriem Nâipasal hih Râtinchung Pathien chang tieng insung a tih zoi” a tia.
An rêngin, “Nônte Pathien Nâipasal mo na ni,” an tia. An kôma, “Ani mi nin ti zoi hate” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu, “Ite rietpuipu dang nâng khâi mak me, eini rengin a ti ei riet zoi,” an tia.
Hanchu, ântûpngei murdi an inthoia, Pilat makunga Jisua an tuonga.
“Hi mi hin, kin mingei anôk tieng a ruoia, Caesar kôma khom chôiruol chôi no roi,” a tipea. “Mapêna, ama reng Messiah rêng ki ni ântia, kin sûr ani,” tiin an nôna.
Pilat'n, “Judangei rêng mo nani?” tiin a rekela. Hanchu, “Ani, mi ni ti zoi hate” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu, Pilat'n, Ochaisingei le mipui ngei kôma, “Hi mi hih theiloi mintumna rang abi reng mu mu-ung” a tipe ngeia.
Hannisenla, anni han, “Galilee ram renga phutin hi mun dên rakin Judea ram pumpuia, a minchua, a minjêla,” tiin an nôn uol uola.
Hanchu, Pilat'n ha chong hah a riet lehan, “Galilee mi mo ni ni” tiin a rekela.
Galilee rama mi ani iti a rietin chu, Herod kôma a tîra; Herod khom Jerusalema a om lâitak ani.
Jisua a mûn chu a râisân oka, a thurchi a lei rieta, amu rang a nuomna a lei sôt zoi sikin. Jisua sininkhêl mu rang khom a sabei sa ani.
Masikin, Herod'n chong rekelna tamtak a neia, ania, Jisua'n thuon maka.
Ochai Inlalngei le Balam minchupungei mântieng an hôn thîna, Jisua an nôn uol uola.
Herod le a râlmingeiin Jisua an phenênga, esêl takin tusiem thonân an manga; male kancholi inchuol an minhaka, Pilat kôm an tîr nôk zoi.
Hâni lelea han Herod le Pilat hah mal an inchanga, ma mâna han chu râla lei om an ni.
Hanchu, Pilat'n Ochaisingei, ruoipungei, mipui ngei a koitûpa.
An kôma, “Hi mi hin mipui ngei aletieng a ruoisiet, tiin ko kôm nin hong tuonga, ania, hin nin makung renga ke ena, nin nôn lam angin ite theiloina man mu-ung.
Herod khomin a theiloina man maka, masikin ei kôma a hongtîr nôk ani. Athina rang dôrin hi mi hin ite tho minchâina nei mak.
Masikin jêm ka ta mojôk ki tih” a tia.
(Kalkân kût rachamin Pilat'n mi intâng inkhat an rangin a mojôk pe ngâi ani)
Mipui ngeiin an hêta, “That roh, kin rangin Barabbas mi mojôk pe roh” an tia.
Barabbas chu khopuia injêlna le mithat sika jêlina intâng ani.
Pilat'n chu Jisua mojôk rang a nuom sikin, mipui ngei kôma atharin a ti nôka.
Hannisenla, an hêtkhuma, “Khrosa jêmdel roh, Khrosa jêmdel roh” an tia.
Pilat'n, avoithumnân, an kôma, “Imo a tho minchâina? Athina rangin a minchâina mu mu-ung! jêm ka ta, mojôk ki tih,” a tia.
Hannisenla, rôl inring theidôrin, Jisua chu khrosa jêmdel rangin an ti ngita. Hanchu an iniekin a mene zoia.
An ngên lam angin Pilat'n aroi a masata;
an nuom lam angin, injêlna sika mithata intângpu a mojôk pea, Jisua chu an ning an nuoma an lo rangin an kôma a pêk ngei zoi.
Hanchu, râlmingeiin Jisua an tuonga, an se lâiin a riming Simon Cyrene mi khosûng renga khopuilien hong pan an tonga. An sûra, khros an min ruputa, Jisua nûka an min lôna.
Mipui tamtakin an jûia, an lâia nupang senkhat ngei chu an châa, an chapa.
Jisua'n an tieng ânheia, “Jerusalem nupangngei o, micha no roi, nangni le nin nâingei rangin chap roi.
Nikhuo a hong tung tir zoi, mingeiin, ‘nupang a chingngei, nâi vong ngâi loi ngei, nâi neiloingei chu an ralvân asa pe bah na!’ la tîng an tih.
Ha tikin chu mingeiin muolngei kôma, ‘Ni del roh,’ la tîng an tih. Muolngei kôma, ‘Ni thup roh’ la tîng an tih.
Thing aringa luo hi ang takin a thôn te, achâr vanga te i ang takin mo tho ta nih,” a tia.
Hanchu, midang inik, mipuoloi, ama leh that sa rangin an tuonga.
Hanchu, “Luru mun” an ti mun an tungin chu mahan Jisua khrosa an jêmdela, mipuoloi inik a voitieng inkhat a chang tieng inkhat.
Jisua'n, “O Pa, ngâidam ngei roh, imo an tho an riet loi kêng,” a tia. Hanchu taruo sânin a puon an insema.
Hanchu mipui indingin an thîra, Juda ruoipungeiin, “Mi dangngei chu a mojôk ngâia, Pathien ithang, ani tatakin chu, a thenin jôk rese” tiin an êroa.
Râlmingei khomin an khorâia; a kôma an honga ju thûr an pêka.
A chunga, “Judangei rêng na nîn chu ne theiin jôk roh bah!” an tia.
A chunga, “Hi mi hih Judangei Rêng ani” iti miziek a oma.
Mipuoloi inkhat an makhâi han êro chongin a kôma, “Messiah nimak che mo? jôk inla, keini khom mi mojôk sa roh” a tia.
Inkhatpa han a ngoa a kôma, “Pathien ni chi loi mo? Ama leh in-ang banga dûk min mintong hih.
Eini chu ei sintho man ei man rangtum piel ei man ani, aniatachu, ama chu ite tho minchâina nei mak,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua kôma, “Jisua Rêngin nu juong tikin ni riettit roh,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua'n a kôma, “Chong kên khâm, avien ko kôma Paridise'a om ni tih,” a tipea.
Hanchu, sûnlâi dâr sômleinik renga kholoi dârthum dênin, nisa avâr ân ngama, ram pumpui a jîngkhap zoi.
Hanchu, Biekina puonjâr hah inikin a kêrphata.
Jisua'n rôl inring takin ânieka, “O Pa, na kuta ka ratha ka bâng,” a tia. Mahah a ti zoiin chu a rang achat zoi.
Hanchu, râlmi ulienpu han neinun omtie a mûn chu, “Inkhel loiin midik ani khet” tiin Pathien a minpâk zoia.
Ha enhoi ithîra mipui intûpngei han neinun omtie an mûn chu, ngâisieta rôp ruchumin an in tieng an kîr nôk zoi.
Jisua mêlrietngei le nupangngei murdi Galilee ram renga ama hong jûingeiin lâtaka indingin an thîra.
Hanchu Judea ram, Arimathea khuo mi a riming Joseph a oma. Ama hah midik, mi mirit om, Pathien Rêngram juong tung rang lei ngâk mi ania. Roijêkpungei lâia mi inkhat nikhomrese an roi masat lam le an sintho lam nuom loi mi ani.

Pilat kôma a sea Jisua ruok a zonga.
Hanchu ruok hah a musuma, rosom puonin a thoma, thân, lungkuo ihel tute la minjâlna ngâi loia a min jâla.
Hanchu, sûn rangnga ni ania, Sabath ni phut rang ani zoia.
Galilee ram renga nupang Jisua hong jûi ngei hah Joseph ngei leh an sea, thân le Jisua ruok an dar tie khom an mua.
Hanchu ina an sea, mirimhoi le sariekngei ruok pol rangin an sinsiema. Balam angin Sabathnin chu an ingam zoi.
Pathienni jîng, inmâna, nupangngeiin mirimhoi an sin hah chôiin thâna an sea.
Thân kotbâia lung hah inluoipai sân an va mua.
Hanchu, an lûta, ania, Pumapa Jisua ruok chu mu khâi mak ngei.
Mahan mulungjîngin an indinga, harenghan, mi inik puon chek insilin an kôla an juong indinga.
Nupangngei han rolo innîkin nuoia an inbok raka, anni han an kôma, “Ithomo mi ring hah mithingei lâia nin irok?
Hin om khâi maka, ânthoinôk zoi. Galilee rama a om lâia nin kôma ai ti ngei hah riettit roi.
Miriem Nâipasal hih mi nunsie ngei kuta ipêk nîng a ta, jêmdel an ta, a sûnthum nîn a ringin inthoi nôk a tih” an tia.
Hanchu, nupangngei han ai ti ngei hah an rietsuok nôka,
thân renga an kîra, neinun omtie ngei chu ruoisi sômleikhat ngei le midangngei an rila.
Nupangngei hah Mary Magdalene, Joanna, le Mary, Jacob nungei anni. Anni le nupang adang an kôma omngei han tîrtonngei hah an ril ani.
Ania nupangngei chongril hah, chongkâmboi an tia, taksôn mak ngei.
Nikhomrese, Peter chu ân thoilita, thân tieng a tâna, ân kûna, rosom puon injuot tiloi chu ite dang mu maka. Hanchu, neinun omtie ngei kamâmin in tieng a kîr nôk zoi.
Ma ni nanâk han Jisua jûi ngâi mi inik Emmau khuoa an sea, Jerusalem renga kilometer sômleikhat dôra la ani.
An ruonin neinun omtie ngei hah an misîra.
Ha anga an chonga an misîr lâiin, Jisua lelên a hong nâia an kôma a lôna.
An mua chu riet minthâr mak ngei.
Ama'n an kôma, “Lampuia nin misîr hah ithurchi mini?” a tia. Hanchu mâi inngûi riemin an indinga.
Hanchu, a riming Cleopas han a kôma, “Jerusalema sûnkhat vai mo no om? Sûntômte lei vuna neinun omtie ngei hah ni riet loi mo?” tiin a rekela.
“I neinun mo?” a tia. “Nazareth Jisua chunga neinun tungngei hah; ha mi hah Pathien le mitin mindon khoma jâttinrêng ai ti le ai sin, racham inei dêipu ania,
kin Ochaisingei le ruoipungeiin that rangin an pêka, an jêmdela.
Ama hah Isreal minjôk rang mi nîng a tih iti kin tûnga. Mapêna, ha anga neinun tungna hah avien hin a sûnthumni ani zoi.
Kin champui nupang senkhat, jînga thân va en ngeiin kin mulung an minjînga.
A ruok mu loiin an hongkîr nôka, vântîrton inlâr kin mua, a ring nôk zoi an ti, an hong tia.
Hanchu, kin champui senkhat ngeiin thâna an va sea, nupangngei ti lam anghan an va mua, ama chu mu khâi mak ngei” an tia.
Male, Jisua'n an kôma, “Amo ngei o, dêipungei neinuntin an lei rilngei hah idôra a iem innu mo nin ni?
Messiah han ha ngei murdi tuongin a roiinpuina ai lût rang nimak mo?” a tia
Hanchu, Jisua'n ama chungroi, Moses lekhabu renga dêipungei lei miziek lekhabungei a rilminthâr pe ngeia.
Hanchu, an sêna rang khuo an hong nâi zoia, Jisua hah la se bang rang angin a oma,
Nikhomrese bâiin an sûra, “Kin kôma om ta roh, sûn aheka ajîng rang kêng ani zoi” an tia. Hanchu an kôma om rangin a se zoi.
Hanchu, an kôma sâk rangin ânsung lâiin vâipôl a lâka, sat a vura, a khoia, a pêk ngeia.
Hanchu an mit a hong vâra, an rietminthâr zoia, hannirese, an mitmu renga ânmang nôk kelena.
“Lampuia ei kôma, Mi chongpuia, lekhabungei mi rilminthâr pe lâia han mei a kâng angin om mak me mo?” tiin an inrekela.
Harenghan, an inthoia, Jerusalema an kîr nôka, ruoisi sômleikhat ngei le Adangngei lei intûp an va mua.
“Pumapa chu ânthoinôk tatak; Simon kôma khom ânlâr zoi” an lei tia.
Hanchu, ha inik ngei khom han, lampuia neinun omtie le vâipôl a khoia Pumapa an rietminthâr tie an rilminthâr ngei zoi.
Hanchu, mi inik ngei han an la ril lâitakin, harenghan Pumapa lele an lâia ândinga an kôma, “Nin chunga ratha'ngamna om rese” a tia.
An jâminzal sabaka, khori an mûn an mindona.
Hanniresea, an kôma, “Ithomo nin mulung nin minjînga? Ithomo nin mulunga iem zoiloina nin inei?
Ka kut, ke kephangei en ta u, keima nanâk hah ki ni hih! Ni tôn ungla, en roi, minin mu anghan khori'n taksa le ru nei mak” a tia.
Hanchu, mahah a ti zoiin chu, a kut le a kephangei a min en ngeia.
An râisân rai sikin taksôn thei kelen mak ngeia, an kamâm sabak lâiin an kôma, “Asâk ruo imokhat mo nan nei?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Nga suong sai tangkhat an pêka.
Alâka, an mu chungin a sâka.
Hanchu, an kôma, “Hi chongngei lele hih ani, nin kôma ko om lâia ku chungroi Moses Balam lekhabua miziek, Dêipungei miziek, Minpâkna labua miziek, a hongtung dik rang nangni ke lei ril ngâi hah,” a tia.
Hanchu, lekhabua ânziekngei an riet theina rangin an mulungrîlngei a mo-ong pe ngeia.
An kôma, “hi angin miziek ani, Messiah han dûk tuong a ta, sûnthum suole thina renga inthoi nôk a tih.
Ama rimingin insîrna le nunsie ngâidamna thurchi Jerusalem renga namtin kôma misîr nîng a tih.
Ha neinunngei murdi rietpuipu nin ni.
Hanchu, ka Pa ânkhâm hah keima rengin nin chunga juongtîr ki tih, hannirese, chungtieng renga sinthotheina nin chunga a chum mâka chu khopuilien ha nin ngâk tit rang ani,” a tia.
Hanchu, khopuilien renga Bethany dênin a ruoi ngeia, mahan a bân a phara, sat a vur ngeia.
Ha anga sat a vur lâitakin, ânsenpui ngeia, ama chu invâna tuongin a om zoi.
Hanchu chubai an mûka, râisân takin Jerusalema an kîrnôk zoi.
Hanchu, Biekina Pathien kôma râisânchong rilin an zorangei murdi an mang zoi.
Aphutna taka han chong alei oma; ma chong ha Pathien kôm aoma, Chong ha ke Pathien ani.
Aphutna tak renga han chong hah Pathien kôm ke aom ani.
Neinunngei murdi Pathien sin riempet an nia, ama sin loi neinun inkhat luo omak.
Ma Chong ha ke ringna bulpui ani, male ma ringna hah munisi ngei minvârpu ani.
Ma vâr han ijîng a êlminvâra, ijîng han lei khap thei mak.
Pathien'n a thangtheipu inkhat a juong tîra, a riming chu John ani,
ha mi han vâr thurchi mingei min riet ranga juong ani, ama sikin mitinin an iem theina rangin.
Ama hah vâr chu nimaka; vâr thurchi mingei min riet ranga juong ani.
Mahi vâr diktak chu ani; rammuola a juonga mingei murdi minvârpu hi.
Chong hah rammuola aoma, male Pathien'n Chong mangin rammuol ha sin khomsenla, rammuolin lei riet thei maka.
A mingei nanâk kôm a juonga, aniatachu a mingeiin lei modôm mak ngei.
Hankhoma ama modôm ngei kai le ama iem ngei chu Pathien nâi nina a pêk ngei zoi.
Ha mingei hah chu thisena inzir nimak ngeia, taksa nuomlama ânzir khom nimak ngeia, munisi ngei pa nuomlama ânzir khom ni uol mak ngei; Pathien ha kêng an Pa ani.
Hanchu, Chong hah munisi juong changin, moroina le chongtaka sipin ei lâia a juong om zoi. A roiinpuina ei mua, Pathien Nâikhât roiinpuina a man hah.
John'n a chungroi a misîra, ân ieka, Hi mi thurchi hih ki misîr ani, “Ku nûka juong rangpu hi keima nêka lien uol ani, kên zir mâna a lei om sai ani sikin,” a tia.
A lungkham satvurna akipin ei rêngin ei changa, moroina chunga moroi nôkna.
Pathien'n Balam chongpêk Moses a pêka, aniatachu moroina le chongtak chu Jisua Khrista sikin ahong om ani.
Tutên Pathien la mu mak ngeia. A Nâikhât vai, Pathien ân angpui le Pa tienga om ngêt han, a thurchi a min riet zoi.
Jerusalema Juda rachamneipungei han, “John, hah tumo ani?” ti rekel rangin ochaingei le Levi richisuonpârngei an tîra.
John'n ânthârtakin, “Messiah chu ni mu-ung” a lei tipe ngeia.
“Nônte, Tumo ni ni? Elijah mo ni ni?” tiin an rekela. “Ni mu-ung,” tiin a thuon ngeia. “Dêipu mo ni ni?” tiin an rekela. “Ni mu-ung,” tiin a thuona.
“Nônte tumo ni ni? mi hongtîr ngei chong kin mele theina rangin mi ril roh. Nu thurchi hi i angin mo ni ti?” an tia.
John'n dêipu Isaiah chong mangin a thuona: “Keima hi ramchâra mi inkhat tânghâipu ha ki ni: Pumapa lônna rang lampui mintûn roi!”
Ma thangtheipungei, Phariseengei hongtîr ngei han John an rekel nôka,
hanchu “Messiah ni ni noa, Elijah mo, Dêipu mo luo ni ni nônte ithomo mi na baptis ngâia?” tiin an rekela.
John'n a thuona, “Keiman chu tui leh ka baptis'a, hannirese nin lâia hin nin riet loi mi inkhat ânding chiena.
Ama hah ku nûka a juong rang ania, kei chu a kekokrûi sût rang luon inhoi mu-ung,” a tia.
Mangei hah Bethany khuo nisuo tieng Jordan tuidung râla, John'n a baptisna ngâi muna atung ani.
Anangtûka chu John'n Jisua a kôm hongin a mua male, “En ta u, Pathien Belrite rammuol sietna pêl rangpu soh,” a tia.
Hi mi chungroi hih ani, “Mi ku nûka a juong a oma, aniatachu keima nêka lien uol ani, keima kên zir mâna a omsai ani sikin, ki ti hah.
Tumo ani rang riet mu-ung, nikhomsenla, Israel mingei min riet rangin tuia baptis rangin ku juong ani.”
Male John'n hi thurchi hih a misîra: “Ratha hah invân renga juong chumin vasu angin a chunga a juong chum ku mu.
Atûntena keiman chu la riet thei mu-ung, nikhomrese tuia mi baptis ranga mi tîrpu Pathien'n, Ratha hah invân renga juong chumin mi inkhat chunga chuongin mini mûng na ta; ama hih Ratha Inthienga leh mi baptis rangpu ha ani.”
John'n, “Ama hah ku mu zoi, Nangni ki ril, ama hah Pathien Nâipasal ani,” a tia.
Anangtûka chu mahan John ha a ruoisi inik ngei lehan ânding nôka,
Jisua lôn lâitak a mu lehan. “En ta u, Pathien Belrite soh!” a tia.
Ma ruoisi inik ngei han a thurchi misîr an rieta Jisua leh an se kelena.
Jisua ân heia, an hongjûi a mûn chu an kôm, “Khoimo nin rok?” a tipe ngeia. Anni han, “Rabbi, khonmo no om ngâi,” tiin an thuona. (Rabbi ti chu “Minchupu” tina ani).
Ama han, “Hong ungla en roi,” tiin a thuona. (ma zora ha chonûktieng dâr minli inring dôr ani.) Masuole chu an jûia a omna an mua, male mani sûna zora kai chu ama leh an mang minhek zoi.
An lâia inkhat ha chu Andrew, Simon Peter lâibungpa ani.
Ama han a upa Simon a mu kelena a kôm, “Messiah hah kin mu zoi,” a tia. (hi chongbâi aomtie chu “Khrista” tina ani.)
Hanchu ama'n Simon hah Jisua kôm a tuonga. Jisua'n Simon hah a lei ena, “Ni riming chu Simon, John nâipasal ni ni, hannirese Kephas, tiin nang koi an ti zoi,” a tia. (Ma hih Peter tina leh munkhat ania, aomtie chu “lungpui” tina ani.)
Anangtûka chu Jisua Galileea se rangin a masata, Philip a mua, “Ni jûi roh a tipea!”
(Philip ha Andrew le Peter omna khopui Bethsaida mi ani.)
Philip han Nathanael a mua a kôm, “A thurchi Moses'n Balam lekhabua a lei miziek le dêipungei khomin an miziek Joseph nâipasal Nazareth Jisua hah kin mu zoi,” tiin a rila.
Nathanael'n a kôm, “Nazareth taka neinun sa asuok thei mini?” tiin a rekela. Philip'n a kôm, “Hongin la, en roh,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n Nathanael a kôma hong a mua, a chungroi a misîra, “Ama hi Israel mi diktak; dikloina reng dôn loi ani!” a tia.
Nathanael'n, “Kho angin mo mi ni riet?” tiin a rekela. Jisua'n a kôm, “Philip'n nang a koi mân theichang kung nuoia no om lâihan nang ku mu zoi,” tiin a thuona.
Nathanael'n a kôm, “Minchupu,” “Pathien Nâipasal ni ni! Israelngei Rêngpa ni ni!” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a tia, “Theichang kung nuoia no om lâia nang ku mu kêng ani zoi nang ki ti sikin ni iem mini? Hi nêka neinun roiinpui uol ok la mûng ni tih!” a tipea.
Male Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongtak nangni ki ril: invân ajuon onga, Miriem Nâipasal chunga vântîrtonngei an juong chum le an kal, la mûng nin tih,” a tia.
Sûnnik suole chu Galilee ram sûnga Cana khopuia inneina aoma. Jisua nû khom mahan a oma,
Jisua le a ruoisingei khom inneina han an siel ngei sa.
Uain an hun khâiloi lehan, Jisua nû han a kôm, “Uain an insam zoi kêng hi,” a tia.
“Khoimo ko tho rang mi ni ril rang nâng mak,” Jisua'n, “Ko zora la tung mak.” tiin a thuona.
Jisua nû han tîrlâmngei kôm han, “Nangni a bê murdi tho roi,” tiin a ril ngeia.
Judangei rusûk minsâi balam an dôn anghan lung tuibêl uruk mahan aoma, an sika liter razakhat keng theina chit an ni.
Jisua'n tîrlâmngei kôm, “Tuibêlngei han tui min sip roi,” a tia, anni ngei han an min sipmata,
male an kôm, “Atûn chu thâl ungla, moiruoipu kôm se pui roi,” tiin a ril ngeia. Ama kôm han tui ha an chôia,
maha uain ahong chang zoia, moiruoipu khom han a tem vika. Uain ha kho renga hong mini riet mak (aniatachu, tui thâla an mang, tîrlâmngeiin chu an rieta); masikin mâkpa hah a koia,
male a kôm, “Mitinin uain sa an sem baka, nûk tieng khuolmingeiin an buong suo nûkin chu uain sa bâkloi an sem ngâia. Aniatachu, nangman chu atûn tena uain sa na la sem banga!” a tipea.
Hi sininkhêl hih Jisua'n Galilee rama Cana khopuia motontaka a sin ani; mahan a roiinpui tie ân phuonga a ruoisingeiin ama an iem zoia.
Masuole chu, Jisua le a nû, a lâibungngei, male a ruoisingei Capernaum tieng an sea, mahan môrkhat chu an om zoi.
Judangei Kalkân Kût anâi zoia, masikin Jisua Jerusalema a sea.
Mahan Pathien Biekina serâtngei, kêl le belringei khom, male pharvali juorngei le sumthûlngâingei an dosângngei kôla an insung a mua.
Masikin rûiruol a jêmna rang a sina, kêl, belringei le serâtngei an reng rêngin Pathien Biekin renga a mojôk ngei heta; sumthûlngâingei an sumdârngei khom a cheknôineka, an dosângngei khom a nam melet pe ngeia,
male pharvali juorngei kôm han chong a pêk ngeia, “Mangei hih hi mun renga hin chôipai roi! Ka Pa in hih sadâi munin sin khâi no roi!” a tia.
“O Pathien, ni in ranga kên pêkna hin, ku sûnga hin mei angin mi kâng ani,” tia ânziek ha a ruoisingei han an rietsuok nôk zoi.
Juda rachamneipungei han chongrekel leh a kôm an hong kîr nôka, “Hima anga tho rangin racham no dôn tiin i sininkhêl thôn mo, mi ni min mu rang?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Hi Biekin hih set ungla, male sûnthumin sin minding nôk ki tih,” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu Judangei han, “Hi Biekin sinna rangin kum sômminli leiruk anânga! Nangman sûnthumin ni sinminding nôk thei rang mo?” tiin an rekela.
Aniatachu Jisua'n biekin a ti hah ama takpum ke a tina ani.
Masikin thina renga ân thoinôkin chu, a ruoisingeiin hi thurchi hih a lei misîr suozoi, ani ti an riet suoka, Pathien lekhabua chong le Jisua'n a lei ti sai ngei ha an iem zoi.
Jisua Kalkân Kûta Jerusalema aom lâiin mi tamtakin a sininkhêl tho hah an mu sikin ama an iem zoia.
Hannirese Jisua'n ha mi ngei hah a riet ngei let sikin an chunga taksôn zoi maka.
Mangei mulungrîlngeia han khoimo aom ama'n a riet var sikin tutên, mangei chungroi hah an ril rang nâng mak.
Hanchu Phariseengei pâl kâra mi inkhat a riming Nicodemus Judangei ruoipu aoma.
Jân khat chu Jisua kôm a sea, a kôm, “Rabbi, Pathien juongtîr Minchupu ni ni ti kin riet. Pathien an chunga aom nônchu tutên nangma angin sininkhêlngei hih tho thei no ni ngei,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Chongdiktak nang ki ril: tutu khom a suok nôk nônchu Pathien Rêngram mu thei no ni ngei,” tiin a thuona.
Nicodemus'n a rekela, “Kho angin mo mi ulien a chang suo nûkin a suok nôk thei rang? A nû sûnga lûtin voinik suok thei no nih!” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Chongdiktak nang ki ril ani. Tukhom tui le Ratha'n a suok nôk nônchu Pathien Rêngram lût thei no nih.
Taksân ânzir kai chu taksa mi an nia, Ratha'n ânzir kai chu ratha mi an ni.
Nu suok nôk rang kêng ki ti hih kamâm aom ti no roh.
Phâivuo hih anuomna ti-tieng asêma; arahang khom ni riet, aniatachu khotieng renga hong mo, khotieng mo ase rang riet mak che. Ma angdên hah ani, tukhom Ratha'n a suok nôk nônchu,” a tipea.
Nicodemus'n, “Kho angin mo anithei ranga?” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Israelngei lâia minchupu lien ni nia, hima roi hih ni riet minthâr theiloi mini?
Chongdiktak nang ki ril: kin ti hih kin riet ania, kin mu hih kin ril ani; hannoma, kin thurchi misîr tutên pom nuom mak chei.
Rammuola neinunngei chungroi ki misîr luo nin iem nônchu; i angin mo invân neinunngei chungroi ki misîr hin nin iem thei ranga?
Invân renga juong chumpu, Miriem Nâipasal tiloiin chu, tute invâna lei hong se sai la om mak ngei.”
Moses'n ramchâra sumdâr murûl a târ anghan Miriem Nâipasal khom târin a om ngêt rang ani,
masika han tukhom ama iem kai chu kumtuong ringna an dôn theina rangin.
Pathien'n rammuol a lungkham tatak sikin a Nâipasal khât a pêka, masika han tukhom ama iem kai chu thi loia kumtuong ringna an dôn theina rangin.
Pathien'n rammuol theiloi mintum rangin a Nâipasal juongtîr maka, rammuol sanminring rangin kêng a juongtîr ani.
Tukhom Nâipasal a iem kai chu theiloi intumin om no ni ngeia, tukhom a iem loi ngei chu atûn renga theiloi changin an om zoi, Pathien Nâikhât an iem loi sikin.
Mahi theiloi intumna chu ani: vâr ha rammuola ajuonga, aniatachu, mingeiin avâr nêkin ajîng an midit uola, an sinthongei hah asaloi sikin.
Tukhom sin saloi tho ngei nâmin chu avâr an henga, avâra hong ngâi mak ngei; asaloi an thongei hah minlang an nuom loi sikin.
Aniatachu, adik sinpu ngeiin chu Pathien chongjômna sintho an ni ti avârin a minlang theina rangin avâra an hong ngâi.
Masuole chu, Jisua hah a ruoisingei leh Judea ramhuola an sea, mahan môrkhat an lâia omin baptis a thoa.
John khomin Aenon, Salim khuo kôla han mi a baptis ngâia, ma muna han tui atam sikin. Mingei a kôm an sea, male ama'n a lei baptis ngei ngâia.
(Ma zora han John ha intângna ina la khum mak ngei.)
Hanchu John ruoisi senkhatngei le Juda inkhat rusûk minsâina balam roia an inkhala.
Masikin John kôm an sea, “Minchupu, Jordan râl nisuo tienga no kôma om, a chungroi ni misîr ngâi hah na la riet mo? Asa, atûnhin, ama'n mi a baptis'a mi murdi ama tieng kêng an se suo zoi!” an tia.
John'n a thuona, “Miriemin ite dôn mak me, Pathien'n a pêk ani nônchu.
‘Keima hi Messiah ni mu-ung, aniatachu, a motona tîr ki ni’ ti hih nangni ngei reng hi ki rietpuipu nin ni.
Moi puma chu mâkpa hah ani; hannirese mâkpa mal, a kôla ândinga a he a rangâichaka, a rôl a rietin chu a râisân tatak ngâi. Ma angdên han ka râisâna mikhipin aom ani.
Ama chu a hôn lal tetet ngêt rang ania, keima chu ko hôn tem tetet rang ani.”
Chung tieng renga juongpu chu mi murdi nêka ânchungtak ani. Pila inzir chu pilchung mi ani, pilchung roi a misîr ngâi, hannirese, invân renga juongpu chu mi murdi nêka an chungtak ani.
A mu le a riet ngei a misîra, hannoma, tutên a thurchi misîr pom mak ngei.
Aniatachu, a thurchi misîr a pom kai chu Pathien chu mi diktak ani ti a nammindet ani.
Pathien tîrpu'n chu Pathien chong a misîr ngâi, Pathien'n ama Ratha akipin a pêk sikin.
Pa'n a Nâipasal a lungkham ngâia, neinunngei murdia a racham nuoia a dar let zoi.
Tukhom Nâipasal a iem kaiin chu kumtuong ringna an dôn zoi; tukhom Nâipasal chongjômloi chu ringna dôn no ni ngeia, Pathien dûkmintongna nuoia kêng an om rang.
Phariseengei han John nêkin Jisua ruoisi atam uol, ama'n tui leh mi a baptis a min tam uol ti an riet zoia.
(Adikin, Jisua'n chu tute baptis maka; a ruoisingei vaiin ke mi an baptis ngâi ani.)
Masikin Jisua'n ha anga an ti hah a rietin chu Judea ram a mâka Galilee tieng a kîr nôka;
a se tieng Samaria ram palin a se rang anâng ani.
Samaria ram sûnga han khopui inkhat Sychar an ti han a hong tunga, Jacob'n a nâi Joseph mun a pêkna kôl hah ani.
Jacob tuikuong khom mahan aoma, Jisua'n a lam lônna a sôl sikin ha tuikuong kôla han ânsung raka, ma hah sûnchimripa ani.
Samaria nupang inkhat tuithâl rangin a honga, male Jisua'n a kôm, “Tui nêk rang mi pêk roh,” a tipea.
(A ruoisingei chu sâkruo rochôk rangin khopui sûnga an sea).
Nupangnu han a kôm, “Nangma Juda mi ni nia, keima Samaria nupang ki nia, kho-angin mo tui nêk rang mi ni zong hi?” (Judangei han khuri mo, khuriâi mo, Samaria mingeiin an mangna chu mang ngâi khâi mak ngei.)
Hanchu Jisua'n a thuona, “Pathien neinunpêk le buong rang mi pêk roh tipu hi ni riet nisenla chu, nangman keng a kôm zong na ta; hanchu, ama'n ringna-tui nang a pêk rang ani,” a tia.
Nupangnu han a kôm, “Pu, tui thâlna laka ite dôn mak chea, tuikuong lak ânthûk zana. Khotieng mo ringna-tui na man rang?
Kin pu Jacob'n hi tuikuong hih mi pêka; ama le a nâingei le a sâ vâi ngei murdi khom ma renga hih an lei nêk ngâi ani. Kin pu Jacob nêkin no roiinpui uol mo?”
Jisua'n a thuona, “Tutu khom hi tui nêk ngei chu an tui lân râl nôk a ta,
Hannirese, tukhom an kôma tui ke pêk rang a nêk ngei kai chu an tui inrâl nôk tet khâi no nih. Keiman tui ke pêk rang chu, an sûnga tuinâr hong chang a ta, tuinâr han ringna-tui le kumtuong ringna pêk atih,” a tia.
Nupangnu han a kôm, “Pu, ma tui hah ni pêk roh! ku tui ânrâl khâi loina rang le hi tena lâ tuithâl ko hong khâi loina rangin,” a tia.
Jisua'n ha nu kôm han, “Sênla, no lômpa va koi inla, hong nôk roh,” a tipea.
Nupangnu'n a kôm, “Lômpa la dôn mu-ung,” tiin amanu han a thuona. Jisua'n chong a melea, “Lômpa dôn mu-ung, ni ti hih, ni ti mindik ani.
Pasal rangnga in ne neipui zoia, male atûna no ompuipa khom hih no lômpa tatak nimak. Chongdiktak ni ni ril ani,” a tia.
Nupangnu han a tia, “Pu, dêipu ni ni ti ki riet.”
“Kin Samari richibulngeiin chu hi tânga hin Pathien chubai an mûk ngâi, aniatachu, nangni Judangeiin chu Jerusalema Pathien chubai kin mûk ngâi ani, nin ti ngâi.”
Jisua'n, nupangnu kôm han a tipea, “Nupangnu, keima mi iem roh, hi tâng le Jerusalem ngêt ni loi khomin mingeiin Pa chubai an mûk zora la tung atih.
Nangni Samari mingeiin chu nin riet loi chubai nin mûk ngâi; aniatachu keini Judangeiin chu kin riet ke chubai kin mûk ngâi ani, sanminringna hih Judangei renga hong suok kêng ani sikin.
Hannirese azora atung rang ani zoi, male atûn khom atung tir ani zoi, ma tikin chu Pathien chubaimûk ngeiin Ratha le Chongtakin Pa chubaimûk an tih, Pa'n ma anga mingei ha ama chubaimûk rangin a nuom ngâi ani.
Pathien chu Ratha ania, ama chubai mûk ngeiin Ratha le chongtakin chubai an mûk rang ani,” a tia.
Nupangnu han a kôm, “Messiah la juong atih, ti ki riet, a juong tikin chu neinunngei murdi mi ril atih,” a tia.
Jisua'n a thuona, “Keima nang chongpuipa hih, ama hah ki ni,” a tia.
Ma lâitak han a ruoisingei an hong kîr nôka, nupang leh an chong an mua an kamâm sabaka. Aniatachu, tutên ha nu kôm han, “Imo no zong?” aninônchu ama kôm, “Ithomo nupang no chongpuia?” tiin khom ite rekel mak ngei.
Hanchu nupangnu hah a tuibêl mâkrakin khopui sûnga a kîra, male mingei kôm,
“Ki sin lei tho ngei murdi a ril thei let mi inkhat a oma, hong en ta u, Messiah ni thei ni mo?” a tia.
Masikin khopui renga an honga Jisua kôm an va se zoi.
Ma zoratak han ruoisingeiin, “Minchupu, sâk-sâk bak hi roh!” tiin an lei ngêna.
Nikhomsenla Jisua'n, “Nin riet loi bu nêk rang ko dôn,” tiin a thuona.
Masikin ruoisingei han anni leh anni anin rekela, “Mîn bu an hong chôi pe mini?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Mi tîrpu lungdo sin le a sin zoi rang hi ku bu tuitak ani, a tipe ngeia.
Nangnin chu, ‘Bu âtna rang tha minli ala om nin tia.’ Aniatachu nangni ki ril, loingei so en sabak ta u; atûn renga ât rangin bungei an min zoi!
A âtpu'n chu rathaman a man ngâia, kumtuong ringna dêna om rangin amara a mintûp ngâi; masikin a lingpu le a âtpu an râisân ânruol theina rangin.
‘Mi inkhatin a linga, mi dangin a ât ngâi,’ ti hi adik ani.
Nin sin loina muna nangni ki tîr; mi dangin an sina, an sin sai hah nin ât ani,” a tia.
Nupangnu han, “Ki sin lei tho ngei murdi ni ril let,” tiin a thurchi a misîr pe ngei sikin Samari khopui mingei, mi tamtakin Jisua an iem zoi.
Masikin, Samari mingei ha Jisua kôm an honga, an kôm om rangin an ngêna, male Jisua'n ha khopui han sûnnik a châm zoi.
Midang tamtakin khom a thurchi misîr sikin an iem sa zoia,
male anni ngei han nupangnu kôm, “Atûn chu mi ni misîr pe sika ni loiin keini lelên a thurchi misîr kin rieta, hi mi hih rammuol sanminringpu ani khet ti kin riet zoi,” an tia.
Ma khopui han sûnnik a châm suole chu a mâka Galilee rama a se zoi.
Jisua'n ama rang nanâk ân tia, “Dêipungei chu an ram nanâka chu miritin om ngâi mak ngei,” tiin.
Galilee rama a tungin chu mipuingeiin an lei phâm tataka, Jerusalema Kalkân Kût han inchelin Jisua sintho ngei murdi ha an mu sikin.
Hanchu, Jisua ha Galilee rama Cana khuoa tui uain a min changna han a hong nôka, sorkâr ulien inkhat a oma, a nâipasal Capernaum khuoa dam loiin a om ani.
Jisua Judea ram renga Galilee rama a hong ti a riet lehan a kôm a sea, Capernaum khuoa sea, a nâipasal juong mindam rangin Jisua a ngêna, a nâipasal hah a thi vang zoi ani.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Sininkhêlngei le neinun kamâmomngei nin mu nônchu tutên iem no tu nui,” a tipe ngeia.
Sorkâr ulien han, “Pu, ka nâipasal a thi mân ni juong pe roh,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Se nôk ta roh, na nâipasal a dam zoi!” a tipea. Ha mi han Jisua chongngei ha iem pumin a se zoi.
Hanchu a in a pan lâiin lampuia a tîrlâmngei leh annin tonga, “Na nâipasal a dam zoi!” an tipea.
Ama'n an kôm, a nâipasal lei dam zora tak hah a rekel ngeia, annin a kôm, “Mazan chonûktieng dârkhat inring han a mintun a lei mathân zoi,” an tipea.
Hanchu, a pa han Jisua'n a kôm, “Na nâipasal a dam zoi,” a tipe zora tak hah ani ti a riet zoi. Masikin ama le a inmingei anrêngin an iem zoi ani.
Ma hah Jisua'n Judea ram renga Galilee rama a hong suo nûka a sininkhêl sin avoinikna ani.
Masuole chu, Jisua Jerusalema Judah sakhuo tienga khohoi aom sikin a sea.
Jerusalem Belri Mokot kôla han dîl inkhat aoma, Hebrew chongin Bethzatha an ti ngâi; ma dîl han bokrop rangnga aoma.
Ma bokropngei han damloi ngei loko tamtak an jâla mitcho ngei, kholra ngei le phalkhatthi ngei, tui singânsa zora an ngâka,
a kakâra dîl han vântîrton, a juonga, tui ha a juong chek ngâi. Ma tui singânsa zora han dîla a lût masatak chu i-anga natna khomnirese an dam ngêt ngâi.
Mi inkhat kum sômthum leiriet damloi a oma.
Jisua'n a jâlin ava mua, male zora sôt tak renga damloia om ani ti a rieta; masikin a kôm, “Dam rang no jôt mo?” tiin a rekela.
Hanchu damloipu han, “Pu, tui singânsa zora dîla mi juong thak rang lak dôn mu-ung; ke se khomin mîn, min khêl nôk ngâi,” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Inthoi inla, na jâmpher louk inla, lôn ta roh,” a tipea.
Ha mi han voikhatrengin a hong dam kelena; a jâmpher chôiin a lôn phut kelen zoi. Ma nikhuo hah sabbathni ania,
masikin Juda rachamneipungeiin a dampu kôm han, “Avien hin sabbathni kêng ani, jâmpher chôia lôn hi ei balam nimak,” an tipea.
Ama han an kôm, “Ni mindampu'n, ‘Na jâmpher louk inla, lôn ta roh’ mi ti kêng,” tiin a thuona.
Anni ngei han, “Hi anga tho ranga nang rilpu hah tumo ani?” tiin an rekela.
Hannirese, ha a dampu han Jisua hah tumo ani riet mak, ha muna han mipui an tam sikin Jisua chu a rotpat zoi.
Chomol suole chu, Jisua'n ama hah Biekina a mua male a kôm, “Rangâi roh, na dam zoi ani; masikin nunsie tho nôk khâi no roh, nu chunga natna saloi uol hong tung nih,” a tia.
Masuole chu ha mi han Juda rachamneipungei kôm a mindampu chu Jisua ani ti ava ril ngeia.
Masikin sabbathni mi a mindam an ti sikin Jisua hah dûk an mintong zoi.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ka Pa'n sin a tho tit ngâia, male kei khom sin ko tho ngêt rang ani,” tiin a thuon ngeia.
Ma anghan a ti sikin Juda rachamneipungeiin that rang an bôk uol nôk zoi; Sabbathni balam a siet ti vai niloiin, Pathien hah a Pa angin a bêa, ama khom Pathien leh ân-angin ânbê ti sika khom ani.
Masikin Jisua'n a thuon ngeia, “Chongdik tak nangni ki ril: Nâipasal athenin ite tho thei maka; a Pa sintho a mu ngei kai vai ke a tho ngâi. Pa'n sin a tho kai ke Nâipasal khomin a tho ngâi ani.
Pa'n Nâipasal a lungkhama male a tho murdi a min mu ngâi ani. Hi nêka neinun roiinpui a tho rang khom la min mûng atih, male nin rêngin nin la kamâm rang ani.
Pa'n mithi a kaithoia ringna a pêk ngei anghan, Nâipasal khomin a nuom kai chu a min ring ngâi.
Pa'n tute roijêk pe ngâi maka. Roijêk rangin Nâipasal kôm kêng rachamneina akipin a pêk zoia,
masikin mi murdi'n Pa mirit an tho anghan Nâipasal khom mirit an tho theina rangin. Tukhom Nâipasal mirit tho loi kai chu Pa a tîrpu mirit tho loi ani.
“Chongdik tak nangni ki ril: Tukhom ko chong rieta mi tîrpu iem kaiin chu kumtuong ringna an dôn zoi. Theiloi changin om mak ngeia, thina renga an jôka ringna han an lût zoi ani.
Chongdik tak nangni ki ril: azora atung rang ani zoi, atûn khom atung tir zoi, male mithi ngeiin Pathien Nâipasal rôl riet an ta, a riet ngei kai chu hong ring an tih.
Pa ha ringna nâr ani anghan, Nâipasal khom ringna nârin a sin ani.
Male Miriem Nâipasal ani sikin a kôm roijêk rangin rachamneina a pêk ani.
Ma hi kamâm no roi; azora atung rang ani zoi, ma tikin chu mithi ngeiin a rôl riet an ta,
male an thânngei renga hôn thoi an ta: sin sa tho ngei chu ringna changin inthoi nôk an ta, sin saloi tho ngei chu theiloi changin inthoi nôk an tih.
“Ke thena rachamneinân ite tho thei mu unga; Pathien'n ni ril lam anghan roi ke jêk ani, masikin ko roijêk chu adik ani. Keima ku nuom hi sin rangin bôk mu unga, mi tîrpu lungdo kêng sin rang ko bôk ani.
“Ku thurchi nanâk misîr ronga, ku thurchi misîr ha adik tiin pom thei ni no ni.
Aniatachu ku thurchi mi aminrietpu chu mi dang ania, male ama'n ku thurchi a misîr hah adik ti ki riet.
Nangnin John kôm thangtheipungei nin tîra, ama han chongtak ruthûlin chong nangni a lei rila.
Munisi rietpuipu ko dôn ngêt rang ki ti nimaka; mahi sanminringa nin om theina ranga ki ti ani.
John hah châti vârtak le ân-ângtak angin ani, male zora bongkit vai mang rang nin nuom ani anghan.
Hannirese, rietpuipu ko dôn hi chu John minrietna chong nêkin a roiinpui uol: Khoimo ko tho, ma hah, Pa'n sintho ranga mi pêk ani, ki sintho ngêt hin Pa mi tîr ani ti ku thurchi a minriet ani.
Male Pa mi tîrpu khom han a minriet zoi, nangnin chu khotik lâi khomin a rôl la riet ngâi mak chei, a mêl khom la mu mak chei,
male a chong khom nin mulungrîlngeia vong ngâi mak chei, a tîrpu hi nin iem loi sikin.
Asûnga kumtuong ringna aom ti nin sabei sikin, Pathien Lekhabungei ha nin pore ngâi. Male Pathien Lekhabungei han ku thurchi an misîr ani!
Hankhoma, ringna nin dôna rangin ko kôm hong jôt ngâi mak chei.
“Munisi minpâkna rok mu-ung.
Aniatachu kho anga miriem mo nin ni nangni ki riet, male nin mulungrîlngei han Pathien lungkhamna dôn mak chei ti ki riet.
Ka pa rachamneina leh ku juong ani, hannirese mi modôm mak choia; nikhomrese, tumakhatin ama rachamin hong rese chu lei modôm nin tih.
Pathien inkhat vai renga minpâkna man rang nuom mak choia, inkhat le inkhat inpâk inlôm kêng nin min luta; nônte, kho angin mo mi nin iem rang?
Nikhomrese, keiman Pa makunga nangni doi ki tih tiin mindon no roi. Nangni doi rang chu mi inkhat aom, nin sabeipu Moses ha.
Moses nin iem tatakin chu, kei khom mi nin iem rang ani; ama han ku chungroi kêng a miziek sikin.
Aniatachu a miziek nin iem nônchu, kho angin mo ko chong nin iem thei ranga?” a tia.
Masuole chu, Jisua Galilee dîl râl inkânin a se zoi. (Tiberias dîl khom an ti sa ngâi).
Damloi ngei chunga a sininkhêlngei an mu sikin loko tamtakin an jûia.
Jisua hah muola a kala male a ruoisingei leh an insunga.
Judangei Kalkân kût zora ha anâi zoia.
Jisua'n akôl akieng a hong ena, loko tamtakin ama tieng an hong pan a mua, masikin Philip kôm han, “Hi mingei sâk rang vâipôl khonmo ei rochôk rang?” a tia.
(Hi chong hi Philip minsina ranga a ti ani, adiktakin chu imo a tho rang lam ama'n a riet sai ani.)
Philip'n a kôm, “Mitinin achîn tete min chang ngei rang khomin sumdâr duli razannik man vâipôlin luo hun no ni ngei,” tiin a thuona.
A ruoisingei adang inkhat, Simon Peter lâibungpa Andrew'n a tia,
“Barli vâipôl pêk rangnga le nga inik a dôn pasalte inkhat hi hin aom. Aniatachu hi dôra mingei sâk rangin chu hun no ni ngei,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Mipuingei hah minsung roi,” tiin a ril ngeia. (Ma mun han durba tamtak aom.) Mipuingei ha an insung zoia; mi isâng rangnga dôr an ni.
Jisua'n vâipôl hah a lâka, Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila, male mipui ânsungngei hah a sem pe ngeia; ma angdên han nga khom a sem nôka, an nuom do-dôr a sem pe ngeia.
An khoptang suo nûkin a ruoisingei kôm, “Ite inpai riek loi rangin an sâk minieng; khom rûtvar roi,” a tipe ngeia.
Masikin barli vâipôl rangnga sâk ngei, an sâk minieng ha tabong sômleinik an la rût min sipa.
Ha mingei han Jisua sininkhêl sin hah an mûn chu, “Hi mi hih dêipu tatak, rammuola juong rangpu ha ani khet!” an tia.
Anni ngei hah hongin, ama hah rangrâta sûrin rêng minchang rang an bôk ti Jisua'n a rieta; masikin athenin muola a se nôk zoi.
Kholoi ahong nin chu, Jisua ruoisingei hah dîla an juong sea,
rukuonga an chuonga, dîl râl Capernaum tieng an pana. Jân ahong ni tena khom Jisua hah an kôm la hong tung maka.
Hanchu phâivopui hong rângin ahong sêma male tuidâr ahôn soka.
Hanchu ruoisingei han kilometer rangnga mini, uruk mini an hong jâpin chu Jisua hah tui chunga lônin rukuong tieng a hong panin an mua, an lei chia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chi no roi, keima kêng ki ni!” a tipe ngeia.
Hanchu râisântakin rukuonga han an min chuonga, male rukuong leh an va pana, tângkôl hah harenghan an tung kelen zoi.
Anangtûka chu dîl râl kângkhat tienga mipui a omngei han rukuong inkhat vai mahan aom ti an rieta. Jisua chu a ruoisingei leh rukuonga chuong loiin, anni ngei ha mâkin anthenin an se ti an riet zoia.
Pumapa'n râisânchong a ril suole lokongeiin vâipôl an sâkna mun kôla han rukuong dang ngei Tiberias renga an hong tunga.
Mipuingeiin Jisua le a ruoisingei chu ha muna han om khâi mak ngei ti an rietin chu anni khom rukuonga chuongin Capernauma, Jisua rok rangin an se zoi.
Mipuingei han Jisua dîl râla an hong mûn chu a kôm, “Minchupu, khotik han mo hi tieng râl no hong tung?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongdiktak nangni ki ril: sininkhêlngei nin riet sika mi nin rok ni loiin, vâipôl nin sâk man sika mi nin rok kêng, tiin a thuona.
Vâipôl asiet nôk thei ngâi rangin sin no ungla; manêkin chu kumtuong ringna vâipôl adier rangin sin roi. Hi vâipôl hih Miriem Nâipasalin nangni a pêk rang ani, Pathien, Pa, han ama sînthona a chunga adar zoi sikin.”
Masikin anni ngei han a kôm, “Pathien lungdo kin sin theina rangin imo kin tho rang?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n a thuon ngeia, “Pathien'n khoimo sin ranga nangni a nuom chu a tîrpu iem hih ani,” a tia.
Anni ngei han a kôm, “I sininkhêl mo ni sin rang, kin mua nang kin iem theina rangin? Imo no tho rang?
Kin richibulngei chu ramchâra han manna an sâk ngâia, Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, ‘Invân renga vâipôl sâk rang a pêk ngei,’” tiin chong an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongdiktak nangni ki ril,” “Moses'n vâipôl nangni a pêk hah invân renga nimaka; Ka Pa'n kêng invân renga vâipôl diktak nangni a pêk.
Pathien'n vâipôl nangni a pêk chu invân renga a juong chuma rammuol ranga a ringna pêkpu hih ani.”
Anni ngeiin, “Pu, ma vâipôl hah mi pêk bang roh,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Keima hih ringna vâipôl ki ni.” “Tukhom ko kôma hong ngei chu an vonchâm no nia; tukhom keima mi iem ngei chu an tui inrâl khâi no ni.
Atûn hin, nangni ki ril, mi nin mua aniatachu mi iem mak chei.
Pa'n mi pêk ngei kai chu ko kôm hong an tih. Ko kôma hong kai chu tute rujûl tet noning,
ku lungdo sin ranga invân renga juong ni mu unga, mi tîrpu lungdo sin ranga juong kêng ki ni.
Ma hih mi tîrpu lungdo chu ani, mi pêk ngei murdi tute minmang loiin nikhuo nûktaka chu aringin kaithoi inlang, ti hih.
Ka Pa'n a nuom tak chu tukhom Nâipasal mua a iem ngei murdi'n chu kumtuong ringna dôn senla ngei, keiman nikhuo nûktaka, mangei hah kaithoi ngei inlang ti hi ani,” a tia.
“Invân renga vâipôl juong chum ki ni,” a ti sikin mipuingei hah an chierlul zoi.
Masikin anni ngei han, “Hi mi hih Joseph nâipasal Jisua hah nimak mo? A nû le a pa khom ei rieta. Nônte, kho angin mo, invân renga juong chum ki ni a ti thei hi?” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Nin thenin chier kekêng no roi.
Pa mi tîrpu'n a kaikuoi nônchu tute ko kôm hong thei no ni ngei; male keiman nikhuo nûktaka chu kaithoi ngei ki tih.
Dêipungei lekhabua, ‘Pathien'n mitin la minchu ngei atih,’ tiin an miziek ani. Mitin Pa chong rieta ânchu ngei kai chu ko kôm an hong ngâi.
Mahi tutên Pa an mu zoi ki tina nimaka; Pa kôm renga juongpu vaiin kêng Pa ha a mu ani.
Chongdiktak nangni ki ril: tukhom a iem kai chu kumtuong ringna an dôn zoi.
Keima hih ringna vâipôl ki ni.
Nin richibulngeiin ramchâra manna hah an sâka chu an thi dên ani.
Aniatachu, invân renga vâipôl juong chum hi chu tukhomin an sâka anîn chu thi khâi no ni ngei.
Keima hi vâipôl aring invân renga juong chum ki ni. Tukhomin hi vâipôl hih a sâkin chu kumtuongin ring tit atih. Vâipôl ke pêk rang chu ka taksa hi ani, rammuol ringna ranga ke pêk chu” a tia.
Masikin Judangei ha taksîn an inkhal phut zoia. “Kho angin mo hi miriempa hin a taksa ei sâk rangin mi pêk thei ranga?” tiin an rekela.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongdiktak nangni ki ril: Miriem Nâipasal taksa hih nin sâk noa, a thisen khom nin buong nônchu nin thethenin ring thei no tunui.
Tukhom ka taksa a sâka, ki thisen a buong kai chu kumtuong ringna an dôn zoi, male anni ngei ha keiman nikhuo nûktaka kaithoi ngei ki tih.
Ka taksa hi bu diktak a nia; ki thisen hi buong ruo tak ani.
Tukhom ka taksa sâka, ki thisen buong ngei kai chu keima ko kôm an om banga, male kei khom an kôm ko om bang ngâi.
Pa aring han mi tîra, male Pa jâra ring ki ni sa. Ma angdên han ka taksa sâk ngei kai chu keima jârin ring an tih.
Ma hih invân renga vâipôl juong chum chu ani; nin pilepungeiin vâipôl an sâka an thi nôk angha nimak. Tukhom hi vâipôl sâk ngei kai chu kumtuongin ringtit an ti.”
Hi chong hih Jisua'n Capernaum synagog taka a minchu lâia a ti ani.
A nûkjûi tamtak ngeiin hi chong hih an rietin chu, “Hi minchuna hih chong ngartak kêng ani. Tumo a rangâi thei ranga?” an tia.
Tutên ril loiin, a ruoisingei hah ma roia han an chier ani, ti Jisua'n a mulungrîlin a rieta, an kôm, “Hi roi sika hin nin mulung amin hoiloi mini?
Nônte, chongkhatin, Miriem Nâipasal hih motona a omna ngâia a kîr nôk nin mu tika kho angin mo nin tho rang?
Ringna pêkpu chu Pathien Ratha ania; munisi ranak chu ite a mangna omak. Nin kôma ki misîr chongngei hih ringna pêkpu Pathien Ratha ani.
Hannoma senkhat chu iem mak chei,” a tia. (Jisua'n aphut renga tu ngei mo a iem loi rang le tu lelên mo a minsûr rang a riet chien sai ani.)
Male a bôksa nôka, “Hi sika hin kêng, Pa'n a thop nônchu tute ko kôm hong thei no ni ngei ki ti ani.”
Masika han Jisua nûkjûi ngei mi tamtakin nûkkîr an thoa, ama jûi khâi mak ngei.
Masikin Jisua'n ruoisi sômleinik ngei kôm, “Nangni khom rot rang nin jôt mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia.
Simon Peter'n a kôm, “Pumapa, tu kôm mo kin rot ranga? Kumtuong ringna chongngei laka nangman no dôna.
Male atûn chu kin iema, Pathien renga juong Mi Inthieng ni ni ti kin riet zoi,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Nangni sômleinik ngei hih keiman nangni ka thang nimak mo? Hannoma nin lâia mi inkhat hih diabol kêng ani!” tiin chong a mele.
Ama han Judas, Simon Iscariot nâipasal chungroi a misîr ani. Judas hah ruoisi sômleinik ngei lâia mi nikhomsenla, ama a minsûr rang ani sikin.
Masuole chu, Jisua'n Galilee rama a chaia; Juda rachamneipungeiin that rang an bôk sikin Judea rama chu chai nuom khâi mak.
Judangei Kâirêng khohoi zora anâi zoia,
masikin Jisua lâibungngei han a kôm, “Hi mun hih mâk inla, Judea rama se roh, masika han nu nûkjûi ngeiin ni sintho an mu theina rangin, an tia.
Ama riming inthang rang nuompu chu tutên a sintho thup ngâi mak. Hi neinunngei hih ni sin anînchu rammuol pumpuiin nu chungroi riet rese bah!” an tia.
(A lâibungngei luon ama iem mak ngei.)
Jisua'n an kôm, “Keima rangin chu azora diktak la tung mak. Zora pai hih nangni rangin chu adik ani.
Rammuolin nangni mumâk maka, aniatachu keima chu mi mumâk ngâi, a sintho ngei ha sa mak tiin ki ril ngâi sikin.
Khohoia nangni lei se roi, kei chu khohoia la se thei no ning, ko zora diktak ala tung loi sikin,” a tia.
Ma chong hah a ti suole khom ama chu Galilee rama a la om bang.
A lâibungngei khohoia an se suole chu Jisua khom a se sa; ânlangin chu se maka, inrûkin a se zoi.
Juda rachamneipungeiin khohoia han ama an roka, “Khonmo aom?” tiin an rekel titira.
Mipuingeiin a chungroia an inkereng chichiena; senkhatin, “Miriem sa kêng,” an tia. Adang ngeiin, “Nimak, ama kêng mingei lamnôk tieng a tuong ngâi,” an tia.
Hannirese Juda rachamneipungei an chi sikin tutên ânlangin chu a chungroi misîr ngam mak ngei.
Khohoi ha inang dôr an mang tena chu Jisua Biekina a sea mingei a minchu phut zoi.
Juda rachamneipungei han an kamâm sabaka, “Hi mi hi ânchuna boi tetin kho angin mo madôr a riet thei hi!” an tia.
Jisua'n a thuona, “Ki minchuna chong hih keima kata nimaka, aniatachu Pathien mi tîrpu renga juong kêng ani.
Tutu khom Pathien lungdo a sin nuom kai chu hi minchuna chong hih Pathien renga juong mo, aninônchu ka rachama ko chong mo riet an tih.
Tukhom ama rachama chongpu chu ama roiinpuina man rang a pût ani. Hannirese, a tîrpu roiminpui rang a nuompu'n chu dikna a dôna, male ama sûnga han dikloina reng omak.
Moses'n Balam nangni a pêk nimak mo? Hannirese Balam hah tutên jôm mak chei. Ithomo ni that rang nin bôk hi?” a tia.
Mipuingei han, “Ramkhori nang a sûr ngihi! Tumo nang that rang a bôk?” tiin lokongeiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Sininkhêl inkhat ko thoa, nin rêngin nin kamâm sabaka.
Moses'n nin nâipasalngei sertan rangin chong nangni a pêka (Moses'n a phut nimaka, nin richibulngeiin kêng an phut ani), masikin Sabbathnin pasalte ser nin tan ngâi ani.
Moses Balam asiet loina rangin Sabbathni khom pasalte sertan nin tho ngâi anînte, keiman Sabbathnia mi ki mindam phar sikin ithomo ku chunga nin takasi?
Pêntienga ânlang rang vaiin roijêk mong ungla, male adiktakin roijêk roi,” a tia.
Jerusalema mi senkhatin an tia, “Hi mi hih rachamneipungeiin that ranga an pût ha nimak mo?
En ta u! Mipui rietin thurchi a misîra, male tutên rokôk mak ngei! Ama hih Messiah ani tiin rachamneipu ngeiin an riet tatak zoi mini?
Aniatachu Messiah a juong tika chu kho renga mo a juong tutên riet no ni ngei. Hi mi hi chu a hongna ei rêngin ei riet-iem ani,” an tia.
Jisua'n Biekina a minchu lâihan rôl inringtakin a tia, “Tumo ki ni le kho renga hong mo ki ni nin riet tatak mo zoi? Ka rachama juong ni mu-ung. Mi tîrpu chu mi diktak ani. Nangnin chu ama ha riet mak choia,
aniatachu keiman chu ama ha ki rieta, a kôm renga juong le ama mi tîr ki ni sikin,” a tia.
Hanchu ama hah sûr rang an pût zoia, aniatachu, azora ala tung loi sikin tutên an kut musum mak ngei.
Hannirese mipui lâia mi tamtakin chu ama an iem zoi, “Messiah a juong tika hi mi hin a sin nêka tam sininkhêlngei sin thei ni mo?” an tia.
Phariseengeiin Jisua chungroia mipuingei an inkereng chichiena chong an rieta, masikin ochaisingei le Phariseengeiin Jisua sûr rangin rungpungei an tîra.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chomolte nin kôm la om ka ta, masuole chu mi tîrpu kôm sêng ki tih, a tia.
Nangnin mi rok nin ta, mi mu no tunui, ke sena ranga nin se thei loi sikin.”
Juda rachamneipungei han anni nanâkin, “Ei mu thei loina rangin khotieng mo se rang a ti? Ei mingei omna Greek khopuilienngeia sea, male Greekngei juong minchu rang a ti mini? an tia.
Nangnin mi rok nin ta mi mu no tunui, ke sena ranga hong thei no tunui, a ti hih khoimo a tina?” an tia.
Khohoi chîn rang ni le nikhuo lupuitak ni han Jisua ândinga, rôl inringtakin, “Tukhom a tui ânrâl kai chu ko kôm hong senla ngeia, nêk rese ngei, male
Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, tukhom mi iem kai chu a sûng renga ‘Ringna-pêk’ tuinârngei luong suok atih,” a tipe ngeia.
Mahi Jisua'n ama iem ngeiin Ratha an chang rang chungroi a misîrna ani. Ma zora han Ratha pêk la nimaka; Jisua ha roiinpuia kaithoi ala ni loi sikin.
Mingei lâia senkhatin ha chong hah an rietin chu, “Hi mi hih Dêipu tatak kêng ani ngihi!” an tia.
Adangngeiin chu, “Ama hih Messiah kêng ani!” an tia. Hannirese adangngeiin chu, “Messiah chu Galilee ram renga hong suok no nih! an tia.
Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan Messiah chu Rêng David jâisuon renga nîng a ta, David omna khopui Bethlehema a suok rang ani,” an tia.
Masikin Jisua sikin mipuingei lâia insenna aom zoia.
Mi senkhatin sûr rang an bôka, aniatachu tutên a chunga an kut musum mak ngei.
Mi rungpungei ha an hong kîr nôka, Ochaisingei le Phariseengei han an kôm, “Ithomo nin hong tuong loi?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
Mi rungpungei han an thuona, “Hipa anga thurchi misîr reng la om ngâi mak ngei!” tiin an thuona.
Phariseengeiin an kôm, “Nangni khom huongin nin om sa mo ni zoi?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
“Rachamneipungei le Phariseengei lâia mi inkhat luon ama an iem zoi ti nin riet mo?
Hi mipuingei hih Moses Balam riet mak ngei, masikin Pathien khomâksâmna nuoia om kêng an ni!”
Phariseengei lâia mi inkhat Nicodemus, motona Jisua intongpui ranga sêpu ha a oma. Ama'n midangngei kôm,
“Ei Balam dungjûiin chu tukhom a chongbâi suok ei riet mân le a sintho ei mu mân chu theiloi minchang thei ngâi mak me,” a tia.
“Asa,” anni ngei han a kôm, “Nang khom Galilee ram renga hong mo ni ni? Pathien Lekhabungei pore inla dêipu Galilee ram renga hong suok ngâi mak ti riet ni tih,” tiin an thuona.

Hanchu mitinin an ina an sea, aniatachu, Jisua chu Olive tânga a sea.
Anangtûk jînga ânmânin Biekina a se nôka. Mipuingei murdi a kôm an hôn tûpa; ânsunga anni ngei ha a minchu ngei phut zoia.
Balam minchupungei le Phariseengei han nupangnu ânrê lâitaka an sûrnu hah an hong tuonga, male an rênga an moton han amanu hah an mindinga.
Jisua kôm, “Minchupu, hi nupangnu hih ânrê lâitaka kin sûr ani.
Ei Balamin Moses chongpêk angin chu hi nupangu hih lung leh dêng that ngêt rang ani. Atûn hin, nangman kho angin mo ni ti?” an tia.
Ma hah ama min ôkna ranga an ti ani, demna an man theina rangin. Aniatachu Jisua ân kûna, a kutruol leh pil a mizieka.
Ma anga indingin chong an rekel anghan ânthoi lita, male an kôm, “Nin lâia nunsie tho loitakin motontaka lung leh amanu hah dêng bak roi,” a tia.
Hanchu ân kûn nôka, a kutruol leh pil a miziek nôka.
A chong hah an rietin chu, a ulien dônin inkhat inkhatin, an rot riei zoia. Jisua hah athenin an mâk raka, nupangnu hah ma muna a lân ding chien lehan.
Jisua hah a hôn dinga, nupangnu kôm han, “Khonmo an om suo zoi? Tutên theiloi nang mintum rang om khâi mak ngei na?” a tia.
Amanu han a thuona, “Pu, tutên theiloi mi mintum mak ngei,” a tia. Jisua'n a kôm, “Asa, nônchu, kei khom theiloi nang mintum uol mu-ung. Se roh, hannirese nunsie tho nôk khâi no roh,”] a tia.
Jisua'n Phariseengei kôm a chong nôka. “Keima hi rammuol vâr ki ni,” a tia. “Tukhom mi jûi murdi chu ringna vâr dôn an ta, ijînga lôn tet no ni ngei.”
Phariseengeiin a kôm, “Atûn hin nu thurchi nanâk kêng ni misîr; nu thurchi misîr dik mak,” an tia.
“Nimak,” Jisua'n an kôm, “Ku thurchi nanâk misîr khom ronga, ki misîr hih adik kêng. Keima chu kho renga mo ku juong le kho tieng mo ke se rang khom ki riet. Nangni chu kho renga mo ku juong aninônchu, kho tieng mo ke se rang riet mak chei.
Nangnin chu taksa balam angtakin roi nin tan ngâia; keiman chu tu roi te tan ngâi mu-ung.
Ke lei tanna khom om senla, ko roi tanna chu dik atih; asikchu ke theivaia om ni mu unga; Pa mi tîrpu ko kôm a om sikin.
Nin Balam lekhabua khom rietpuipu inik an inruola, imo an ti tak chu adik, tiin miziekin aom ani.
Keiman ku thurchi nanâk ki misîra, male Pa mi tîrpu khomin ku thurchi a misîr sa ngâi,” a tia.
Anni ngei han, “Khomo na Pa?” tiin ama an rekela., “Nangnin mi riet mak choia, ka Pa khom riet uol mak chei. Mi nin riet nisenla chu ka Pa khom riet nin ti zoi,” tiin Jisua'n a thuon ngeia.
Jisua'n hi ngei murdi hih Biekina chôiruol dôngna an darna mun khâltan sûnga a minchu lâia a ti ani. Tutên ama hah sûr mak ngei azora ala tung loi sikin.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Ke sepat rang kêng ani zoi; nangnin mi rok nin ta chu, nin sietnangei han thîng nin tih. Ke sena ranga se thei no tunui,” a tia.
Masikin Juda rachamneipungeiin, “Ke sena ranga se thei no tunui a ti hih amananâkin inthat rang a tina mini?” an tia.
Jisua'n a thuon ngeia, “Nangni chu hi rammuola mi nin ni. Kei chu chung tieng renga juong ki ni. Nangni chu hi rammuol renga nin ni, hannirese kei chu hi rammuol renga ni mu-ung.
Masika han nin sietnangei han thîng nin tih, tiin nangni ki ril ani. Male ‘Keima hih tumo Ki ni’ mi nin iem nônchu nin sietnangei han thi lelê nin tih,” a tia.
Anni ngei han, “Tumo ni ni?” tiin an rekela. Jisua'n, “Aphut renga nangni ki ril ani.
Nin chungroia hin misîr rang tamtak, nangni demna rang tamtak ko dôn. I-ih khomnirese, mi tîrpu chu mi diktak ani, ama renga ki riet kai ke rammuola ki ril ngâi ani.”
Jisua'n an kôm, Pa chungroi kêng a misîr ani ti riet thei mak ngeia.
Masikin an kôm, “Miriem Nâipasal hih nin makhâi tika ‘Ama hah Keima ki ni’; ti le keima ka rachamin ite tho mu unga, Pa'n mi minchu kai ke ki misîr ani tiin riet sa nin tih.
Male mi tîrpu chu ko kôm a oma; ke thenin mi mâkrak maka, a lungdo ki sin bang ngâi sikin,” a tia.
Jisua'n thurchi a misîr ngei hah mi tamtakin an rieta, ama an iem zoi.
Masikin Jisua'n ama iem Judangei kôm han, “Ki minchuna nin jômin chu ku ruoisi diktak ngei nin ni rang;
chongtak riet nin ta, chongtak han nangni mojôk atih,” a tia.
Anni ngei han, “Abraham richisuonpârngei kêng kin ni, tute suoka la om mak me. ‘Suok renga nangni mojôk atih,’ ni ti hih khoi tina mini?” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chongdiktak nangni ki ril: tukhom nunsie tho chu nunsie suok ani.
Suok chu insûngmi ni tit ngâi mak, aniatachu Nâipasal chu kumtuongin a om ngâi.
Nâipasalin suok nangni a mojôk vaiin kêng nin jôk tatak rang.
Abraham richisuonpârngei nin ni ti ki riet. Hannoma nangnin ma that rangin nin pût ani, ki minchuna chong nin pom loi sikin.
Keiman ki misîr hih ka Pa mi min mu ani, nangni khom nin pa ngei nangni an ril anghan nin misîr ngâi.”
Anni ngei han, “Kin pa chu Abraham ani,” tiin an thuona. Jisua'n an kôm, “Abraham nâi diktak ngei nin ni nisenla chu a lei tho ngâi anghan nin tho rang ani,” tiin chong a mele ngeia.
“Ki sin lei tho ngei murdi chu Pathien renga chongdik ki riet ngei nangni ril hih ani, aniatachu atûn hin ma that rangin nin pût chien ani. Abraham'n chu ma anghin tho ngâi mak!
Nangni chu nin pa ngei lei tho ngâi anghan nin tho ani,” a tia. Anni ngei han, “Pathien vai kêng kin Pa dôn chu, keini hih a nâi diktak ngei kin ni,” tiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Pathien nin Pa ani tatakin chu, mi nin lungkham rang ania; Pathien renga juong ki ni sikin atûn hin nin lâia ko om ani. Keima rachama juong ni mu unga, ama tîr kêng ki ni, a tipe ngeia.
Ithomo ki misîr hih nin riet thei tet loi? Ku thurchi misîr hih nin mulungrîla nin mindon loi sika ani.
Nin pa Diabol nâingei nin ni, male nin pa lungdo jûi nin nuom ani. Ama chu aphut renga mi that ngâi ani, male chongdik tieng khom inchel ngâi mak, dikna reng a dôn loi sikin. Milak a tho tikin ama lungdoa a tho ani ngâi, milakpa ani sikin, milak ngei murdi pa khom ani sa.
Hannirese keima chu chongtak kêng ki misîr ngâi, masika han nin iem ngâi loi ani.
