Ni sinthotheina le nu lungdo mintung ranga ne jêk masat sai anghan neinuntin tho rangin an intûp zoi.
Misinangei hih en ta ni tîrlâmngei hih hâina murdi leh nu thurchi misîr phalna pêk roh.
Mingei mindamna rangin nu kut phar inla, male tîrlâm inthieng Jisua riming jârin kamâmruoingei le sininkhêlngei sin theina rangin ni pêk roh” an tia.
Chubai an tho suole chu an om khômna mun hah ahong innîka, anrêngin Ratha Inthiengin an sipa, hâitakin Pathien chong an ril phut zoi.
Iempungei pâl hah mulung munkhat le mulungbôk mulungrîl munkhat ruputin an oma, an lâia tukhomin an neinun dôn ngei hah keima kata kêng ti loiin, neinuntin insemin an inlopkhôm ngâi.
Tîrtonngei han asân sinthona dônin Pumapa Jisua inthoinôkna, rietpuipu nina rangin chong an ril ngâia, male anrêngin Pathien satvurna lientak an chang pak zoi.
An pâla tute ânsam khom om mak ngei, loingei mini, inngei mini an juora, aman hah an hong chôia,
male tîrtonngei kuta an pêka; an nâng lam angtakin sum hah an sem ngâia.
Masikin, Joseph, tîrtonngeiin Barnabas an ti (Aomtie chu “mohôk ngâipu” tina ani), Levi jâisuon Cyprus tuihuola mi ania,
loimun a dôn hah a juora, aman hah hong chôiin tîrtonngei kuta a hong pêk zoi.
Hannisenla mi inkhat a riming Ananias a dôngma Sapphira leh an oma, an neinun senkhat a juora.
Hannirese ma sum hah a dôngma inrietpuiin in-ang a thupa, adang aminieng kai hah tîrtonngei kuta an hong pêka.
Hanchu Peter'n, “Ananias Ratha Inthieng huongin ram man in-angrip thup rangin ithomo Soitan'n nu mulungrîla racham ni min nei?
Nu juor mâna han khom nata ania; nu juor suo nûkin khom aman chu nata ania, ithomo ma anga neinun tho rangin nu mulunga na masata? Miriemngei huong nimak chea, Pathien huong kêng ni ni,” a tipea.
Ananias'n ma chong hah a riet lehan, ha renghan an leta a thi kelena; hanchu ha thurchi a riet murdi'n chu asân an chi zoia.
Ruothartengei an honga, a ruok hah an thoma, an rojôna, male an phûm zoi.
Dâr inthum vêl suole a dôngma khom ite roi riet loiin a hong lûta.
Peter'n amanu kôm, “Na pasal le neinun man nin man hah hi dôr veihi mo ani, ni ril roh?” tiin a rekela, “O, ma dôr vai hih ani,” tiin amanu han a thuona.
Masikin Peter'n amanu kôm han, “Ithomo Pumapa Ratha minsinna rangin no lômpa le nin inruol? En ta atûn hin na lômpa phûm ngei khom mokota an hong tung nôk zoi so, male nangma khom nang rojôn nôk an tih,” a tia.
Hanchu voikhat rengin Peter ke kunga han ân leta a thi kelena. Ruothartengei hah an hong lûta, amanu hah a thîn an hong mua, masikin an rojôn paia, a pasal kôla han an phûmsa zoi.
Koiindang mi murdi ngei le midangngei ha roi a riet murdi'n chu asân an chi sabak zoi.
Tîrtonngei chu mipui lâia kamâmruoingei le sininkhêl tamtak an tho tira. Iempungei anrêngin Solomon Bokropa an intûpkhôm ngâia.
An pâl pêntieng mingei hah tute an kôma kop ngam khâimak ngeia, nikhomsenla mingeiin anni ngei hah an minpâk ngâi.
Hannirese Pumapa iempungei pasal le nupang tamtakin an pâla kopin an hong pung bang ani.
Tîrtonngei sintho sika han, damloingei khom khalâidung lamlienngeia an hong rojôna, jâlmunngeia, puonphângeia an min jâl ngeia, Peter hong inlôi zorân a rilîm tete luon mi minli thei duoi mo, an tia.
Jerusalem kôl revêla khopuingei renga mipuingei an honga, damloingei, ramkhori sûrngei an hong tuonga; anrêngin an dam let zoi.
Hanchu ochai Inlaltak le a champui Sadduceengei murdi an honga, tîrtonngei hah an narsa ngei tataka, dûkmintong ngei rang an masata.
Tîrtonngei hah an sûr ngeia intâng ina an khum ngei zoi.
Hannirese, jâna Pumapa vântîrton inkhatin intâng in mokot hah ajuong mo-onga, pêntieng a tuong ngeia male an kôm,
“Se ungla Biekina vân ding ungla, male mipuingei kôm hi ringna thar roi hih varil roi,” a tia.
Ma chong hah an jôma, male an sea, khuovârchak dôrin Pathien Biekina an lûta, mi an minchu phut zoi. Hanchu Ochai Inlaltak le a champuingei hah an honga, Juda ulienngei murdi hah roijêkna lientak nei rangin an koi bûma; an makunga rangin tîrtonngei varuoi rangin intâng ina mi an tîra.
Aniatachu, ulienngei hah an vatungin chu intâng ina han tîrtonngei hah tute va mu khâi mak ngeia, masikin an hong kîr nôka,
“Intâng in ha asadimin inkhârin a rungpungei mokotngeia indingin kin va mua; hannirese kin mo onga asûnga tute mu mak me,” tiin an hong rila.
Biekina ochaisi le ruoipu ulien han ha chong hah an rietin chu, “Tîrtonngei chunga imo atung ani zoi hih,” tiin an kamâm sabak zoia.
Hanchu mi inkhat a honga, an kôm, “Rangâita u! Intâng ina mi nin khum ngei han Biekina mi an minchu ngei bang so,” tiin a hong rila.
Hanchu ruoipu ulien hah a champuingei le an honga tîrtonngei hah rangrât song loiin an hong ruoi ngeia, rangrât an songin chu mipuingeiin lungin me deng ni ngei ti an chi sikin.
Tîrtonngei asûnga an hong tuonga male roijêkna muna an inding ngeia, male Ochai Inlaltak han chong a rakel ngeia.
“Hi mi riminga hin minchu tet khâi loi rangin chong inngartak nangni kin pêka, aniatachu en ta u nin chongrilin Jerusalem nin min sipzit zoi hi! hi mi thina hih keini ngei mi minpêl rang nin bôk ani hih!” tiin a ti pe ngeia.
Peter le tîrton dangngei han, “Miriemngei chong nêkin Pathien chong kin jôm ngêt rang ani.
Nangnin Khrosa peret leh nin jêmdela nin that Jisua hah ei richibulngei Pathien'n a kaithoi nôk zoi.
Israelngei nunsie minsîr ngeia ngâidam an chang theina rangin Ama ngêt hah Pathien'n Ruoipu le Sanminringpu ni rangin a changtienga rangin a kaithoi zoia.
Keini hih ha roi rietpuipungei kin nia, Keini le Ratha Inthieng, Pathien'n chong jôm ngei kai kôma a pêk ngâi hah kin ni sa,” tiin an thuona.
Hanchu roijêkpungei han ma chong ha an rietin chu asân an ning athika, tîrtonngei hah thatpai rang an bôka.
Hannirese an lâia Pharisee inkhat a riming Gamaliel, Balam minchupu le mitinin mirit an tho ngâi hah Roijêkna han ândinga. Tîrtonngei hah pêntieng chomolte mojôk rangin chong a pêka,
hanchu roijêkpungei makunga han, “Ki Israel champuingei, hi mingei chunga tho ranga nin bôk chunga hin indîn roi.
Moton han khom Theudas, ‘Milien ki ni’ tiin a hong oma, mi raza minli dôr an jûi ti nin la riet, nikhomrese ama hah thatin a oma, a nûk jûipungei khom anrêngin chekaninchâi zita ite ni khâimak ngei.
Ma suonûk khom han, intelna zora lâiin Galilee rama om Judas hah a hong om nôka; a tieng mi tamtak an kop nôka, aniatachu, ama khom thatin a om nôka a nûk jûipungei murdi khom chekaninchâi zit nôka.
Masikin ma roia hin nangni ki ti, hi mingei hih tôn ngei no roi, omchien rese ngei! tho ranga an bôk le an sintho ngei hih miriem renga ânzir anînchu mong nôk kelen atih,
hannirese Pathien renga an tho anînchu mene no tunui, Pathien doi kêng nin hong changna rang!” a tia. Roijêkna han Gamaliel chong hah an poma.
Tîrtonngei hah asûnga an koi ngeia, an vîk ngeia, Jisua rimingin thurchi misîr tet khâiloi rangin chong an pêk ngeia, male an mojôk ngei zoi.
Hanchu, roijêkpungei lâi renga an jôka Jisua riming sika tuong thei rangin intelin an om sikin asân an râiasâna.
Male anîngtin Biekin le insûng ngeia thurchisa misîrin, Jisua chu Messiah ani tiin an misîr bang ngâi.
Ma zora han, ruoisingei an hong pung bang lâia han, anîngtin an neinun sema han meithâingei rang lunghâng an tho ngâiloi sikin Greek chong mang Judangei hah, Juda Hebrew ngei chunga an chiera.
Masikin, tîrton sômleinik ngei han iempungei murdi an koibum zita, “Pathien chongril mâksanin anîngtin sum puon jêk kin changin chu dik noni.
Masikin, champuingei nin lâia mi Ratha Inthienga asip le vârna dôn pasal sari inthang ungla, an kôm hi sin hih minkol kin tih,
Keini chu chubaitho le chongrilin om kin tih,” an tia.
Tîrtonngei chong han mipuingei murdi an râiasâna, masikin Stephan taksôn dettak le Ratha Inthienga sip le Philip, Prochoras, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Nikolas Jentail Juda lei chang Antioch mi an thang suok ngeia.
Ma mi sari ngei hah tîrtonngei makunga an minding ngeia, tîrtonngei han an lu chunga kut min ngamin chubai an thoa.
Masikin Pathien thurchi inzarin a oma, Jerusalema ruoisingei asân an hong punga, ochai lâia mi tamtak khomin taksônna hah an pomsa zoi.
Stephan chu Pathien satvurna tamtak changin le sinthotheinân a sipa, mipui lâia kamâmruoi le sininkhêl roiinpuitak a tho ngena.
Hannirese Cyrene khuo le Alexandria khuo renga Juda senkhat (suok renga jôk) Synagog an tia kop sa ngâi ngei le Cilicia ram le Asia rama Judangei an honga, Stephan an hôn khalpuia.
Aniatachu Ratha han ma anga vârna a pêka han a hong chongin chu makhal mindok thei ngâi mak ngei.
Hanchu, “Moses le Pathien a rilminsiet kin riet,” min ti rangin mi senkhat sum le an methêmin an lei dara.
Ma anghan, mipuingei, Upangei le Balam minchupungei an misieta. Stephan hah an minsûra, Judangei roijêkna an tuonga.
Mi senkhat a chungroia milak tho rangin an hong tuonga anni han, “Hi mi, hin kin Biekin Inthieng le Moses Balam a rilminsiet bang ngâi.
Nazereth Jisua'n, hi Biekin hih set a ta, Moses'n balam mi pêk ngei hah thûl atih, tiin a misîr kin riet!” an tia.
Roijêkna muna om murdi'n Stephan hah an enruma, a mâi hah vântîrton mêl angin an mu zoi.
Ochai Inlaltak han Stephan kôm, “hi chong hi adik mo?” a tia.
Stephan'n, “Ka lâibungngei ka pangei rangâi roi, ei richibul Abraham hah Haran khuoa ava om mân, Mesopotamia rama aom lâihan, roiinpuina Pathien hah a kôm ânlâra.
‘Na ram le ni insûngmingei mâksan inla, ram nang ka la min mûna rang tieng se roh,’ a tipea.
Masikin, a ram renga ânphêta, Harana om rangin a sea. Abraham a pa thi suole, ha mun renga atûna nin omna rama hin Pathien'n nangni a min thon ani.
Pathien'n ite mun luorang, a ke sirna rang dôr luo pêk maka, aniatachu ama le anûka a richisuonpârngei tena pêk rangin ânkhâm ani. Pathien'n ha chong ânkhâm lâihan Abraham chu nâi la dôn mak.
Pathien'n hi anghin a tia, ‘Nin richisuonpârngei chu mi rama khuolmi la nîng an ta, kum raza minli mi suoka omin asân dûkmintong la nîng an tih.
Hannirese suoka tuong rang mingei chu keiman jêk ka ta; masuole jôk an tih, hi muna hin ni la biek an tih,’ a tia.
Pathien'n Abraham kôm chonginkhitin an sertan rangin chong a pêk zoi. Masikin Abraham han a nâipasal Isaac hah sûn sari suoleh a ser a tanpea; Isaac'n a nâi Jakob a tanpe nôka, Jakob'n a nâi sômleinik ei richibulngei inthang ngei a tanpe nôka.
“Jakob nâipasalngeiin an lâibungpa Joseph hah an narsa zoia, Egypt rama suok rangin an juora, hannirese, Pathien'n a ompuia.
Intak a tuongna murdia a san minjôka, Egypt rama Rêng Pharoah mitmua mi vârtak le midit omtak a min nia; Pharaoh han Egypt ram le a ina mi murdi chunga râiôt ni rangin a min changa.
Hanchu Egypt le Canaan ram pumpuia mâitâm achula, asân intak an tuonga, ei richibulngei han sâk le nêk rang reng man khâimak ngeia.
Jakob'n Egypt rama bu aom ti a rietin chu a nâingei a tîra, ma hah an se phutna tak alei ni.
Avoinikna an se han Joseph han a lâibungngei le inrietna a lei thopui ngeia, Egypt Rêng han khom Joseph insungmingei a lei riet zoia.
Hanchu, Joseph han a pa Jakob le a insûngmingei murdi Egypt rama om rangin a koia, an rêngin sômsari-leirangnga anni.
Hanchu Jakob hah Egypt rama a va sea ha muna han ama le a nâipasalngei chu an thi zoia.
A ruok hah Shechem khuo an hong chôia, Hamor rûingei renga Abraham'n suma a rochôk thâna han an phûm zoi.
“Abraham kôma Pathien chongkhâm ahongtung rang zora ahong nâi tena ha mingei hah Egypt rama an hong pung zoia.
Anûktaka Egypt rama han rêng dang Joseph riet loi ahong inlal zoia.
Ama han ei richibulngei hah a huong ngeia, dûk amintong ngeia, nâitesenngei ring loina rangin an suok suo pêntieng pai rangin rangrâtin chong a pêka.
Ma zora tak han Moses ajuon zira nâitesen mêl satak a nia. A pa ina thân thum an donsuia,
an in renga an pai suo nûkin, Pharaoh nâinupangin a lâka a nâipasal rangin a vâia.
Moses hah Egypt rama vârna murdi an minchua, hanchu chongril theitak le sinthothei tak a hongni zoi.
“Kum sômminli a hong nînchu, a mulung sûnga a sungsuok Israel champuingei kho angin mo an om mu rang nuomin ava pana.
A va sên chu mi inkhat Egypt min dûk amintong lâi ava mua, masikin a sanna, dûktongpu chunga han phûba a laka Egypt mipa hah a thata.
(Moses han, ama mangin Pathien'n a mingei mojôk atih ti a sungsuok ngeiin an riet mini tiin a bôka hannirese riet mak ngei.)
Anangtûka chu Isreal mi inik insuol lâitak ava tonga ava sel ngeia, ‘Rangâita u sûngsuokngei,’ lâibungrêng kêng nin ni, ithomo hima anga nin insuola? tiin min sûk ngei rang a bôka.
A theiloi uolpu han Moses hah a nampaia, ‘Kin chunga ruoipu le roijêkpu rangin tumo nang phun?’ a tia.
‘Majâna Egypt mi na that angdên han ni that nôk rang no bôk mo?’ a tia.
Ma chong hah a riet lehan, Moses a rota, Midian rama ava oma, mahan nâipasal inik a neia.
“Kum sômminli avun suole chu, Sinai Muol ramchâr kôla chîmbuk akângna han vântîrton a kôm ânlâra.
Moses'n a neinun mu hah a kamâm tataka, minthâr rang bôkin a va nâia, Pumapa rôl a rieta:
‘Keima hih ni richibulngei Pathien, Abraham Pathien Isaac Pathien, Jakob Pathien hah ki ni,’ a lei tia, Moses hah ichîn ânnîka en ngam khâi maka.
Pumapa'n, a kôm, ‘Ne kekokngei ha khek roh, nên dingna mun hah mun inthieng kêng.
Egypt rama ki mi omngei dengthei tie ku mua, an inrûmnangei khom ki rieta anni ngei minjôk rangin ku juong ani. Hong ta; Egypt rama nang lei tîr rong,’ a tia.
“Ha Moses kôma ruoipu le roijêkpu rangin tumo nang phun? tia an makhal hah chîmbuk kângna taka vântîrton a kôma inlâr han a sanna, Pathien'n ama lele hah ruoipu le sanminjôkpu ni rangin ai tîr ani.
Ama han anni hah a ruoisuoka Egypt rama, tuipui sena, ramchâra kum sômminli sûng han Kamânruoi le sininkhêl tamtak thôn a ruoi ngeia.
Moses hah Israel mingei kôm, ‘Pathien'n keima, mi tîr angin nin sûngsuokngei lâia om dêipu nangni la minchang pe atih,’ tipu hah ani.
Ama hah ani ramchâra Israel mi intûp ngei lâia oma; ei richibulngei kôma le Sinai muola a chongpuipu vântîrton kôma, eini mi pêk ranga Pathien chong ring lâkpu hah ani.
“Hannirese ei richibulngei han a chong jôm nuom mak ngeia; ama hah an nampaia male Egypt ram tieng kîr nôk an nuoma.
Masikin Aaron kôm, ‘Kin moton ruoipu rangin pathienngei mi sin pe roh. Moses Egypt ram renga mi ruoipu laka a thurchi reng riet khâi mak meh,’ an tia.
Masuole chu, ma ngei han serât chalte rimil an sina, a rimil hah sa thatin an bieka, male an kut suoka han mirit thonân ruolhoi an thoa an râi an minsâna.
Hanchu, Pathien'n anni hah nûk a song ngeia, invâna ârsingei an biek theina rangin a rotsan ngeia, dêipu lekhabua: ‘Israel insung mingei! kum sômminli sûngin ramchâra han inbôlna sa thatin nin pêk ngâi hah keima ni mu ung.
Molech pathien puon-in nin chôia nin pathien le Rephan nin ârsi pathien; rimilngei hah chubaimûk rangin nin sin ngei hah an ni. Masikin Babylon khêl tieng nangni min tâng ki tih, tia ânziek anghan.’
“Ramchâra han ei richibulngeiin Pathien omna Puon-in an neia, ma in hah Pathien'n Moses kôm sin rangin a bea, a rimil a min mu lam taka sin ani.
Ha ngei hah ei richibulngei khomin an hong dôn banga, Pathien'n ei richibulngei motona ai not pai nâmngei rama an luo lâihan Joshua lût zorân an lûtpui ani. David a zora tena a oma.
Ha David hah Pathien mitmua miditin a hong oma, Jacob Pathien ta ranga omna rang sin pe rangin a zonga.
Hannirese, in hah chu Solomon'n kêng a sin pe zoi.
“Nikhomrese, Ânchungtak Pathien chu kuta sin in ngeia om ngâi mak; Dêipu'n,
‘Pumapa'n, invân ke Rêngsukmun ania pilchung ke ke sirna ani. I anga in mo mi ni sin pe rang? Khotieng mo kên ngamna rang mun khom aom?
Hi neinun murdi hih keima ki sin nimak mo?’
“Khodôra mulung ngar mo nin ni! Mulungrîl le kuor in-ongloi sertanloingei anga, nin richibulngei tho ngâi lam angin Ratha Inthieng nin dem tita!
Nin richibulngeiin, dêipungei lâia tumo dûkmintong loia an dar? midik tak juong rang lei juong ril Pathien tîrtonngei hah an thata, atûn nangni hih mi min sûrpu le a thatpu nin ni hi.
Nangni hi Pathien balam, vântîrtonngeiin an juong thak muchaka jômloi ngei nin ni!” a tia.
Roijêkpungei han Stephan chong hah an rietin chu an takasia, a chunga an rakam an tâta.
Hannirese, Stephan hah Ratha Inthienga sip ania, invân tieng a en ngita, Pathien roiinpuina le a changtienga Jisua inding a mua.
“En ta u! invân in-ong ku mua, Pathien changtienga Miriem Nâipasal inding ku mu!” a tia.
Hanchu, roijêkpungei han inringtakin an inieka, an kutngei leh an kuorngei an hîpa. Hanchu ha renghan a tieng an tâna.
Khopuilien sûng renga an mojôk paia, lungin an dênga rietpuipungei han ruotharte inkhat a riming Sual an tih kôm han an puon an mâka.
Lungin an dêng lâiin Stephan'n Pumapa a koia, “Pumapa Jisua ka Ratha lâk ta roh,” a tia.
Khûk ânbila, rôl inringtakin ânieka, “Pumapa! hi an sietna hih riet pe ngei khâi no roh!” a tia. Ha chongbâi hah a ti suole chu a thi zoi.
Male Saul khomin Stephan thi hah apompui sa. Ma nikhuo renga han Jerusalema koiindangngei hah dûk an mintong ngei kelen zoia. Hanchu tîrtonngei telloi iempu adang nâm chu Judea le Samaria ram khuotina chek an inchâi zita.
Pathien sabei senkhatin Stephan ruok hah an phûma, mulungna takin an châ zoi.
Sual chu koiindang minboipai rang bôkin in tina a lûta, iempungei nupang, pasal a kaisuo ngeia intâng ina a khum ngei zoi.
Iempu khuotina chekinchâi ngei hah muntina an sea, thurchisa an ril tira.
Philip chu Samari khopuilien a lûta, an kôm Khrista thurchi a rila.
Mipuingeiin Philip chongril an rieta, sininkhêl a tho ngei an mûn chu a chongril ngei hah asân an rangâia.
Ramkhoringei hah inringtakin in-iekin mi tamtak sûng renga an hong jôka, phalkhatthi le kholra tamtak khom a mindam ngeia.
Ha khuo mingei hah an râisân tataka.
Ma khopui han mi inkhat a riming Simon, dôithei a oma, mi inlal takin an bea, Samari mingei han a dôi hah an kamâm tataka.
Khopuilien sûnga mi murdi, achîn alienin a chong asân an rangâia, “Hi mi hih Pathien sinthotheina roiinpui an ti hah ani,” an tia.
A mitphildôi hah zora sôttak kamâm tataka an lei ti zoi sikin a chong kamâm omtak hah an rangâi ngâia.
Aniatachu Pathien Rêngram thurchisa le Jisua Khrista riming Philip'n a ril hah an iem le chu nupang, pasalin baptisma an changa.
Simon khomin a iema; baptisma a chang zoia, Philip kôm han aom bang ngâia, sininkhêl kamâmruoi a sinngei hah a mua kamâm aom sabak a tia.
Jerusalema tîrton omngei han Samari khuoa omngei chu Pathien chong an pom zoi tih an rieta Peter le John an kôm an tîra.
Anni hah an tungin chu a iempu thar ngeiin Ratha Inthieng an chang theina rangin chubai an thope ngeia.
An lâia tute chunga khom Ratha Inthieng la chum mak; Pumapa Jisua riminga baptisma an chang vai kêng ala ni.
Hanchu Peter le John'n an lu chunga kut an minngama, male Ratha Inthieng an chang zoi.
Tîrtonngei han iempungei chunga kut an min ngamin Ratha Inthieng pêk an ni ti, Simon han amûn chu, Peter le John hah sum a pêk ngeia,
“Hi anga sinthotheina hi mi pêk roi, tu chunga khom ku kut ki minngamna chita Ratha Inthieng an chang theina rangin,” a tia.
Hannisenla, Peter'n a kôm han, “Nangma le nu sum hih meidîla se rese, Pathien manboipêk suma rochôk rang no bôk sikin!
Kin sinna hin kopna le rangtum dôn mak che, nu mulungrîl Pathien mitmûn adikloi sikin.
Masikin, hih no bôkna saloi renga hi insîr inla Pumapa kôm invûi roh, ni mindon hih nang ala ngâidam theina rangin.
Mulungrîl bôkna khâtak ne pêla, sietnân nang a khitrap iti nang ki riet,” a tia.
Simon'n Peter le John kôm, “Nin ti ngei hi inkhat luo ku chunga atung loina rangin nangnin rangâihoitak Pumapa kôm chubai mi thope roi,” a tia.
Peter le John'n an thurchi le Pumapa thurchi an misîr zoiin chu Jerusalema an kîr nôka, lampuia Samari rama khuo tamtaka Thurchi Sa an misîra.
Pumapa tîr vântîrtonin Philip hah a chongpuia, “Inthok inla, Jerusalem renga Gaza panna lampuia saktieng ramchâr pielna han se roh,” a tia. (Atûn hin chu hi lampui hih mang nikhâi mak.)
Masikin Philip ânthoka a sea. Ethopia rama mi inkhat an Rêngnu nuoia sinpêl milien inlaltak a sum murdi enkolpu, Jerusalema Pathien chubaimûk rangin a sea. A kîr nôk tieng chu tali chunga chuongin dêipu Isaiah lekhabu a porea.
<range>
Ratha'n Philip kôm, “Tali so va pan inla vanâi roh,” a tia.
Hanchu Philip a tâna, dêipu Isaiah lekhabu a pore hah a rieta, no pore hah ni rietthei mo? tiin a rekela.
“Ama'n tutên mi rilminthâr pe loiin i angin mo ki riet thei ranga?” tiin a thuona. Hanchu Philip ha tali chunga a kala a kôla insungpui rangin a koia.
Pathien lekhabu a pore hah ma hi ani: “Belri that rang angin belri angin ama hah an tuonga, Belrite a mul eplâitak khomin a dâirek angin, Chongbai khat luo ti maka.
Ântem lâiin a roijêkna hah lâkpe'n a oma. A richisuonpârngei thurchi tûn mo ril ta nih, Rammuol renga a ringna ahek zoi sikin,” ti hi.
Milien han Philip kôm han, “Ni ril ta, dêipu hin tu thurchi mo a misîr? Ama thurchi mo, midang thurchi mo?” tiin a rekela.
Hanchu Philip'n, hi Pathien lekhabua phutin Jisua Khrista Thurchi sa a rila.
An sea suk an chumin chu, tui omna an tunga, milien han “mahin tui aom, baptis ka chang loina rangin imo mikhap?” a tia.
Philip'n a kôm, “Nu mulungrîl murdi'n ni iemin chu na chang thei,” a tia. Ama han, “Ki iem,” Jisua Khrista chu Pathien nâi ani ti ki iem, tiin a thuona.
Hanchu, tali ha an min ngama, an chuma Philip le milien hah tuia an juong sea. Philip'n Ethopia milien hah baptis a min changa.
Tui renga an hong jôka, Pumapa Ratha Inthiengin Philip hah a lâk min manga, ama hah mu khâi maka, hankhom râisântakin a in tieng a sea.
Philip chu mingeiin Azotus khuoa an mu nôka, hanchu a sea, Caesarea khuo a tung mâka chu khopui murdia Thurchi Sa a misîr tira.
Saul han Pumapa jûipungei hah en nuom ngei maka, anrêngin that let rang aphuta. Hanchu Ochai Inlalngei kôm a sea.
Damascusa Khuoa Synagog mingei kôma pêk rang lekha a min mizieka, ma khuo han a nuom lam takin sin a thothei tiin an lei rietna rang ani, tukhom Pumapa jûi mi amûn chu nupang mo, pasal mo, a sûra Jerusalema a hongtuong theina rangin.
Hanchu, Saul hah Damascusa a tung rangtôn, inningloi rengin invân renga vârin ajuong êla.
pila ânlet paia, rôl miring a rieta, “Saul, Saul! ithomo ma angtaka dûk mini tho hih?” a tia.
Hanchu, Saul han, “Pumapa tumo ni ni?” tiin a rekela. Hanchu, rôl miring han, “Keima Jisua, dûk ni mintong bângpu hah ki ni.”
“Nikhomrese, inthoi inla khopuilien sûnga va senla, mahan ni sintho rang nang lei ril an tih,” a tia.
Saul leh munkhata se ngei chu, chong theiloi le a mindona chang riet loiin, an inding chiena, rôl miring hah chu an rieta, aniatachu tute mu mak ngeia.
Saul hah nuoi renga ânthoia male a mitngei ahong menga, hannirese, tute muthei khâi maka, a kuta an kaia Damascusa khuo tieng an sepuia.
Sûnthum dôr chu khoite muthei loi le sâk nêk khom sâk thei loiin a oma.
Ma zora han Damascusa khuoa Khristien iempu mi inkhat a riming Ananias a oma. Inlârnân Pumapa a mua, “Ananias!” a tia, Ananias'n, “Pumapa hin ko om,” tiin a thuona.
Pumapa han a kôm, “Ananias insiem inla, Lamlien Tûn son va sênla, Judas ina Tarsus mi a riming Sual an ti hah va rok roh, ama'n chubai a tho tit.
Male inlârnân mi inkhat a riming Ananias a sea, a mitngei minvâr pe rangin a lu chunga a kutngei minngamin chubaitho pe rangin nang a lei mu zoi,” a tia.
Ananias'n, “Pumapa ma miriem han Jerusalema khuo mingei dûk amintong lam mi tamtak ngeiin min rila.
Male atûnhin khom Damascusa khuoa nang jûipungei, sûrna rang phalna lekha ochaisingei kôm renga a dôn,” a tia.
Pumapa han, “va se roh, ama hah ki sinthopu rangin ka thang zoi, hi Jentailngei, Rêngngei le Israel mingei ki riming min riet ranga ki tîr rang ani.
Keima sikin idôrmo dûk a la tong rang nang la ril ki tih,” a tia.
Masikin Ananias hah a sea, Saul omna ina a lûta, male Saul chunga a kutngei a minngama “Sungsuok Saul ni mit vâr nôkna rang le Ratha Inthieng sipa no om theina rangin no hongna lampuia na kôma inlârpu Pumapa Jisua'n ni hongtîr ani,” a tia.
Harenghan, a mitngei renga ngalip angati ajuong tâka, a mitngei ahong vârpe nôka. Hanchu ânthoia baptis a changa;
Male bu, an, a nêka a hong har nôk zoi. Saulin sûn tomte Damascusa iempungei kôm oma.
Synagog taka a lût pata Khrista thurchi a rila, Jisua chu Pathien nâipasal ani tiin a ril phut kelen zoia.
A chongril riet ngei murdi'n asân an kamâm tataka, “Hi mi hih Jerusalema Jisua riming ralam ngei dûk lei mintong ngâipu hah nimak mo? Ha mingei hah khita ochaisingei kôma tuong ranga mahin khom a hong nimak mo?” an tia.
Hannirese Saul chongril hah ranak a dôn teteta, male Jisua chu Khrista ani tiin a ril minthâr han mi a mene thei oka, Damascus taka aom Judangei khomin makhal thei khâi mak ngei.
Sûn tamtak suole chu Saul that rangin Judangei lungvâr an thoa,
hannirese ama'n an lungvâr tho hah a rieta, that rang bôkin rukul mokot tina sûn le jân an muruonga.
Hannirese a nûkjûingeiin Saul an tuonga, jâna rukul kotvêng renga kok leh makhâiin an musum zoi.
Hanchu Saul hah Jerusalema a sea, ruoisingei inloppui rang a bôka, hannirese anni han ruoisi ani sa ti iem mak ngeia, anrêngin achiin an chia.
Hanchu Barnabas a tuonga tîrtonngei kôm a sepuia. Lampuia Pumapa a mu tie ngei, Pumapa'n a kôma a ti pe ngei, Damascusa taka Jisua riminga hâitaka chong a ril tie ngei an kôm a misîr pe ngeia.
Male Saul hah an kôm a om zoia, Jerusalem pumpuia hâitakin Pumapa rimingin chong a rila.
Greek chong mangin Judangei lâia chong a rila, a makhala, anni rêkin chu that rangin an pûta.
Ha chong hah koiindang mingeiin an rietin chu Saul hah Caesarea khuo an tuonga, Tarsus khuoa an tîr pat zoi.
Male Judea ram, Galilee ram le Samari ram pumpuia koiindang hah dengtheina an jôk zoia. Pumapa mân thôn an oma, Ratha Inthieng ompuinân an rât uola, an mijôn ahong pung tetet zoia.
Peter'n muntina a chaia, sûnkhat chu Ludda khuo Pathien mingei omna a juong sea.
Mahan mi inkhat a riming Aeneas an ti kum riet phalkhatthi sika jâlmuna jâl a mua.
Peter'n a kôm han, “Aeneas, Jisua Khrista'n nang a mindam zoi inthoi inla na jâlmun luok roh,” a tia, hanchu harenghan ânthoia.
Ludda le Sharona mi murdi'n ama an mua Pumapa tieng an hong inhei zoi.
Joppa khuoa han Jisua lei iem nuvengte inkhat a riming Tabitha a oma. (Greek riming Dorcas, mahi, “sakhi,” tina ani.) Amanu han azora dôn murdi sin sa le inriengngei sannân a lei mang ngâi ani.
Ma zora han dam maka, a thi zoia, tui an min buola inchunginchuon khâltana an min jâla.
Ludda khuo hah Joppa khuo kôl ani sikin, iempungeiin Peter Ludda khuoa aom ti an rieta, “Rangâihoitakin inrangralin mi hong pe roh,” tia koi rangin mi inik an tîra.
Masikin Peter inthoiin anni ngei lehan an sea. A tung leh an inchunginchuon khâltan sûnga an tuonga. Dorcas kôla indingin meithâingei tamtakin an chapa, an kôm aom lâia kâncholingei le puonngei hah a sûi ngei hah Peter an min mua.
Peter'n anrêngin pêntieng a mojôk ngeia, male Khûkinbilin chubai a thoa, hanchu ruok tieng ânheia, “Tabitha inthoi roh,” a tia. Tabitha hah a hong menga Peter hah a mua, a hong insunga.
Peter'n a kut a pêka a kaithoia, hanchu iempungei le meithâingei a koia, Tabitha hah aringin a pêk ngei zoi.
Ma roi hah Joppa khuoa ânthang zita, mi tamtakin Pumapa an hong iem zoi.
Peter chu sûn tamtak Joppa khuo savun sinngâipu Simon ina ala châma.
Caesarea khuo mi inkhat a riming Cornelius an ti, “Rom râlmi pâl raza-ruoipu a oma” maha Italy râlmi an ti ngâi.
Ama hah Pathien biek mi ania, ama leh a insûng mingei nâm anrêngin Pathien lei biek ngâi an ni. Judangei lâia inriengngei sanin asân ranak a song ngâia, Pathien kôma khom chubai a tho bang ngâia.
Sûnkhat chu chonûk dâr thumin inlârna inthârlak a mua, Pathien vântîrton inkhat a kôm ahong lûta, “Cornelius!” a hong tia.
Cornelius'n ama hah a en ngita, a chia, “Pu mahi imo?” a tia. Vântîrtonin a thuona nu chubaithona le nu lungkhamna sinngei hah Pathien'n a râisânna nang a thuon rang ke ani zoi.
Atûn Joppa khuoa mi tîr inla, mi inkhat a riming Simon Peter an ti hah hong min koi roh.
Savun sin ngâipu Simon ina a tunga, a in chu tuikhanglien panga aom a tia.
Hanchu vântîrton hah a rot suole, Cornelius'n a tîrlâmngei mi inik le râlmi inkhat, Pathien biek ngâi a tîrlâma a mang ngâi a koia.
A mu le a riet murdi a ril zoiin chu Joppa khuoa se rangin a tîra.
Anangtûka an sea, Joppa khuo kôl an tungin chu, Peter hah chubaitho rangin sûna inchunga a kala.
A von a châm sabaka, bunêk rang a nuoma hannisenla nêk rang a mintuo lâitakin inlârna a mua.
Invân in-ongin puon lienpa arikil minlia inthung invân renga nuoia juong chum a mua.
Ha sûng han sa ake minli jât tamtakngei le rama vângei an omna, a rôpa intolngâi ngei.
A kôm han rôlin, Peter, “Inthoi roh; that inla sâk roh!” a tia.
Hannisenla Peter'n “Pumapa nimak! ânthiengloi le porinche ite sâk ngâi mu ung” a tia.
Rôl han avêlin a kôma, “Pathien'n ânthieng zoi a ti hih nangman ite ânthiengloiin mindon no roh,” a ti nôka.
Ha anghan, voithum ajuong oma, masuole chu invân tieng lâk paiin a om nôk zoi.
Hanchu, Peter'n inlârna a mu hah a mindonna chang riet loiin a om lâitak han, Cornelius mi tîr ngei hah Simon in rekelin mokot kôla an lên dinga.
Mahin Simon Peter a tung mo? tiin an rekela.
Peter'n inlârna ai mu hah a mindon lâitakin, Ratha'n a kôma, “Rangâi roh! Mi inthumin nang an rok.
Masikin inthok inla chum roh, ite kamâm loiin jûi ngei roh, anni hah ko hongtîr ngei ke” a tia.
Masikin Peter hah a chuma, an kôm han, nin rokpu hah “Keima ki ni, imo nin hongna abi?” a tia.
Anni han, “Râlmi raza ruoipu Cornelius mi hongtîr ani. Ama hah mi sa Pathien biek ngâi mi le Juda mi murdi'n mirit an tho ngâi mi ania. Pathien vântîrtonin nangma hah a ina koi rangin a tipea, no chongril rangâi rangin” an tia.
Ha mingei hah a koi lût ngeia, a min riek ngeia. Anangtûka ânthoka anni ngei leh, Joppa khuo iempu senkhat ngei le munkhatin an sea.
Anangtûk nôka chu Caesarea khuo an tung zoia, Cornelius han a sûngsuokngei le a ruolngei a koibûma, Peter ngei an lei ngâk chiena.
Hanchu Peter ava lût rangtôn Cornelius'n a lei dônna, a ke bula khûkinbilin chubai a mûka.
Aniatachu Peter'n ama hah a kaithoia, “Inding roh, kei khom miriem dên ke ki ni,” a tia.
A kôm chong pumin insûnga a lûta, mi tamtak intûp ngei hah ava mua.
An kôm han, “Juda mîn, Juda mi niloi pan rang le inloppui rangin Juda balamin phal mak ti nangni rengin nin riet. Hannirese, tute inthiengloi le annima ke be loina rangin Pathien'n mi min mu ani.
Masika han mi nin hong min koia han, ite makhal viet loiin ko hong kelen ani. Masik han nangni ki rekel imo mi nin hong koina bi?” a tia.
Cornelius'n a kôma, “Atûn zora tena hin sûnthum ani zoi. Chonûk dâr thum vêlin ki ina chubai ko thoa; harenghan mi inkhat puon chêk invo ka makunga a juong indinga.
‘Cornelius! Pathien'n nu chubaithona a riet zoi, nu lungkhamna sin ngei khom a riettit.
Masikin Joppa khuoa mi tîr inla Simon Peter hong min koi roh, ama hah tuikhanglien panga savun sin ngâipu Simon ina a tung ani’ a tia.
Male han no kôm mi ko hongtîr kelena; no hong hih râisân aom sabak. Pumapa'n chongril ranga nang a pêk riet rangin atûn hin Pathien mitmu'n kin rêngin kin om ani hi,” a tia.
Peter a hong chonga hi anghin a tia: “Pathien'n jâttin le namtin in-angsara a en ti ki riet minthâr zoi.
Namtin lâia tukhom ama iema sin asa thopu murdi chu ama khôk thei mi anni ngâi.
Ama'n, mi murdi Pumapa, Jisua Khrista han Israel mingei kôma rangin inchamna râisânna Thurchi Sa chu a juong mintunga.
John'n Baptis roi a ril suole Galilee ram renga a phuta, Judea ram pumpuia a roi a chongril hah nin lei rieta.
Nazareth Jisua chu Pathien'n Ratha Inthieng le sinthotheinân min silin, Pathien han a ompui tita, sin sa thoa muntina a chai lâihan Diabol dûkmintong murdi ngei a mindama.
Judea ram le Jerusalema a sintho murdi rietpuipungei kin ni, ama hah Khrosa jêmdelin an that ani.
Hanniresea, Pathien'n sûnthum suole a kaithoia mu theiin ânlâra,
mitin mitmua chu inlâr maka, Pathien'n a rietpuipu ranga a lei thang keini ngei vai hin kin mu, ânthoinôk suole han Ama lehan kin sâkin kin nêk suom ngâi ani.
Male hah thurchisa ril rang le Ama hah mi ring le mithi chunga roijêkpu'n Pathien'n a phun ti mi murdi min riet rangin chong mi pêk ani.
Dêipungei murdi khomin ama iem murdi'n a riming sikin an sietnangei ngâidam nîng an tih,” tiin an lei ril ngâi a tia.
Peter chong a la ril bang lâiin, a chongril rangâi murdi chunga Ratha Inthieng ajuong chuma.
Juda iempungei Joppa khuo renga Peter hong jûipungei han Ratha Inthieng neinun pêk Jentailngei chunga khom ivur ani ti an rieta an kamâm oka.
Chong rietloia chongrilin le Pathien roiinpuina minpâkin an rieta, Peter'n a thuona,
“Hi mingei hi kin chang anga Ratha Inthieng an chang ania, tuia baptis chang rangin tumo khap thei ngei ranga?” a tia.
Masikin Jisua Khrista riminga baptis chang rang chong a pêk ngeia. Hanchu anni kôm han sûn tômte la châm rangin an ngêna.
Judea ram pumpuia tîrtonngei le iempungei hah Jentailngei khom Pathien chong an rieta an lei modôm zoi.
Peter hah Jerusalema a sea, hanchu sertan ngei han ama an lei dema, a kôm,
“Sertanloi Jentailngei ina nu tunga an kôma sâk khom na sâk ngâi!” an tia.
Masikin Peter'n abul renga anrêngin aroi omtie murdi a misîrpe ngâia.
“Joppa khopuiliena chubai ko tho lâiin, inlârna ku mua. Puon chêk lientak anghan arikil minlia inthung invân renga juong musum ko kôla juong om ku mua.
Mahan anâikikin ke enna insûng sa le ram sa, rôpa intol ngâi le vângei ku mua.
Masuole chong mirîng ki rieta ko kôm, ‘Inthoi roh Peter; that inla sâk roh,’ a tia.
Hannirese keiman ‘Nimak Pumapa! ânthieng loi le ânnim ite ka bâia lût ngâi mak’ ki tia.
Invân renga rôl han avoiniknân, ‘Pathien'n ânthieng a ti sai hi nangman inthieng mak tino roh!’ a ti nôka.
Ma anghan voithum ajuong oma masuole azoinataka chu invân tieng lâk pâiin a oma.
Ma zora tak han Caesarea renga mi inthum hongtîra om ngei hah ko omna in an hong tunga.
Ratha'n mulung inlakloia anni ngei jûi ngei rangin mi rila. Hi iempu uruk Joppa renga Caesarea hong ngei khom min jûisa kin rêngin Cornelius ina kin lûta.
Ama han a ina vântîrton inding a mua, vântîrton han a kôma, Joppa khuoa mi tîr inla mi inkhat a riming Simon Peter an ti hah hong minkoi roh.
Ama han chong nang misîrpe a ta, ama chong han nangma le ni insûngmingei sânminjôkin om nin tih, tiin khom mi ril sa.
Chongril ko hong phut lehan motona ei chunga ajuongtung anghan Ratha Inthieng an chunga ajuongtunga.
Male Pumapa'n a ti ‘John'n tui le mi a baptis ania, nangni chu Ratha Inthiengin baptis la chang nin tih,’ a ti hah ki rietsuok nôka.
Pumapa Jisua Khrista ei iema ama chongpêk nanâk hah Jentailngei khom a pêk ani ti ânthâr ani. Kei hih tumo ki ni, Pathien khap rang bôkpu hi!” a tia.
Ma chong hah an riet lechu dem khâi mak ngei, Pathien an minpâka, “Pathien'n Jentailngei khom insîra ring rangin zora inchum a pêk ani hi!” an tia.
Hanchu Stephan an that zora dûkmintongna sika chekinchâi ngei hah Phoenicia Ram, Cyprus tuikul le Antioch khuo dênin an sea Judangei kôm vai thurchi an rila.
Hannirese, iempu senkhat: Cyprus tuihuol le Cyrene a mingei hah Antioch'a an sea, Jentailngei kôm khom Thurchi Sa an misîra, Pumapa Jisua Thurchi Sa an rila.
Pumapa ranakin a san ngeia, mi tamtakin an iema, Pumapa tieng an inhei zoia.
Ma thurchi hah Jerusalema koiindang ngeiin an lei rieta, masikin Barnabas hah Antioch taka an tîra.
Ama hah a tungin chu mataka mingei Pathien'n satavur tie hah a mûn chu a râisân tataka, an mulungngei murdia Pathien taksônna om mindet rangin anrêngin a mohôk ngeia.
Barnabas hah mi satak, Ratha Inthieng le iemna sip ania, masikin mi tamtak Pumapa tieng a tuong zoia.
Hanchu Barnabas hah Saul rokin Tarsus khuoa a sea.
A mu lehan Antioch tieng a hong tuonga, kum khat piel koiindangngei inkhômna an inchel ngâia, mi tamtak an minchu sa ngâi. Antioch'a han kêng iempungei hah Khristien an ti masatak.
Ma zora han Dêipu senkhat ngei Jerusalem renga Antioch an sea.
An lâia mi inkhat a riming Agabus ândinga rammuol pumpuia mâitâm natak chul atih, ti ratha min rietin a phuonga; ha mâitâm hah Claudius inlal lâiin atung zoi.
Ha anghan, ruoisingei han an thei lam chitin Judea rama iempungei kôm sanna muthuon rang an masata.
Ma hah an thoa masuole sum han koiindang upangei kôm pêk rangin Barnabas le Saul kuta an muthuon zoi.
Hanchu, ma zora han, Rêng Herod'n koiindanga mi senkhat ngei a nunuom a lo zoia.
Jacob, John nâipa hah khandaiin a tuk thata.
Ama han Judangei an râiasân ok ti a rietin chu Peter khom sûr rang a bôk tita. (Ma zora hah cholboivâipôl ruolhoi zora ani).
Peter hah a sûr suole chu intâng ina a khuma, râlmi pâl minli minlin angâk an inthâklîpa. Kalkân kût ruolhoi chumin mipui makunga kai suoa jêk rangin a mintuo ani.
Masikin Peter hah intâng ina a khum rapa, hannirese, ama ta rangin koiindangngeiin ningsiettakin Pathien kôm chubai an thope ngâi.
Herod'n a kai suoa, a jêk rang nijân tak han chu Peter hah rungpungei inik kâra rênrokol inik bunin a jâla, a ngâkngei khom mokot bula an oma, an ngâk chiena.
Inningloiin vântîrton inkhat a kôla ajuong indinga intâng in sûnga han vâr ajuong inlanga. Vântîrton han Peter dâra anîk min hara, “Inrangin! inthoi roh!” a tia. Hanchu, voikhatrengin Peter kuta rênrokolngei hah a kutngei renga a tâkrila.
Masuole Vântîrton han a kôm, “No kongkhit mindên inla, ne kekok bun roh,” a tia. Peter'n ha anghan a thoa, hanchu vântîrton han a kôm, “Na kâncholiinchuol inhak inla, mi jûi roh,” a tia.
Peter intâng in renga a jôka, a jûi zoia; nikhomrese a tak ani ti riet mak, Vântîrton hah inlârna a mu mini kêng a bôka.
A rungngei inkhatna le inikna an khêlin chu khopuiliena lûtna thîr mokot an va tunga. Mokot hah athethenin alei in-onga, an jôka, lamlien inkhat an khêlin chu voikhatrengin vântîrton han Peter a mâk zoia.
Hanchu Peter hah a harin chu, “Pumapa'n a vântîrton a juongtîra, Herod kut renga le Judangei sabeina murdi renga mi mojôk ti adiktakin ki riet zoi,” a tia.
A mulung a min chong zoiin chu John Mark nû Mary ina a sea, mahan mi tamtak lên bûmin an lei chubaia.
Peter'n bokrop inkhâr a tôk lehan, tîrlâm inkhat Rhoda dôngmate han mo-ong rangin a sea.
Peter rôl a riet lechu a râisân rai sikin inkhâr mo ong loiin a tân nôka, “Peter inkot bula son ânding,” tiin a va rila.
Anni han a kôm, “Na châng ani zoi hi!” an tia. Ama'n chu adik tatak kêng? a ti tita. Anni han “a vântîrton nîng atih,” an tia.
Nikhomrese Peter'n a tôk tita nûktaka chu an va mo onga, ama hah an mua kamâm aom an ti tataka.
Ama han an dâirekna rangin a kut a jâpa, Pumapa'n intâng in renga a kêlsuo tie hah a misîr zoia. Hanchu, “Hi chong hih Jacob le iempu dangngei va ril roi,” a tia. Masuole chu a jôka ram danga a se zoi.
Hanchu, jîng ahongni lechu rungpungei hah, Peter imo a chang zoi? tiin asân an mulung ajîng zoia.
Herod han a rok rangin chong a pêk ngeia, hannirese mu mak ngeia a ngâkngei hah a rekela, that ngei rangin chong a pêk ngei zoi. Masuole chu, Herod judea khuo a mâka Caesarea khuoa môrkhat ava om zoi.
Hanchu, Herod hah Tyre le Sidon khuo mingei chunga a taksi sabaka. Anni han inruolin ama kôm se rangin an honga, rêng milien Blastus hah an malin an sin baka. Masuole Herod kôm an sea, an ram hah rêngpa ram renga sâk, nêk an man ngâi ani sikin inngêi rangin an ngêna.
A nikhuo khâm nîn chu Herod hah puon inlal insilin rêngsukmuna ânsunga, mipuingei kôm chong a misîra.
Mi murdi'n, “Miriem rôl nimak, Pathien rôl kêng,” an tia, an inieka.
Voikhatrengin ama han Pathien kôm miritna a pêk loi sikin Pumapa vântîrtonin voikhatrengin Herod chunga a kut a musuma, rûlkûtin a sâka, athi zoi.
Ma lâia han Pathien chong ânzara an pung tir zoi.
Barnabas le Saul'n an sintum an sin suole chu Jerusalem renga an kîr nôk zoia, John Mark hah an kôm an tuong sa.
Hanchu, Antioch koiindangngei lâia Dêipungei le minchupungei an oma; Ma ngei hah Barnabas ngei, Simeon (miduk an ti) ngei, Cyrene khuoa Lucius ngei, Manaen (Râiôt Herod'n a vâi minlien) ngei le Saul ngei an ni.
Pumapa sin an thoa, bu an ngêi lâiin Ratha Inthiengin an kôm, “Barnabas le Saul hih ko koina lama sintho rangin mi pêk roi,” a tia.
Bungêiin chubai an tho zoiin chu an chunga kutngei an minngama, an tîr ngei zoi.
Ha anghan, Ratha Inthieng tîrin an sea, Seleucia khuo an tunga, ha mun renga Cyprus tuihuola rukuongin an se zoia.
Hanchu, Salamis khuoa an tungin chu Judangei Synagog ngeia Pathien thurchi an misîra. John Mark hah an insanpui rangin an tuong sa.
Tuihuol hah Paphos dênin an chai suoa, dôithei, dêipu inti Juda inkhat a riming Bar-Jisua an tonga.
Ama hah tuihuol râiôt Sergius Paulus mi vâr tak khom a malpa ania. Ha râiôt han Pathien chong rangâi a nuom sikin Barnabas le Saul a koia.
Hannirese, dôipu Elimus (Greek riming) han râiôt hah takminsôn loi rang pûtin anni hah a lei deia.
Hanchu Saul, Paul an ti sa ngâi hah Ratha Inthiengin a sipa, dôipu hah a en ngita, a kôm,
male “Nangma khori nâipasal! satnangei nâm râlpa, milak ngei nâmin ni minsipa, zoratin Pathien chongtakngei hih chong milak min chang rang no bôk ngâi ani.
Atûn Pumapa kut nu chunga achum rang ani, ni mit jîng a ta, sûn khovâr mu khâino tini,” a tia. Sûm le ijîngin ama hah abok kelen zoia, a kairuoi rang mi zongin ânvâk titira.
Râiôt han ahong mu lehan khoimo atung hah, a iem zoia; Pumapa minchuna chungroi hah a kamâm oka.
Paul le a champuingei hah Paphos khopuilien renga rukuongin an sea, Pamphylia rama Perga an tunga, mahan John Mark'n anni hah a mâka, Jerusalema a kîr nôk zoia.
Anni hah Perga renga an se tita, Pisidia rama Antioch an tunga, male Sabbathnin chu Synagog taka an lûta, an insunga.
Moses balam le dêipungei lekhabungei an miziekngei hah an pore suole chu Synagog ulienngeiin an kôm mi an tîra: “Sûngsuokngei, mohôkna chong nin dôn aomin chu mipuingei kôm misîr rangin nangni kin nuom ani,” an tia.
Paul ândinga, a kutin a jâpa, thurchi misîr a phut zoia: “Ki Israel champuingei le Jentialngei murdi Pathien biek ngei, ko chong rangâi roi!
Israelngei Pathien mingei ei richibulngei a lei thanga, Egypt khuolmingei anghan an om lâiin nam lienpân a sina, a ranak lienin Egypt renga a kai suo ngeia,
male kum sômminli ramchâra an sinthongei hah a en chien theia.
Canaan rama nam sari an inmanga, a mingei a ram puma a minchang zoi.
Ma ngei nâm hah Kum raza minli sômrangnga alût ani. “Masuole han roijêkpungei a pêk ngeia, dêipu Samuel dêna han.
Male Rêng an ngêna, ma anghan Pathien'n Saul, Kish nâipasal, Benjamin rûia mi hah kum sômminli sûnga an rêng rangin a pêk ngeia.
Ama hah an hengpai suole chu Pathien'n David hah an rêng aminchanga, ma chungroi hah Pathien'n hi anghin a misîra; ‘David Jesse nâipasal, ku lungdo mi ka mân zoi, ama han sin ranga ku nuom murdi sin a tih,’ a tia.
Mahi Jisua, David richisuonpârngei lâi renga han Israel mingei Sanminringpu'n ai sin ani, Pathien'n a lei khâm anghan.
Jisua'n a sin a phut mân han, Israel mingei an sietnangei renga an insîra baptisma an changna rangin John'n thurchi a misîr pe ngei ngâia.
Male John'n a sintum a zoi rangto han mipuingei kôm, ‘Keima hih tumo ani mi nin ti? nin ngâkpu hah keima hih ni mu ung. Aniatachu, rangâi ta u! ku nûka juong a tih, kei chu a kekok khek rang luo inhoi mu ung,’ a tia.
“Abraham richisuonpârngei, ki richibulngei le Jentailngei murdi Pathien biek ngei, hi Sanminringna chong hih ei kôm a juongtîr ani.
Jerusalema mi omngei le an ruoipungei han sanminringpu ani an riet loi sik le dêipungei chong Sabbathni tina an pore ngâi hah aomtie an rietloi sikin Jisua theiloi min changin dêipungei chong an mintung min dik zoi.
Thina rang rak dôr a chunga ite abi an man no khomin that rangin Pilat kôm an ngêna.
Male a chungroi Pathien lekhabu'n a miziek murdi atung suole chu Khros renga an musuma, thâna an min jâl zoia.
Aniatachu, Pathien'n thina renga a kaithoi nôk zoi,
Galilee ram renga Jerusalema ama leh munkhata lei se ngei kôm han sûn tamtak ânlâr ngâia; ha mingei hah atûna hin Israel mingei kôm ama rietpuipungei an ni.
Ei richibulngei kôma Pathien'n chong a lei khâm hah, eini a richisuonpârngei ta rangin Pathien'n atûna hih Jisua kaithoiin atung ani ti Thurchi Sa nangni kin mintung pe. Lapui inikna taka aom anghan. ‘Ka Nâipasal ni ni; Avien hin na Pa ko hongni zoi.’
<range>
Monna mun thâna kîr nôk khâi loi rangin Pathien'n ama hah thina renga a kaithoi rang roi hi anghin a misîra; ‘Satvurna inthieng le adik David kôma kên khâm hah nang pêk ki tih,’ tiin.
Masikin, minpâkna la dangin, ‘Ni mi inthieng chu thâna mon rangin phal no ti nih,’ ati sa.
David'n ama zora kai chu Pathien lungdo a sina, masuole chu a thia, a richibulngei leh an phûma, a takpum hah thâna amon zoi.
Pathien'n thina renga a kaithoipu ha chu mon mak.
Ki Israel sûngsuokngei, mahih nin riet rangin kin nuom, Jisua sikin ani sietnangei ngâidamna chong nin kôma misîrin aom; male tukhom ama iem kai chu Moses balamin a mojôk theiloi sietnangei murdi renga an jôk zoia.
<range>
Masikin, indîn roi, dêipungei lei ti hah nin chunga tung duoi nih.
‘Mumâkpungei, en ta u! kamâm aom ti ungla, thi roi! asikchu aviena sin ko tho hih, Mîn nangni ril minthâr pe khom rese ngei iem no tunui!’ ” ti hah a tia.
Paul le Barnabas hah Synagog renga an jôkin chu sabbathni nôka ma chong hah hong misîr nôk rangin mipuingei han an siela.
Ânbûm ngei an chîn zoiin chu Judangei le an Juda rotholngei tamtakin Paul le Barnabas an jûia, Tîrtonngei han, Pathien moroina nuoi han om tit rangin an mohôka.
Sabbathni nôka chu a khopui pumpui ti dôrin Pathien chong rangâi rangin an hong intûpa.
Judangei han mipuingei an mûn chu an narsa oka, Paul thurchi misîr hah an makhala, an misîr minpôta.
Aniatachu Paul le Barnabas han hâi uolin an misîra, “Pathien chong hi nin kôma misîr masa rang piel ani; hannirese, nin henga, kumtuong ringna manpui rangin ahunin nin be loi sikin, nangni mâkin Jentailngei tieng pan kin tih.
Mahi Pumapa chong mi pêk ani; ‘Jentailngei min vârpu'n nang ki minchang, masikin rammuol murdi an ring theina rangin ti hi,’ ” an tia.
Jentailngei han ha chong hah an rietin chu an râiasâna, Pumapa chong an chôiminsânga; kumtuong ringna chang ranga thang ngei kai chu iempungei an hong chang zoi.
Pumapa chong hah ramhuol muntina ânzar zoia.
Hannirese Khopuiliena Juda ulienngei le Pathien biek mi Jentail nupang mirit omngei an misieta; Paul le Barnabas hah an nuom an min loa, an ramhuol renga an rujûlpai zoia.
Tîrtonngei han anni ngei chunga an mulung hoiloi minlangnân an kepha taka pildi an không mathâka, Iconium an pan zoi.
Antioch taka iempungei chu râisânna le Ratha Inthiengin an sip zoi.
Ma angdên han Iconiuma khom Judangei Synagog taka an lûta, thurchi an misîra, Juda le Jentail tamtakin an iem zoia.
Hannirese a iem nuomloi Judangei han Jentailngei an misieta an min mumâk zoi.
Tîrtonngei han hâitaka Pumapa thurchi misîrin ha khuoa han sôttak an oma; mahan a lungkhamna chongril tîrtonngeiin an misîr hah adik ti minlangnân an kuta sininkhêlngei le sin kamâmruoingei an sina.
Khopuilien sûnga mipuingei pâl inikin an insen zoia. Senkhat Judangei tieng, senkhat tîrtonngei tieng.
Hanchu Jentailngei le Judangei an ruoipungei le tîrtonngei hah lung leh dênga dûkmintong rang an bôka.
Tîrtonngeiin ma chong hah an lei riet lechu Lycaonia rama Lystra le Derbe khopuilienngei le a kol revêla ram ngeia an rota.
Mahan annîn Thurchi Sa an misîr tir zoi.
Lystra khuoa mi inkhat a suok renga kholra lôn theiloi a oma.
Mahan ama ânsunga Paul thurchi misîr a rangâia. Damna ranga iemna a nei ti Paul'n a mûn chu ama hah Paul'n a en ngita,
male rôl inringtakin, “Ne ke le injîkzatin inding roh!” a tia. Ama hah ân chôma, a lôn titir kelen zoi.
Mipuingeiin Paul sintho hah an mu lechu anni Lycaonia chongin an inieka, “Pathienngei miriem changin ei kôm an juong chum ani hih!” an tia.
Barnabas riming hah Zeus an tia, male Paul hah thurchi misîr uol ngâi ani sikin Hermes an tia.
Hanchu, Zeus pathien ochai, an biekin, khopui pêntienga om han serâtchalngei le pârthilrûingei mokota a hongchôia, mipuingei lehan tîrtonngei biekna ranga that rangin an mintuoa.
Ma anga tho ranga an mintuo hah Barnabas le Paul'n an riet lechu an puon an potkhêra, mipui lâi tieng tânin an inieka.
“Mahih irang mo nin tho? keini khom nangni anga miriem papai kêng kin ni. Mahin keini hih Thurchi Sa misîr ranga om ke kin ni, hi kâmnângloi neinunngei hih mâka Pathien aring, invân, pilchung, tuikhanglien le an sûnga om murdi Sinpu tienga nin hong kop theina rangin.
Tiena han chu, Pathien'n mitin an lampui chit jûi rangin a phal ngâia.
Hannirese ama aom ti rietnân neinun sa nangni thopên a minlang ngâi. Invân renga ruo le chimungei azora taka nangni a pêk ngâia, sâk rang le nin mulungrîla râisâna sip nangni a pêk ngâi” an tia.
Ha chonga han tîrtonngeiin mipuingei chu an kôm inbôlna pêk loi rangin an khap thei jâma.
Pisidia rama Antioch le Iconium renga Juda senkhatngei an honga; mipuingei hah an tieng an methêm mene zoia; Paul hah lung leh an dênga, a thi zoi tiin an mindona khopui renga an kai suoa.
Hannirese, iempungei hah a kôla an hong indingin chu ânthoia, khopuia han a lût nôk zoia. Anangtûkah chu Barnabas le Derbea an se zoi.
Paul le Barnabas'n Derbea han Thurchi Sa an misîra, ruoisi tamtak an man nûkin Lystra, Iconium le Pisidia rama Antioch ngeia an kîr nôka.
“Intakna tamtak tuong ngêtin Pathien Rêngrama ei lût rang ani,” tia minchûn iempungei hah an mindeta, taksôn dika omtit rangin an mohôka.
Koiindang tina upangei an phun pe ngei tira, bungêiin an chubai suole an iemna Pumapa, an taksônpu kuta an bâng tir zoia.
Pisidia ram an sir zoiin chu Pamphylia ram an hong tunga.
Perga taka thurchi an misîr zoiin chu Attalia an sea,
ma renga hah chu rukuongin Antioch an se nôk zoia. Ha mun hah hi zora an chuonsin an zoi hih, an phut rang lâia Pathien moroina kuta bânga an omna mun hah ani.
Antioch an tungin chu koiindangngei an koibûma, anni ngei manga Pathien'n sin a tho ngei murdi le Jentailngei ta ranga iemna lampui a mo-ong pe ngei tie hah an rila.
Mahan iempungei leh zora sôtzan an oma.
Mi senkhat Judea ram renga Antioch an juonga, “Moses Balam anghan sertan nin tho nônchu sanminring ni thei no tu nui,” tiin iempungei an minchua.
Paul le Barnabas han ma roia han anni ngei hah an inkhalpui ngei oka, masikin, Paul le Barnaba le an lâia mi senkhat le ha bâiinkhamna chungroia han Jerusalema tîrtonngei le upangei hong intongpui rangin an minsûk zoia.
Koiindangin an hong mathâna, anni han Jentailngei Pathien tienga an inlet roi hah misîr tîrin Phoenicia ram le Samaria ram an sir suoa ha an misîr renga han iempungei murdi an râiasân oka.
Jerusalem an tungin chu koiindangin tîrtonngei le upangeiin an lei modôma ma ngei kôm han Pathien'n anni ngei ma anga sin a tho ngei murdi hah an rila.
Hannirese Pharisee pâla mi iempungei senkhat an indinga, “Jentailngei sertan ngêta, Moses Balam an jôm rangin tipe ngei rang ani” an tia.
Tîrtonngei le upangei, ha roi hah jêk rangin an intûpa.
Asôt tak an inkhal suo nûkin Peter ândinga, “Sûngsuokngei, Jentailngei Pathien chong an rieta, an iem theina ranga Thurchi Sa misîr pe ngei ranga nin lâi renga tien renga Pathien'n mi zen ani ti hah nin riet.
Mitin mindona rietpu Pathien'n ei kôm mi pêk anghan Jentailngei khom Ratha Inthieng pêk sân a khôk tiin ânlanga.
Eini le anni sensâi loiin, an iem sikin an sietnangei a ngâidam zoia.
Masikin, ei richibulngei le eini pêl zoi khâiloi puok hah atûna hin iempungei chunga mokhop pe rang bôkin irang mo Pathien nin minsin hi?
Ni mak! Anni ngei angdênin eini khom Pumapa Jisua iema moroina han Sanminring ei ni,” a tia.
Barnabas le Paul'n anni ngei manga Pathien'n Jentailngei lâia sininkhêlngei le kamâmruoingei a sin roi an misîr kâr chu mipuingei nâm an dâireka.
An misîr suole chu Jacob khomin a misîr sa, “Sûngsuokngei, ko chong rangâi ta u!
Pathien'n ama riming ruput ranga anni ngei lâia ni lâk suok rangin Jentailngei a juong pan phut roi Simon'n a misîr zoia.
Ha chong le dêipungei chong hi ântok thap ani. Pathien lekhabu'n,
‘Masuole, Pumapa han kîr nôk ka ta David omna rêngram achim hah minding nôk ki tih. a sietnangei sin nôk ka ta male mindet nôk ki tih.
Male mi murdi ngei le Jentailngei, Ki mi niranga ko koi ngei nâm Jentailngei ko kôm hong an ta.
Rammuol insieng renga hi chong min riet ngâipu Pumapa han a ti,’ ati anghan.
“Masikin Jacob'n, mahi ki mindon chu ani. Jentailngei Pathien tienga hong inlet ngei chu minjêl no ila.
Manêkin, lekha muthuonin mirmilngei biekna neinun inthiengloi sâk mo, hur le ngal mo, sâ lei thisai le thisen sâk mo, mong rangin tipe ngei ila ki ti ani.
Moses Balam chu tienlâi renga sabbathni rachamin Synagog taka an pore ngâi zoia, a chongngei khom khopui tina an misîr ngâi zoi,” a tia.
Hanchu, tîrtonngei, upangei le koiindang pumpuiin an lâia mi senkhat an thanga, Paul le Barnabas pâla Antiocha min se rangin an min chukka. An ulien uol inik iempungeiin an mirit, Judas, Barsabass an ti le Silas an thang ngeia.
Hi anghin miziekin, an min chôi ngeia: “Keini, tîrtonngei le upangei nin sûngsuokngeiin kin iempu champui Jentail ânzir ngei Antioch, Syria le Cilicia rama omngei chibaingei nangni kin mûk.
Kin pâla mi senkhatin thurchi juong misîrin nangni an minjêla, mulungjîng nangni an shak ti kin rieta; nikhomrese, anni ngei ha kin kôm renga ite rilnangei man mak ngei.
Masikin kin intûpa, mulung inruol takin kin thanga nin kôm juongtîr rangin kin minsûk ani. Ei ruol moroitak ngei Barnaba le Paul
Jisua Khrista sinthona an ringna phal ngei lehin juong rese ngei kin ti.
Ha anghan, Judas le Silas kin juongtîr ani, hi ngei hin kin miziek hih mêl inmun nangni misîr pe an tih.
Ratha Inthieng le inruolin hi balamngei sin om pêna hi chu puok rik dang sin loi rangin kin inruol;
mirmilngei biekna sâkruo sâk no roi, thisen sâk no roi, sâ sômthat sâk no roi, hur le ngal renga inkêm roi. Hi ngei hih tho tet loi rangin nin indîn theiin chu nin ta rangin sa ok atih, chibai” tiin.
An tîrlâmngei hah an sea, Antioch an tunga; mahan iempungei pâl murdi an koibûma, lekhamuthuon hah an pêk ngeia.
An pore suole chu ma mohôkna chong sika han râisânin an sip zoia.
Judas le Silas chu dêipungei khom an ti sa, asôtzan an chongpui ngeia, an mohôk ngeia, an min rât oka.
Sûn sôtzan an om suole chu a juongtîr ngei kôm kîr nôk rangin an se zoia, iempungeiin rathangamriemin an mathân ngeia.

Paul le Barnaba chu midang tamtak ngei le Pumapa chong minchu le misîrin Antioch'a han zora sôtzan an la oma.
Zora sôtzan suole chu Paul'n Barnabas kôm, “Tho se nôk ei ta, khopui tina Pumapa chong ei misîrna murdia ei sûngsuokngei pan ei ta, i angin mo an om va en ngei rei,” a tia.
Barnabas'n John Mark an kôm tuongsa rang a nuoma.
Hannirese Paul'n chu nuom maka, abi chu Pamphylia ram tena a kîra, an sin a zoipui loi sikin ani.
An inkhal bita, an insen zoia, Barnabas John Mark a tuonga, rukuongin Cyprus tuihuol tieng an sea.
Paul'n chu Silas a thanga, iempungeiin Pumapa moroina kuta an bâng ngei suole chu a se zoi.
Koiindangngei mindet tîrin Syria le Cilicia ram a sir zoi.
Paul'n Derbe le Lystra khom a sir sa, mahan Khristien inkhat a riming Timothy a oma. A nû khom Khristien dên Juda mi ania, a pa chu Greek ani.
Lystra le Iconiuma iempungei murdi'n Timothy an minlut ok ngâia.
Paul'n ama hah tuong rang a nuoma, ma revêla Judangei han Timothy pa hah Greek ani ti an riet sikin Timothy khom a sertan pe ani.
Khopuingei tin an sir malamin, Jerusalema tîrtonngei le upangei balamngei masat hah iempungei an pêk tira, jôm rang khomin he an be tira.
Masikin, koiindangngei hah taksônnân an rât uola nîngtin an pung titira.
Ratha Inthiengin Asia rama thurchi misîr a khap sikin Phrygia le Galatia ram an sîra.
Mysia ramri an tungin chu Bithynia rama se rang an bôka, hannirese, Jisua Ratha'n phal ngei maka.
Masikin, Mysia ram khêlin Troasa an se zoia.
Hanchu, mani jâna han Paul'n inlârnân Macedonia rama mi inkhatin “Macedonia rama hong kâi inla, mi hong san roh,” tia ngênin a mua,
Paul'n inlârna hi a mu suole chu Macedonia rama se rangin kin inthok kelen zoia, ha rama mingei kôma Thurchi Sa misîr rangin Pathien'n mi koi sikin.
Troas renga rukuongin kin jôka, Samothrace kin thengpata, male anangtûka Neapolis kin sea.
Ha renga hah Philippia kin sea, ha khopuilien hah Macedonia; rama khuo inkhat ania, ma biela han chu khuo kâm omtak ani. Rom mingei bung ani. Ma khuoa han sûn tamtak kin châma.
Sabbathni khopui pêntienga tuidung panga Judangei chubaithona ngâi mun ni ranga kin iema han kin sea; mahan kin insunga nupang intûp ngei kôm thurchi kin misîra.
Ha ngei lâia mi a riming Lydia, Thyatira, khuo mi puon senduk juor ngâi, Pathiena inbei mi nupang inkhatin chong a rieta; male Paul thurchi misîr jôm rangin Pumapa'n a mulungrîl a minvâr pea.
Ama le a inmingeiin baptisma an chang zoiin chu, “Pumapa iem tatakin ni nan bêa anin chu ki ina hong tung roi tiin mi siel rîta,” ni sûr zoi.
Sûnkhat chu chubaithona muna kin se lâiin suok dôngmate inkhat ramkhori sûra taruosân thei kin intongpuia, amanu han taruosân a theina sika han a pu ngei sum tamtak a lo pe ngâia.
Hanu han Paul le Keini mi jûia, “Hi mi, Sanminringna lampui nangni ril ngei hih, Ânchungtak Pathien tîrlâmngei an ni hi,” tiin âniek ngâia.
Ma anghan, sûn tamtak a tho tenin chu Paul a mulung hoi khâi maka, a takasia. Ramkhori kôm han, “Jisua Khrista rimingin a sûng renga jôk rangin chong nang ke pêk,” a tia. Ha mitmisim kongkâr han a jôk pai kelen zoia.
A pumangei han an sum manna om khâi mak ti an riet lechu Paul le Silas hah an sûra, roijêkpungei kôm mipui intûpna muna an kai minlûta.
Rom roijêkpungei kôm an min tungin chu, “Hi mingei hih Juda an nia, kin khopuilien sûnga bâiinkhamna an sin ngâi.
Balam dang kin balam le ânkâl, keini Rom mingei kin pom rang le kin mang ranga ânthiengloi an misîr ngâi” an tia.
Mipuingei hah Paul le Silas jêm rangin an inthoka. Masuole chu roijêkpungei han Paul le Silas puon an khêr pe ngeia, jêm rangin chong an pêka.
An jêm bit suole jêl ina an khuma, a ngâkpu kôm han asân khumrap rangin chong an pêka.
Ma anghan, intâng insûng ânlâina taka a khum ngei, an kea thing kekok riktak an min bun ngeia.
Jân lâitaka chu Paul le Silas'n Pathien kôm chubai an thoa. Minpâkna lâ an thoa, intâng ina midangngeiin an rangâia.
Inningloiin nîngnupui a honga; intâng in lungphûmngei tena khom ânphêt heta, voikhatrengin inkhârngei hah ân-ong leta, mitin rênrokolngei hah ânkhek rila.
Hanchu, angâkpu a in hah a hong hara, inkhârngei in-ong letin a mua, intâng ina intângngei an rot suo zoi tiin a bôka, khandai a kaidûka, inthat rang a thoa.
Hannirese Paul'n rôl inringtakin, “Ite inlo no roh, kin rêngin kin la om let” a tia.
Ama han meiser a roka, a tâna, chi le innîk pumin Paul le Silas ke bula ânbokraka.
Hanchu anni han a ruoi suok ngeia, “Pungei, Sanminringa ko om theina rangin imo ko tho rang?” a tia.
Anni han, “Pumapa Jisua iem inla, hanchu sanminringin om ni tih, nangma le ni inmingei leh,” tiin an thuona.
Masuole chu ama le a inmingei han Pumapa thurchi an misîra.
Mani jâna han, ma zora lelea han an sâbengei hah a rusûk pe ngeia; hanchu ama le a inmingei baptisma an chang kelen zoi.
Masuole Paul le Silas hah a ina a tuong ngeia, sâk rang a pêk ngeia Pathien an iem zoi sikin an insûng pumin an râiasân tatak zoi ani.
Anangtûk jînga chu Rom roijêkpungei han, “Ha mingei hah mojôk ta roh,” ti chongpêk chôiin misûr ngâi ngei ulienngei an tîra.
Masikin a ngâkpu han Paul kôm, “Roijêkpungeiin nangni mojôk rangin chong an hong muthuon. Hong jôk ungla, rathânngamtakin se ta roi,” a tia.
Aniatachu, Paul'n misûr ngâi ulienngei kôm, “Rom miriem kêng kin ni, kin tho minchâina om le omloi luo en loiin loko makunga min jêma, intâng ina min khuma. Atûn inrûkin mi mojôk rang an ti na? Ni thei tet no nih! Anni ngêt hong rese ngei, mi hong mojôk rese ngei,” a tia.
Misûr ngâi ulienngeiin ha chong hah roijêkpungei kôm an misîra; Rom miriem anni ti an rietin chu an chi zoia.
Masikin an sea an vânvûia, male chu an mojôk ngeia khopuilien renga jôkpai rangin an ngêna.
Paul le Silas hah intâng in renga an jôka, Lydia ina an sea. Mahan iempungei hah an mua, mohôkna chong an pêk ngei suole chu an mâk ngei zoia.
Paul le Silas hah Amphipolis le Apollonia an khêla. Thessalonika an tunga. Mahan Judangei Synagog taka ava oma.
Paul'n a tho ngâi balam anghan an kôm a lûta, sabbathnia voithum Pathien lekhabu renga asân a sûtpuiin,
Messiah chu dûktonga thina renga ânthoinôk rang piel ani ti a rilminthâra, a minlang ngâia, “Hi Jisua, nin lâia ku phuong hih Messiah ani,” a ti sa ngâi.
An lâia senkhat chu Paul thurchi misîr hah an iema, Paul le Silas hah an jôm zoia; nupang ruoipu tamtak le Pathiena inbei mi Greek mipuingei lehan.
Hannirese Judangei han an narsa, lamliena thaboi pâlngei hah an tuonga, mipui an koibûma, khopuilien pumpui bâiinkham chara, Paul le Silas hah loko makunga tuong rang bôkin Jason in an hong lûtkhuma.
Hannirese, an manloi lehan chu, Jason le iempu senkhatngei hah khopuilien ulienngei makunga an hong kainâl ngeia, an inieka. “Hi mingei hin muntina bâiinkhamna an sin ngâi! atûna hin ei khopuiliena an hong ani.
Jason hin a ina a lei mintung ngei ngâia. Hi ngei hin, a riming Jisua, Rêng dang aom tiin Caesar balam an siet ngâi,” an tia.
Ma chong hah an rietin chu mipui le khopuilien ulienngei hah bâiinkhamin an om zoia.
Khopui ulienngeiin Jason le a champuingei hah sum anâng dôr an pêka, an mojôk ngei zoi ani.
Hanchu, iempungeiin hani jân ahongni lechu Paul le Silas hah Berea khopuia an min se ngei kelena, an tungin chu Judangei Synagog an lûta.
Ma taka mingei kai chu Thessalonika mingei nêkin chu an mulungrîl ân ong uola. Thurchi hah atui takin an rangâia, Paul thurchi misîr hah adik le dikloi rietna rangin nîngtin Pathien lekhabu an inchu ngâia.
Ha ngei lâia mi tamtakin an iem zoia, Greek nupang mirit om tamtak le pasal tamtak khomin an iem zoi.
Hannirese Thessalonika Judangei han, Paul'n Berea khopuia khom Pathien thurchi a misîr ti an riet lechu mahan khom an va sea, mipuingei an mohôka; bâi an inkhâm char zoi.
Iempungeiin tuipui dênin se rangin Paul hah an tîra, Silas le Timothy chu an la oma.
Paul juong thak ngei han Athens dênin an juong thaka; Silas le Timothy kôm han innota a kôma se ranga Paul chongbê chôiin an kîr nôk zoi.
Paul'n Athens taka anni hah a lei ngâk lâiin ha khopuilien hah mirmilngeia sip ani ti a mûn chu a mulung a minna oka.
Masikin Synagog'a Judangei le Jentailngei, Pathien biek ngei hah a dem ngâia; mipui intûpna muna khom mataka omngei ngân chu nîngtin an injêk ngâi.
Epicurean le Stoic minchupungei lâia khomin an inkhalpuia. Senkhat chu, “Hi mûr thiempa hin imo misîr rang a bôk hi?” an tia. Adangngeiin chu, “Ram dang pathienngei chong a misîr rang ani hi,” Paul, Jisua le inthoinôkna. misîr sika ani.
Masikin Paul hah a koia, roijêkna Areopagus han an tuonga; a kôm “Hi minchuna thar ni misîr ngâi hi a riet kin nuom.
Ni misîr kin riet ngei hih la riet ngâi makme; itina mo ani a riet kin nuom,” an tia.
(Athens khopui mi murdi le ramdangmingei ajuong omngei khomin an zora dôn murdi neinun thar misîrna le rangâina mang an nuom sikin).
Paul hah roijêkna Areopagus moton taka ândinga, “Nangni Athens mingei, lamtina sakhuo mi tatak nin ni ti ki riet.
Nin khopuilien sûnga ka chai malamin chubai nin mûk ngâi ngei ke ena; mâichâm inkhat, ‘Rietloi pathien ta rang,’ tia ânziek ku mua. Nin rietloi chubai nin mûk tit ngâi hah atûna nangni ki misîr pe hih ani.
Pathien'n rammuol le asûnga neinunngei murdi sinpu chu pilchung le invân Pumapa ani sikin kuta sin in ngeia om ngâi mak.
Miriem ei sem rang neinun ite khom insam mak. Ama ngêt han hah ngei nâm kôma ringna ngei, phûk ngei le mitin kôma neinunngei nâm a pêkpu ani uol.
Rammuol pumpuia om rangin, mi inkhat renga jâttin a sina. An ta rang zorangei a khit pe ngeia, an omna rang rikung a khangpe ngeia.
Ma hih a thona abi chu ama an ena, an zonga an mu theina ranga ani. Adiktakin, Pathien chu tute renga la uol mak.
Mi senkhatin an ti anghan, ‘Ama sikin ei ringa, singinsa'n, ei om ani,’ Nin lâ phuopungei khomin an ti sa anghan, ‘Eini khom a nâingei ei ni.’
Pathien nâingei ei nin chu, Pathien chu rângkachak mini, sumin mini, lungin mini, miriem kut thiem le mindonna mirimil an sin ngâi anga han om rang tetên ei bôk rang nimak.
Pathien'n ama ei riet mâna ngei kai chu rietloi om a tho ngâia; aniatachu, atûn chu ramtina mi murdi sietna renga inhei rangin chong a pêk zoi.
Nikhuo a khita, ha nia han a mi phunpu hah rammuola mi murdi ngei roi adiktakin jêk atih. Ma chong ha chu Pathien'n ama hah thina renga kaithoiin mi murdi kôm a min riet zoi,” a tia.
Thina renga inthoinôk roi an riet lechu senkhatin an munuisana; senkhat nôkin chu, “Hi chong hi no kôm renga la rangâi nôk kin nuom,” an tia.
Male Paul a mâk ngeia.
Mi senkhat chu a tieng an kop tita male an iem zoia. Ha ngei lâia senkhat chu, Areopagus roijêkpu pâla mi Dionysius le nupang inkhat a riming Damaris le midang ngei an ni.
Masuole han, Paul hah Athens renga Korinth a se zoia.
Mahan Juda inkhat a riming Aquila a mua, ha mi hah Pontus rama suok ania, Claudius Juda murdi Rom renga jôkpai rangin chong a pêk sikin a lômnu Priscilla le Italy ram renga hong inthon bil an ni. Paul an kôm a sea.
Ha ngei khom hah Paul anga puon in sin ngâi anni sikin an kôm a oma, munkhatin sin an tho zoi.
Sabbathni racham Synagog taka chong a mintukpui ngâia. Judangei le Greekngei hah min riet minthâr rang a bôk ngâia.
Silas le Timothy Macedonia ram renga an juong tungin chu Paul hah thurchi misîr injîen a zora a mang zoia, Jisua chu Messiah ani tiin Judangei kôm a ril minthâr ngâia.
Hannirese an doia an ril minsieta masuole, chu Paul'n a puona rababngei hah thikin chongnatakin a thuona, an kôm, “Nin thina chungroi chu nangnin pêl roi, keima chu ko jôk ani, atûn renga chu Jentailngei kôm se ki tih,” a tia.
Masikin a jôka Jentail inkhat a riming Titius Justus ina a lûta, ha mi hah Pathien biek ngâi mi ania, a in khom Synagog le ântôn chak.
Crispus Synagog ruoipu han a inmingei murdi le Pumapa an iema, Korinth khopuia mi tamtak khomin an rieta, an iema baptisma an chang zoi.
Jân khat chu Paul'n inlârna a mua, mahan Pumapa'n a kôm, “Chi no roh, dâirek loiin thurchi misîr tit roh,
asikchu nang ko ompui tit nang minna rangin tutên nu chunga an kut musum noni ngei, hi khopuia hin mi tamtak ko dôn kêng,” a tia.
Masik han, Paul hah ma khopuiliena han Pathien chong minchûn kum khat in-ang a oma.
Gallio ha Achaia rama râiôt a chang lâiin Judangei an inruola, Paul an sûra, roijêknamuna an tuonga.
“Hi mi hin balam niloia Pathien biek rangin mi methêm rang a bôk ngâi,” an tia.
Paul hong chong rang a ti lehan, Gallio han Judangei kôm, “Judangei, mahi neinun dikloi mini, aninônchu tho minchâina mini luo nirese chu, inkhêl loiin nangni mindon pe ki tih.
Hannirese, chongngei, rimingngei le nin balam chungroia inkhalna papai kêng ania, nangnin jêk roi. Kei chu ha anga neinunngei kai chu jêk no ning,” a tia.
Roijêkna mun renga a rujûlpai ngei zoia.
Anrêngin an Synagog ruoipu Sosthenes an sûra, roijêknamun mâia an jêma. Aniatachu Gallio han ma anga an tho ha itên rangâi pe ngei tet mak.
Masuole han Paul hah iempungei leh sûn tamtak a la oma, hanchu iempungei hah a mathân ngeia Syria ram tieng rukuongin a se zoia, a kôm Priscilla le Aquila khom an se sa. Paul'n chonginkhâm a lei dôn sikin Cenchreae a se mân a sam a ep baka.
Ephesus'a an tunga, mahan Priscilla le Aquila chu a mâka, ama chu Synagog taka a lûta Judangei hah chong a la mintukpui ngeia.
Anni han asôtzan om rangin an ngêna, hannirese pom pe ngei maka.
Manêkin, an kôm se khom inlang “Pathien lungdo anîn chu nin kôm la hong nôk ki tih,” tiin chong hoiin a mâk ngeia, Ephesus'a renga rukuongin a se zoia.
Caesarea a tungin chu Jerusalema a sea, koiindang chibai a mûka, masuole chu Antioch taka a se zoia.
Mahan sûn tamtak a om suo nûkin a se nôka, iempungei mindet tîrin Galatia ram le Phragia ram a sir suo zoi.
Ha lâia han Juda inkhat a riming Apollos, Alexandria taka suok Ephesus'a a juonga. Ama hah thurchi misîr theitak ania, Pathien Lekhabungei khom a riet oka.
Ama hah Pumapa lampui chong ânchu zoisai ania, mulungrîla satna tak inheiin Jisua thurchi a misîr ngâia, Nikhomrese, John baptisma vai kêng ala riet.
Synagog taka hâitakin thurchi misîr a phuta, hanchu Priscilla le Aquila hah a thurchi misîr an rietin chu an ina an tuonga, a kôm, Pathien lampui roi adik uolin an rilminthâr pea.
Hanchu ama hah Achaia rama se rang a bôk sikin Ephesus'a iempungeiin an mohôka ama an lei modômna rangin Achaia rama iempungei kôm lekha an miziek pea. A tungin chu Pathien moroina sika iempu hong chang ngei ta rangin a sanpu satak a changa.
Loko rieta Judangei hah a makhal mindoka, Pathien lekhabu mangin Jisua chu Messiah ani ti a minlang ngâi.
Apollos hah Korinth taka a la om lâiin Paul'n sak tienga biel a hong sîra, Ephesus'a a tunga mahan ruoisingei senkhat a mua.
Ama han, “Iempu nin changa han Ratha Inthieng nin lei modôm ngâi mo?” tiin a rekel ngeia. “Ratha Inthieng aom ti luo riet mak me,” tiin an thuona.
Asa! “Nônchu, khoi baptisma mo nin chang?” a tia. Anni han “John baptisma,” an tia.
Paul'n an kôm, “John'n mingei kôm, ku nûka juong rangpu Jisua nin la iem rang ani tiin Isrealngei an sietna renga inhei ngei hah a baptis ngâi ani ha,” a tia.
Maha an rietin chu Pumapa Jisua rimingin baptisma an chang zoia.
Paul'n an chunga a kut a minngama, Ratha Inthieng an chang kelen zoi, rietloi chong ngeiin an chonga, Pathien chong an misîr zoi.
Anrêngin pasal sômleinik dôr an ni.
Paul'n Synagog lût bangin than thum chu Pathien Rêngram thurchi mintukpuiin methêm mene rang bôkin hâitakin thurchi a misîr tita.
Aniatachu, senkhat chu an seletrûka, iem nuom mak ngeia, mipui makunga Pumapa lampui thurchi hah an ril minsieta, masikin Paul'n anni ngei hah mâkin iempungei hah a tuonga nîngtin Tyrannus inchuna ina han chong an mintukpui ngâia.
Ma anghan, kumnik a thoa, masikin Asia rama om murdi, Judangei le Greekngei khomin Pumapa chong an riet zoia.
Pathien'n Paul kuta sininkhêl adangviek a min thoa.
Paul'n a lei mang ngâi mâihuinangei le a rôpthupna puonngei hah damloingei kôm a min chôia, an natnangei an dam ngâia, an sûnga ratha saloi tena khom an jôk ngâi.
Judangei senkhat ratha saloi rujûlpai rang a bôka, ânvâk ngâi ngei khomin Pumapa Jisua riming an manga. Ratha saloi kôm, “Paul'n a misîr ngâi Jisua rimingin a sûng renga jôk rangin chong nang ke pêk,” an tia.
Juda Ochai Inlaltak, Sceva han nâipasal sari ha anga chong ngâi a dôna.
Hannirese ratha saloi han an kôm, “Jisua ki riet, Paul khom ki riet nangni rêk hi chu tu ngei mo nin ni?” a tia.
A sûnga ratha saloi dôn han a hong invôra, amene ngei riei zoia, ha in renga hah popnekin le an puon chet chitin an tân riei zoi.
Ephesus'a taka om Judangei le Jentailngei murdi'n ma roi hah an rietin chu an chi sabak zoia, hanchu Pumapa Jisua riming ânthang uol zoi.
Iempu tamtak an honga, loko rieta an chong minchâina an phuonga.
Dôitheingei tamtak khomin an lekhabungei an hong bûma, mitin mitmua an hâla, male aman an minsâpa, sumdârngei isâng sômrangnga ani tiin an rieta.
Ma ang taka sintho theina lien han Pumapa thurchi ânzara, rât takin ânsôn tir zoi.
Masuole chu Paul'n Macedonia ram le Achaia ram a sir suo baka, Jerusalema se rang a bôka “Ma han ke se suole chu Rom khom sir sa ngêt ki tih,” a tia.
Masikin ânsanpui ngâi mi inik, Timothy le Erastus hah Mecedonia rama a lei tîr baka, ama chu Asia rama ala oma.
Ma zora lâihan Pumapa lampui thurchi sikin bâiinkhamna lientak Ephesus'a a oma.
Mi inkhat a riming Demetrius, sumtuia Artemis pathiennu biekin rimil sin ngâi a oma, maha a sintho ngei kôm inlâpna lientak an pêk ngâia.
Masikin ama han anni ngei hah a koibûma, an sintho anga tho ngei lehan chu, an kôm, “Miriempa, hi sin hih ei neina ani ti nin rieta.
Atûn, hi Paul sintho hih nangni khomin nin mua, nin rieta Ephesus'a vaia khom niloiin Asia ram pumpuia ti rang dôrin hi mi hin, kuta sin pathienngei hih pathien ni tet mak tiin mi tamtak a huong mene suo zoia.
Masikin ei sintho hih min en minnuoi an tih, ti vai niloiin, Asia rama mi murdi le rammuola mîn an biek ngâi pathiennu Artemis roiinpui khom boi atih, ti hih ichi aom ani,” a tia.
Ha chong hah mipuingeiin an riet lechu an taksi sabaka, “Ephesus'a Artemis hi a roiinpui tak,” tin an hêta.
Hanchu, khopuilien pumpui bâi an inkhâm zoia, Gaius le Aristarchus, Mecedonia rama mi Paul nûkjûingei hah an sûra, a pâlin enhoi sinna ina an tânpuia.
Paul'n mipui makunga vânding rang a bôka, hannirese, iempungeiin phal mak ngeia.
Asia rama ulien senkhat Paul malngei an oma, ha ngei khom han Paul hah enhoi sinna ina vânlang loi rangin chong an muthuona.
an thup ngeia, anrêngin bâi an inkhâm char zoia, mi tamtakin an intûpna bi khom riet mak ngei. Masikin, senkhat chong inkhat an hêtpuia senkhatin chong dang an hêtpuia.
Mi senkhat chu Alexander sika nîng atih, an tia; ama hah Judangei moton tieng an nam minlût sikin. Alexander'n mipui ruhu dâina rangin a kut a jâpa, an theina thurchi misîr rang a bôka.
Hannirese Juda ani ti an riet lechu darkâr nik inruolin, “Ephesus'a Artemus hih a roiinpui tak,” tiin an iniek tita.
Amongnataka chu an khopuilien jêkpu'n mipuingei hah a ngo mindâia. A ngo mindâi suole chu an kôm, “Ephesus'a Artimus roiinpuitak biekin le invân renga lung inthieng achul hah Ephesus'a mingei hih a donsûipu nin ni ti mitinin an rieta.
Hi chong hi tutên makhal thei noni ngei. Masikin nin ruhu mindâi ngêt rang ani, mindon bak loiin ite nin tho rang nimak.
Hi mi, hi taka nin hong tuong ngei hih biekina inru khom nimak ngeia, ei pathiennu rilminsiet khom nimak ngei.
Demetrius le a sinthongei khomin tu chunga khom roi intak an dônin chu roijêkpungei ei dôna, roijêkna in khom ân-ong tit, ma son vân ngo rese ngei.
Aniatachu, roi intak piel nin la dônin chu jâttin roijêkna ina mindon nîng atih.
Aviena inkhôm sika hin mîn bâiinkhamna musuo ngei tiin, mi tîng an tih, ti hih ichi om ani. Hi bâiinkhamna hi abi boi ani sikin tute lakin abi misîr thei noni ngeia,” a tia. Ma chong hah a ti suole chu mipuingei intûp hah an chîn zoi.
Ruhu lumpa hah ahek suole Paul'n iempungei a koibûma, a mohôkna chongin a mâk ngeia. Hanchu a jôka Macedonia rama a se zoia.
Mingei mohôkna chong tamtak misîrin ha ram hah a sir suoa, Achaia ram a tung zoia.
Mahan than thum aom suole Syria ram tieng se rangin ânthoka; hannirese, Judangei an lei muruong chien ti a riet sikin Macedonia tieng kîr nôk rang a bôka.
Pyrrhus nâipasal Sopater Beroea mingei, Aristarchus le Secundus, Thessalonika mingei, Gaius, Derbe, mingei, Timothy ngei, Tichicus le Trophimus Asia rama mingei an se sa.
Ha ngei hah moton aninsa. Troasa min lei ngâka.
Keini chu cholboivâipôl ruolhoi chumin Philipi renga rukuongin kin jôka. Sûn rangnga suole Troasa an kôm kin tunga, mahan sûn sari kin châma.
Sûnrukni kholoiin vâipôl khoi rangin kin intûpa, Paul'n anangtûka se rang a bôk sikin jânchim tena thurchi a misîr jêta.
Kin intûpna khâltan chunginchuon han châti tamtak mochok ania.
Hanchu ruotharte inkhat a riming Eutychus, kotvênga ân sunga inngûi a lênsua Paul thurchi misîr hah asôt rai sikin a lei inphara; in chunginchuon inthumna renga a juong tâka. An juong rût tena chu a lei thi zoi.
Aniatachu Paul a chuma a juon kûna a poma, “Nin mulung minjîng no roi, a la ring ke,” a tia.
Hanchu, Paul hah in chunginchuona a kal nôka, vâipôl a khoia, an sâk zoia. Asôtzan khuovâr rak dôr nisa asuok tena a chongpui ngei suole chu a se zoia.
Ruotharte hah damin a in tieng an tuonga an phûk adâiriem zoi.
Keini chu rukuongin Assos khuo panin moton kin lênsa zoi, mahan Paul min chuong rang kin bôka, ama hah kea hong rang a bôk sikin hi anga rangin mi ril sai ani.
Assosa mi hong huoma, kin min chuonga Mitylene kin tung zoi.
Ha mun renga hah rukuong nanâkin kin se nôka, anangtûka Chios kin tunga hatûk chu Samos kin tunga, anangtûk nôka Miletus kin tung zoia.
Paul'n Asia rama om sôt a nuom loi sikin Ephesus'a chu sûnapal rang a bôk piel ani. Ani thei paia anîn chu Jerusalema Pentecost ni mang rang a bôka, ânnot ani.
Miletus renga Paul'n Ephesus'a mi a tîra, koiindang ulienngei ava min koi ngeia.
A kôm an tungin chu an kôm, “Asia ram ku lût masa ni renga nin kôma ko om kâra ko omlam hah nin rieta.
Judangei min muruong sika mitrithi tâk pumin le zora intak ku chunga hong tung ngei tuongin intem takin Pumapa sin ko tho ngâi.
Nin ta ranga inlâpna rang ite thup loiin loko lâia le insûngngeia nangni ki ril ngâia, nangni ki minchu ngâi duo.
Judangei le Jentailngei khom Pathien tieng an sietnangei renga insîrin ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista an iem rang ani ti insiemna chong ke pêk ngeia.
Male atûn Ratha Inthieng chong jômin Jerusalema ke se rang ani, mahan ku chunga imo atung rang riet mu ung.
Khopuilien tina, intâng ina le bâiinkhamnân mi ngâk ti vai hi Ratha Inthiengin mi min rieta, ki riet ani.
Pathien moroina Thurchi Sa misîr rang sintum Pumapa Jisua Khrista mi pêk zoina rangin chu ki ringna khom hi itên be mu-ung.
“Masikin riet roi, nin rêngin Pathien Rêngram thurchi misîra kên vâkna ngâi ngei hin atûn renga chu mi mu khâi no tu nui, ti ki riet.
Mapêna an mang nin om duoi le khom kei chu ko jôk ani ti avien hin nangni ki min riet.
Pathien neinun khîn murdi anrêngin nin lâia misîr inrîng mu ung.
Masikin Pathien koiindang, a Nâipasal thina sika ama ta ranga a sin chunga belripungei chang ungla, nangni le belripâl Ratha Inthiengin nangni a min kolna ngei satna rang zong roi.
Ku nûk le chu melang ichi om ngei nin lâia hong lût an ta, belripâl hôih noni ngei ti ki riet.
Nin pâla mi senkhat khomin iempungei an tieng an tuong theina rangin milak an ril zora la tung atih.
Hanchu sûn, jân mitrithi tâkpumin kum thum piel mitin nangni ki minchu hah riettitin sing thei roi.
“Atûn hin Pathien donsûina le moroina chonga nangni ka bânga ama han nangni a sin minlien theia, Pathien'n a mingei ta ranga a khâm satvurna hah nangni a pêk thei.
Tute sumdâr khom, rângkachak khom, sil le bom khom ôi ngâi mu-ung.
Ku kutngei lehin keima le ka champuingei anâng murdi asuo ngâi ti nangni rengin nin rieta.
Lamtina sintho ranak songin le Pumapa Jisua'n, ‘Lâk nêkin pêk râisânna aom uol’ a ti hah riettitin râtloingei ei san rang ani ti nangni ki min mu ngâi,” a tia.
Paul'n ha chong hah a ti suole chu, khûkinbilin an rêngin chubai a thopui ngeia.
He hoiin an mathân zoia, anrêngin an chapa Paul hah an kuoa an tuma.
A mêl an mu nôk khâi loi rang chong Paul'n a misîr pe ngei hah an rangâi sietna bitak ani. Masuole chu rukuong dênin an juong thak zoi.
Anni ngei le kin insen suole chu rukuong leh kin se pata Cos kin tunga anangtûka Rhodes kin tunga, tuihuol kin tung nôka ma renga hah Patara kin tung nôka.
Ma mun han rukuong inkhat Phonicia tienga se rang kin mua, mahan kin chuonga kin se nôk kelena.
Cyprus tuihuol ânlangna mun ten kin va phâk lehan Cyprus hah voi tieng kin mâka Syria tieng kin sea Tyre chu neinun an musum sikin kin chuma.
