Ma mun han iempungei senkhat kin va mua an kôm sûn sari nikhuo kin châma, anni ngei han Ratha Inthieng rilin Paul hah Jerusalema se loi rangin an khapa.
Hannirese, sûn sari ahek suole chu ha renga hah kin jôka kin se nôka iempungeiin an lômnungei le an nâingei le tuikôl tena min juong thaka ma mun han khûkinbilin chubai kin thoa.
Masuole chu chonghoiin inkhat le inkhat kin insena rukuonga kin chuonga anni ngei chu in tieng an kîr nôk zoi.
Rukuong leh kin se pata Tyre renga Tolemais kin tunga iempungei chibai kin pêka mahan sûn khat an kôm kin châma.
Anangtûka chu kin se nôka Caesarea kin tunga mahan Thurchi Sa misîrpu Philip ina kin tunga, Philip hah Jerusalema sanpu ânthang sari ngei lâia inkhat hah alei ni.
Ama han nâi dôngmate inneiloi minli a dôna anni ngei han Pathien thurchi an misîr ngâia.
Mahan sûn tamtak nikhuo kin châma ha nikhuo kin châm sûng han Judea ram renga dêipu a riming Agabus a juonga.
Kin kôm a honga Paul a kongkhitngei hah a lâka, a kengei a kutngei athenin a khita masuole chu kin kôm hi anghin a tia, “Jerusalema, Judangei hi anga kongkhit a dônpu tak hi, hi angtak hin khit an ta, Jentailngei kuta an pêk rang ti hi Ratha Inthiengin mi ril sai ke ani,” a tia.
Ha thurchi hah kin riet lechu keini le ma khuoa omngei han Paul hah Jerusalema se loi rang kin tipe tita.
Hannirese Paul han kin kôm, “Khoimo nin tho, ma angdôr hih nin chap, ku mulung nin khoi hi? Pumapa Jisua sikin Jerusalema khit rang vai hi kên phal nimaka, thi rang ten khom kên phal ke,” a tia.
Methêm theijât ani khâiloi sikin, “Pumapa ti lam tak nirese,” kin tia, kin mojôk zoi.
Masuole chu, kin insiema Jerusalem tienga se rangin kin jôk zoi.
Caeserea khuo renga ruoisi senkhat ngeiin min jûia, anni ngei lâia mi inkhat a riming Mnason, ruoisi masa ngei lâia mi Cyprus tuihuola om ngâi ama han kin tungna rang ina mi sepui zoi.
Jerusalem kin tungin chu iempungeiin râisântakin min lei dona.
Anangtûka chu Paul'n Jacob ina mi sepuia ma mun han koiindang upangei murdi khom an oma.
Anni ngei hah Paul'n chibai a pêk suole chu Pathien'n a ranak a minsila Jentailngei lâia sin a tho lam ngei hah anrêngin a misîr pe ngeia.
Ha thurchi hah an rietin chu anrêngin Pathien an minpâka, Hanchu Paul kôm, “Sungsuokpa, Judangei lâia iempungei tamlam le Balama an inpêk lam ngei nu mua.
Nangman Jentailngei rama Juda omngei murdi kôm, Moses balam nûksonga an nâingei sertan khâiloi rang le Juda balam jûi khâiloi rang ni minchu ngâi ti mîn an rila.
No hong tung ti laka hi an riet ngêt rang ania, kho angin mo ei tho rang?
Masikin chong nang kin be lam angtakin tho roh, chonginkhâmna lei dôn sai mi pasal minli an oma.
Anni ngei hah tuong inla, an kôm nang khom inthieng inla an sam epna man hah nangman pêk roh, male chu mingei murdi'n nu thurchi an lei misîr ha dik mak ti hong riet thei an tih, nangma ke Moses balam ajûi mindik ti hong riet kelen an tih.
Jentailngei lâia iempungei rangin chu, mirmil biekna sâ inthiengloi ngei, sâ alei thi sai ngei, ha renga athi ngei sâkloi rang le, hur inditna ngei khoma inthieng rang ani tiin lekha'n ei roijêk ei min riet zoi,” an tia.
Masikin Paul'n anangtûka chu pasal minli ngei hah a tuonga an kôm ama khom ânthienga Pathien Biekina an lûta, inthiengna nikhuo ahek suomân chu inbôlna rang sângei pêk thei ni noni tiin ochai'n a lei ril ira.
Aniatachu sûn sari ahek suo vâng dôrin Asia rama Judangei Paul hah Biekina an mua lokongei an misieta Paul hah an sûra.
An hêtsana, “Israel mingei mi san roi, ma miriem hih ramtina mingei murdi kôm, Israel mingei Moses Balamngei ma Biekin ngei hi a rilminsiet bang ngâipu hah ani, atûn reng hin khom ma Biekina hin Jentailngei a hong tuonga ma Biekin hih a min nim,” an tia.
(Ma anga an tina chu moton han khopuilien sûnga Ephesus'a renga Trophimus hah Paul kôm an mua, Biekin sûnga a tuong nîng atih, tiin an iem sikin).
A khopuilien pumpui an injêl sabak zoia lokongei hah an tama, Paul ha an sûra Biekin renga an mojôk paia Biekin ngei an khâr kelen zoia.
Paul hah that rang an ti lâitakin Jerusalema mingei murdi an injêl ti Rom râlmi ulientak kôm an hong rila.
Masuole chu, râlmi pâl ulientakpu han râlmi ulienngei le râlmingei hah a tuonga lokongei tieng an tân kelena, lokongei han, râlmi ulientak le râlmingei ha an mu lechu Paul an lei jêm hah an inngama.
Hanchu, râlmi ulientak han a kôm a hong nâia, Paul hah a sûra a kuta zingjirûi inik a minbun kelena, masuole chu lokongei kôm han tumo ani le imo a tho minchâi a rekela.
Lokongei an chong inruol khâi maka, pâl dadangin an chong hah ahong om zoia, lokongei an hêtsan rei sikin khoite mindik thei maka Paul hah kulpuia minlût rangin chong a pêka.
Paul hah kalbi a phâk vâng dôr an tuonga, lokongei an pût rei sikin râlmingei han a domin an dom paia.
Lokongei han “That roi” tia hêtsan chungin an jûi ngei bang.
Hanchu, Paul han kulpui an minlût rangto han, râlmi ulientak kôm han “No kôm chong imakhat ti thei ning mo?” a tia. Râlmi ulientak han, “Greek chong ni riet mo?”
“Tiena misaloi mi thata isâng minli ramchâr tienga tuong, Egypt mi hah nimak che mo?” a tia.
Paul'n “Juda, Cilicia rama Tarsus khopuiliena suok ki nia, khuo kâm omtak mi ki ni, rangâihoitakin lokongei makunga hin chong thei rangin ni phal roh,” a tia.
Male chu râlmi ulientak han chong thei rangin phalna a pêka Paul hah indingna mun han a vândinga, lokongei hah dâirek rangin kut a jâpa lokongei rahang adâi lehan Hebrew chongin a chonga:
“Ka champui Isrealngei ki dikna thurchi nin kôm ki ril hih rangâi roi!” a tia.
Hebrew chongin a chong ti an riet lechu an dâirek uol zoia Paul'n a ti banga.
Hanchu Paul'n, “Juda ki ni, Cilicia rama Tarsus khuoa suok ki ni, hannirese Jerusalema Gamaliel minchuna hong seilien ki nia, ei richibulngei anga balam inngartaka lei inchu ki ni. Aviensûn hin nangni ngei angtaka Pathien tienga theidôra inpêk ke lei ni.
Hi Lampui lei jûingei hih that rang dôra lei pûta ku nuom lei lo ngâi ki ni, pasal nupang ku sûra intâng ina lei khum ngâi ki ni.
Ochai Inlalngei le Roijêkpungei murdi'n ko chong hih adik ti nangni ril thei an tih, an kôm renga Damascus taka Juda champuingei sûrna rang lekha ka mana, masikin ma khuo mingei hah sûra dûkmintonga zingjirûi leh khita Jerusalema hong tuong ranga se ki nia.
“Hanchu ke sea, Damascus khuo kôl kin phâk le sûnchimripa inningloi rengin invân renga vârin mi juong êla.
Hanchu nuoia kên leta, chong ki rieta, ‘Sual, Sual ithomo dûk mi ni mintonga?’ a tia.
Keiman, ‘Pumapa Tumo ni ni?’ tiin ke rekela, ama han ko kôm, ‘Keima Nazareth Jisua, dûk ni mintong ngâipu hah ki ni,’ a tia.
Ko kôla miriemngei han vâr chu an mua, hannirese ko kôma chong juong tung hah chu riet mak ngei.
Keiman ‘Pumapa imo ko tho rang?’ ki tia, Pumapa han ko kôm ‘Inthoi inla Damascus khuo lût roh, mahan Pathien'n no tho rang ngei murdi nang lei ril atih’ a tia.
Avâr hah avâr rai sikin ki mitngei khom ajînga, masikin ka champuingei han ku kutin min keiruoia Damascus khuoa kin lût zoi.
“Ma khopuilien han mi inkhat a riming Ananias, Pathien biek mi le balam lei jûi ngâi a oma, mataka Juda omngei murdi'n an mirit sabaka.
Ama hah ko kôm a honga, ko kôla ândinga, Lâibung Saul hong mu thei ta roh, mi tia. Ma zora tak han ko hong muthei nôk zoia, ama hah ko hong ena.
Ama han, ei richibulngei Pathien lungdo ngei riet rang le mi diktak tîrlâm hah mua, a chongbâingei riet rangin nang a thang ani.
Nu mu le ni riet ngei angtak han mi murdi chunga rietpuipu na la ni rang sikin.
Atûn reng, hi hin khoi mo na la ôt bang? Inthoi inla, baptisma chang inla ni sietnangei rusûk minsâina rangin a kôm chubaitho ta roh, a tia.
“Jerusalem tieng ki kîr nôka, Biekina Pathien kôm chubai ko tho lâiin inlârnân,
Mahan Pumapa ku mua, ko kôm, ‘Inrangin Jerusalem mâk roh, ku thurchi ni misîr rang, hi muna mingeiin an modôm loi rang sikin’ a tia.
Hanchu keiman, ‘Pumapa, synagog murdi ngei lûta nang iempungei lei sûra lei jêm ngâipu hah ki ni tiin min riet let kêng alei ni.
Male no chong rietpuipu Stephan an that zora han khom ko oma, an that rang hah asa lei ti puipu le ama that ngei an puonngei lei dar pepu hah ki ni,’ ki tia.
Pumapa'n, ‘Se roh, alataka Jentailngei kôm nang tîr ki tih,’” a tia.
Hanchu, ha thurchi ten hah an rangâia, masuole chu rôl inringtakin an inieka minboi pai roi! That roi! a ring rangin chuk mak an tia.
Anrêngin an inieka an puonngei an vôka, pildi invân tieng an vôra.
Hanchu Rom râlmi ulientakpu han Paul hah rukulpui sûng tieng ruoi rangin chong a pêka, a chunga ma angdôra an hêtsana abi riet theina rangin jêm pumin rekel tit rangin a ti pe ngeia.
Hannirese jêm ranga an khit suole chu, Paul'n a kôma inding râlmi razakhat ruoipu kôm han, “Rom mi adik loina khoite boi hih jêm rangin balam ani mo?” a tipea.
Râlmi razakhat ruoipu han ha chong hah a rietin chu, râlmi ulientak kôm a sea. “Khoimo tho rang nin ti hi? Ma miriem hih Rom mi ke ani” a tipea.
Masuole chu, râlmi ulientakpu hah Paul kôm a sea, “Rom mi ni ni mo, mi ril roh!” tiin a rekela, Paul'n “Ki ni,” a tiin a thuona.
Râlmi ulientakpu han “Kei chu Rom mi changna rang hin sum tamtak ka thâm ok,” a tia, Aniatachu Paul'n kei chu “Rom mi nisai piela juonzir ki ni,” tiin athuona.
Voikhat rengin, Paul kôma chong rekel rang dônpu ngei murdi khom an rot let zoia. Râlmi ulientak ha khom Paul hah Rom mi ani ti a riet lechu asân a chi zoi, moton han Paul ha zingjirûi leh a lei thung zoi sikin.
Hanchu, anangtûka chu râlmi ulien han, Judangei itho sikin mo Paul an nônna riet rang a nuom sikin, a zingjirûi khitna an sût pea, ochaisingei le roijêkpungei murdi lei intûp rangin chong a pêka, masuole chu Paul ha a tuonga an makunga a minding zoi.
Paul'n roijêkpungei hah a en ngita, “Ka champui Isrealngei aviensûn ten hin Pathien mâkunga sielesarietna diktak dônin ko tho rang ngei murdi ko hong tho ani,” a tia.
Ochai Inlaltak Ananias han, Paul kôma inding ngei kôm han Paul hah a bâikuo bên pe roi, a ti pe ngeia.
Paul'n a kôm, “Nangma, bang rusûk minchekpu Pathien'n nang bên atih, a tia. Mahan nên sunga Balam anga roijêk rangin nên sunga balam khêlin mi min bên rang ni ti mo!” a tipea.
Paul kôm inding ngei han, Paul kôm han “Pathien Ochai Inlaltak khom jâ loiin khoi ithomo no ngo,” an tia.
Paul'n “Ka champuingei Ochai Inlaltak ani ti ki riet loi sika kêng, Pathien lekhabu'n ‘Ni mi, roijêkpungei chunga chong saloi ni ti rang nimak ati,’” a tia.
Paul'n Sadduceengei senkhat, Pharisee ngei senkhat le anni ti a riet lechu, roijêkpungei lâia han inringtakin “Ka champui Isrealngei keima Pharisee ki ni, Pharisee nâipasal ki ni, keiman mithi inthoinôkna aom ti sabeina ko dôn sikin ma angtaka intakna ko om ani,” a ti pe ngeia.
Maha a ti suole chu, Pharisee ngei le Sadduceengei bâiinkhamin pâl inikin an insena.
(Sadduceengeiin chu mithi inthoinôkna reng om mak, vântîrtonngei, rathangei ommak, aniatachu Pharisee ngeiin chu anin thumin an iem sikin.)
Hanchu an iniek hah ânring uola, Pharisee tienga Balam minchupungei senkhat an indinga asân an makhala, “Hi miriem hih a tho minchâina khoite mu mak me, vântîrton le ratha'n a chongpui tatak khom nisenla khoimo asiet?” an tia.
Hanchu asân an inkhal sikin Paul hah khêr nôinek ni ngei tiin râlmi ulientak han a chia, râlmingei hah lokongei lâia han juong sea, Paul hah hong tuonga kulpui sûng tieng tuong pai rangin chong a pêka.
Mani jân han Pumapa hah, Paul kôm a juon dinga, a kôm, “Chi no roh! Jerusalema ko chong ni min riet angdên han Rom khopuia khom ko chong la min riet nôk ni tih,” a tipea.
Anangtûk jînga chu Juda senkhatngei an intûpkhôma, huongvâr an sina Paul an that mân chu ite sâkloi rang nêkloi rang tiin khomâk an insâma.
Ma anga tho ngei hi mi sômminli nêkin an tama.
Hanchu anni ngei hah ochaisingei le upangei kôm an sea, “Paul kin that mân chu ite sâkloi rang nêkloi rangin khomâk kin insâm ke ani zoi.
Masikin atûn hin, nangnin roijêkpungei le a roi asa uola jêk rang angin Paul hi nin kôm juong tuong rangin Rom râlmi ulientak kôm chong hong pêk roi, nin kôm a juong tung mân khom lei that rangin kin insiem suo ke ani zoi,” an tia.
Hannirese ma thurchingei hah Paul a tupa'n a lei rieta, kulpui sûnga a va lûta, Paul a va rîla.
Hanchu Paul han râlmi razakhat ruoipu inkhat a koia, “Hi ruotharte hi râlmi ulientak kôm tuong roh, râlmi ulientak kôma chong khat ril rang a dôn,” a tipea.
Râlmi ulientakpu kôm a tuonga, “Intâng ina ompu Paul han mi koia hi ruotharte hi no kôm hong thak rangin mi tia, no kôm hin chong inkhat ril rang a dôn tiin chong mi be sa,” a tia.
Râlmi ulientak han a kut a sûra, mun ânkilna uola a tuonga “Imo mi ril rang no dôn,” tiin a rekela.
Ama han, “Juda rachamneipungei Paul a roi hi adik uola jêk rang tiin nangtûka roijêkpungei kôma tuong rang minlêmin nang an hong zong rang ani.
Hannirese an chong lei don no roh, an lâia mi sômminli nêka tam uolin Paul an that mân chu ite sâkloi rang nêkloi rang tiin chong an inkhâm, atûn hin that rangin an insiem chak kêng ani zoi no chong vai ke an ngâk,” a tipea.
Râlmi ulientak han, “Hi thurchi hi ko kôma ni misîr pêna chu tute kôm misîr khâi no roh,” tiin chong a bea. Male ruotharte hah a min se zoi.
Hanchu, “Râlmi razanik ruoipu inik a kôia, avien jân, dârkuo dôrin Caesarea se rangin râlmi razanik le, sakor chung chuong thei sômsari le isei a chôi râlmi razanik insiem roi,
Mapêna han Felix kôm a tung ngêt theina rangin, Paul a chuongna rang sakorngei khom mintuo pe sa rangin chong a be sa zoi.”
Male Râlmi ulienpu han, hi anghin lekhamuthuon a mizieka.
“Claudius Lysias Râiôt jâ omtak Felix: chibai a pêk.
Hi miriem hih Judangei an sûra, that rang an ti lâitakin ka râlmingei juong kêlsuo rangin ke sea, Rom mi ani ti ki riet sikin ko hong sanminjôka.
An nônna bi riet rang ku nuom sikin, an roijêkpungei kôm khom ku tuonga.
Anni an balama a lekti sikin an nôn pai ani ti ki rieta, hannirese thi rak rang dôr le intâng ina omna rang dôr ite minchâi mak.
Male Judangei that rangin an pût tit ti min rîla, masikin no kôm ku juongtîr kelen ani. A nônpungei khom a thurchi misîr rang a nônpungei murdi chu no kôm hong misîr rangin chong ke pêk ngei,” a tia.
Hanchu râlmingeiin a chongpêk angin Paul hah an tuonga mani jân han Antipatris khuo an tungpuia.
Anangtûka chu râlmi kea se ngei hah chu rukulpui tieng an kîr nôka, sakor chunga chuong mingei vai hah Paul sepui tit rangin an oma.
Hanchu Caesarea an tuonga, Râiôt kôm lekha hah an pêka, male Paul ha khom a kuta an bang kelena.
Râiôt'n lekha hah a pore suole chu Paul omna ram a rekela, Cililia ram mi ani ti a riet lechu a kôm,
“Nang nônpungei an juong tung lehan no roi hih keiman rangâi ki tih,” a tipea. Hanchu Paul hah râiôt omna munpuia han dara vêng bang rangin chong a pêk ngeia.
Sûn rangnga suole Ochai Inlaltak Ananias hah upangei senkhat le balamtheipu a riming Tertullas ngei le Ceasarea khuoa an sea. Felix makunga an vânlanga male Paul an nônna roi hah an va rila.
Hanchu Paul hah an koi lûta, male Tertullus'n hi anghin an nônna roi a hong misîr phuta: “Nasa sabak na! No roijêk theina jârin inngêi takin zora sôtak kin om ngâi sik le kin ram sana rang sinsiem anângngei murdi khom nangman mi ni thop sikin.
Kho zora khoma, kho muna khom râisântakin kin om ngâi.
No zora minchâi ok rang hi jôt mu ung han khom nu nunhoina sikin ko chong bongkik hi mi lei rangâi pe rangin nang ko hong ngên.
Ma miriem hin asân mi min jêla; muntina Judangei lâia injêlnangei a musuok phuta Nazareth pâla ruoipu inkhat ani ti kin riet.
Pathien Biekin min nim rangin a tho ngâi sikin kin lei sûr ania, kin balam angin a roi hih jêk kin nuoma.
Hannisenla, râlmi ulientak Lysias a honga, male rangrât rengin kin kôm renga a tuonga.
Ama nônpungei khom na makunga inlang rangin chong a pêk sa, nangma reng khomin rekel inla, kin nônna bi ngei hi ama renga khom hin riet thei ni tih,” a tia.
Judangei khomin an nônna an lei thopa ma ngei murdi hah adik kêng an lei tia.
Masuole chu râiôt'n Paul hah chong rangin kut jâpin a kôia, Paul'n, “Kum tamtak hi jât nget chunga roijêkpu ne lei ni ti ki riet sikin asân ka râiasâna, râisântakin na makunga hin ki dikna thurchi ki misîr rang ani, a tia.
Jerusalema Pathien biek rangin ko hong se ni renga hi sûn sômleinik pên lani nonih ti nangma rengin riet thei ni tih.
Pathien Biekina tute kên khal puina omak, Synagogngeia le khopuiliena, kho mun khoma, Mipuingei saloi tho ranga ki misietna Judangei mu mak ngei.
Atûna no kôma min juong nônna hi khom inthâr takin misîr thei no ni ngei.
Nikhomrese hi chong hih no kôm muphuong ki tih: Anni ngeiin minchuna dikloi an lei ti ngâi lam dang tieng ei richibulngei Pathien ke lei jûia, hannirese Moses Balama lênziek le dêipungei lekhabungei murdi chu ke lei iem ani.
Keima khom anni ngei angin Pathiena sabeina ko dôn, mi murdi ngei, midik le dikloi, thina renga inthoinôkna ngeia.
Masikin Pathien le miriem makunga hin sielesarietna diktak hih kho zora khom dôn tit rang hih ke lei nuom tak ani.
“Kum tamtak Jerusalem ka mâk suo nûkin, ka jât mingei rang sum le inbôlnangei pêk rangin ke sea.
Ma zora han inthiengna ko dôn suole Biekina min mua, ma zora han mipuingei khom ommak ngeia ite rahang a rât khom om mak.
Hannirese, Asia rama Judangei senkhatngei mahan an oma; anni ngei han min nônna thurchi hin imo misîr rang an dônin chu, no kôm hin juong misîr rese ngei.
Nônchu ma muna mingei hin roijêkpungei makunga kên ding zora han imo ki minchâina an man misîr rese ngei.
Hi neinun inkhat an makunga kên ding lâia ki ti telloiin chu: ‘Mithi inthoinôkna aom tiin iemna ko dôn ti hi aviensûn ten hin hi angtaka dûktonga ko omna chu ani.’ ” a tia.
Hanchu Felix hah, ma roi hah asadima lei min riet ani sikin, roijêkna hah a minngama, “Râlmi ulientak Lysias a juong tung tena nin roi hi la jêk rong,” a ti pe ngeia.
Hanchu Paul a rungpu ulientak kôm han asadima enkôl rangin chong a pêka, aniatachu alekti mojôk rangin le a malngei anângngei pêk thei rangin phalna a pêka.
Sûn idôr mini suole Felix le a lômnu Drusilla, Juda nupang leh an honga. Paul hah an kôia Jisua Khrista taksônna roia an chonga, a thurchi hah an rangâia.
Paul'n dikna ngei, indînna, male roijêk nikhuo ahong tung rang ngei, a misîr pea anînchu Felix han asân a chia, “Atûn chu ne se thei zoi. Zora ka man tika nang koi nôk ki tih,” a tipea.
Ma zoratak han Paul'n sum mi pêk duoi mo ti sabeina a dôna; masika han a kôia a chongpui bang ngâi ani.
Kum inik dôr a vunsuo lechu, Porcius Festus, Felix hah râiôt'n a thûl zoia. Felix han Judangei modômna man rang a nuom sikin Paul ha intâng ina a mâk chiena.
Hanchu Festus'n ha ramhuol hah a tunga, sûnthum suole chu Caesarea renga Jerusalema a sea.
Mahan ochaisingei le Juda ruoipungeiin Paul hah an hong tuonga an nônna Festus kôm han an ngêna
an nuomna thope ngeia Paul hah Jerusalema hong tuong rangin, asikchu lampuia lei that rang an bôk sikin.
Festus a thuona, “Paul hi Caesarea intâng ina lei dar ania male keima khom mason se nôk lei rang ki ni.
Nin ruoipungei Caesarea tena mi jûi senla ngei ma miriem hah a tho lei minchâina aomin chu juong nôn rese ngei,” a tia.
Festus hah sûn riet mini, sûn sôm mini, anni ngei leh ala châma male Caesarea tieng a se zoi. Anangtûka chu roijêkna ânsunga Paul hah hong tuong rangin chong a pêka.
Paul hah a hong tung lechu a kôm han Jerusalem renga juong Judangei hah a rihîla an indinga an nônna thurchi tamtak an misîra, minthârna man mak ngei.
Aniatachu Paul han athenin ânrunga: “Judangei balam roia, Biekin roia nônchu Caesar chunga khom ite minchâiin doina lei tho mu-ung,” a tia.
Hannirese Festus han Judangei modômna man rang a nuomna, masikin Paul kôm han a rekela, “Jerusalema sea, ka makunga nang an nônna ngei hih khi taka hôn jêk rang nu nuom mo?” a tia.
Paul'n, “Caesar roijêkna makunga ko roi an jêkna muna jêk pea om rang piela inding ki ni. Judangei chunga ite minchâina dôn mu ung ti nangma khom ni riet sai ania.
Balam ki minchâia, thi rang dôrin minchâina ko dôn anîn chu, thi rang khomin kên phal. Hannirese min nônna ngei hi adikloi anin chu tutên an kôm mi pêk thei no ni ngei Caesar kôm tung ki tih,” a tia.
Hanchu Festus roijêkpungei, a chongpui suole chu, “Caesar kôm tung rang nu nuom lam angtakin tung ni tih,” a tia.
Sûn idôr mini avun suole chu Rêng Agrippa le Bernice Caesarea an hong tunga Festus mirit an pêka.
Sûn tamtak an om nûkin, Festus'n Paul thurchi ngei hah Rêng kôm han a misîr pea Felix han mi inkhat intâng ina hin a mâka.
Jerusalema ke sea han, Juda Ochaisingei le Juda ruoipungeiin asân an lei nônna dikloi minchang ngêt rangin ko kôm an ngêna.
Aniatachu hi anghin ki tipe ngei, “An nônpu le a nônpungei mâi intongin, an nônpu han an nônna roia han a dikna thurchi misîr rang a riet khâi noa, dikloi ani ti ânlang mân chu mojôk rang hih Rom mingei balam nimak.
Mahin an juong tung suo nûkin zora sôtloiin anangtûka roijêkna taka kên sunga, ama hah hong tuong rangin chong ke pêka.
A nônpungei hah an indinga, aniatachu Paul chunga han ma dôra dikloina khoite an misîr angin riet mu-ung.
An inkhalnangei senkhat ha chu sakhuo roia ania mi inkhat a riming Jisua an ti, ama hah a thia; aniatachu Paul'n ama hah aring nôk a tia.
Keiman chu ma thurchi ngei ha chu a jêkna chang khom riet mu-ung, masikin keiman Paul ke rekela Jerusalema a sea mahan ajêk rangin nu nuom mo? tiin ke rekela.
Aniatachu Paul han Caesar jêk pe rangin a ngên sikin, ki min se thei mân chu lei donsûi rangin chong ke pêk ngei ani,” a tia.
Agrippa han Festus kôm, “Kei khom ma miriem hah a chong rangâi rang ku nuom,” a tia. Festus'n “Nangtûka rangâi ni tih,” tiin a thuona.
Anangtûka chu Agrippa le Bernice han inlal takin mipuingei intûpna an va lûta, râlmi ulienngei le khopuilien sûnga ulienngei khom an oma. Hanchu Festus chongpêkin Paul an hong tuonga.
Festus han, “Rêng Agrippa le kin kôma omngei murdi, hi mi hih nin mu ania, Judangei murdi'n hi taka omngei le Jerusalema omngei murdi'n ko kôm an juong nônna min ring khâiloi rangin an in-iek.
Hannisenla thina rang dôr ite tho minchâina dôn mak ti ki rieta. Aniatachu ama'n Ceasar kôm tung rang a nuom sikin tîr rangin ki ti ani.
Aniatachu, a thurchi hi Ceasar kôm ki miziek rang hi ânthârin riet mu-ung, masikin nin kôm ko hong tuong ani hi, Rêng Agrippa nangma kôm hin ani uol, a chungroi nin phuol suole, a miziek rang imakhat ko dôn thei rang.
Asikchu mi intâng ina om, an nônna bi inthârlaka ril loia tîr rang chu keima rangin omzie boi aphuo rang,” a tia.
Agrippa'n Paul kôma, “Ni dikna thurchi misîr thei rangin phal ni nih,” a tipea. Paul'n a kut a phara a dikna thurchi, hi anghin a misîra:
“Rêng Agrippa! Judangei min nônna murdia ki dikna thurchi avien hin no kôm ki misîr rang sikin asân ka râlvân asa okin ki riet,
mahin, Judangei balam le ânjêlna omngei murdi ni riet minthâr sikin rangâihoitakin ko chong hi ni lei rangâi pe rangin nang ko hong ngên ani.
“Judangei murdi'n nâipang ka chang lâia ko omlam le ku nunchan, motona kin rama, masuole Jerusalema khom an rêngin an riet.
An misîr nuom ngânin chu, ku thurchi hi aphut renga an riet let, ei sakhuo tienga pâl inngartak Pharisee ngei lâia ke lei omngei hah.
Male atûn ei richibulngei kôm Pathien chong a lei khâmsai hah sabeina sikin hima mun hin kên ding ani.
Ma chonginkhâm sika han ei jât sômleinik ngeiin sûn le jânin Pathien chubai an lei mûk ngâi ani, male ma sabeina sika han Pumapa, hima sikin kêng Judangei hin min nôn ani.
Pathien'n mithi a kaithoi ngei thei ani, tiin hi taka omngei hin ithomo nin iem theiloi?
“Keima nanâk khom hih Nazareth Jisua riming doiin neinunngei murdi tho ngâi ke lei ni.
Maha Jerusalema ke lei tho ngâi. Ochaisingei renga rachamneina ngei ka mana, male Pathien mingei tamtak intângna ina ke lei khum ngâi; male that rang an ti zora khomin, asa ke lei ti pui ngei ngâi.
Synagogngeia khom voi tamtak dûk ke lei mintong ngei ngâi, an taksônna ngei min mâk rangin ke lei pût ngâia, ka takasi rei sikin ram dang khopuilienngei khom ku nunuom lo rangin ke se ngâi.
“Ma rang sik piel han ochaisingei renga rachamneina le phalna chôiin Damascus khuoa ke sea.
Pu Mirit-omtak, lampuia ke se lâitak sûnchimripa, O Rêngpa, invân renga juong vâr, nisa nêka vâr uol hah, keima le ka champuingei revêla hin ajuong êl ku mua.
Kin rêngin nuoia kin inleta, male Hebrew chongin ‘Saul, Saul! ithomo nangman nu nunuom mini loa? Nangmananâk kêng nang minna rang, serâtchalin a pumapa tôkmola doiin athâi anghan’ kêng ani rang.
Keiman, ‘Puma tumo ni ni?’ tiin ke rekela, male Pumapa han, ‘Keima hih Jisua, dûk ni mintong bângpu hah ki ni, tiin a thuona.
Aniatachu, inthoi inla ne ke leh inding roh, ki sinthopua nang phun rangin no kôm ku juong inlâr ani. Avien sûna keima renga nu mu ngei le sûnmoton tienga nang ki min mu rang ngei murdi hi midangngei khom ril roh.
Israelngei le Jentailngei renga nang kêlsuo ki tih, nang ki tîrna rang ngei kôm renga.
An mitngei minvâr pe ngei na ta, hanchu ijîng renga avâr tieng hong inhei an ta, soitan kut renga Pathien tieng hong inhei an tih, masikin ku chunga taksônna an dôn sika an sietnangei ngâidam an changna rang le Pathien mi thang ngei lâia mun an manna rangin.’ a tia.
“Male, Rêng Agrippa, invân renga inlârna ku mu jômloiin tho mu-ung.
Motontaka Damascus sûnga male Jerusalem sûnga male chu Judea ram murdi le Jentailngei lâia khom, an sietnangei renga insîrin, male Pathien tieng an nin hei zoi ti riet theina rangin thurchi ki misîr pe ngâi ani.
Masik taka han hi Judangei Biekin sûnga ko om han min sûra, male ma that rang an pût ani.
Aniatachu avien sûnten hin Pathien'n ni sana, male mi chîn le mi lien ngei kôm indingin rietpuipu nina hih nin rêngin nin kôm ka la misîr thei ani, ki ti ngâi ngei chu, Moses le dêipungeiin la juong tung atih, an ti bang ngâi hah ani:
Messiah han dûktong ngêt a ta, male thina renga inthoinôk masatak nîng atih, Sanminringna vâr thurchi Judangei le Jentialngei kôm muphuong atih,” a tia.
Ma anghan, Paul'n a dikna thurchi a misîr lâitakin, Festus hah a hong hêtsana, “Paul, na châng ke ani zoi! nên chu mintam rei sikin na châng zoi!” a tia.
Paul'n, châng mu-ung, Festus mirit omtak hangvangin adiktak ki misîr ani.
Rêng Agrippa! hâitakin no kôm ko chong thei, hi neinunngei chungroi hih ni riet sikin, hi thurchi hih inkila tho nimaka a kôm hin ite ip rang ommak ti ki riet mindik ani.
“Rêng Agrippa dêipungei ni iem mo? ni iem ti ki riet ani!”
Agrippa han Paul kôm, ma zora bongte sûng hin Khristien mi min chang rang no bôk mini? a tia.
Paul'n, “zora bongtên mo, aseiin mo, nangma vai nang ti mu unga, avien sûna ko chong rangâi ngei murdi hih keima anga om rangin Pathien kôm ke ngên bang ngâi hi zingjirûi hi chu bun uol loi rangin!” tiin athuona.
Hanchu Rêng, le Râiôt, le Bernice, le adangngei murdi an inthoi leta,
Male an mâk suole anni le anni a nin tia, “Hima miriem hin a thina rang dôra le intângna ina khum rang dôra minchâina dôn mak.”
Male Agrippa han Festus kôm, “Hi miriem hin Caesar kôm tung rangin lei inzong no rese chu, ma reng hin mojôk thei rang piel ani,” a tia.
Italy taka rukuonga se rangin kin masat lehan, Paul le intângna ina om senkhatngei hah “Rom râlmi pâl” ulien Julius kuta an bang ngeia.
Adramyttium renga rukuonga kin sea Asia ramhuol sûnga rukuong inngamna mâk rangin ânthoka male Aristarkus Macedonia rama Thessalonika khuo mi kin kôm a oma.
Anangtûka chu Sidon kin tunga. Julius han Paul hah lungkham a mua, male a malngei vântongpui rangin phalna a pêka a nângngei an lei pêk theina rangin.
Ma renga han kin se nôka, male phâivuon anôk tieng mi hong sêm sikin Cyprus tuihuola kâirêng omna tieng kin se zoia.
Cilicia rama tuikhanglien kin rakâna male Pamphylia le Lycia rama Myra kin hong zoi.
Mahan râlmi ulien han rukuong inkhat Alexandria renga hong Italy rama se rang a mua, masikin mahan mi min chuong zoi.
Nikhuo tamtak thâmin jâm jâmin kin sea male intak takin Cnidus khopuia kin tunga, phâivuo han ma tieng han mi min se thei maka, masikin kâirêng omna Crete tuihuol tieng asukin kin sea, Cape Salmone kin tung zoi.
Tuipâng kin vanâia male intak takin Rukuong Inngamna Hoi, an ti hah kin hong tunga, Lasea khopui renga hah labâk mak.
Mahan nikhuo tamtak kin min hek zoi sikin rukuong dêna se nôk rang hah chi a oma, Ratanna Nikhuo alei vun zoia, Masikin Paul'n hima rilna hih a pêk ngeia.
“Miriem ngei, atûn renga ei mântieng hi chu asân chi aom ti ku mua, sietna le inmangna lientak rukuong le a neinunngei chunga le ei ringna khom ânmang thei.”
Aniatachu râlmi ulienpu han Paul chong jôm nêkin rukuonga ulienpu le rukuong pumangei chong a mindon ngei uola.
Rukuong inngamna hah phalbia omna rangin asaloi sikin mi tam uolin an omna renga sea, Phoenix an tung theia anin chu la tunga ma muna han phalbi la min hek rangin a min sûka. Phoenix chu Cret tuihuola rukuong inngamna inkhat thang-mâr le sak-mâr maiinthak ani.
Thang phâivuo jâmin ahong lechu an mintuo tak ha an tho thei rangin an bôka, thîrrûi ha a kaisuoa Crete tuipâng tienga han nâi theidôra nâiin an jâpa.
Aniatachu chomolte ani lechu phâivuo râttak “Sak-sim” an ti ngâi hah tuihuol renga ajuong sêma.
Rukuong hah ajuong tokthapa, phâivuo mâithakin kin se thei khâiloi tena chu pût khâi makme phâivuon rukuong ha asemna titieng mi chôia.
Cauda tuihuol saktieng kin khêl lechu kâirêng chînte kin mana. Mahan, intak takin, rukuong sûnga rukuong chînte hah kin kêlsuo theia.
An kêlsuo nûkin insanna rûi lehan rukuong nuoitieng an thunga an khitbela. Libya tuipânga sietsâia mi nôngpai atih, ti an chi sikin puonjâr hah an min nuoia, male phâivuon ajôtna titieng amin sêma.
Phâivuo hah ala rât tit sikin anangtûka chu neinun hah senkhat an vôr paia,
male hatûknôka chu rukuonga mangruo neinunngei ha an vôrpai nôka.
Nikhuo tamtak nisa, ârsingei khom inlang khâiloiin phâivuopui râtin ahong sêm tit sikin amongnataka chu ring rang khomin in sabei khâi makmea.
Masuole bunêk loia zora sôttak an om nûkin, Paul'n an motona ândinga male, “Miriemngei, ko chong hah nin rangâia Cret tuihuol renga ei juong khâiloi nirese chu hi sietna le inmangna hi tong loi rang ei nia.
Aniatachu atûn hin nangni ke ngên ratha inngamtakin om roi! tute nin ringna machân uol no tunui, rukuong hi vai kêng machânin aom rang.
Ata ki nia, a sin ki sin bang ngâipu Pathien vântîrton inkhat jânin han ko kôm a juonga.
‘Paul, chi no roh! Caesar makunga lânding ngêt ni tih. Male Pathien asatna sikin rukuonga na champuingei ringna khom hôi pe ngei atih.’
Masikin miriem ngei rathângamtakin om roi! Pathien ka sabei sikin mi juong ril angin nîng atih.
Aniatachu kho tuihuol pânga makhata mi chôi atih.”
Mediterranean tuipuia jân sômleiminli phâivuopuiin mi chôi suo nûkin, jânchimripa rukuongpungei hah tânga suok thei rangin an mindona.
Masikin anni ngei han tui minkhina le an minkhia metres 40 ânthûka; chomolte suole chu ma angdên han an thoa metres 30 an man nôka.
Kho lungkâra makhat mi juong nông nih ti an chi sikin rukuong remei tieng thîrrûi minli dôr an juong mathâka khuovâr rang ngâklalin chubai an tho.
Hanchu rukuongpu ngei han, rukuong renga rotpai rang an pûta; rukuong chînte hah tuia an mathâka, rukuong moton tienga han thîrrûingei mathâk inlêmin an thoa.
Aniatachu, Paul'n râlmi ulienpu kôm le râlmingei kôm, “Rukuongpungei hah rukuong chunga an om nônchu nin ring rangin sabeina om mak,” a tia.
Masikin, râlmingei han rukuong chînte rûi hah an âtsata, an min se zoi.
Khuo ahong vâr vângin, Paul'n, bunêk rangin a ngên ngeia: “Aviensûn ten hin sûn sômleiminli nin ngâkna ani zoia, male madôr zora sôt hi khoite sâkloi nêkloia nin om ani zoi.
Bunêk rangin nangni ke ngên, nin ring theina rangin. Nin lua samsang inkhat luo inmang no nih” a tia.
Mahi a ti suole, Paul'n vâipôl senkhat a lâka anrênga makunga han Pathien kôm râisânchong a rila, a khoia an sâk phut zoi.
Anni ngei khom han an ratha ânngama an rêngin bu an nêk zoi.
Rukuonga miriem hah kin rêngin 276 kin ni.
Mitinin an khop dôr an nêk suole chu rukuong hah ajâng theina rangin bungei hah tuikhangliena an vôrpai zoi.
Khuo ahong vârin chu, rukuongpungei han kho mun mini rietthei mak ngeia, aniatachu, tui inkilna mun inkhat sietsâibil an mua, anithei nisenla chu ma mun han rukuong hah tâng makhâi ngêt rang an pûta.
Masika han thîrrûingei hah an âtsata, male tuikhangliena han an minngima, an jâpna thîrrûingei khom madên han an sûta, mântieng puon an mazara phâivuon ajôtna titieng atuong thei rang lam takin an min sânga sietsâibil an va muna tieng han an pan zoia.
Aniatachu tuisou inik inchunna taka kin lûta rukuong lu han tâng ava sika rukuong lu hah singinsa thei khâiloiin ân-ôk tita, rukuong remei tieng hah tuidârinsokin ahong suka akoi zoi.
Intângna ina intâng ngei hah tui inlieiin lei rot ni ngei ti sika han râlmingei han anrêngin that let rang an mintuoa.
Aniatachu, râlmi ulienpu han Paul hah mojôk rang a nuoma masikin hima anga an tho hah a khap ngeia, manêkin tui inliei thei ngei kai chu tui inlieia tâng lei kâi rangin;
adangngei khom thingpêk chunga aninônchu rukuong hârngei lehan tâng lei kâi rangin chong a pêk ngeia. Ma anghan kin rêngin damtakin tâng kin kâi zoi ani.
Damtakin tuipânga kin hong lehan, tuihuol hah Malta ani ti kin riet zoi.
Ma rama mingei hah keini rangin mal satak an lei nia. Ruo ajuonga adâi sikin mei an thoa male kin rêngin uôt rangin min modôm ani.
Paul han thing pomkhat ava lâka meia a tuoa alum lehan murûl ahong jôka Paul kut hah a muchuka a kher tita.
Ma rama mingei han Paul kuta murûl akâi hah an mua, inkhat le inkhatin, “Ma miriempa hi mi thatpu kêng ani ngêt rang, tuikhanglien renga damin a hong jôka, aniatachu adika roijêkpu han min ring no nih,” an tia.
Hannirese, Paul han murûl hah mei lâia a hirthâk paia, khoite tiriêk mak.
Anni ngei han chu inthing a ta, aninônchu harenghan inletin a thi rang, ha an ôta. Hannisenla zora sôtzan an ôt suole khoite ati an mu loi lechu, an mindona hah an thûla, “Paul hi pathien kêng ani duo!” an ti zoi.
Ma mun le inla bâkloi han ram alekti a oma a puma chu, tuihuola an ruoipu lien a riming Publius ani. Ama han mulunghoitakin mi lei modôma sûnthum tena khuolmi kin chang ani.
Publius a pa hah jâlmun sûnga a oma, ritun le êksen damloi ani. Paul hah khâltana ava sea, chubai a thoa, a chunga a kutngei a minngama, a mindam zoi.
Masuole chu, ma tuihuola om damloi dangngei murdi an honga an dam zoi.
Neinun ngâihoipêk tamtak min pêka, male rukuonga kin se lehan, rukuonga kin om sûnga kin nâng rang ngei hah rukuonga an dar zoi.
Thânthum suole chu Alexandria renga rukuong inkhat han kin sea, ariming “Pathien Inphîr,” maha phalbia ma tuihuola alei om sai ani.
Syracuse khopuilien kin tunga male mahan sûnthum kin oma.
Ma renga hah kin se nôka male Rhegium khopuilien kin tunga. Anangtûka chu sim phâivuo ahonga, sûnnik sûngin Puteoli khopui kin tung zoi.
Mahan iempungei senkhat kin mua an kôm sûn sari nikhuo châm rangin min tia, masuole chu Rom kin hong zoi.
Rom taka iempungei han kin thurchi an rieta male alazan ten Appius khopuingeia bazar lei Tung-in Inthum ten han keini ngei leh intong rangin an honga. Paul'n a mu ngei lechu, Pathien kôm râisânchong a rîla mohôkna lientak ngei a man ani.
Rom kin tung lechu, Paul hah a rungpu râlmi inkhat leh atheivaia om rang an phal zoia.
Sûnthum suole chu Paul'n khotuola Juda ruoipungei hah intong rangin a koitûpa. An intûp suole, ama'n an kôm, “Ka champui Isrealngei, ei mipuingei chunga nônchu ei jât balam ei richibulngei renga ei manna chunga ite minchâina dôn khom no ronga, Jerusalema intâng ina min khuma male Rom ngei kuta mi bânga.
Chong min rekel suole, Rom ulienngeiin mi mojôk rang an nuoma, asikchu thi rang dôra ki minchâina ite an mu loi ani.
Aniatachu maha Judangei an makhal lechu, ki mingei lelê doi ngei rang jôt khom no ronga, Caesar kôm jêk rangin namnôl ko tho zoi ani.
Masikin kêng nangni inmupuia nangni chongpui rangin nangni ko koi ani. Maha atatak kêng, Ma sabeina hanchu Israelngei an sabeipu han zingjirûi leh thungin ma anghin ko om ani,” a tia.
Anni ngeiin a kôm han, “Judea renga nu chungroia lekhamuthuon khom ite man makme, ei miriem so renga juong ngei khomin no roi ngei aninônchu nu chunga asie juong ti mak ngei.
Aniatachu nu huongvârngei hih riet rang kin nuom ani, asikchu muntina mingeiin no omna pâl hah an misîr minsiet ngâi kin riet,” an tia.
Masikin Paul le nikhuo an khita, ma nikhuo han chu mi tamtak Paul omna han an honga. Jîng renga jânjîng ten an kôm Pathien Rêngram thurchi a misîr minthâr pe ngeia, Moses Balam le dêipungei miziekngei hah mangin Jisua thurchi min iem ngei rang a pûta.
Senkhatngeiin chu an iema, hannirese senkhatngeiin chu iem mak ngei.
Masikin anni le anni khom inngêi khâi mak ngeia, Paul'n hi chong inkhat hih a ti pe ngei suole: “Ratha Inthieng han dêipu Isaiah renga nin richibulngei kôma a lei misîr ha idôra adik mini.
Ama'n a kôm ‘Sênla ma mingei kôm han va ti roh: Rangâi rangâi nin ta, aniatachu rietthei no tunui; En en nin ta, aniatachu mu no tunui,
asikchu ma miriemngei an mindona hih ânmôl zoi, male an kuorngei hîprap an ta an mitngei sîng an tih. Aninônchu, an mitin a mu rang, an kuorin a riet rang, an mulungbôkngei han rietthei an ta, male ko kôm hong kîr an tih, Pathien'n a ti, male keiman lei mindam ngei duoi nîng,’ ” a tia.
Male Paul'n: “Nangnin nin riet rang chu, Pathien'n sanminringna chong hah Jentailngei kôm min pêl ani zoia. Anni ngei ke a lei rangâi rang!” tiin a khâr zoi.

Kum nik ten chu Paul hah athena rang in man oma han a oma, male mahan ama mu nuoma ahong ngei murdi chu a lei modôm ani.
Pathien Rêngram thurchi a misîrpe ngeia male Pumapa Jisua Khrista thurchi a rila, tutên khap mak ngeia ngamtakin a misîr tit ani.
Paul renga, Jisua Khrista tîrlâm le tîrton ranga thang, Pathien'n a Thurchi Sa ngei misîr ranga koi.
Ma Thurchi Sa hah tien renga Pathien'n a dêipungei mangin a lei khâma, Lekhabu Inthieng taka miziekin.
Mahi a Nâipasal, ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista roi ani: Miriem nina tieng chu David richisuonpâra inzir ania;
ânthiengna Ratha Inthieng chu, thina renga ânthoinôkna han Pathien Nâipasal ani tie sinthotheina roiinpuitak chu a minlang ani zoi.
Ama sika han Pathien'n tîrton ni rangin Khrista jôtna sika sintum ni pêk ani, Ramtina mingei iema le jômna tienga ruoi ngei rangin mikhâm ani.
Rom taka om ngei khom nangni huomsa ani, Jisua Khrista ata nirangin nangni a koi ani.
Masikin Rom taka om Pathien lungkham ngei le ama mi ni ranga a koi ngei nâm ranga ki miziek ani: Pathien ei Pa le Pumapa Jisua Khrista'n, moroina le inngêina nangni pêk rese.
Amotontaka, rammuol pumpuia nin taksônna thurchi ânthang sikin nin rênga rangin Jisua Khrista jâra ka Pathien kôm râisânna chong ki mintung bak ani.
Chubai ko thona ngeia nangni ki riettit ngâi ti a Nâipasal Thurchi Sa misîra ku mulung murdia sin ko tho ngâi Pathien hah ni rietpuipu ani.
A lungdo anînchu atûn luo nangni ko hong sir phâk theina rangin Pathien kôm ke ngên tit ngâi ani.
Nin dik nôk uolna rangin ratha satvurna ngei nangni min chang rangin mu rang nangni ku nuom tatak ani.
Maha keima le nangni hih nin taksôn han inmohôk inlôm ku nuom ani, ei insan inlôm theina rangin.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, nangni hongpan rang ko bôk tit ngâia, hannirese insûkloina a om kelen ngâi ti nin riet ku nuom ani, Jentail dang ngei lâia taksôn thar ka man anghan nin lâia khom man rangin ka sabei.
Mitin chunga lâkâi ke nei, Greek mingei le mi môlma ngei mivârngei le mi inmôl ngei kôma khom.
Ma anghan nangni Rom khopuia omngei kôma khom Thurchi Sa misîr rangin inthok chakin ko om ani.
Thurchisa hih inzakpui mu-ung, tukhom a iem murdi sanminringna ranga Pathien sinthotheina ania, aphuta Judangei ta rangin masuole Jentailngei ta rang khomin ahongni.
Thurchisa hin taksôn sik vaia Pathien'n mi thei a minchang lam aphut renga amongna tena a juong minlang ani, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Taksôn sika thei intumpu chu ring a tih,” tia ânziek anghan.
Invân renga Pathien taksina hah miriemngei Pathien lunghâng tholoina sietna le dikloina murdi chunga ajuong minlang ani, an sietna sikin chongtak hah an kal tita.
Pathien'n intakna a mintuong ngeia, asikchu thurchi rietruongei chu an kôma ânlang tita Pathien'n ama rengin a min riet zoi sikin.
Anina mita mutheiloi a kumtuong sinthotheina le a Pathien nina hah rammuol sinphut renga a neinun sin ngeia inthârin mutheiin ânlanga. Masikin anni ngei chu jôkna rang lampui ite dôn mak ngei.
Pathien an riet chakin Pathien angin chôiminsâng mak ngeia ama kôm râisânchong khom ril mak ngeia; sin kâmboi mang an mindona an mulungrîl sêt tak hah ahong jîng zoia.
Avâr okin an inbea hannirese an inmôl ani.
Thitheiloi Pathien chubaimûk nêkin a thithei miriemngei le vângei sângei le iring rimilngei pathien an min chang zoia.
Masikin, an mulungrîl nuomlam neinun porinchengei tho rangin Pathien'n nûk a song ngeia inzakpui omtakin an om zoi ani.
Pathien chongtak nêkin milak an thang uola, asinpu biek nêkin a sin ngei biekna sin an thope uola, Asinpu chu kumtuongin minpâkin om rese! Amen.
Masika han kêng Pathien'n inzak taka an hur ha phalin nûk a song ngeia. An nupangngei hah khom nunchan insiengpui angtakin om loiin an oma.
An pasalngei khom nupang mang ngâi lam mâksanin, hurin an in en inlôma, pasal le pasal dikloi takin an lênga. An taksa ngeia an sietna man an man ani.
Pathien rietna diktak hah an mulungrîla an nei nuom loi sikin an mindonna siet tak anga om rangin Pathien'n nûk a song ngeia, an tho loi ruo khom an tho zoia.
Dikloina murdi'n an sipa sietnangei, insâp râtnangei, puoloina ngei, narsana ngei, inthatna ngei, insuol inkhalna ngei, inhuongna ngei le inmumâkna ngeiin an sipa,
an inêroa, an indema, Pathien an henga, an indoia, an inpâka, an insonga, sietna dadang athar an min suoka, an nulepangei mirit mak ngeia.
A sielesarietna nei mak ngeia an inkhâmna mang mak ngeia, midang lungkhamna le inriengmuna reng dôn ngâi mak ngei.
Ma anga tho ngei chu Pathien'n a khâm anga thiruo anni ti riet chakin, anni an tho vai niloiin midang a tho ngei khom an nuompui sa ngâi.
O miriem, mi jêkpu tukhom ni roh inlêmna rang reng dôn riek mak che, midang ne jêkna dêna han nangma theiloi na chang kêng, nangma a jêkpu reng khomin ma anga sin hah no tho ngâi sikin.
Ha anga tho ngâi mingei hah Pathien'n theiloi a min changin a jêk mindik thap ani ti ei riet.
Aniatachu, O miriem ma anga sin tho ngâi ngei jêkpu, nang khomin ha anga sin hah no thôn chu roijêkna piel thei rangin nên tung mo?
Aninônchu nang mehei rang a nuom sikin Pathien'n a moroina lien, a tuong theina le a tuongdierna hi misit mo ni ni?
Nangma tukdullien le mulungngar sikin Pathien taksina le roijêkna diktak juong inlang rang Nia rangin nu chunga dengtheina nu bûm ani.
Pathien'n mitin an sintho lam angtakin râisânman a pêk rang sikin.
Tuongdiertaka sin asa thoa roiinpuina le chôiminsângna le ringna thitheiloi zong ngei kôma han kumtuong ringna pêk atih.
Hannirese, a rang mang zonga chongdik hengpaia dikloina an jûi theina rangin, an chunga Pathien taksina le ningthikna musum atih.
Adikloi sin ngei murdi chunga dengtheina le jâmzalna ngei om atih, Judangei chunga om bak a ta, Jentailngei chunga om nôk atih.
Hannirese, sin asa sin ngei murdi chunga chu roiinpuina, chôiinsângna le inngêina ngei Pathien'n pêk atih, Judangei pêk bak a ta masuole Jentailngei pêk a tih.
Pathien'n zen uol a neiloi sikin.
Jentailngei chu Moses Balam dôn mak ngeia, Balam dôn loia nunsie ngei chu balam boia inmang rang an nia, Judangei chu Balam an dôna, Balam an dônna nunsie ngei khom Balam taka an roi jêk rang ani.
Asikchu, Pathien makunga midika a tel chu Balam ariet ngei nimaka, ajômpu ngei kêng thei intum rang an ni.
Jentailngei Balam dôn no khom rese ngeia mulungrîla an insiengpuia balam sin ngei hah sinin, anni le anni Balam an changa.
An mulungrîla balam chongpêk inziek ani ti an nunchana an minlanga, an sielesarietna han khom ânlanga, an mindonna ngei ânjêlna, akâra thei a mintuma, akâra chu theiloi a mintum ngâi.
Pathien'n mi murdi mindonna inthup Jisua Khrista manga a jêk Nikhuo tika chu Thurchi Sa ki misîr angtak hin jêk a tih.
Hannisenla nangma Juda kini ni tia, Balam han nên beia Pathien no songa,
a lungdo khom ni rieta, Balam ni riet sikin sielesa khom ni riet.
Nangma ngêt hah mitcho ngei ruoipu ajînga om ngei êlpu.
Amo ngei minvâr theipu le nâipangngei minchupu ni uol takin nên bê ngâia, rietna le chongtak murdi chu Balama aom let ni riet sikin.
Midangngei ki minchu ngâi ni tia, ithomo nethenin nên chu loi? inru loi rangin mi ni minchu ngâia, nangma'n nên ru ngâi na?
Inrê no roh ni tia, ania nangma nên re ngâi mini? mirmilngei mumâkpu, nangman mirmil biekna ina neinunngei hah nu muruk ngâi mini?
Pathien Balam hah insong puiin balam minchâiin Pathien thang ni minsiet ngâina?
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nangni sikin Pathien riming chu Jentailngei lâia rilminsiet ani,” ti ânziek anghan.
Balam hih jômin la chu ne sertana khom asêna om ok atih, Balam no jôm nônchu sertanloi angtakin ni ni rang.
Jentail mi hah sertanloi ania, Sertan loiin Balam chu a jôma, Pathien'n maha sertan anga a bê loi rang mini?
Nangni'n sertana, Balam inziek nin neia, hannirese Balam chu nin minchâi nôka, Jentail taksa sertanloi ngeiin chu Balam chong chu an jôm ngit nôka, theiloi nangni an minchang rang ani.
Apêntieng vaia Juda mi ki ni ti chu Juda mi taktak ni mak, taksa vaia sertan chu sertan taktak ni nôk sa mak.
Manêkin, mulungrîla Juda mi ni chu Juda taktak chu ania, sertan taktak khom hah mulung tienga ania balam inziek vaia niloiin Ratha tieng ani uol. Ma anga mi ha chu miriemin minpâk no khomrese Pathien'n chu minpâk atih.
Hanchu, Juda mi ni hah Jentail mingei nêkin imo chungtuorna aom uola? sertan khom imo asena aom?
Lamtina asena aom ok! Amotontaka chu Pathien chongngei hi Judangei chunga juong mintung ani.
mi senkhatin taksônna dônloi ngei ha inmo an ni rang? an taksôn loina han Pathien taksôn omna hah an minboi thei rang mini?
Nitet mak! mi murdi milak ni riei khomrese ngeia Pathien chu dik tit atih, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nangma no chong zorân chu thei na chang ngêt rang anâng, roijêkpea no om tika no motor theina rangin,” tia ânziek anghan.
Ei dikloina ngei hin Pathien dikna a min lang thei aninte i angin mo ei mindon? Pathien'n mi sepna a pêk inte a minchâi ei ti thei rang mini? (Miriem balama ki ril ani).
Nitet mak! ha anghan nirese, Pathien'n i angin mo rammuol roi a jêk thei ranga?
Aniatachu, adikloi ki nina hin a roiinpuina rang Pathien dik tie ânlang thei uolin te i rangin mo kei khom dikloia bên ka la om ranga?
Mi senkhatin, “Asa ahong suok theina rangin asie lei tho rei u,” a ti, tia min rilsiet anga han ei tho rang mini? ha mingei ha chu theiloi intum ruopiel an ni.
Hanchu, eini Judangei hih Jentailngei nêkin ei sa uol bak mini? nitet mak! Judangei le Jentialngei nunsie suoka om zit ei ni ti ki ril suozoi.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tute midik reng ommak ngei, inkhat luo ommak ngei,
Tute mivâr reng ommak ngei, tute Pathien a rok reng ommak ngei,
Pathien renga an pêt suo zoia, dikloina tieng an se suozoi, inkhat luo asa sin reng om khâi mak ngei.
An rôl chu thân in-ong ania, an meleiin milak an rila, an bâi sûng renga murûl tûr asuoka,
an bâi hah khomâksâmna le chongkhân asipa,
an ke hah thisen min suok rangin kal achôi ânranga;
an lampui chu inmangna le jâmzalna asipa.
Inngêina lampui reng riet mak ngei,
an mitmua Pathien china reng om riek mak,” tia inziek anghan.
Balam chongngei chu Balam nuoia omngei chunga mang rang ani ti ei riet, tutên ite an ti theiloina rangin le rammuol pumpui hi Pathien roijêkna nuoia aom theina rangin.
Masikin Balam jôm mindik sikin tute Pathien makunga dik intum theiruo nimak Balam chu miriem sietna inrietna mang kêng ani.
Atûn chu Pathien'n miriemngei dik a mintum lam a juong minlang zoi. Balamin ite atho rang ommak, Moses Balam le Dêipungeiin rietpuipu lei ni senla ngei khoma.
Jisua Khrista an taksônna sikin Pathien'n mi thei a min chang ani, tukhom a iem murdi chu inteina reng ommak.
Mi murdi'n nunsie an tho zita, Pathien sanminjôkna hah an chang thei khâiloi ani.
Nikhomsenla, Khrista Jisua râtanna jârin Pathien'n a moroina sik vaiin ke mi a manboiin thei a min chang zoi.
Pathien'n ama hah ngâihoiin a pêka, ma anghan a thisena ama an taksônna sika mi murdi nunsie ngâidam anni narangin, mîn dik an chang theina rangin Pathien'n a tho ani. Zora lei vunsai han chu tuongdierin miriemngei nunsienangei chu riet khâiloiin a min vun ani. Pathien'n ama lelê midik ani tie le Jisua iem ngei murdi dik an chang ti minthârna rangin atûn lâihin mi dik a minchang lam hah a juong minlang ani hi.
<range>
Hanchu song rang mo ei dôn? dôn makme, itho sikin mo? balam jôm sika mini? nimak, iemna sika kêng ani.
Masika han miriem hi Balam jôm sika Pathien kôm adik a chang niloiin, taksônna sikin kêng mîn dik an chang tiin kin min mong ani.
Pathien chu Judangei ta rang uol mini? Jentailngei ta khom ani loi mini? O, ani sa.
Pathien chu inkhat ania, Juda sertanngei chu an taksônna sikin thei min chang ngei a ta, sertanloi Jentailngei khom an taksônna sik nanâk han thei min chang ngei atih.
Hanchu taksônna ei misîr uol sikin Balam hah mangmunboia ei dar rak rang tina mini? Ni uol mak, Balam hah ei mindet ani.
Hanchu, taksa tieng ei richibul Abraham hah i angin mo ei misîr rang ani zoi? Inmo a sinthona a lei intem?
Sintho sika thei intum nirese chu, Abraham'n song rang imini chu a dôn rang kêng, hannirese Pathien mitmua chu ni mak.
Pathien lekhabu'n imo ati? “Abraham'n Pathien a iema, a taksônna sika han Pathien'n midikin a pom ani,” ati.
Sinthopu rathaman chu lungkham pêk niloiin lâkâi anga be ani uol, an sinthona an man kêng ani.
Aniatachu mingei hah an sintho han midika tel nimak ngeia nunsiengei ngâidampu Pathien taksônna sikin kêng ani.
Mi Sintho sika niloia Pathien'n dikna a minchang ngei satvur anni tie, David khom hi anghin a ril:
“An tho minchâinangei ngâidamin a oma, an sietnangei mukhua aom ngei chu, satvur an ni!
Pumapa'n sietna dôn a be loi ngei chu satvur an ni!”
Ha satvurna hah sertan ngei rang vai mo? Sertanloi ngei rang khom mo? Abraham'n taksônna sikin dikna achang ei tia.
A sertan mâna chong mo, a tan suole mo? nimak, sertan suole nimaka, sertan mân ani.
A sertan mâna a taksônna sika, Pathien'n thei a minchang minenna ranga sertan kêng ani. Hanchu sertan khom no rese iemna sika Pathien'n thei a minchang ngei ta rangin chu Abraham chu an rathatienga pa ani.
Sertan ngei pa khom ani, sertan anni vai sika niloiin ei pa Abraham'n a sertan mâna an taksôn angdêna iemna an nei sika ani.
Balam jôm sik niloiin, iemna sika thei minchang a lei ni, Pathien'n Abraham kôm, ama le a jâisuon ngeiin rammuol hih la luo an tih, ti a khâm ani.
Balam jôm hih rochon luona anînchu, taksônna hih akorong nîng ata, chongkhâm khom hah kâmomloi ani, tina nîng a tih.
Balam han Pathien taksina a minsuok ngâi balam boina hanchu minchâina khom om ngâi mak.
Masikin, chongkhâm hah Abraham jâisuonngei murdi rangin balam a jôm ngei mang niloiin ama taksôn anga iempungei rang khomin Pathien manboipêk a nitie min langna rangin iemna sikin ani Abraham kôma chong a lei khâm hah, ama hah ratha tienga ei rênga ei pa ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nam tamtak pa'n nang ki minchang zoi” a tia, inkhâmna hah Pathien tieng chu asa ani. Hi chongkhâm hih Abraham'n ai iem Pathien mithi ngei minringnôkpu le neinun a omloi ngei min ompu kôm renga ai mu ani.
Abraham han sabei rang aboi tet nûk khomin ala sabei ngit sikin, “Nam tamtak ngei pa,” a hongchang zoi ani. Pathien chongin, “Na jâisuonngei ârsi dôr la nîng an tih,” ati anghan.
Kum raza mi ani zoia a taksa mindon nân chu mithi angdôr ani zoia, Sarah khom aching ani ti a riet chien pum khomin a taksônna chu duoi uol mak.
Taksônna insamin Pathien chongkhâm hah mindon kârminlak maka, a taksônna a rât uol uola Pathien a chôiminsânga.
Pathien'n a chongkhâm tuonmintung thei ngêt a tih, ti a riet minthâr sikin.
Masika han kêng, “A taksônna sika thei minchang ani,” ti ani.
Hi chong, “midika pom ani,” ti hih ama chungroi misîrna rang manga miziek ni maka.
Eini, ei Pumapa Jisua thina renga kaithoipu iemngei sika dikna intum sai ngei rang khomin miziek ani.
Jisua hah ei sietnangei sikin thatin a oma Pathien makunga dikna intum theina rangin kaithoiin a om nôk ani.
Hanchu taksônna sika dik intuma omin, ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista jârin Pathien leh inngêiin ei om zoi.
Ama jârin hi ei omna moroina nuoia hin taksônna ei lut zoi Pathien inlalna sabeina sikin insongin, râisânin ei om ani.
Mapêna ei intakna khom ei insong ani, intaknân tuongdierna asuoka,
Tuongdierna'n Pathien pomna amusuoka, detna han sabeina asuok ti ei riet ani.
Ha sabeina han ei bei mindong maka, asikchu Pathien'n Ratha Inthieng renga a lungkhamna hah ei mulung sûnga a juong vura, maha eini ranga Pathien manboipêk ani.
Asan rang boi ei ni lâitak han, azora taka Khrista chu mi nunsie ngei rangin a juong thi zoia.
midik ranga thi chu a nuom om khet noni ngei, misa ta rangin chu tumakhat athi ngam khom an om duoi thei.
Nikhomrese, Pathien'n mi lungkham tatak ti a minlang zoi, mi nunsie ei la ni lâitakin Khrista hah ei ta rangin a juong thi zoi.
A thisen sika han Pathien'n dik mi juong mintum zoia, a taksina renga khom ama jârin mi sanminjôk ngêt atih.
Pathien leh râl ei lei nia, aniatachu a nâipasal thina sikin a malngeiin mi sin zoi. Atûn chu Pathien malngei ei ni zoia, Khrista ringna sikin vângchu idôra sanminring mo ei ni rang na!
Ma mang hah nimaka, atûna inngêina mi pêkpu ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista jâra han Pathiena ei râiasân ani.
Rammuola hin mi inkhat sikin nunsie ahong lûta, nunsie sika han thina ahong om zoia hanchu rammuola mi murdi'n nunsie an sin zoi sikin, thina han mi murdi ahuom zoi.
Balam aom mân khomin rammuola nunsie aom zoia, hannirese balam aom loi sikin nunsie hah nunsiea be nimak.
Hannirese, Adam zora renga Moses zora dênin mi murdi chunga Adamin Pathien chongpêk jômloia nunsie a tho sikin nunsie tho loi ngei chunga khom thina han racham aneia. Adam hah a la juong rangpu le mintêk ani.
Hannirese, Pathien manboipêk hah chu Adam nunsie leh han in-ang tet mah, ha mi inkhat nunsie sika han mi tamtak an thia. Aniatachu, Pathien moroina chu alien oka male mi inkhat Jisua Khrista sika a manboipêk chu mi tamtakin an chang ani.
Pathien manboipêk leh mi inkhat nunsie hah in-ang riek mak, mi inkhat nunsie sikin theiloi changna ahong oma, nikhomrese, mi tamtak nunsie sikin moroinân thei inchangna ahong om nôk zoi.
Mi inkhat nunsiena sikin rammuola hin thina'n roi a jêka, hanchu, mi inkhat nanâk, Jisua Khrista sikin Pathien moroina lientak leh a manboipêka thei inchanga omngei han ringna changin inlaltakin roi la jêk ngêt an tih.
Ma anghan, mi inkhat nunsie sikin mi murdi theiloi intum an nia, ma angdênin mi inkhat dikna sikin mi murdi dik intumin an ring thei zoi ani.
Mi inkhat chong jômloina sikin mi tamtak nunsie an ni zoia, ha angdênin mi inkhat chong jôm sikin mi tamtak dik intum an tih.
Hanchu, nunsie apung nôk uol theina rangin balam ajuong oma, hannirese, nunsie apung nôk uolin Pathien moroina apung nôk uol ani.
Hanchu nunsie chu thina'n roi a jêka ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista jâra kumtuong ringna ei man theina rangin Pathien moroina han thei intumnân roi a jêk ani.
Imo ei ti rang ani zoi? Pathien moroina apung uol theina rangin nunsie ei la tho tit rang mini?
Nitet mak! Ei ni nunsiea thisai ngei hin i-angin mo nunsiea ei la om tit thei ranga?
Khrista Jisua han baptis chang murdi ngei chu a thina han baptis in ei omsa ti nin riet loi mini?
A thina han baptis changin, ama leh phûmin ei omsa zoi, Pa'n roiinpuitakin thina renga Khrista a kaithoi anghan ei ni khom ringna thara ei lêng theina rangin.
A thi anghan ei ni khom ama leh inzomin ei thia ma anghan ama leh inzomin kaithoiin om sâng ei tih.
Nunsie suoka ei om khâi loina rangin nunsie pêl taksa hih that rangin ei miriem muruo hah Khrista leh khros chunga jêmdelin aom zoi ti ei riet.
Tukhom a thiin chu nunsie sinthotheina renga a jôk ani.
Hanchu, Khrista kôma ei thisân chu a kôma ringsa nôk ei tih, ti ei iem ani.
Khrista hah thina renga kaithoiin a oma, thi nôk tet khâi no nih ti ei riet, thina han a chunga racham nei khâi mak.
Hanchu a thi sikin nunsie han a chunga racham nei khâi maka, male atûn chu a ringna ha Pathien leh inzomin aom zoi.
Ha anghan, nangni khom nunsie tieng athi saiin inbe ungla, Khrista Jisua han Pathien tieng a ringin inbe roi.
Masika han, nin taksa mulungbôk jôm rangin nin takpum athithei han nunsie hah minlal khâi no rese.
Nin takpum abâkngei khom dikloina mangruo rangin nunsie thona rangin phal no roi. Manêkin thina renga a ring nôk anghan Pathien kôm inpêk ungla, nin takpum abâkngei hah dikna mangruo rangin Pathien kôm pêk rangin phal let roi.
Nunsie han nin chunga racham nei khâi no nih, balam nuoia om loiin Pathien moroina nuoia nin om zoi sikin.
Inmo a ni rang ani zoi? balam nuoia om loiin Pathien moroina nuoia ei om zoi sikin nunsie ei la tho tit rang mini? Nitet mak.
Tu kôma khom nirese an chong jôm ranga an suoka nin inpêklûta thina rang raka nunsie suok mini, dikna ranga chong jômna suok mini khom nirese a chong nin jômpu suok chu nin ni ti nin riet minthâr ani, Pathien kôm dik intumna han a minlangsuok ani.
Hannirese, Pathien chu minpâkin om rese, voikhat nunsie suok lei ni ta khom ungla, minchuna chongdik nin man, nin mulungrîl murdia nin jôm sikin.
Hanchu, nunsie suok renga chu mojôkin nin oma, dikna suokngei nin hongni zoi.
(Nin riet theina rangin anîngtina chong ei mang ngâi lamin ki ril ani) nin takpum abâkngei hah inthiengloina le dikloina suoka siet rangin nin lei phal ngâi anga han, atûn chu dikna suoka inthienga ring rangin hong pêk phar roi.
Nunsie suok nin ni lâihan chu dikna renga nin inkêm ani.
Atûna nin inzakpui tak nin lei sin ngâi hah nin inlâp pui mo? ha ngei murdi mongna hah chu thina kêng ani.
Atûn chu nunsie suok renga mojôka omin Pathien suokngei nin hong ni zoi. Hanchu a kôma ringna akipphar le ânthieng kumtuong ringna hah nin hong nei zoi.
Asikchu nunsie sin mara chu thina ania, Pathien manboipêk rêk chu ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista leh inzomin kumtuonga ringna ani.
Sûngsuokngei, balam nin riet let sikin ki misîr rang hih riet thei nin tih. Balam han mi an ringsûng kâr mang kêng an chunga roi a nei ngâi ani.
Dôngma hah a lômpa ringsûng kâr chu a lômpa balam han a khita, hannirese a lômpa a thi inchu a lômpa renga balamin a khit hah sûtin aom ngâi.
A lômpa ringsûngin midang a nei inchu a inrê ania, a lômpa thi nûkin chu balamin a khit hah a jôk ania, midang nei khom senla inrê nikhâi mak.
Ma angtak han ani, ku sûngsuokngei, Khrista takpum machangngei nin ni zoi sikin Balam tieng chu nin thi zoia, atûn chu thina renga kaithoia ompu ta nin ni zoi, Pathien chuonsina mangruo sa ei nina rangin.
Ei miriem nina muruo nuna ei lêng lâihan chu ei ngâituina saloi Balamin ânchoka han ei takpuma sin a thoa, thina amintung ngâi.
Atûn chu mikhit ngâipu hah ei thisan zoia, balam renga mojôkin ei om zoi, balam inziek muruo papai ang niloiin Ratha balam tharin sin ei tho ani zoi hi.
Imo ei ti rang ni zoi, Balam ha nunsie mini? nitet mak! Aniatachu balam han mi min riet no rese chu nunsie hih riet no ning. Balam han “Mi ta ôi no roh” ti no rese chu, ôi hi ki riet loi rang ani.
Hi chongpêk hih chuminrêna mangin sietna han ôina tamtak amin om ngâi, Balam om no rese chu nunsie hih neinun thi ani.
Moton han chu balam boiin ke lêng ngâia, hannirese, chongpêk hah ahong oma, nunsie hah ahong hara,
kei chu ki thi zoia. Ringna ranga chongpêk hah kei rangin chu thina ahong ni zoi.
Asikchu sietna han chongpêk hah chuminrêna mangin mi huonga mi that zoi ani.
Balam chu ânthienga, chongpêk khom ânthienga, adika asa ani.
Nônchu, neinun sa han kata rangin thina amintung mini? nitet mak! nunsie hin ani, nunsie ani ti minlangna rangin neinun sa mangin kata rangin thina amintunga, chongpêk sik han nunsie hah saloina inchung uolin aminlang ani.
Balam chu rathatienga neinun ani ti ei riet, keima rêk chu athithei miriem papai nunsie suoka juor ki ni zoi.
Ki sintho hi rietthei mu-ung ko jôtlam tho ngâi loia, manêkin ko jôt loilam sin ngâi ki ni.
Ko tho nuom ngâiloi hah ko thôn chu, balam hah asa tia jôm nîng ki tih.
Masikin, hi sinngei hih keima a thopu ni mu-unga, nunsie keima taka om han atho ngâi ani.
Keima miriem nina hin neinun adik reng om mak ti ki riet adik tho nuomna nei ngâi khom inlang thothei ngâi mu-ung.
Neinun asa ko tho nuom hah tho loiin, neinun saloi ko tho nuomloi hah ko tho ngâi.
Ku nuom loi ko thôn chu a thopu hah keima ni khâi mu-unga, nunsie keima taka om han atho ngâi ani.
Masikin, hi balam hih sin atho tit ti ki riet thei zoi, neinun asa tho ku nuom ngâi nâka, neinun saloi ko tho nôk kelen ngâi.
Ki miriem sûngrîlin chu Pathien Balam hah a râiminsân ngâia.
Nikhomsenla, ka takpuma hin balam dang sin atho tit aom ti ki riet, ama han ku mulung sung balam hah adoia, nunsiena balam ka takpuma sin atho tit ngâi suok mi min chang chien ngâi.
I anga mi Lungkham omtak mo ki nina! hi thina mi tuong rang takpum renga hih tûn mo mi sanminjôk rang ani zoi?
Pathien vaiin kêng. Ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista jârin ei Pathien minpâkin om rese. Hanchu ku mulungrîl takin chu Pathien Balam sin ko tho ngâia, ki miriem nina rêkin chu sietna balam sin atho ngâi.
Masika han atûn chu Khrista Jisua taka om ngei rangin chu theiloi intumna rang reng om khâi mak.
Khrista Jisua a ringna Ratha balam han sietna le thina balam renga mi sanminjôk zoi sikin.
Miriem nina rât loina sika balamin atho thei viet loi hah Pathien'n a juong thoa, miriem taksa nunsie nina pêlin a Nâipasal hah, nunsie inbôlnân Pathien'n a juongtîra, miriem nina nunsie aom hah theiloi a minchang zoia.
Pathien'n mahih a tho ani, taksa balama om khâiloi Ratha Balama omsai ngei, einia hin balamin aphut hah thangsuoa aom theina rangin.
Taksa nina balama om ngeiin chu taksa tienga neinunngei an nuoma, Ratha tienga om ngeiin chu Ratha tienga neinunngei an nuom ngâi.
Taksa nina tienga neinun a nuom chu thina ania, Ratha tienga neinun a nuom chu ringna le inngêina ani.
Taksa nina nuomlam han Pathien adoi ngâi, Pathien Balam ajôm loi sikin, jôm khom jôm thei ngâi mak.
Masikin taksa nina nuomlam ajôm ngeiin chu Pathien râiminsân thei mak ngei.
Hannirese, Pathien Ratha hah nin kôm aom tikin chu taksa nina mi nikhâi mak chôia, Ratha mi kêng nin ni zoi. Tukhom Khrista Ratha dôn loi chu ama mi nimak.
Khrista hah nangnia aomin chu nin takpum hah nunsie sikin thi khomrese Pathien kôm dik inchang nin ni sikin nin Ratha chu a ring ani.
Thina renga Jisua kaithoi nôkpu Ratha hah nangnia han aomin chu thina renga Khrista Jisua kaithoi nôkpu han nin takpum athi thei hah nangnia han ama Ratha omin min ring atih.
Masikin, sûngsuokngei, lâkâi ei dôn, taksa nina balama omloi rangin, taksa tieng khom ni sa loiin.
Taksa nina balamin nin omin chu nin thi ngêt rang ani, nikhomsenla nin taksa nunsie sintho ngei hah Ratha'n nin thatin chu ring nin ti.
Pathien ratha iruoi ngei kaichu Pathien nâingei an ni.
Nin Ratha chang hah ichia om nôk ranga suokngei nina Ratha nimaka, Pathien nâingei nina Ratha kêng nin chang, ha ratha sinthotheina jâra han “Abba! Pa!” tiin Pathien kôm ei koi ngâi ani.
Ma Ratha nanâk han ei Ratha leh inzomin Pathien nâingei ei ni tiin amin rieta.
Hanchu, a nâingei ei nînchu a rochon luopungei Pathien rochon luopu ngei Khrista luopu ngei ei ni, Khrista tuongna ei tuongpuiin chu a roiinpuina khom ei changsa ngêt rang ani.
Atûn lâia tuongna ngei hih chunga roiinpuina inlanga la om rang lehan mintuk zatin be mu-ung.
Neinun sin murdi ngeiin Pathien nâingei hong inlang rang zora an ngâklal tatak ani.
Neinun sin murdi ngei hah an nuom sika niloiin Pathien nuom sikin mangmunboi ni rangin heng an ni zoi, nikhomsenla, sabei rang ala om.
Neinun sin murdi ngei khom nikhuo khat chu sietna suok renga mojôkin la om an ta, Pathien nâingei zalenna roiinpui hah la koppui an tih, ti sabeina hah ani.
Neinun sin murdi ngei hah atûn tena nâiha na inrûm anga inrûm ti ei riet.
Maha vai niloiin ei ni Ratha mara chang masapu ngei khom hih a nâingei mi minchang rang zora ei takpum minjôk rang ngâklalin ei inrum ani.
Ma sabeina han kêng min ringin ei oma, nikhomsenla, mu thei tit sabeina hih sabeina tatak nimak, ei mu thei tit hah i angin mo ei la sabei tit ranga?
Ei muloi hah ei sabeiin chu tuongdiertakin ei ngâk zajâm ngâi ani.
Ma angdênin, Ratha'n ei rât loina mi san ngâia, i anga chubaitho rang mo ei nâng khom riet mak meh, nikhomsenla, Ratha han inrûm misîr thei loiin chubai mi thope ngâi.
Mi mulungrîl bôkna rietpu Pathien'n chu Ratha bôkna a rieta, asikchu Ratha'n chu Pathien a mingei ruthûlin ama nuomlam takin a ngên pe ngâi.
Hanchu Pathien'n lungkham a mupu ngei chu, a mintuo anga a koi ngei rangin chu an satna rangin neinuntin a thope ngei ngâi ti ei riet.
Pathien'n a lei thangsai ngei hah ama nâipasal angin om rangin a lei mintuma, masikin a nâipasal chu urêng tamtak kâra nâi lutîrtak ni theina rangin.
Hanchu, Pathien'n a lei thangsai ngei hah a koia, a koi ngei chu dik a mintuma, dik intum ngei chu a roiinpuina a semsa ngei ngâi ani.
Ma roia han imo ei ti rang ani zoi? Pathien eini tieng a kop inte tumo mi doi thei ranga?
Nitet mak, Pathien'n a Nâipasal luo manar loia ei rênga ruthûla pêkpu han neinun dang murdi khom manboiin mi pêk sa noni mo?
Pathien'n a thangsai mingei hah tûn mo a rilminsiet ngam ranga? adik mintumpu hah Pathien ani sikin.
Tu ngânin mo theiloi a mintum ranga? a thi hah Jisua Khrista ania, a thina renga ânthoinôka Pathien changtieng omin mi chongpepu hah ama nanâk kêng ani.
Khrista lungkhamna renga chu tûnmo mi sensâi thei ranga? Injêlna ngei mo? intakna mo, nuomlona mo, vonchâmnân mo, inriengnân mo, chi omna mo? nônchu thina'n mo, mi sensâi thei rang mini?
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nangma jârin zoratin thina rang chipumin kin oma, Belri that rang toto, anga bên kin om ani hih,” ati anghan.
Nithei no nih, ha ngei murdi renga han lungkham mi mupu sikin roiinpui taka azoipu ngei ei ni.
Thina khomin, ringna khomin, vântîrton khomin, invâna rachamneina khomin, neinun a omsai le ala hong om rang khomin, sinthotheina khomin,
insângna khomin inthûkna khomin, neinun sin dadang ngei khomin, ei Pumapa Khrista Jisua a om Pathien lungkhamna renga chu mi sensâi thei no nih, ti ki riet minthâr ani.
Chong diktak ki ril ani; Khrista taka kini milak ril mu ung. Ki sielesarietna Ratha Inthieng ruoina han khom milak tho mu ung ti mi minthâr ani.
Ku mulung dûktongna lientak le mulung nanah boi theiloi ko dôn tie ki ti zora hin,
Ki mingei, taksa tienga ki richibulngei ruthûla hin Pathien khomâksâmin Khrista renga minsenin om inlang chu ku nuom ngâi.
Pathien mingei an nia, aman a nâingeiin a sin ngeia, an kôm a roiinpuina ngei a minlanga; chonginkhitngei a sinpui ngeia male Balam ngei a pêk ngeia; Sava diktak an dônna; Pathien chonginkhâmngei an man ani;
Richibulngei inthang tak Hebrew jâisuon an nia, taksa tieng roia chu Khrista reng khom hah an rûia mi ani. Jâttin chunga roijêkpu Pathien chu tuonsôtin! minpâkin om rese, Amen.
Pathien chonginkhâm hah ite asena ommak ki tina ni riek mak. Israelngei nâm hah anrêngin Pathien mi ni zit mak ngei.
Abraham richi murdi khom anrêngin Pathien nâingei ni let uol mak ngei, “Isaac hin nu rûi isûi nîng atih,” Pathien'n a ti pe ani.
Ma hah taksa lama a nâingei hah Pathien nâingei nimak ngei, chonginkhâm nâingei hah kêng Abraham richi diktaka be an ni tina ani.
Pathien chonginkhâm hah mahi ani “Azora taka juong nôk ka ta, Sarah'n nâipasal nei atih,” ti hi.
Ma vai hah nimaka, Rebecca han ei richibul Isaac renga nâi inphîr a neia.
Nâite ngei an la suok mân, sielesa an tho thei mân Pathien'n a lungdo angin inkhat lam a thang ani ti ânlang. Sintho sik ni loiin a koipu lungdo sikin Rebecca kôm, “A ulienpu'n nâipangpu sin thông atih,” Pathien'n a ti hah.
<range>
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Jacob ku lungkhama, aniatachu Esau chu ke heng,” ati anghan.
Hanchu, imo ei ti rang ani zoi? Pathien han dik zoi loina aom mini? Nitet mak.
Ama han Moses kôm han, “Ku nunuom moroi ka ta, ku nunuom chunga inriengmu ki tih a ti anghan.”
Masikin, miriem nuom sika le sin tho sika niloiin Pathien inriengmuna sikin kêng ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n Pharaoh kôm, “Ki sinthotheina ki minlang theina rang le rammuol pumpuia ki riming ânthang theina rang pielin rêngin nang ku phun ani,” a ti.
Ma anghan Pathien'n a nuom kai inriengmuna a neia, a nuom kai a mulung a minngar ngâi ani.
Ma anghan aninte, “Pathien'n irangin mo mi a lei dem tit rêka? A lungdo hah tumo a makhal theia?” mi nin ti thei.
Hannirese, O miriem, Pathien makhalpu hah tumo ni ni? bêlpil han a sinpu rekel ngâi mak, “Irangin mo hi anghin mi ni sin?” ati rang mini?
Bêlpil tangkhat renga bêl a lut uol, anem uola sin rangin bêl sinpu han bêlpil chunga racham a dôn nimak mo?
Ma anghan Pathien'n a tho ngâi, a taksina le a sinthotheina minlang nuom khomrese, a taksina changpu bêl inmang kelen ruo ngei chu a tuong zajâma.
Hanchu, a inriengmuna bêl a roiinpuina chang ranga a minsûk, eini ngei kôma hin a roiinpuina tamtak a juong vur ani.
Ma anga bêlngei hah eini Judangei lâia vai niloiin Jentailngei lâi renga a koi ngei khom ei ni sa.
Hosea lekhabua, “Ki mi ni ngâi loi ngei hah ‘ki mingei’ tîng ka ta. Lungkham ku mu ngâi loi nu hah ‘Lungkhamnu’ tîng ki tih.
‘Ki mingei nimak chei’ a tina mun lelê han Pathien a ring nâingeiin bên om an tih,” tia a lei misîr anghan.
Isaiah khom han Israelngei chong hêt puiin “Israelngei hah tuikhangliena sietsai dôr tam khomrese ngei, mi tômte kêng sanminringa om rang an ni.
Pumapa'n pilchunga a roijêkna rang hah a jêk kelen rang sikin,” a ti hah.
Isaiah nanâkin, “Pumapa Râtinchung han suonpâr mi lei hôih pe no rese chu, Sodom anghan nîng ei ti zoia. Gomorrah angtakin nîng ei ti zoi,” tia a lei ril anghan.
Imo ei ti rang ani zoi? Jentailngei, Pathien taka dikna zong loi ngei hah taksônna sikin dik an hong intum zoi ani.
Balam jôma adik chang rang bôk Pathien mi Israelngei hanchu balam angtakin dik chang makngei.
Itho sikin mo? Taksônnân minngam loiin sintho nân an zong sika ani. Masikin “Inpalna rang lunga” an inpal zoia.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “En roh! Keiman Ziona han lungpui ka dara mahan mingei minpal a ta, ma lungpui han minlet ngei atih. Tutu khom ama iem murdi'n chu mâimôkinshakin om noni ngei,” tia inziek anghan.
Ku sûngsuokngei Israelngei chu sanminringin om rese ngei ti hih ku nuom tak le Pathien kôma ki ngên ngâi tak ani.
Pathien tieng ningsietakin an om ti ki riet, aniatachu an inpêkna hah rietna diktaka inngam nimak.
Pathien'n mi dik a minchang lam hah riet theiloiin anni an lampui an jûi ngita, Pathien'n dik a min changna balam nuoia han inpêklût nuom mak ngei.
Khrista chu Balam murdi mongna ania, a iem murdi chu Pathien kôm dik intuma an om theina rangin.
Moses han Balam jôm sika dik changna thurchi hi anghin a miziek, “Balam chongpêk a jômpu chu ring atih,” ti.
Taksônna sika dik changna thurchi rek chu, “Tumo invâna kal ranga?” (Mahan tumo chungtieng renga Khrista hong ruoi rang tina ani)
Tumo pilrîla juong se ranga? (thina renga tumo Khrista hong ruoi rang, tina ani) nin mulungrîlin ti no roi, a tia.
Hanchu imo a ti? “Pathien chong han, nu mûr le nu mulungrîla nang anâi ani,” ma taksônna chong hah kin misîr ani.
Na mûrin Jisua hah Pumapa ani tiin nu phuonga, thina renga Pathien'n a kaithoi ti nu mulungrîlin ni iemin chu sanminringin om ni tih.
Mulungrîla taksôn chu dik minchang an nia, mûra thop chu sanminringin an om sa ngâi.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tukhom ama iem murdi chu mâimôkinshakin om no ngei,” a ti ani.
Juda le Jentialngei hah ite lei teina dôn mak ngei, Pumapa inkhat hah anrênga Pumapa ania, Ama ralam ngei kai chu sat a vur ok ngâi.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tukhom Pumapa riming ralam ngei murdi chu sanminringin om an tih,” ati anghan.
Nikhomsenla, an iem loi hah i angin mo an ralam thei ranga? An rietloi hah i angin mo an iem thei ranga? Thurchi misîrpu omloiin kho angin mo an riet thei ranga?
Itîr niloiin kho angin mo thurchi an misîr ranga? Pathien lekhabu'n Thurchi Sa hong mintungpu ngei chu en ahoi bâk na! ati anghan.
Hannisenla, Thurchi Sa hah anrêngin chu pom let mak ngeia, Isaiah reng khomin, “Pumapa kin chongril tumo a iem?” a ti ani.
Ma anghan, taksônna hah chong riet sikin ahong oma, chong rietna hah Khrista thurchi misîrna sikin ahong om ngâi.
Hanchu, thurchi an riet loi tatak mini? an riet ngêt Pathien lekhabu'n, “An rôl miring hah ramtina ânthanga; An thurchi hah kôlkung dênin ânthang suo zoi,” ati anghan.
Hanchu, Israelngeiin an riet loi mini? amotontaka Moses rengin “Nama telkhâiloi ngei hah nangni min narsa ka ta; Nam inmôlngei sikin nin takminsi ki tih,” a lei ti ani.
Isaiah'n hâi uolin, “Mi rok loi ngeiin min mua, mi ralam loi ngei kôma kên lâr,” a lei ti sa.
Hannirese, Israelngei chungroia chu, “Hedonloi ngei le inhel mingei modôm rangin sûntuonin ka bân ka phar ngâi,” a ti.
Hanchu, Pathien'n a mingei a hengpai mini? Nitet mak, keima reng khom hih Israel mi, Abraham richi Benjamin rûia mi ki ni.
Pathien'n aphuta a thang, a mingei hah paiphar mak. Pathien lekhabu'n Elijah roi a misîr hah imo a ti nin riet. Ama han Israelngei chungroi Pathien kôm a mintunga.
“Pumapa ne dêipungei an thata, na mâichâmngei an misima; Keima vai kêng ko om zoi. Keima khom hi mi that rang an bôk,” tiin.
Hannirese, Pathien'n, “Baal makunga khûk lân bil ngâiloi mi isâng sari ka ta rangin ka la dar tit ani,” tiin a thuona.
Ma angdênin atûn hin khom Pathien'n a moroina sika a thangsuok ngei pâl atômte an la om.
A moroina sika a thangsuok anni an sintho sika nimak, ma anghan aninônchu moroina hih moroina tatak ni thei no nih.
Imo ei ti rang? Israelngeiin an rok hah man mak ngeia, Pathien thang atômte ngei vaiin an mana, midang ngei murdi chu Pathien koina han an sêt suo zoi.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Pathien'n avien sûn tena an mindonna le an mulungngei a min môl pea, an mua an riet thei loina,” a ti anghan.
David khomin, “An ruolhoi thona bukhalâi hah châng le in ôkna chang senla, An inbana le an khitrûi chang rese.
An mu theiloina rangin an mit hong jîng senla, an intakna puokrikin del ngei tit rese,” a tia.
Hanchu an inba sikin an inluoi phar rang mini? Ni mak! an inpal sikin Jentailngei kôma sanminringna a juong tung ani. Judangei narsana rang ani.
Ha anghan, Judangei an inpalna man rammuol neina ania, Judangei ratha tienga an insamna man hah Jentailngei neina a ninte, Judangei an hong kip tena vâng chu idôra satvurna mo a ni rang ani zoi.
Ha anghan, nangni Jentailngei kôm ki ti ani, Jentail tîrton ki ni anghan ki sinthona hih ki minlût ani.
Ki mingei nangni ki min narsa senkhat luo ka sanminring thei ngêt na rangin.
An hengpai lâihan rammuol ta ranga Pathien leh inngêi nôkna aninte, an pom nôkna tena inmo ani rang? Maha thina renga ringna nîng atih.
Vâipôl hâr ât masatak han Pathien kôm pêk minthieng anînchu apumin pêk minthieng ani. Hanchu thing khom a ruzung ânthienga anînchu amachangngei khom an inthieng ani.
Olive thing machang senkhat tanpaiin, nangni ram olive, an lâia zomin nin oma, ruzung asa hah nin inzompui zoi ani. Nangni Jentailngei hah ram olive angin nin nia, male atûn chu Judangei ratha râtna tienga ringna hah nin insempui ani.
A machang dangngei chunga insong no roi, insong khom ungla, aruzung vâipu nimak chei, aruzung in kêng nangni avâi ani.
Hanchu, nangman, “Zoma ko om theina ranga amachangngei hah thâk kêng an ni,” tîng ni tih.
Ani, an iem loina sikin thâkin an oma, nang chu na taksônna sikin zom ni ni, inpâk nônla, manêkin chi roh.
Pathien'n amachang taktak angati Judangei luo a manar nônchu nang khom nang manar uol no nih.
Masikin, Pathien sa tie le chi aomtie ei mua, ânpal ngei ta rangin chu chi a oma, a satna no omtitin chu nangma ta rangin chu asa ani. No omtit nônchu nang khom thâkpai sa nîng ni tih.
Male, Judangei khom an iemloina an maka anînchu zomin la om nôk an tih, Pathien'n a zom nôk thei sikin.
Nangni Jentailngei, ram olive machang renga thâkpai luon olive thing bâk sa taka inzomin nin om inte, nangni Judangei, olive thingkung diktak amachangngei a zom chu Pathien rangin abai pe uol ok rang ani.
Ka malngei hi chong inthup hih nin riet rangin ku nuom ani, aninônchu avâr intum nin tih. Isreal mingei tukdullienna hah a omjêt rang nimak. Aniatachu Jentailngei hah Pathien kôma an hong kipphar tena rang vai ani.
Hanchu, Israelngei murdi sanminringin om an tih. Pathien lekhabu'n, “Zion renga Minringpu hah juong a ta, Jacob jâisuonngei renga puoloinangei minboi atih.
Mahih an kôma ko chongkhit rang chu ani, An nunsienangei ka lâk pai tika chu,” ati anghan.
Thurchi Sa an hengpaia, nangni sikin Judangei chu Pathien râl an ni. Pathien'n a thang ngei na mindonin chu an richibulngei sikin a champui lungkhamna ngei an ni.
Pathien'n mi a thangna le sat a vurna lama a mulungrîl thûl ngâi mak.
Tienlâi han chu nangni Jentailngei chu Pathien chongjôm mak cheia, atûn chu Judangei an jômloina sikin a moroina nin chang zoi ani.
Ma ang nanâk han, atûn nang nin moroina nin chang sikin Judangei khomin Pathien moroina an chang sa theina rangin atûn hin chu chongjômloia om an ni.
Asikchu anrênga chunga a inriengmuna a minlang nuom sikin Pathien'n mi murdi chongjômloina a khum zit ani.
Pathien neina ngei chu idôra roiinpui mo! a vârna le a rietna khom idôra ânthûk mo! tûn mo a roijêk a rilminthâr thei ranga? tun mo a lampui a riet thei ranga?
Pathien lekhabu'n: “Tun mo Pumapa mulungrîl rieta? Tu mo rilna a pêk thei ranga?
Tumo a kôma lâkâi amin tanga, tumo a kôm renga a man nôk rêk ngai?” ati anghan.
Asikchu neinun murdi hih ama sin ania, ama sika hong om le ama ta riempet ani. Pathien kôma tuonsôtin inlalna chu om rese! Amen.
Masikin ka malngei, Pathien inriengmuna lientak sika hin inbôlna ring le inthieng leh a khôktheiruo ni rangin nin takpum hah Pathien kôm pêk rangin nangni ki ngên ani. Maha nin biek rang lampui diktak chu ani.
Hi rammuol omlam anghin om no ungla, Pathien lungdo asa le a khôktheiruo le asakipdir ngei hah nin riet minthâr theina rangin nin mulungrîl minthara omin hong tei ta roi.
Pathien'n mi pêk moroina neinunpêk sika hin nangni ke ngên ani. Nin kâra tute rangâiinlut rai om no roi. Manêkin, Pathien'n mitin kôma taksônna a pêk angtakin intukpui chit mulungrîl pêl roi.
Takpum inkhata amachang tamtak ei dônna ha amachangngei sintum hah aom chit.
Ma angdênin, eini khom tamtak ni khom inla, Khrista leh takpum inkhat ei nia, ei rêngin takpum abâk anga ânzom chit ei ni.
Masikin Pathien moroina mi pêk angtaka hin manboia pêk adang dang ei chang chita. Pathien chongril rang anînchu ei taksônna dôn angtaka hin misîr ila.
Sintho rang anînchu ei sinthona hin inpêk ngit ila, mi minchu rang anînchu minchu ngit ila.
Mi mohôk rang anînchu mohôk ngit ila, neinun pêkpu'n phaltakin pêk senla, rachamneipu han takintâitakin tho senla, mi lungkhampu khomin râisântakin lungkham rese.
Lungkhamna chu a rothol koploiin nirese. Asie hah mumâk ungla, asa ha chu mutu tit roi.
Khristien sûngsuokrêng angin inkhat le inkhat inlungkham inlôm ungla, mirit inlômna minlang rang jôt tit roi.
