Sinthona lama ningsiet ungla, nin ratha minboi no roi. Mulungrîltakin Pumapa sin tho roi.
Nin sabeina han nin râiminsân senla, intaknangei nin tuong khomin dier ungla, zora tina chubai tho ngâi roi.
Nin Khristien champui ngei insamna nin neinun insan ungla, nin ina khuolmi mintung ngâi roi.
An nuom nangni lo ngâi ngei hah khomaksâm loia satvur ngei rangin Pathien kôm ngên roi.
A râisân ngei râiminsân pui ungla, a chap ngei chappui roi.
Mindon munkhatin om ungla, insong no roi rangâiinchîn mingei leh ruol inchang roi. Nin thetheiin avâr intum no roi.
Mingeiin nin chunga an sin minchâina hah sietna nanâkin thuon no roi. Mi murdi ranga asa hah tho rang pût roi.
Mi murdi leh inngêia lêng theina rangin bôk ngit roi.
Ka malngei, phûba lâk tet no ungla, manêkin Pathien taksina han tho rese. Pathien lekhabu'n, “Phûba murdi chu keiman ka lâk rang ani, Keiman thuon ki tih, Pumapa'n a ti,” ati anghan.
Manêkin, Pathien lekhabu'n ati nôka, “Na râlngei an vonachâmin chu sâk rang pêk ngei inla, an tui ânrâlin chu an nêk rang pêk ngei roh, ha anghan no thôn chu ni min zak ngei ok rang ani.”
Sietnân motorin om nônla, manêkin nangman sietna hah motorin satnân zoiin om roh.
Mitinin an chunga rachamneipungei chong an jôm ngêt rang ani. Pathien'n a phun ni nônchu tute rachamneipu om ngâi mak ngei, atûnlâia rachamneipungei khom hih Pathien'n a phun an ni.
Masikin, tukhom rachamneipu adoipu chu Pathien a phunpu an idoi ani, adoipu ngei han an chunga roijêkna tung atih.
Roijêkpungei hah neinun dik thopu ngei rangin chu ichi om mak ngeia, neinun dikloi thopu ngei ta rangin chu ichi an om ani. Rachamneipungei chi loia om nu nuom mo? Neinun dik tho inla hanchu nang minpâk an tih.
Na satna ranga Pathien tîrlâmngei kêng an ni. Hannirese, neinun dikloi no thôn chu chi roh, khandai hah an chôi papai nimak kêng. Pathien tîrlâmngei an nia, neinun dikloi tho ngei chunga taksia dûkmintongpu ngei an ni.
Masikin, Pathien dûkmintongna chi sik vaiin niloiin, ni sielesarietna sik khomin rachamneipungei chong no jôm ngêt rang ani.
Masika han kêng chôiruol nin chôi ngâi, rachamneipungei han an sintum asân an thôn chu Pathien sin an tho kêng ani.
Pêkna rang murdia pêk roi, pilman pêk rang anînchu pêk ungla, mimala le neinun man chôi rang anînchu chôi ungla, miritna le minlalna minlang pe ngei roi.
Lungkham inmu inlômna ti loiin chu tute kôm ite intâng no roi, ei miriem champui lungkhampu han Balam a jôm mikhip zoi ani.
Chongpêkngei, “Inrê no roh, mi that no roh, inru no roh, mita ôi no roh,” ti ngei le chongpêk dang ngei murdi hih, “Nangma nên lungkham angin nu bunga mingei lungkham roh,” ti hin a kaikhôm zit ani.
Mi nu lungkhamin chu an chunga asaloi tho tet no tinia, lungkhamna chu Balam pumpui jôm mikhipna ani.
Atûnlâi neinun omtie nin riet sik le a in ngei inthoi zora ani tatak zoi ti nin riet sikin maha ki ril ani, atûna hin chu ei iem phut lâia nêkin chu ei sanminringna hah anâi uol zoi.
Jân hih ase ok zoia, khuovâr rang kêng ani zoi. Masikin ajîng sintho ngei hah mong ei ta a avâra indoina râlrovo invo ei ti u.
Sûna om ngâi mingei angin enhoitakin om ei ti u, junêk omhoina le ju inrûiin om loiin hurindit le inditnasaloi songloiin, insuol le innarsân khom om loiin.
Pumapa Jisua Khrista râlrovongei hah lâk ungla, nin taksa nunsie nina ôina saloi ngei thangminsuo rang bôk no roi.
Hanchu taksônna tienga râtloi mingei chu anthena an mindona hah dem loiin môdôm ngei roh.
Mi senkhatin an taksônna han jâttin sâk thei rangin a phal zoia, aniatachu taksônna râtloi mi han chu ansûl vai a sâk ngâia.
Jâttin sâk thei mi han a sâk loi mi hah dem no rese, a sâk loipu khom han a sâkpu hah jêk no rese, Pathien'n ama hah a khôk kêng ani zoi.
Midang tîrlâm jêkpu hah tumo ni ni? Ânding indetin mo, ânletin mo, a mindon rang chu a pu ani. Inding det ngêt atih, Pumapa a minding mindet thei sikin.
Hanchu, mi senkhatin nikhuo khat hah nikhuo dang nêkin a mindon minlut uol ngâia, mi dangin chu nikhuo murdi an angnatin a be ngâi. Mitinin ama mindon lam diktak nei chit rese.
Nikhuo khata aser-uolpu han Pumapa chôiminsângna rangin a ser ani, jâttin sâkpu han Pathien kôm râisânchong a ril baka a sâk ani sikin Pumapa a chôiminsâng ani. A sâk loipu khom hah Pathien kôma râisânchong a ril sa nôk sikin Pumapa chôiminsângna rangin a ngêi ani.
Tute eini ta ranga vaia ring nimak mea, tute eini ta ranga vaia thi khom nimak me.
Ei ringin chu Pumapa ta ranga ei ring ania, ei thi khomin Pumapa ta ranga ei thi ani. Masikin ei ring khomin ei thi khomin Pumapa ta ei ni.
Masikin, mi ring le mi thi Pumapa ani theina ranga Khrista hah a thia, a ring nôk zoi ani.
Hanchu, nangma ansûl riempet sâkpun irang mo midangei ne jêk? Nônchu, nangma jâttin sâkpu irang mo iempu dangngei ne dema? Pathien roijêkna makunga ei rêngin ei lân ding pak rang kêng.
Pathien lekhabu'n: “Adiktakin Keima hi Pathien ring ki ni, Pumapa han a ti, mi murdi ka makunga an minkhûk lân bil pak an ta, Male mitinin keima Pathien ki ni la Phuong an tih,” a tia, ânziek anga han.
Ma anghan, ei rêngin Pathien makunga ei thurchi ei la misîr pak rang ani.
Masika han inkhat le inkhat injêk inlôm khâi no roi. Manêkin na lâibung nunsie mo, inbana mo a tho tet loina rangin no bôk rang ani.
Athei mamangin chu ânthiengloi neinun ite ommak ti Pumapa Jisua leh kin inzomna hin ki riet minthâr ani. Nikhomsenla, neinun senkhat chu ânthiengloi iempu rangin chu ânthiengloi ani.
Na sâk sâk sikin na lâibung mo na sarnu mo, mulungrîl ahoi nônchu lungkhamna lampui nu jûi khâi loi ani. A thi sika Khrista a thi pe hah na sâk sâk sikin minsiet no roh.
Masikin ninta ranga asa anga nin mindon hah ril min sietin om no rese.
Asikchu Pathien Rêngram chu sâk le nêk roi nimaka, Ratha Inthieng jâra diknangei, inngêina le râisânna ngei kêng ani.
Tukhom ma anga Khrista sin tho chu Pathien râiaminsâna male midangngei pomna khom a chang ngâi ani.
Masikin, inkhat le inkhat inngêina rang le min râtna rang ngei hah ei rujûl tit ngêt rang ani.
Na sâk sikin Pathien sintho siet no roh. Sâk murdi sâk thei ania, hannirese midang nunsie minchâina ranga sâk chu sa mak.
Na lâibungngei le na sarnungei inbana rang anînchu me ngei, ju ngei le neinun dadang ngei a ngêi hih asa uol.
Ni iemna hah iem chien roh, Pathien le nin kongkâra ama iemna lama theiloi intum loi chu satvur an ni.
Hannirese tukhomin mulungokcha pumin a sâkin chu a taksôn lam niloi a tho ani sikin Pathien'n theiloi a mintum ani. Male i-ih neinun khom taksônna chunga ânngam loi hih chu nunsie ani.
Eini taksônna taka râtngei hin eini râisânna rang rok loiin, râtloi ngei râtloina han ei san ngei rang ani.
Manêkin taksônna ei phun mindet theina rangin iempu dangei râiminsânin anni ranga neinun sa hah ei tho rang ani.
Asikchu Khrista khom ama râisânna rok maka. Pathien lekhabu'n, “Nang êro ngei êrona hah ku chunga achul zoi,” ati anghan ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n apêk ngâi sabeina renga tuongdierna le mohôkna ei nei theina rangin Pathien lekhabua lei inziek ngei murdi hah ei inchu rang ani.
Khrista Jisua nin jûi anghan nin lâia inngêina ratha han tuongdierna le mohôkna hah Pathien'n nangni min dôn senla.
Hanchu, nin rêngin rôl-ûm khatin ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista Pa le Pathien hah nin minpâk thei rang ani.
Pathien roiinpuina rangin Khrista'n nangni a pom angin inpom inlôm chit roi.
Nangni ki ril, Pathien taksônomna minlangnân an richibulngei kôma a chonginkhâm tuontungin Khrista hah Judangei ruthûlin sinthopu'n a juong oma,
Jentailngei khomin a moroina sika Pathien an minpâk theina rangin. Pathien lekhabu'n: “Masikin Jentailngei lâia nang minpâk ka ta, Ni riming minpâkin uoi ki tih,” ati anghan.
Ati nôka, “Jentailngei Pathien mingei leh râiminsân roi,” ati sa.
Male, “Nangni Jentailngei murdi, Pumapa minpâk roi; Mingei murdi khomin minpâk rese ngei!” ati nôka.
Male avêlin, Isaiah khomin, “Jesse jâisuon la hong inlang a ta; Jentailngei chunga inlal rangin la hong om a ta, Ama chunga han an sabeina minngam an tih,” a tia.
Ratha Inthieng sinthotheina jâra sabeina nin sip theina rangin sabeina nâr Pathien han ama nin taksônna sikin, râisânna le inngêinangei nangni minsôn pe bang rese.
Ku sûngsuokngei, nangni hih satna akip, rietna murdi dônna, inril inlôm thei rang nin ni tiin tak ko sônchêt ani.
Nikhomsenla, neinun senkhat nangni min riet nôk rangin hâitakin ma lekha hih ki miziek ania, Pathien'n mi pêk moroina sikin
Jentailngei sinthopu rangin Khrista Jisua tîrlâm ki ni. Jentailngei hah Ratha Inthiengin minthienga Pathien inbôlna ringa khôktheiruo min ni ranga Thurchi Sa misîrna hin ochai angin ki sin ani.
Masikin Khrista Jisua leh inzomin hima Pathien sinthona hin insongna ke dôn thei ani.
Jentailngei ruoia Pathien chong min jômna rangin Khrista'n sintho le chongrilin keima mi manga, a sinthongei pêna chu ite dang ril ngam no ninga,
sininkhêlngei le sin kamâmruoingei, Pathien Ratha sinthotheina han mi manga, masika han Jerusalem le akôl revêla ram renga Illyricum dênin Khrista Thurchi Sa chu ku phuong let zoia.
Midang lungphûm chunga sinminding ki ni loina rangin Khrista la riet loina muntina Thurchi Sa phuong hi ku lungdo ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n: “A thurchi la rilna ngâi loina mingei han mûng an ta, A koura la riet ngâi loingei han riet an tih,” tia ânziek anghan.
Masika hah kêng ani, nin kôma hong rang ki minchâi titna ngâi.
Aniatachu, atûn hin hi ram revêla hin chu ki sintho ko zoia, kum tamtak nangni hong mu rang ke lei nuom ngâi anghan.
Spain rama se malamin nangni hong mu rang ko bôk ani. Chomola nangni le inlopkhôm zoiin, nangni sanna renga ka panna rang mun tieng se thei rangin ka sabei ani.
Atûn tak hin chu Pathien mingei sintho rangin Jerusalema la sêng ki tih.
Macedonia le Achaia rama koiindang mingei han phaltakin Jerusalema Pathien mingei kâra inriengngei rangin chôiruol an tho sikin.
Inphaltaka an tho ani, aniatachu an kôma an intâng sa piel khom ani. Asikchu, Jentailngei ratha satvurnangei Judangei an insempuiin chu rammuol neinun satvurna tieng khomin Jentailngei Judangei san rang anâng ani.
Ma hah ko tho zoiin, an sum ngei an kôm ka bâng let zoiin Spain rama se rangin nangni la hong lût ki tih.
Nin kôm ko hong tika chu Khrista satvurna akipin hong ki tih ti ki riet.
Sûngsuokngei, ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista le Ratha pêk lungkhamnân Pathien makunga chubai mi nin thopui tatak ngâi rangin nangni ki ngên.
Judea rama iemloingei kut renga ko jôk theina rang le Jerusalema ki sintho hih Pathien mingei khôktheiruo ani theina rangin chubai mi thope roi.
Pathien'n asa a tiin chu râisânna sipmata nin kôm ko honga ei har inruol theina rangin.
Atûn inngêina Pathien hah nin rênga nin chunga om rese, Amen.
Ei sarnu Phoebe Cenchreae koiindang mingei sinthonu hih a mêl nangni min riet ku nuom.
Pumapa riminga Pathien mingei anga nin lei modômna rang le asan anângna tina nin lei san theina rangin. Ama reng khom hi mi tamtak lei san ngâi ania, keima reng khom mi lei san ngâi ani.
Priscilla le Aquila, Khrista Jisua chuonsina ki sintho champui ngei hah lei chibai roi.
Anni han ki ringna minjôkna rangin an ringna tena lên phala an chunga ka râisân sabak ani, keima vai niloiin Jentail koiindang murdi khom an chunga an râiasân ani.
An ina koiindang inkhôm ngâi ngei hah chibai mi mûk pe sa roi. Asia rama Khrista lei iem masatak ka mal Epaenetus hah chibai mi lei mûk pe roi.
Mary ninta ranga sin dûktong nu hah lei chibai roi.
Andronicus le Junia, ku Juda champui le intâng ina ke lei lûtpuingei hah mi lei chibai pe roi. Ma ngei hah tîrtonngei riming inthangtak le keima nêka Khrista lei iem masa an ni.
Ampliatus, Pumapa taka ku ruol miditom hah mi chibai pe roi.
Khrista chuonsina kin sinthopui Urbanus le ku ruol miditom Stachys hah mi chibai pe roi.
Khrista mi tatak ânthârlak Apelles hah mi chibai pe roi. Aristobulus insûngmingei hah mi chibai pe roi.
Ku Juda champui Herodion, Khristien insungmingei lâia Narcissus mi chibai pe roi.
Tryphaena le Tryphosa, Pumapa a sin ngâi hah mi chibai pe roi. Ku ruol miditom Persis, Pumapa sintho râttak nu mi chibai pe roi.
Pumapa chuonsina sinthopu satak, Rufus le a nû, a nâi anga mi be ngâinu hah mi chibai pe roi.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes ngei le a kôma Khristien sungsuok dang omngei murdi hah mi chibai pe roi.
Philologus le Julia Nereus le a sarnu, Olympas le an kôma Pathien mi omngei murdi hah mi chibai pe roi.
Intum inthiengin inkhat le inkhatin chibai roi. Khrista koiindangngei murdi'n chibai nangni an pêk.
Sûngsuokngei, rilna chong nin man ha ânkâl lama nin kâra insenna le mingei taksônna minngûipu ngei renga han indîn rang le mangei hah nûksong rangin nangni ke ngên.
Ha mingei han ei Pumapa Khrista sintho mak ngei, an phûngpui sin kêng an tho ani. An chong hoi le an mûr thiemin mi theiloinaboi ngei an huong ngâi ani.
Thurchisa taka nin det tie mitinin an riet zoi masikin nin chunga kin râiasân ani. Nikhomsenla, satna tieng nin vâra sietna tieng chu theiloinaboi nin ni rang ku nuom ani.
Hanchu ei inngêina bulpui Pathien han Soitan hah nin kepha nuoia om rangin min nôichit lâi atih. Ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista moroina hah nin kôma om rese.
Ki sinthopui Timothy le Lucius, Jason le Sosipater ku Juda champuingeiin chibai nangni an pêk.
Keima, Tertius hi lekha miziekpu hin, Pumapa rimingin chibai nangni ke pêk.
Ku tungnapa Gaius le koiindangngei inkhômna ngâi in pumapa, khopuiliena sumrâkpu Erastus le a lâibungpa Kuartus khomin chibai nangni an pêk.
Ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista moroina hah nin rênga nin chunga om rese, Amen.
Pathien chu chôilôm ei ti u! Ama han Jisua Khrista thurchi, Thurchisa kin ril le zora sôt taka chongtak inthup lei muphuong anghin nin taksônna dettakin nangni minding thei ani.
Atûn chu ha chong dik hah dêipungei lekhabua ajuong inlanga, tukhomin an iema an jôm theina rangin kumtuong Pathien chongpêk angtakin namtin kâra min riet ani zoi.
Pathien inkhat mang avârtak kôma om, Jisua Khrista jâra tuonsôtin roiinpuina chu om rese! Amen.
Paul renga, Pathien lungdoa Khrista Jisua tîrton ni ranga koi le ei lâibungpa Sosthenes han,
Korinth taka Pathien koiindang aom, Pathien mi inthieng ni ranga koi ngei, Khrista Jisua leh inzoma ama ta, muntina ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista biek mi murdi ngei leh munkhatin, an Pumapa le ei Pumapa kôm:
Pathien ei Pa le Pumapa Jisua Khrista kôm renga moroina le inngêina nin kôm om rese.
Khrista Jisua Pathien'n moroina nangni a pêk sikin nin ta rangin Pathien kôm râisânchong ki misîr bang ngâi.
Ama renga lam tina minei nin nia, chong le rietnangeia nin insôn bang sikin.
Khrista chong hah nin kôma mindetin aoma
ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista inlâr rang nin ngâk angin a satvurnangei inkhat luo man loiin om mak chei.
Ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista Nikhuo han khom châinaboia nin omna rangin a kôm han among dênin nangni mindet atih.
A Nâipasal Jisua Khrista, ei Pumapa leh inlopna dôn ranga nangni koipu Pathien hah taksôn aom ani.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, nin tina murdia inruola, nin lâia insenna reng om loia, mulungrîl munkhat leh mindonna munkhat dôna om rangin ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista rimingin nin rêngin nangni ke ngên.
Ku sûngsuokngei, nin lâia inkhalna aom ti Khloe insûngmi senkhatngeiin ânthârlakin min ril.
Ma anghin lei ti rong: nin rêngin nin ti lam atei chita, senkhatin an ti “Kei chu Paul pâl ki ni”; “Kei chu Apollos pâl ki ni”; adangin “Kei chu Peter pâl ki ni”; male adangin “Kei chu Khrista pâl ki ni” nin tia.
Khrista chu pâlngeiin semin aom mo! Nin ta ranga khrosa thipu hah Paul mini? aninônchu tîrton Paul riminga baptis chang mo nin ni?
Krispus le Gaius tiloiin chu tute ka baptis loi sikin Pathien kôm râisânchong ki ril.
Masikin, tutên ku ruoisingei rimingin baptis ka chang ti thei no tunui.
(O ani, Stephanas le a insûngmingei khom baptis ko thoa, midang ka baptis sa mo khom riet mu-ung.)
Khrista'n baptis rangin mi tîr maka, Thurchi Sa misîra, ma thurchisa hah miriem vârna mang loia misîr rangin mi tîr kêng ani, Khrosa Khrista thina hah asênaboi achang loina rangin.
Khrosa Khrista thina roi hih ânmang tir ngei ta rangin chu mona ania, aniatachu eini sanminring tira omngei ta rangin chu Pathien sinthotheina ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n: “Mivâr vârna chu min boi riei ka ta, male mitheingei riettheina chu paivar ki tih,” ati.
Hanchu, mivârngei hah khonmo an om? mitheingei hah khonmo an om? Hi rammuola mi makhal theitakngei hah khonmo an om? Pathien'n hi rammuol vârna hih mona ani ti a minlang zoi!
Miriemngeiin an vârna mangin Pathien an riet thei khâiloi lehan Pathien vârna thurchi misîr “inmôl tak” manga a iemngei sanminring hah Pathien lungdo tak ani.
Judangeiin minthârna rangin sininkhêlngei an zonga, Greekngeiin vârna an zong.
Keini rêkin chu Khrista jêmdelna roi kin misîr ngâia, mahah Judangei ta rangin chu inpalna ania, Jentailngei ta rangin mona ani;
aniatachu Juda mo, Greek mo Pathien'n a koingei ta rangin chu Khrista hah Pathien sinthotheina le Pathien vârna ani.
Pathien inmôlna chu miriem vârna nêkin avâr uola, a râtloina khom miriem râtna nêkin arât uol sikin.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei atûn, nangni a koi lam hih mindon ta u, nin lâia mi tamtak hi taksa tienga mivâr nimak choia, mi sinthotheitak khom nimak choia, mi roiinpui lâia khom nimak choi.
Pathien'n mivârngei mâimôkashak theina rangin rammuol mindonna inmôlngei a thang ngeia, mirâtngei mâimôkashak theina rangin rammuol mindonna mi dok ngei a thang zoi.
Mapên han Pathien'n rammuol mindonna neinun kâm omngei hah kâmnângloi a min chang theina rangin rammuolin a en nuomloia amintem le itea abe loi hah a thang sa zoi.
Masikin Pathien makunga han tute omlien song thei om noni ngei.
Aniatachu nangni chu Pathien'n Khrista Jisua le nangni minzomin, Khrista hah ei vârna rangin a sin ani. Ama jârin Pathien makunga midik ei changa, Pathien mi inthieng ngei ei hongnia mojôkin ei om zoi.
Masikin Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, “Tukhom insong rang ajôt ngei chu Pumapa sintho hih song ngêt rese ngei.”
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, Pathien chongtak inthup, misîra nin lâia ko hong lâihan, chong roiinpui le rietna roiinpui mang mu-ung.
Nin lâia ko om han khom neinun dang murdi mingil riein Jisua Khrista jêmdela aom roi vai kêng nin riet rang ku nuom ngâi.
Ma anghan nin lâia han râtloi le innîk pumin leh ichin ko oma,
male ka bâi renga minchuna chong asuok le ku thurchi misîr ngei khom hah miriem vârna methêmna chong nimaka, Pathien Ratha sinthotheina chong kêng ani uol.
Masikin nin taksônna hah miriem vârna han inngam maka, Pathien sinthotheina han kêng ânngam ani.
Hannoma rathatienga mitungsuo ngei kôm chu vârna chong ki misîr ngâi. Hannirese hi rammuol vârna chong chu nimaka, hi rammuol roijêkpungei an inlalna ânmang tir ngei vârna chong khom nimak.
Pathien vârna chong inthup ha kêng ki misîr ngâi, vârna chong inthup ei roiinpuina ranga Pathien'n rammuol om mânna a lei thangsai hah kêng ani.
Ma vârna hah hi rammuol roijêkpungei rengin riet mak ngei. Riet senla ngei chu roiinpuina Pumapa hah jêmdel noni ngei.
Hannoma Pathien lekhabu'n, “Tutên an mu ngâiloi le an riet ngâiloi, Ma anga tung ranga tutên an mindon loi, Pathien'n a lungkham ngei ta ranga a mintuosai ngân chu,” ati anghan.
Aniatachu Pathien'n eini rangin chu a chongtak inthup hah Ratha'n mi min riet zoi. Ratha han jâttin a sûisuok ngâi, Pathien neinunkhînngei inthûktaka inthup khom.
Ei sûnga om ei ratha lelê hih vai kêng ei chungroi a riet ngâia; ma angdên han, Pathien Ratha vai kêng Pathien chungroi murdi a riet thei ngâi.
Ei man hih rammuol Ratha nimaka; manêkin, Pathien'n neinun mi pêk ngei murdi ei riet theina rangin, Pathien juongtîr Ratha ha kêng ei man ani.
Masika han miriem vârna minchûn, misîr ngâi mak mea, Ratha minchûn kêng kin misîr ngâi, rathatienga chongtakngei hah Ratha dônngei kôm kin rilsensâi ngâi.
Tukhom Ratha dôn loiin chu Pathien Ratha renga manboipêkngei hah man thei ngâi mak ngei. Ma anga mingei han chu ma neinunngei hah riet thei ngâi mak ngeia; ama ta rangin chu inmôlna vai kêng ani, a luttie hah Ratha'n vai kêng a riet thei sikin.
Tutu khom Ratha man ngei chu neinuntin aluttie an riet ngâi, hannirese, ama chu tutên jêk thei ngâi mak ngei.
Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan: “Tu'n mo Pumapa mulungrîl a riet? Tu mo minchuna chong a pêk thei rang?” Nikhomrese, einin chu Khrista mulungbôk ei pêl ani.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, ratha mingei kôma ki misîr angin nin kôm thurchi misîr thei mu-unga; hi rammuol mi, khrista taksônna tieng nâitengei kôma misîr angin kêng nangni ki misîr pe.
Burum niloiin, runutuiin nangni ka vâi ani hi, bu nin la nêk theiloi sikin. Male atûn khom la nêk theiloi dên nin nia,
rammuol mingei om anghan nin la om tit sikin. Nin lâia innarsana le inkhat le inkhat inkhalna aom kâr chu rammuol ta nin ni tiin minlangin aoma, anni angdêna la om nin ni tina nimak mo?
Nin lâia, “Kei chu Paul pâl ki ni,” a dangin “Kei chu Apollos pâl ki ni,” ti ngei nin la om kâr chu rammuol mingei angin nan la om bang nimak mo?
Apollos hah tumo ani? Paul khom tumo ani? Pathien tîrlâmngei, nin iem theina ranga sinthopu papai kêng kin ni. Pathien'n tho rang mi pêk chit kêng kin sin:
Keiman chimu ker thea, Apollos'n tui a buoka, aniatachu chimukung a minsônpu chu Pathien ani.
A minsônpu Pathien ni loiin chu chimu rethepu le tui buokpu hah ite nimak ngei.
A lingpu le tui buokpu hah ite an teina om mak. An sintho lam angtakin Pathien'n râisânman pêk ngei atih.
Pathien ta ranga munkhata sintho kin nia, nangni hih Pathien loimân nin ni. Pathien in nin ni sa.
Pathien'n manboipêk ni pêk mangin in sinpu theitak angin keiman lungphûm ku phûma, midangin in an sin ani. Aniatachu mitinin an sin rang lam angtakin indîn thei rese ngei.
Pathien lungphûm a lei phûm sai Jisua Khrista pêna chu tutên lungphûm dang phûm thei noni ngei.
Ma lungphûm chunga han senkhatin rângkachakin mini, sumdârin mini, lung mantam mini mangin sin an ta; senkhatin thingin mini, sûlbuon mini, sapôl mini mangin sin an tih.
Khrista Nikhuo han meiin ânlâr rang sikin mei ngêt han mitin sintho hah phuol a ta; anina tak inlang atih.
Lungphûm chunga sin hah akâng nônchu a sinpu'n râisânman man atih.
Aniatachu tutu sintho khom akângin chu dok atih; hannirese, ama ha chu mei rakân angdôrin sanminjôkin om atih.
Pathien in nin ni le Pathien Ratha nin kôma aom ngâi ti nin riet minthâr khet mo?
Masikin tutu khom Pathien biekin hah a sietin chu Pathien'n ama hah siet atih. Pathien biekin chu ânthieng kêng, male nangni ngei hah a biekin nin ni.
Tutên athenin inhuong no rese. Nin lâia tutu khom hi rammuol balama avârin ân bên chu a vâr tatak theina rangin amo chang bak rese.
Hi rammuolin vârna ati hih Pathien mitmûn chu achâng ani sikin, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Pathien'n mivârngei chu kin vâr an intina han a min ôk ngei ngâi,” ati anghan;
male Pathien lekhabu dangin, “Pumapa'n chu mivârngei mindonna hah mangmunboi ani ti a riet,” ati sa anghan.
Masika han tutên miriemngei song no rese ngei. Adikin chu neinun nâm nin ta ani:
Paul khom, Apollos khom, Peter khom; hi rammuol khom, ringna le thina khom, neinun omsai le ala hong om rang ngei khom anrêngin nin ta riempet an ni,
male nangni khom Khrista ta nin nia, Khrista khom Pathien ta ani.
Keini hih Khrista tîrlâmngei, le Pathien chongtak inthup donsûipungeiin mi mindon roi.
Hi taka neinun ankhat anâng chu tîrlâmngei hah an pu mitmua mi taksônom an ni rang ani.
Atûn nangnin mi nin jêkna le miriem mindonna balama mi nin jêkna hah kei rangin chu itên bê mu-ung; Ke thenin khom ko roijêk ngâi mu-ung.
Ki sielesarietna chu ânthâr, hannirese mahan keima sietnaboi ki ni tatak inthârna om uol mak. Pumapa hah ku chunga roijêkpu chu ani.
Masikin Pumapa juong nôk mâka chu azora diktak motona roi lei jêkmasat lai no roi. Azoina roijêkna chu Pumapa juong rang ngâk ngêt nîng a ta; ama'n ijînga inthup ngei hah avâra hong kêlsuong a ta, miriem mulungrîla bôkna inthup ngei khom minlang sâng atih. Male mitinin minpâkna an chang rang dôr Pathien renga an khôk rang ani.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, “Balamngei hih jôm roi,” ti hi nin inchu theina rangin keima le Apollos hih nin enton rangin ko hong târminlang ani, tutên mi inkhat songin midang enkhûm no roi.
Tumo midang chunga ulienin nangni sin? Neinuntin nin man ngei hah Pathien'n nangni a pêk nimak mo? Asa, nin man anînte ithomo manboipêk aman loi angin omlien nin songa?
Nin nâng ngei murdi nin dôn zoi mo? Nin nei mo ani zoi? Kin om nonnom rêngngei nin chang thei mo ani zoi? Asa, rêngngei chang thei tatak ungla ku nuom ani, hanke nangni leh munkhata rêngngei ei chang thei rang.
Pathien'n keini tîrtonngei hih thi ranga inkhâm anga anûktaka mi tîrsuokin kin bê ani; rammuol le vântîrtonngei le miriemngei mitmua enhoia sinin kin om sika hin.
Keini chu Khrista jârin amo kin ni; aniatachu nangni chu Khrista jârin mivâr nin ni! Keini chu kin doka, hannirese nangni chu nin rât! keini chu mingeiin min enkhûma, nangni chu mirit nangni an tho!
Atûn ten vonchâm le tui inrâlin kin oma; rovo chetin kin invoa; mi tôkmol kin tuonga; ommun invâiin kin chai titir ani;
Kin kuta sinthôn dûktong takin kin invâi ani. Mîn khomâk min sâm khomin sat kin vur ngâia; dûk min mintong khomin diertakin kan tuonga;
Mi min êro khomin chong dâiriemin kin thuon ngâi. Hi rammuola ronok leh tei uol khâi mak meh; hi zora ten khom hin rammuola pornôngkok angin kin ni.
Hi chong ki miziek hih nin inzakpuina ranga ki ti niloiin, Ka nâi moroi ngei angin nangni minchu ku nuom sika ani.
Khristien ringnuna enkolpu isâng sôm dôn khom ungla, Pa chu inkhat vai kêng nin dôn. Nan lâia Thurchi Sa hong mintunga Khrista Jisua leh inzoma nin ringna han nin pa ko hongni ani.
Masikin keima ku nunchan jûi rangin nangni ke ngên.
Hi chungroia hin Timothy, khristien ringnun jâra ka nâipasal moroi le taksônom hih nin kôm ko hongtîr. Ama'n Khrista leh inzomin ringna thara ku nunchan muntina koiindangngei murdi ki minchu ngâi anghan nangni min riet nôk atih.
Nin lâia ko hong khâi loi rang mini ti nin bôk sikin, mi senkhatin chu omlien nan song ani.
Nikhomrese, Pumapa'n asa a tiin chu nan lâia hong lai ki tih, Hanchu hi mi ânsong ngei hih an mûrra an ti vai niloiin, sinthotheina an dôn khom mu thei ki ti zoi.
Pathien Rêngram chu chongbâingei vaia om niloiin sinthotheinân aom kêng ani uol.
Imo nin nuom uol? Tôkmol leh mo nin kôm ku juong rang, aninônchu ratha lungkhamna le nuninnêmin mo?
Atûn, nin lâia inditnasaloi aom ti mîn an hong misîr baka, ma-angdôra inditnasaloi ha chu sonongngei lâia luo om ngâi mak. Mi inkhatin a puingâk a jâlpui ngâi ti khom min lei ril ani!
Hanchu, kho angin mo nin lân song bang theia? Ânsong nêkin, Ma anga saloi thopu ha chu nin inzomkhômna renga nin rujûlpai theina rangin kângdoinân nin sip uol rang ani.
Nin lâia taksan inchel thei no khom ronga ratha'n chu kên chel ani; nan lâia om anghan ei Pumapa Jisua rimingin ma angtaka saloi ichi om thopu chunga han roi ke jêkmasat zoi. Nangni le keima ratha Pumapa Jisua sinthotheinân intûpin,
<range>
ha miriem hah Pumapa Nikhuoa han a ratha sanminring ani theina rangin Soitan kuta a takpum minmang rangin nin pêk rang ani.
Nin inpâk rang hi dik mak! “Chol tômtên vâipôl bil pumpui amin thoizit ngâi,” ti nin riet nimak mo?
Chol koploi vâipôl bil nin nia, vâipôl tang atharzek nin ni theina rangin sietna chol muruo hah khâipai roi. Atûn, ei Kalkân Kût Khohoi thona rang Khrista, ei Kalkân Kût belrite hah, inbôlnân pêkin aom zoi sikin.
Masikin ei Kalkân khohoi mang ei ti u, Chol muruo puoloina le sietna kop vâipôl niloiin cholboi inthiengna le chongtak vâipôl leh mang ei ti u.
Ke lekhamuthuon han inditnasaloi song mingei leh inlop loi rangin nangni ki tia.
Sonongngei inditnasaloi song ngei mini, tamrâival ngei mini, inrungei mini le mirmil biekngei mini inloppui tet no roi ki ti nimaka, ma anghan nisenla chu rammuol hih nin mâkving rang anâng rang ani.
Ki ti tak chu tutu khom iempu intia, inditnasaloi song mini, tamrâival mini, mirmil biek mini, inngo song mini, ju inrûi mini, inru mini ala thopu chu inloppui no roi ti hih ani. Ma anga mingei lehan chu insungin nêk le sâk khom thopui no roi.
Keiman pêntienga mingei roi ke jêk rang nâng mak. Pathien'n jêk ngei atih. Hannirese nin lôm kâra mi chu nin jêk rang nimak mo? Pathien lekhabu'n, “Mi saloi hah nin pâl renga khâipai roi,” ati anghan.
<range>
Nin lâia tumakhatin a Khristien champui leh insûkloina dôn senla, ma insûkloina roi hah jêk rangin Pathien mingei kôm mintung loiin sonong roijêkpungei kôm a mintung ngam rang mo?
Pathien mingeiin rammuol roijêk an tih, ti nin riet loi mo? Rammuol roi luo mana nin la jêk rang anînte, roi achînte jêk rang hi nin jêk thei loi mo?
Vântîrtonngei khom ei la jêk ngei rang anni ti nin riet loi mo? Hi damsûng roi vâng chu ti rang luo nâng mak.
Ma anghan damsûng roijêk rang ahong om duoiin chu, koiindanga itea tel bâkloi mingei nin min jêk rang mo?
Nin inzakna ranga ki ti ani! Nin Khristien champuingei lâia roi injêl jêk thei mivâr inkhat luo nin om loi mo?
Manêkin, khristien ankhatin a sûngsuok leh an insûkloina roijêkna mintungin sonongngei a man jêk ngâi hi!
Roi injêl nin dôn ngâi sika hin chukloina tak nin dôn ti chu ânlang ani. Tho minchâia aom hah nin ta rangin asa uol nimak mo? Muruka aom hah nan ta rangin asa uol nimak mo?
Manêkin nangni rengin nin tho minchâi inlôm ngâia, nin inru inlôm ngâi, nin lâibungngei le nin sarnungei lelê leh khom!
Adiktakin mipuoloi ngeiin Pathien Rêngram luo noni ngei ti nin riet loi mo? Nin thethenin inhuong no roi; inditnasaloi song ngei, mirmil biekngei, inrêngei, hurngei, pinkuohurngei
aninônchu inrungei, tamrâivalngei, ju inrûingei, inngo song ngei, murukmeret tho ngei hin Pathien Rêngram luo tet noni ngei.
Nangni khom senkhat chu ma anga mi nin lei ni ngâi. Aniatachu, sietna renga rusûk minsâiin Pathien kôm pêk nin ni zoia; ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista le ei Pathien Ratha sikin Pathien kôm adik nin chang zoi.
Tumakhatin, “Keima rangin jâttin tho phal ani,” a ti thei. Asa; aniatachu jâttin tho hi nangma rangin sa suolet mak. Jâttin keima rangin tho phal ani ki ti thei, aniatachu ite suokin om no ning.
Tumakhatin, “Sâk nêk chu von ta rang ania, von chu sâk nêk ta rang ani,” a ti thei. Asa; aniatachu, Pathien'n minboi ruruoi atih. Takpum hih inditnasaloia mang rang nimaka, Pumapa sinthona mang rang kêng ani; male Pumapa'n takpum ranga anângngei a pêk minhun ngâi ani.
Pathien'n Pumapa chu thina renga a kaithoia male eini khom a sinthotheinân mi kaithoi sâng atih.
Nin takpumngei hah Khrista takpum amachangngei ani ti nin riet. Khrista takpum amachangngei hah lâkpên notizuor ngei takpum amachangin ki minchang rang mo? Ni tet mak!
Notizuor inzompui mi hah chu notizuor leh takpum inkhat an ni ti nin riet loi mo? Pathien lekhabu'n ânthârtakin, “Anruonin takpum inkhat hong nîng an tih,” ati.
Aniatachu, Pumapa inzompui mi hah chu ama leh ratha pumkhat an ni.
Inditnasaloi hih mong ta roi miriemin sietna dang a tho ngei nâm chu a takpum pêntieng ania, inditnasaloi song mi rêk chu ama takpum chunga nunsie a tho ani.
Nin takpum hah nin sûnga om Pathien nangni pêk Ratha Inthieng biekin ani ti nin rietloi mo? Nin ta nikhâi mak choia, Pathien ta kêng nin ni;
mana rochôk kêng nin ni zoi. Masikin nin takpumngei hah Pathien roiinpuina rangin mang roi.
Atûn, nin chong miziek chungroi ngei hah mindonin. Pasal rangin innei loi asa.
Aniatachu, inditna tamtak aom ngâi sikin pasalin an theia dôngma dôn chit senla ngeia, nupang khomin an theia ruothar dôn chit rese ngei.
Pasalin a pasal nina sintum a dôngma kôm zoi senla, ma angdênin nupang khomin a pasal kôm a sintum zoi sa senla, an nângna nâma inmathâi inlôm rese ngei.
Nupangin ama takpum chunga han racham nei maka, a pasalin kêng a nei; ma angdênin pasal khomin ama takpum chunga racham nei maka, a dôngman kêng a nei ani.
Chubaitho ranga nin inpêk theina rang le nin inmunnôk theina rangin chomoltea rangin asa nin ti ruruoi nônchu nin rachamneina inchu no roi; aninônchu nin indînzoiloina sikin Soitan'n nangni huong i-nih.
Hi chong hih chongpêk angin misîr mu-unga, phalna chong angin vai ki misîr ani.
Adiktakin chu nin rêngin keima angin om ungla chu ku nuom ani; aniatachu, mitinin an chang rang chit manboipêk Pathien kôm renga an chang chita, inkhatin lam dang tieng, adangin lam dang tieng.
Atûn, inneiloi ngei le meithâingei rangin chu hi anghin ki ti, Keima angin intîmvielin om rang bôk tit ungla nin ta rangin sa uol atih.
Aniatachu, nin nângna han indîntheina nin dôn nônchu innei roi, hur nêkin chu innei asa uol.
Inneisai mingei ta rangin chong ke pêk, ma hih keima renga niloiin, Pumapa chongpêk ani: nupangin a pasal insenpui no rese;
aniatachu ân senpui lekhom pasal dang nei khâi no rese, nônchu a pasal le ngêt inluo nôk rese; male pasal khomin a dôngma mâk tet no rese.
Mi dangngei kôm chu ki ti (keiman, Pumapa niloiin): Khristien pasalin sonong dôngma a neiin chu a dôngma han a kôm om tit rangin a mulung achuk tatakin chu mâk tet no rese.
Male Khristien nupang khomin sonong ruothar a neiin chu a pasal han om kelen rangin a mulung achuk tatakin chu mâk no rese.
Iemloi pasal hah a dôngma jârin Pathien mitmua pomthei ani zoia, iemloi nupang khomin a Khristien pasal jârin Pathien mitmua pomthei ani sa zoi. Ma anghan nino senla chu, an nâingei hah inthieng noni ngei; aniatachu, Pathien mitmua pomthei ani zoi.
Nikhomrese, iemloi inkhat han insen a nuomin chu insen chien rese ngei, ma anga roi hah atokin chu iempu pasal mo, nupang mo, khit nimak ngei. Pathien chu inngêia om rangin nangni a koi ani.
Khristien dôngma na pasal na sanminring thei rang le thei loi rang kho angin mo ni riet? Aninônchu khristien pasal, no dôngma na sanminring thei rang le thei loi rang kho angin mo ni riet?
Tutu khom Pumapa'n manboipêk a pêk lam angtakin le Pathien'n a koi lam angtakin om rese. Hi balam hih koiindang tina ki ril ani.
Sertansai mi hah Pathien koina a pomin chu, a sertana sîn hah pai rang a bôk rang nikhâi mak; sertanloi mi khomin Pathien koina a pomin chu, ser a tan rang nikhâi mak.
Sertan le tanloi ite ni uol mak; Pathien chongpêkngei jôm hi kêng ani uol tak.
Tutu khom Pathien koina a pom lâia an om anghan omtit rese ngei.
Pathien'n nang a koi han suoka om mo ni ni? Asa, mindon no roh; hannirese, jôkna zora na manin chu mang roh.
Suok, Pumapa'n a koi chu Pumapa mojôk suok ania; ma angdên han suok niloi Khrista'n a koi khom hah Khrista suok ani.
Pathien'n mana nangni a rochôksai kêng; masikin mingei suokngei chang no roi.
Ka malngei, tukhom Pathien'n a koi lâia a omlam anghan Pathien leh inlopin omtit rese.
Atûn, inneiloi mingei chungroia nin chong miziek hah mindonin: Pumapa renga chongpêk chu ite dôn mu-unga, aniatachu, Pumapa moroina sika mi iemom ki ni sikin ki mindon lam misîr ki tih.
Atûnlâi intakna mindonin mi a om lam angtaka a omtit rang hih sa uol le ki minhoi.
Dôngma mo no dôn zoi? Amanu renga jôkna rok no roh. Inneiloi mo na la ni? Dôngma rang rok no roh.
Hannirese lômnu no dôn khomin nunsie tho mak chea; inneiloi nupang khomin ruothar a dôn khomin nunsie tho mak. Aniatachu in nin neiin chu rammuola dûktong nin tih, maha nangni mojôk rang ku nuom ani.
Ka malngei, ki ti nuom tak chu mahi ani: Zora hih abong zoia, atûn renga chu dôngma dôn ngei hah a dônloi angin om senla ngeia;
achap ngei hah inngûiloi angin om senla ngeia; ânnui ngei hah râisân loi angin om senla ngeia; a rochôk ngei han dônloi angin om senla ngeia;
hi rammuola neinun sampâr ranga sinchuon tho ngei hah anrêngin luo loi angin om rese ngei. Hi rammuol hih, atûna anghin, aom sôt khâi loi rang ani sikin.
Mulungdûk dôn loi rangin nangni ku nuom ani. Ruotharte'n chu Pumapa râiminsân rang a bôk sikin Pumapa sin hah a mindon ngâi.
Aninâkchu pasal inneisai chu a dôngma râiminsân rang a bôk sikin rammuol neinun a mindon ngâia;
masikin kângnikin kaiphirînin a om ngâi ani. Nupang inneiloi, aninônchu dôngmate inthieng chu a taksa le a ratha inpêkphar rang a nuom sikin Pumapa sin hah a mindon ngâia; hanchu inneisai nupangin chu a ruothar râiminsân rang a nuom sikin rammuol neinun a mindon ngâi.
Nangni san rang ku nuom sika mahi nangni ki tipe ani. Nin chunga balam inngar nangni khang pe rang bôk mu-ung. Manêkin, neinun adik le asa nin sin theina rang le Pumapa sinthona han ite manar tet loiin nin inpêk let theina rangin nangni ku nuom ani.
Dôngmate le ruotharte innei roi chu sûtminthel ani zoi, innei nôk khâi loi rang ti ngei chungroia chu: ruotharte hah dôngmate tienga han mirita omin ândînthei tet noa, innei anâng angin a rietin chu innei rese, a nuom angin, mahan nunsie om mak.
Aniatachu, pasal hah dânderit ani noa, ha dôngmate hah innei loi ranga mulungbôk det taka sinsiema, male a nuomlam a dier theipu han chu om rang chang a mulungrîla a mindon suo zoi, dôngmate hah in a neipui loi sikin a tho min sa.
Masikin ruotharte inneipu han a tho min sa, aniatachu, inneiloipu han a tho min sa uol.
Nupang inneisai hah a pasal ringsûngin chu a pasal han khit ania; hannirese, a pasal a thîn chu, pasal dang a nuom tak in a nei pui thei, Khristien ani ngânin chu.
Aniatachu, a om ngâiin om senla, a râisân uol atih. Maha ki mindon lam ani, male kei khom Pathien Ratha chu ko dôn angin kên bê ani.
Atûn mirimil biekna sâknêk pêkna chungroia nin chong miziek mindonin. “Ei rêngin rietna ei dôn,” an ti angin adik ani. Hannoma, ma anga rietna han chu mi a minpâk ngâia; aniatachu lungkhamna rêkin chu mi asin minding ngâi.
Tukhomin idôr tena mini rietna dôn sai angin ân bên chu a riet rang dôr ala riet loi ani.
Hannirese tukhomin Pathien lungkhamna a dônin chu ha mi hah Pathien'n a riet ani.
Masikin, mirimilngei biekna sâknêk pêka omsai sâk chungroia chu: rammuola mirimilngei murdi hih atataka inzir niloi, rimila inding an ni tie le Pathien inkhat vai aom ti chu ei riet.
Invâna mo, pilchunga mo pathien riming pêl “pathienngei” le “pumapangei” tamtak om khom senla,
eini rangin chu Pathien inkhat vai, Pa, neinuntin Sinpu hah a oma, ama ta rangin ei ringa; male Pumapa khom inkhat vai, Jisua Khrista a oma, Ama sikin neinuntin sin ania, eini khom ama sikin ei ring ani.
Aniatachu ma chongtak hih mi murdi'n riet mak ngeia, mi senkhat chu atûnten hin mirimilngei biek ngâiinzong an ni sikin atûnten hin mirimil ta angtaka bên an sâk jêta an sielesarietna hah ânzala, ha sâk sika han a minnim ngei angin an inbe ngâi.
I-ih khomnirse sâk hin Pathien leh ên zomna chu mi min sa pe thei no ni; sâk no khom ila ite dok no ih, sâk khom ila ite man uol no ih.
Nikhomrese, nin zalenna sintho han taksônna tienga râtloi ngei hah sietna an chul loina rangin indîn roi.
Chongkhatin, nangma “Rietna dôn,” ân tipu han, sielesarietna tienga râtloi mi han mirimil biekna ina na sâk lâitak nang mu senla, a sielesarietna han mirimilngei biekna sâknêk pêka omsai hah a sâk ngam rang nimak mo?
Masikin ma miriem râtloi, na lâibung Khrista'n a ruthûla a thi pepu hah nangma “Rietna” sikin ânmang rang ani!
Ma anghan nin Khristien lâibungngei le sarnungei chunga thominchâiin an sielesarietna hah mophoppên Khrista chunga nin thominchâi nîng atih.
Masikin sâkin ka lâibungpa mo, ka sarnu mo sietna han amathâkin chu me sâk tet khâi no ning, ka lâibungpa mo, ka sarnu mo sietna a tâk khâi loina rangin.
Zalên mi ni mu-ung mo? Tîrton ni mu-ung mo? Ei Pumapa Jisua mu loi mo ki ni? Male nangni khom Pumapa ta ranga ki sinthona mara nimak choi mo?
Midangngeiin tîrtonin mi pom no khom rese ngeia, nangnin chu mi nin pom ngêt! Pumapa leh nin ringna ânzom zoi sikin ki tîrton indangna chu nangni hah nin ni.
Mîn min makhalin chu hi anghin kên rung ngâi:
Sin ko tho theina ranga sâknêk man rangin racham ko dôn loi mo?
Tîrton dangngei le Pumapa lâibungngei le Peter ngei anghan ku khuolchaina Khristien dôngma tuong rangin racham ko dôn loi mo?
Aninônchu, Barnabas le keima vai mo kin ringna ranga sinthoa invâi rang?
Tu râlmingei mo anninanâk thâma invâiin râl an doi ngâi? Tu chuonsinpungei mo grapebil thoa amara sâk ngâiloi? Tu belrihôlpungei mo belri pâl vâia an runutui nêk ngâiloi?
Balam khomin ma angdên han ati sikin anîngtina enminkhina hih aten dôn mu-ung ani.
Moses balam lekhabua han, “Sechal hah bu ni minchîl lâitak han a mûr khit pe no roh,” ti ei pore. Atûn, Pathien'n sechal mo a mindon?
Eini ranga a misîr nimak mo? Ani, eini rang piela a miziek, âlkaipu le bu âtpu han an chang rangtum ngâituiin sin an tho rang ani.
Nin lâia ratha sachi kin rethea, nin kôm renga taksa neinun ngei ât unglang kamâmom rai no ni mo?
Midangngei luo mana hi taksa neinun ngei hih nin kôm renga chang rangin racham an neiin chu, keini vâng chu rachamneina lien uol kin dôn nimak mo? Hannirese, ha rachamneina hah mang mak me. Khrista Thurchi Sa kin chakal loina rangin jâttin kin tuong zajâm ngâi.
Pathien Biekina sintho mingei han Biekin renga an sâk rang an man ngâi ti le mâichâma inbôlnangei min tungpungei khomin mâichâma neinunpêkngei han rangtum an dôn ngâi tiin nin riet minthâr ani.
Ma angdên han Pumapa'n Thurchisa hah a misîrpungeiin hima renga hah an sâk rangin chong a pêk ani.
Aniatachu, Keiman chu mangei hah inkhat luo ka mang loi ani, atûn hin khom ku chunga ma anghan nin thona ranga ki miziek ni tet mak. Tutu khom kên songna hih asênaboi chongngei an minchang nêkin chu thi ving inlang kei rangin asa uol!
Thurchisa ki misîr sika ririemin insong theina dôn mu-ung. Thurchisa hih misîr ngêt ranga dânde kêng ki ni. Thurchisa hih misîr nôn lang chu kei rangin ichi omtak ani rang!
Hi sin hih keima nuom thangna sika ki sin nisenla chu thalo khôk thei ki tih; hannirese, Pathien'n hi sin hih mi minkol sikin ki sintum piela bên, ki sin ani.
Hanchu, kho anga thalo mo ka man rang ani zoi? Thurchi Sa rang sika ki sinthona hin ka rachamneinangei mang loia thalo boia ki sin hih thurchisa rangin zora sa ani.
Zalen mi ki ni, tute suok chu ni mu-ung; aniatachu thei dôra mi tamtak ngei ka lâklût theina rangin mi murdi suok ka chang ani.
Judangei ka lâklût theina rangin Judangei lâia chu Juda angin ko om ngâi; male Moses Balam nuoia om no khom inlang, balam nuoia om ngei kôm chu ka lâklût ngei theina rangin balam nuoia om anghan ko om ngâi.
Ma angdên han, Jentailngei ka lâklût theina rangin Jentailngei lâia chu Jentail angin Juda balam pêntieng ko om ngâi. Ma hah Pathien balam jôm mu-ung ki tina nimaka; Khrista balam nuoia ko om tatak ani.
Taksônna tom ngei ka lâklût theina rangin râtloingei lâia chu râtloi angin ko om ngâi. Masikin kho angin mo senkhat ngei luo ka sanminring theina rangin mi murdi kôm jâttin ki ni zoi.
Satvurna ka chang theina rangin mangei nâm hah Thurchisa sikin ki sin ani.
Tân insiet ngei hah anrêngin an tânna, hannirese inkhat vaiin kêng râisânman a man ngâi ti nin riet loi mo? Râisânman hah nin man theina rangin ma angtak han tân roi.
Insietna akop ngeiin chu lam tina an indîn ngâi. Anni chu rênglukhum sietthei man rangin an insieta eini chu rênglukhum siet theiloi kumtuonga om rang man rang ei ni.
Masikin ânjîkzatin zoina tenkung tieng ka tân ngâia; masikin kuttum leh insuk ngâipu'n min pâm loia a kuttum leh a suk ngâi angin ki ni.
Midangngei insietna taka ko koitûp suole keima chukloia ko om loina rangin, ka takpum dûk min tongin ke sep ngâi ani.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, ei richibulngei Moses jûingei chunga neinun atung hah nin riet bang rangin ku nuom ani. Anrêngin sûm thupna nuoia an om rieia hoiriemin Tuipui Sen varâl an kâi ani.
Sûm le tuipuia han Moses nûkjûingei nitheina rangin anrêngin baptis changin an om ani.
Anrêngin rathatienga bu munkhatin an nêka,
munkhatin rathatienga tui an nêka. Anni ngei leh sepuipu rathatienga lungpui renga tui an nêka; ma lungpui hah Khrista ani.
Aniatachu an lâia mi tam uol chunga chu Pathien mulunghoi maka, ramchâra han an ruok ânzamnung ani.
Atûn, ma ngei hah eini ranga minenna ani, neinun saloi ngei an ngâitui angin ei ngâitui loina rang le
an lâia mi senkhat mirimilngei an biek angin ei biek loina rangin. Pathien lekhabu'n, “Mingei ha ruolhoia sâk rangin an insunga, hannirese junêk le indit hoiinhâinân an inlet nôk” ati angin.
An lâia mi senkhatin inditnasaloi an songa, sûnkhat sûngin mi isâng sômnikleithum an thi anghan eini chu inditna saloi song no uh.
An lâia mi senkhat Pumapa an minsina, murûlin amuchuk that ngei ok anghan minsin no uh.
An lâia mi senkhat Pathien kôm an chiera, Thina Vântîrtonin a minmang ngei anghan chier no uh.
Ma an chunga neinun tung ngei murdi hah midangngei rangin minennangei ania, eini zora monga lêng ngei inningna ranga mangei ha miziek ani.
Adettaka inding nin ni tiin nin mindonin chu nin inlet loina rangin indîn roi.
Huongna nin tong ngei murdi hah mingei tuong ngâi tena ani. Pathien chu a chonginkhâma iem aom sikin nin phari loi rang dôr chu huongna nin tong rang phal no nih; huongna nin tuong zorân tuongdierna ranak nangni pêk a ta, male huongna jôkna lampui khom nangni sin pe atih.
Masikin, ku ruol moroitak ngei, mirimilngei biek hih mâk ta roi.
Arietvar mingei kôma misîr anghan nin kôm ki misîr ani; ku thurchi misîr hih mindon roi.
Satvurna khuri chunga Pathien kôm râisânchong ei misîr ngâi: ei nêkin Khrista thisen hah ên sempuina ani. Male vâipôl ei khoi ngâi ha: ei sâk khom hih Khrista takpum ên sempuina ani.
Vâipôl hih tâpkhat ani angin, eini hih mi tamtak ni khom ila, vâipôl tâpkhat renga ei rêngin ei chang pak sikin takpum inkhat ei ni.
Israel mingei hah en ta u, inbôlna neinunpêka om sâk ngei han mâichâma Pathien sin hah an insempui ani.
Mirimil aninônchu a kôma sâk pêka om hah neinun kâmom ki tina mo?
Nimak! ki ti chu sonongngei mâichâmngeia inbôlna hah Pathien kôm niloiin ramkhoringei kôm kêng an pêk ani. Ramkhoringei leh lôminchang rangin chu nangni phal tet mu-ung.
Pumapa khuri le ramkhoringei khuri nêk molop thei no tunui; Pumapa dosâng le ramkhoringei dosâng khom sâk molop thei no tunui.
Aninônchu Pumapa hah ei min nuor rang mo? Ama nêka rât uolin ên be mini?
“Jâttin tho thei rangin phal ei ni,” an ti anghan. Adik, hannirese jâttin nâm sa let mak. “Jâttin tho thei rangin phal ei ni,” aniatachu jâttin hi satna ni let mak.
Tutu khom athei vaia satna rang vai rok loiin midang satna rang rok rese.
Me bazara an zuor kai chu ite rekel loiin nin sielesarietna sikin sâk roi.
Pathien lekhabu'n, “Pilchung le asûnga omngei murdi hih Pumapa ta ani,” ati sikin.
Sonong inkhatin bunêk rang nangni a sielin se ta ungla, nangni a do kai chu rekel tet loiin nin sielesarietna sikin sâk roi.
Aniatachu tumakatin, “Hi sâk hih mirimil kôma pêksai ani,” tiin nangni a rilin chu nangni rilpu sik le ama sielesarietna sikin sâk no roi
ma hih nin sielesarietna ki ti nimaka, midangngei sielesarietna ki ti kêng. “Asa, hanchu,” senkhatin, “Iranga midang sielesarietna han ka zalena tentana mi sin pe mini? tiin an rekel ngâi ani.
Ka sâk chunga Pathien kôm râisânchong ki misîr sai piel ha irang mo mîn min la êro ngâi hi?”
Asa, ma anghan nin sin murdi, nin sâk le nin nêk murdi, Pathien roiinpuina rangin tho roi.
Judangei, Jentailngei le Pathien koiindangngei ta ranga bâiinkhamna nin niloina rang lam takin om roi.
Ko tho angtak hin tho roi; Keima rang satna rok loiin, sanminring an ni theina ranga mi murdi satna rang rokin, ki sinthona nâma mi murdi râiminsân rangin ki mindon ngâi ani.
Khrista nunchan inchupu ki ni anghan, ku nunchan inchu ngei ni roi.
Mi nin riettit ngâi sik le nangni ki minchunangei nin jûi tit ngâi sikin nangni ki minpâk.
Aniatachu, pasal lu chu Khrista ani, nupang lu chu pasal ani, male Khrista lu chu Pathien ani ti nin riet rangin ku nuom.
Masikin pasal lukhum inkhum puma inkhômna taka chubaitho ngâi mini, thurchi misîr ngâi ngei mini chu Khrista an lu hah mâimôk an shak ani.
Male nupang tukhom lukhum inkhum loia inkhômna taka chubaitho ngâi mini, thurchi misîr ngâi ngei mini khom an lu, an pasal mâimôk an shak ania; ma anga nupang chu nupang an sam zietminkol leh ateina om mak ani.
Nupangin lukhum ân khum nuom nônchu epin ep let rese, ma anga nupang rangin samep mo, luvoi mo hi inzakpui aomin chu lukhum tho rese.
Pasal chu Pathien rimil in-angpui le Pathien roiinpuina minlang ngâipu ani sikin lukhum ân khum rang nâng mak. Aniatachu nupang chu pasal roiinpuina minlang ngâinu ania;
pasal hih nupang renga sin nimaka, aninâka nupang chu pasal renga sin ani.
Pasal hih nupang jâra sin khom nimaka, aninâka nupang rêk chu pasal jâra sin ani.
Masikin vântîrtonngei sika han nupangin pasal rachamneina nuoia om ani ti indangna rangin lukhum a tho rang ani.
Nikhomrese, Pumapa taka ei ringnuna hin nupang hih pasal boiin chu om thei maka, pasal khom nupang boiin chu om thei mak.
Nupang hih pasal renga sin ani anghan pasal hih nupang renga suok ania; male jâttin hih Pathien renga ânzir let ani.
Mindon ta u, nupang lukhum inkhum loia inkhômna taka Pathien kôm chubaitho ânhoi mo?
Pasal sam minsei chu ata rangin neinun inzakom ani ti nin inzirpui mulungrîl khomin a riet nimak mo?
Nupang sam minsei chu ama roiinpuina ania, a sam hah ama inkhum rang piela pêk ani.
Aniatachu, tumakhatin hi roi hih a makhal an om lekhom, mapêna hi chu balam dang reng dôn mak me, Pathien koiindangngei khomin dôn mak ngei.
Nikhomrese, nangni ki rilnangei zomin chu nangni minpâk mu-ung, nin satna rang niloiin nin siet uolna rangin nin inkhôm ngâi sikin.
Amotontaka, nin intûpnangei han doi pâlngei an om ti mîn min rila; male ma hih dik lekhom ki iem ani.
(Midik ngei hah an inlang theina rangin nin lâia insenna aom rang piel ani.)
Apâla nin intûp zora nin sâk ngâi hah Pumapa Jânbu nimak.
Nin nêkin nin bu pak motona nin nêk baka, senkhat nin inrûi lâiin senkhat nin von achâm ngâi sikin.
Nin sâk nin nêkna rangin inngei nin dônloi mo? Aninônchu, Pathien koiindang en min nuoiin mi intak ngei hah mâimôk nin shak mini? Hi chungroia hin imo ti-le mi nin minhoi? Nangni ki minpâk rang mini? Nangni minpâk tet mu-ung.
Inchuna nangni ke pêk ngei hah Pumapa kôm renga ka man kêng: Pumapa Jisua minsûra aom ni jâna han vâipôl hâr a lâka.
Pathien kôm râisânchong a misîr suole a khoia, “Hi ma hih ka taksa nin ruthûla pêk rang hah ani. Mi nin riettitna rangin ma hih tho ngâi roi,” a tia.
Ma angdên han, jânbu an nêk suole khuri khom a lâka, “Hi khuri hih Pathien chonginkhitna athar ki thisena mindet ani. Nin buong racham mi nin riettitna rangin tho ngâi roi,” a tia.
Zoratin hi vâipôl hih nin sâka, khuri renga nin buong racham a juong nôk mâka chu Pumapa thina hah nin phuong ani.
Masikin tukhom chukloi pumin Pumapa vâipôl hih nin sâka, a khuri renga buong ngei kai chu Pumapa taksa le thisen chunga theiloi chang nin tih, tiin ajûi sa ngâi ani.
Masikin mitin inphuol bak ungla, masuole vâipôl hah sâkin male khuri renga hah buong roi.
Vâipôl sâkpu le khuri renga buongpu ngei han Pumapa taksa omtie nin riet minthâr nônchu nin sâk le nin buong sika han nin chunga roijêkna nin mintung ani.
Masika han kêng nin inzala, damloiin nin oma male mi tamtak nin thi.
Eini nanâkin inphuol bak ila chu Pathien roijêkna nuoia om no uh.
Aniatachu rammuol leh munkhata theiloi ei chang loina rangin Pumapa jêkin le dûkmintongin ei om ngâi.
Masikin, ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, Pumapa jânbu ot ranga nin intûpin inngâk inlôm ngâi roi.
Nin intûpin Pathien roijêkna nuoia nin omloina rangin tutu khom a vonchâmin chu a ina nêk rese. Roi dangngei nâm chu ko hong tika hong min sûk ki tih.
Atûn, Ratha Inthieng tienga manboipêkngei chungroia nin miziek ngei mindonin. Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei hima roia han adiktakin nin riet rangin nangni ku nuom.
Sonong nin ni lâihan chu ringna dônloi mirimilngei biekna lamtieng tuong minvâiin nin om ngâi ti nin riet.
Tutên Pathien Ratha ruoiin, “Jisua chu vânisal ani!” ti thei ngâi mak ngei ti le tutên Ratha Inthieng ruoi loiin, “Jisua chu Pumapa ani,” ti thei mak ngei ti hih nin riet rangin ku nuom.
Rathatienga neinunpêkngei adadang an oma, aniatachu ha Ratha nanâk han a pêk ani.
Sinthona lam adadang ngei aoma, aniatachu Pumapa sin nanâk ani.
Sinthona rangin thotheinangei adadang an oma, aniatachu Pathien nanâkin mitin kôm sin an thona rangin thotheina a pêk ngei ngâi ani.
Mitin satna rangin Ratha aom ti ei misang chita lam tamtakin ânlang.
Ratha han mi senkhat kôm vârna sip chong misîr theina a pêka, midang kôm han ma Ratha dên han rietna sip chong a pêk ngâi.
Ma Ratha inkhat nanâk han mi inkhat kôm taksônna a pêka, midang kôm han mindam theina a pêk.
Ratha han mi inkhat kôm sin kamâmom thotheina a pêka; adang kôm, Pathien chongbê misîr theina a pêka; male midang inkhat kôm Ratha adik le dikloi riet sensâi theina a pêka. Midang inkhat kôm rietloi chonga thurchi misîr theina a pêka, male midang kôm rietloi chong rilminthâr theina a pêk ani.
Aniatachu ha ngei murdi thopu hah Ratha inkhat dên ania; a nuom lam angtakin, mitin kôm manboipêk adadang a pêk ngâi ani.
Khrista hih takpum inkhat angin ania, abâkngei tamtak a dôna, abâkngei tamtaka sin nikhomsenla maha takpum inkhat dên ani.
Ma angdên han, ei rêngin Judangei mo, Jentailngei mo, suokngei mo, suokngei niloi mo takpum inkhata om rangin Ratha inkhat dên han baptis ei nia, male ei rêngin Ratha inkhatin buong rangin pêkin ei om zoi ani.
Takpum hih abâk inkhat vai niloiin, abâkngei tamtak ani.
Kepha hin, “Kut ki niloi sikin takpuma kop mu-ung,” ti ta senla masika han takpuma koploi ni uol no nih.
Kuor hin, “Mit ki niloi sikin takpuma kop ni mu-ung,” ti ta senla masika han takpuma koploi ni uol no nih.
Takpumpui hih mit nizit ta senla kho angin mo a rangâi thei rang? Kuor nizit ta senla inmo amirim a riet rang?
Ma anghan, nikhomrese, Pathien'n takpuma hin a nuomnana muna a abâk a mokhop ani.
Anrêngin abâk khat ni ta senla, takpum khom om no ni!
Ma anghan abâkngei tamtak nikhom senla takpum chu inkhat kêng ani.
Masika han mitngei hin kutngei kôm, “Nangni nâng mak me!” ti thei mak ngei. Lu khomin kephangei kôm “Nangni min nâng mu-ung!” ti thei uol mak.
Ani, hima nêkin, takpum abâk râtloi anga ânlang ngei hih kam an nâng uol tatak ania;
male takpuma ei minlut ok ngâiloi abâkngei hih ei minlut tak ani ngâia; ei takpum abâk enhoi bâkloi ngei hin enhoina lien uol an man ngâi,
ei takpum abâk enhoi uol ngeiin chu ma anga tho rang hah nâng mak. Pathien lelên enhoina dônloi abâkngei hah minlut uolin takpum hih aminpholom ani.
Masikin takpuma hin insenna om maka; abâkngei murdi hin inangsarrin an mindon inlôm ngâi ani.
Ma anghan abâk inkhatin atuongin chu abâk dangngei khom an tuongpui sa ngâi; abâk inkhatin minpâkin aomin chu abâk dangngei murdi'n an râiasân pui ngâi.
Nin rêngin Khrista takpum nin nia, male nin sika abâk inkhat chit nin ni.
Koiindanga Pathien'n hi mingei hih an mun chita a dar ngeia: inkhatna tîrtonngei, inikna dêipungei, inthumna minchupungei; masuole chu sininkhêl sinpungei, mindam theina ranak dônpungei, mi san theina ranak dônpungei, roijêk theina ranak dônpungei le rietloi chonga thurchi misîr theina manboipêk changpungei hah an ni.
Anrêngin tîrtonngei mini, dêipungei mini, minchupungei mini ni let mak ngei. Mitinin sininkhêlngei sin thei let mak ngei
ri-ngei mindam theina mini, rietloi chonga thurchi misîr theina mini, rilminthâr theina mini dôn let mak ngei.
Hanchu, manboipêk kâmom uol ngei chunga han nin mulungngei hah dar roi. Nikhomrese, mangei kâra asatak, chu a nuoia hih ani.
Miriem chongngei le vântîrtonngei chongin thurchi misîr thei khom ronga lungkhamna ko dôn nônchu, ko chongngei hih jâmluong miring aninônchu sûmeng tôk miring angin kêng ani rang.
Thurchi misîr theina neinunpêk dôn khom ronga; chong inthupngei murdi rietheina le rietnangei nâm dôn khom ronga; muolngei thînpai theina taksônna dôn khom ronga aniatachu lungkhamna ko dôn nônchu, ite ni mu-ung.
Inriengngei rangin ko dôn murdi pêk khom inlang, male ka takpum tena khom kâng let rangin ka takpumpui pêk khom inlang, lungkhamna ko dôn nônchu ite a satna om mak.
Lungkhamna chu atuongdiera male moroina adôna; narsa ngâi maka, inpâk ngâi maka, omin-ân tho ngâi maka;
Lungkhamnân chu omsaloingei tho ngâi maka, ama satna rang rok ngâi mak, a ningthik ngâi mak; dikloinangei mindon tit ngâi mak;
Lungkhamnân chu saloina arâisân ngâi mak, aniatachu, chongdika kêng arâisân ngâi.
Lungkhamnân chu atuong zajâma; a taksônna ngei, a sabeina ngei le atuongtheina ngeia duoi ngâi mak.
Lungkhamna hih kumtuonga om ani. Thurchi misîrnangei hih om khom senla la min mong nîng atih; rietloi chongngeia manboipêkngei hih om khom senla, la mong an tih; rietna hih om khom senla lan mang atih.
Akiploiin ei rieta akiploiin thurchingei ei misîr ngâia;
hannirese akipphar hih ajuong tika chu akiploi hih inmang atih zoi.
Nâipang ki ni lâihan chu, ko chongngei, ko khorietnangei le ki mindonnangei khom nâi ânpanga; aniatachu atûn chu ulien ki ni zoi sikin nâipang tho ngâi hah chu ka mâk zoi ani.
Atûna ei mu hih chu lîmena rimil ânlangdap angin ania; nangkana chu mâi-intongin la mûng ei tih. Atûna ki riet hih chu akiploi ania; nangkana chu kip atih zoi, Pathien'n keima ni rietna akipphar anghan.
Mangei inthum: taksôna, sabeina, le lungkhamna ngei hi chu omtit atih; male mangei lâia aroiinpuitak chu lungkhamna hih ani.
Hanchu, nin rujûl rang tak chu lungkhamna hih ani. Rathatienga neinunpêkngei chunga han nin mulungngei ha dar roi, aliekin Pathien thurchi misîr theina neinunpêk hah rujûl roi.
Rietloi chonga chongpu ngei hah miriemngei kôm an chong nimaka Pathien kôm an chong ani, asikchu an chong hah tutên riet mak ngei. Anni ngei han Ratha sinthotheinân chongtak inthupngei ha an misîr ani.
Aniatachu Pathien thurchi misîrpu ngei han miriemngei kôm an misîr ania male sanna ngei, mohôkna ngei le phûkdâina ngei apêk ngâi.
Rietloi chonga chongpu ngei han chu anninanâk vai mâsôn an ta, aniatachu Pathien thurchi misîrpu ngei han chu koiindang pumpui an sinsiem ngâi.
Nin rêngin rietloi chongngeiin thurchi nin misîr rangin nangni ku nuom; hannirese Pathien chong phuong theina neinunpêk dôn rangin nangni ku nuom uol. Rietloi chong chu koiindang pumpuiin sinminsana an manna ranga rilminthâr thei an om no vângin chu Pathien thurchi misîrpu hah rietloi chonga thurchi misîrpu nêkin chu a lut uol ok ani.
Masikin atûn sûngsuokngei, keiman nin kôm juongin rietloi chong juong tho ronga, chongphuong mo, rietna mo, ratha chongphuong mo, minchuna chong mo, ku juong chôi nônchu nin ta rangin imo asena aom rang?
Ringnadônloi miringhoi mangruongei theili mo, serânda mo an mût le an ât hah amiring ânthâr nônchu ilâ mo an minjûi khom ânthâr nônchu kho angin mo riet thei ani rang?
Bekul khom hih a mûtpu'n a mût minthâr nônchu tumo râl kâp rangin ânthok rang?
Ma angdên han, nangni khom chong rietbai lamin nin misîr nônchu, i roi mo nin misîr inmo riet thei ani ranga? Nin chongngei hah môk chochong ani rang!
Rammuola hin chong jât tamtak aoma, hannoma inkhat luo asena boi reng om mak ngei.
Aniatachu achong omtie ki riet nônchu kei rangin chu ma chong mangpu ngei hah ramdangmingei nîng a ta, kei khom anni rangin ramdangmi nîng ki tih.
Ratha neinunpêkngei dôn rang nin ngâitui anghan jâttin nêka asatak koiindang sinmindingna ranga mang uol rang ngei ha man rangin pût ngêt roi.
Hanchu rietloi chonga chong ngâipu han a rilminthâr sa theina rangin chubaitho ngêt rese.
Masikin rietloi chonga ku chubaitho chu ka ratha'n chu a chubai ngâia, hannirese ki mindonna chu mahan kopna dôn mak.
Hanchu itak mo ko tho rang ani zoi? Ratha'n chubaitho ka ta, ki mindonna khomin chubaitho sa ki tih; Ka ratha'n lâtho ka ta, ka mindonnân khom lâtho sâng ka tih.
Pathien kôm, Ratha vaiin râisânchong ni rilin chu, mi papai ânsungngei han no chong omtie hah riet noni ngeia, inmo na râisânchongril hah “Amen” an ti thei rang?
Pathien kôma na râisânchongril chubaithona han asân asa khom ni ti thei, nikhomsenla midangngei sanna chu nimak.
Nangni nêkin rietloi chong ka mang uol sikin Pathien chunga asân ka râiasân.
Hannirese koiindang inkhôma chu rietloi chongbâingei isâng tamtak misîr nêkin mingei an rietthei rang lamin minchuna chongbâingei rangnga misîr ki tih.
Sûngsuokngei, nin mindonna tieng chu nâi inpang no ungla; sietna tieng chu nâi inpang roi, nin mindonna tieng chu ulien ni roi.
Pathien lekhabungeia ma hih miziek ani: “Pumapa'n, chong dangin ramdangmingei mûrrin ki mingei kôm thurchi misîr ki tih. Ramdangmingei bâiin chong ka ta, hannirese ki mingeiin ni rangâi pe uol noni ngei,” a ti, ti hih.
Masikin rietloi chong thona neinunpêk hih iemloipungei rangin sînthona ania, iempungei rang nimak, hanchu Pathien thurchi chongphuongna neinunpêk chu iempungei rangin sînthona ania, iemloipungei rang nimak.
Hanchu, koiindang pumpui inkhômna han nin rêngin rietloi chongin chong ta ungla, male amolmangei senkhat aninônchu iemloipungei hong lût ta senla ngei, nin rêngin nin chângluk zoi nangni ti noni ngei mo?
Aniatachu nin rêngin Pathien thurchi misîr ta ungla, iemloipungei aninônchu mi amolmangei, ahong lût ngei hah nin chong an rieta han an siet tie min riet atih. An chong rangâi han anni ngei ha jêk a ta,
an mindonna inthupngei hah minlangin om atih, an sietnangei inphuong an ta, inbokin Pathien chubaimûk an ta, “Nin lâia Pathien aom tatak!” an ti rang.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, ma hih ki tina abi chu ani. Nin inkhômin mi inkhatin minpâkna lâ, adangin minchuna chong, adangin Pathien renga chongphuong, male adangin rietloi chongngei le rilminthârna ngei nin dôn pak ngâi. Jâttin koiindang min sana rangin tho ngêt ni rese.
Tumakhatin rietloi chongin a chongin chu, inik mini, atamtakin inthum mini nisenla, inthâk senla ngeia male tumakhatin imo an ti ha rilminthâr ngêt ni rese.
Hannirese tute a rilminthâr thei an om nônchu koiindang inkhôma chu dâirek ngêt senla ama le Pathien kôm vai mang rese.
Pathien thurchi misîr ngei khom inik, inthum vaiin misîr senla ngei, midangin asadimin lei rangâi rese ngei.
Aniatachu ânsung ngei lâia han inkhat lamin chongphuong rang an omin chu a misîr masapu hah dâirek rese.
Mi nâmin an inchu theina rang le mohôka an om theina rangin inkhat inkhatin Pathien chong nin misîr thei.
Pathien thurchi misîr theina neinunpêk hah thurchi misîrpu jêkna nuoia aom rang ani.
Pathien'n injêl rangin mi nuom maka, minhoi rang le inngêi rangin mi nuom sikin. Koiindang tina Pathien mingei anghan,
koiindang inkhômngeia chu nupangngei hah an dâirek rang ani. An chong rang phal nimaka; Juda balamin ati anghan chong an jôm ngêt rang ani.
Imakhat riet nuom an dônnin chu insûnga an pasalngei rekel rese ngei. Nupang rangin chu Pathien koiindang inkhômna taka chong rang hih inzakpui om ani.
Pathien chong hi nangni renga suok ani thei rang mo? Aninônchu nin kôm vai mo ajuong tung?
Tumakhatin Pathien thangtheipu mini, rathatienga neinunpêk dônnin mini an inbên chu nin kôma ko chong miziek hih Pumapa chongpêk ani ti lei riet ngêt rese.
Hannirese lunghâng a tho nônchu ama khom lunghâng tho no roi.
Masikin, ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, Pathien thurchi misîr hih asân lunghâng tho ungla rietloi chonga thurchi misîr ngei khom khap no roi.
Neinuntin hih asadimin le ani rang lam takin tho ngêt ni rese.
Male ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, Thurchi Sa nangni ke lei ril hah atûn hin nangni minrietnôk ku nuom, male ma nin pomna chunga han nin taksônna ânding mindet ngâi ani.
Ma hah thurchisa, nin kôma ki misîr hah ani. Nin iem papai aninoa, nin pom mindet tatakin chu ma thurchisa han nangni sanminring ani zoi.
Moton renga ka man kai chu nangni ki misîr pe ngâi, ma hi aroiinpui tataka: Khrista hah Pathien Lekhabungeia ânziek angin ei nunsiengei sikin a thia;
Pathien Lekhabungeia ânziek anghan an phûma, sûnthum suole kaithoiin a oma;
Peter kôm ânlâra masuole tîrton sômleinik ngei nâm kôm ânlâr nôk.
Hanchu voikhat chu ama jûi ngâi ngei raza rangnga nêka tam ngei lâia ânlâr nôka, mangei lâia mi senkhat thi ta khom senla ngeia, atam uol chu an la ringa.
Hanchu Jacob kôm ânlâr nôka, masuole chu tîrtonngei nâm kôm ânlâr nôk.
Anûktaka chu keima azora niloia suok nikhom ronga ko kôm khom ânlâr nôka.
Kei chu tîrtonngei lâia achîntak, Pathien koiindangngei dûk ko tho sika tîrton inti rang luo inhoi loi ki ni.
Aniatachu Pathien moroina sikin imo ki ni chu ki ni zoi, male a moroina ni pêk ha akorong chang maka. Manêk han tîrton dangngei murdi nêkin a sin uol tak ka la ni, nikhomsenla maha keima ki sin nimaka, hannirese Pathien moroina ko kôma om han kêng a sin ani.
Masikin, keima renga mo, anni renga mo, ma hih kin renga kin misîr ania, male nangni khom ma hih nin iem zoi ani.
Atûn, Khrista hah thina renga ânthoinôk ti chong nangni ki misîr pe hah nin iem suole khom ithomo nin lâia mi senkhatin mithi inthoinôkna reng hih om mak nin ti?
Mithi inthoinôkna reng hih aom nônchu Khrista khom kaithoiin om mak tina ania;
male Khrista hih thina renga kaithoiin aom nônchu, ite misîr rang dôn mak mea, male nin iem rang khom ite dôn mak chei.
Mapêna han, Khrista hih thina renga a kaithoi kin ti sikin Pathien chungroia milak kin minlang nîng a ta, mithi ngei aringin kaithoiin om mak ngei ti hih adikin chu, Khrista khom a kaithoi loi nîng atih.
Mithi ngei kaithoiin an om nônchu Khrista khom kaithoiin a la omloi nîng atih.
Male Khrista hah kaithoiin aom noa anînchu nan taksônna hah khom kâmnângloi nîng a ta, male nin sietnangei han nin lân mang tit ani rang.
Mapêna iempungei Khrista jâra lei thi ngei khom hah an inmang zoi tina ani sa rang.
Atûnlâi damsûng rang vaia Khrista chunga sabeina dôna masuole chu dôn khâiloi einin chu rammuola mingei nâm nêka inriengomtak nîng ei tih.
Aniatachu chongtak chu Khrista hah thina renga kaithoiin aom ngêt ani, thina taka a in ngei hah kaithoiin la om ngêt an tih, ti khâmnân.
Miriem inkhat sika thina ahong om anghan miriem inkhat sika nanâkin inthoinôkna ahong om ani.
Mi murdi Adam leh an inzomna sika an thi anghan mi murdi Khrista leh an inzomna sikin kaithoiin om an tih.
Hannirese an zora angtakin kaithoi nîng an tih; amotontaka Khrista ania, Khrista ta ngei chu a juong nôk tika kaithoiin om an tih.
Hanchu zora mongna tung a ta; rathatienga roijêkpungei, rachamneipungei le sinthotheinangei hah Khrista'n zoilet a ta, male Rêngram hah Pa Pathien kuta bâng atih zoi.
Pathien'n a râlngei a mene rieia a ke nuoia a dar mâka chu Khrista ânlal tit rang ani.
Râl nûktaka zoia om rang chu thina hih ani.
Pathien Lekhabu'n atia, “Pathien'n neinunngei murdi a ke nuoia a darleta,” masikin “neinunngei murdi” ti chong hin Pathien neinunngei murdi Khrista ke nuoia darpu chu huom mak tiin ânlang ani.
Hannirese neinunngei murdi Khrista roijêkna nuoia a dar tika chu, Nâipasal khom Pathien neinunngei murdi a nuoia a darpu nuoia om a ta; male Pathien chu neinuntin chunga roijêk atih zoi.
Atûn, mi senkhatngei an ti anghan, mithi ngei aringin inthoinôk mak ngei, an ti hih adikin chu, athipu sika baptis chang ngei chungroi ha imo ani rang? Imo sintho lenna ha an sabei rang? Irang mo mingei han athipu sika baptis an chang ranga?
Male eini rang khomin itho mo azoratina chipumin ei tân ngâi?
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, nîngtin thina ko tong ngâi! nangnia inpâkna ko dôn ha, ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista leh ei ringnun inzomna han mi minlang ngâi ani.
Miriem tho ngâi vaia Ephesia “ram sarângngei” insuolpui ki nînchu, kei rangin imo ânlâp ranga? Hanchu, mithi ngei ha aringin kaithoiin an omloi rangin chu senkhat ngei ti ngâi anghan, “Tho sâk ei ta, lei buong rei u, nangtûka ei thi rang ani zoi sikin.”
Mo no roi. “Champui saloi ngeiin nunchan asa an siet ngâi.”
Nin rietnangei adika han hongkîr nôk ungla, male nunsietaka nin omna ngâi lamngei ha mak roi. Nin lâia mi senkhat chu Pathien rietna reng nin dônloi sikin nin inzakna ranga mahi ki ti ani.
Tumakhatin, “Inmo mithi ngei hah aringin kaithoi an om rang? Kho anga takpum mo an dôn rang?” Tiin a rekel thei.
Nangma amo! Pila sachi ni ling hah athi bak nônchu mông ngâi mak ngah.
Male na sachi ling khom hah a takpum la om rangin ling mak chea, aramal samsâi kêng nu tuh ngâi duo, bu ramal mini aninônchu chimu dang mini khom ani thei kêng.
Pathien'n a nuom lam angtakin chimu tin takpum a min pêla; ama'n chimu tin an takpum rang chit a pêk ngei ngâi ani.
Iring parânngei taksa nâm hih in-ang suo maka; munisingei taksa adang, sângei taksa adang, vângei taksa adanga, male ngangei taksa adang ani.
Male invân takpumngei le pilchung takpumngei khom aoma; invân takpumngei mêlsana adang ania, pilchung takpumngei mêlsana adang ani.
Nisa khom amêlsana adanga, tha mêlsana adang, ârsingei mêlsana khom adang sa; ârsingei lâia khom an mêlsana ajât dadangngei aom ani.
Mithi ngei aringin an inthoinôk tika aom rang chang chu hih anghin ani. Takpum hih phûmin aom tika chu ma hih monthei ania, kaithoiin aom lechu montheiloi nîng atih.
Phûmin aom han chu mêlsietak le râtloi tak nîng a ta; inthoinôkin aom lechu enhoitak le râttak nîng atih.
Phûmin aom han chu taksatienga takpum nîng a ta; kaithoiin aom lechu rathatienga takpum nîng atih. Taksatienga takpum aom sikin rathatienga takpum khom aom rang ani.
Pathien lekhabu'n atia, “Miriem masatak, Adam, chu miringin sin ania”; Anûktaka Adam hih chu ringna-pêk Ratha ani.
Rathatienga hah ajuong om bak nimaka, taksatienga hah ajuong om baka, masuole kêng rathatienga hah ajuong om ani.
Adam masatak hah pila sin, pil renga hong ania; Adam inikna hah chu invân renga juong ani.
Pil ta ngei chu pila sinpu hah an phuoa; invân ta ngei chu invân renga juongpu hah an phuo ani.
Pila sinpu miriem phuona ênsil anghan, masikin invân renga miriem phuona khom ei lan sil rang ani.
Lâibung le sarnungei, “Taksa le thisen hin Pathien Rêngram luo thei no nia, thithei hin thitheiloina hah luo thei no ni,” ti hih ki tina ani.
Chongtak inthup hi rangâi roi: Ei rêngin chu lei thi riei no ih, aniatachu bekul nûktaka ahôn ring lehan, chomoltên, mitmisim kongkârin ei rêngin inthûlin om ei tih. Bekul ânring tikin chu mithi ngei khom thi nôk khâiloi rangin kaithoiin om an ta, male eini khom inthûlin om ei tih zoi.

Thithei hih thitheiloiin thûlin om ngêt a ta; athi ngâi khom hi athi ngâiloiin inthûlin om ngêt atih.
Masikin hi thithei hih thitheiloiin thûlin aom lechu, hanchu Pathien lekhabua mizieka om hah hong tung tatak atih zoi: “Thina hih sietminmang ani zoia; motorna hih ânthôtphar zoi!”
“O Thina, no motorna hih khonmo aom zoi? O Thina, ni minna theina ranga sinthotheina hih khonmo aom zoi?”
Thinân minna theina ranga sinthotheina chu sietna renga aman ngâi, male sietna sinthotheina chu Balam renga aman ani.
Hannirese ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista jâra motorna mi pêkpu Pathien kôm râisânchong om rese!
Masikin ko moroitak lâibungngei le sarnungei, adet le ngîrtitin inding roi. Pumapa ta ranga nin sintho hah ningsiettakin sin tit ungla, Pumapa chuonsin hih mangmunboi chang tet ngâi mak, ti nin riet sikin.
Atûn chu, Judea rama Pathien mingei ranga chôiruol chungroi nin miziek anghan. Galatia koiindangngei kôma ki ril anghan nangni khom lei tho ngêt sa roi.
Masikin ko hong tika chôiruol rusuong anâng loina rangin, Pathienni tinna nin sisika nin sum suo ngei renga hah khâi ngêt ungla, male lei dar roi.
Ko hong suole, nin neinunpêkngei chôia Jerusalema se ranga nin thangpu ngei hah mêlinrietna lekhangei min chôiin tîr ngei ki tih.
Hanchu ke se ranga ânhoi ani vângin chu keima leh mên ruoipui thei an tih.
Macedonia rama ka chai rang anâng sikin Macedonia rama ka chai suo tika nin kôm hong ki tih.
Nin kôm chu asôtzan om ki tih, phalbi sûng kai khom anithei, kho-kho tieng khom apêna ke sena ranga ma san thei nin tih.
Atûna selampala nangni mu rang chu nuom mu-unga; Pumapa'n aphal ngâiin chu nin kôm zora sôtzan châm rangin kên sabei ani.
Ephesi khuo hin Pentecosni tena chu ko om rang.
Mahan mi doipungei tamtak om khom rese ngeia, sin roiinpuitak le sin kâmomtak ki sin theina ranga zorânchum tak aom ani.
Timothy hah nin lampui tieng a hong duoia anînchu, chi tet loia nin kâra aom theina rangin lamdon lei tho roi, keima angin Pumapa sin a tho ngâi sikin.
Tutên enkhum no rese ngeia, phûkdâitakin ko kôm a hong kîrnôk theina rangin san ngêt ungla mojôk roi; iempungei leh munkhata hong rangin ka lei sabei kêng.
Atûn, ei lâibungpa Apollos chungroi chu, iempu dangngei leh munkhatin nangni hongpan rangin ko mohôk tita, hannirese ama hih ma vêl hin chu hong rangin la minnuom phar nimaka. Nikhomrese zorânchum a man tika hong atih.
Intûngchienin om ungla, taksônna han inding det ungla, hâi ungla, râttakin om roi.
Nin sin ngei murdi hah lungkhamnân sin roi.
Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, Stephanas le a inmingei chungroi hah nin rieta; anni ngei hah Achaia rama Khristien chang masatak an nia, Pathien mingei chuonsin ranga inpêk an nia,
ma anga mingei ruoipunina, le tumakhat khom anni leh chuonsin ngâingei le sintho ngâingei chu an chong jûi rangin nangni ke ngên ani.
Stephanas, Fortunatus, male Achaicus ngei; an hong hih asân ka râiasâna nin omloi khom indang loiin min donsûia
male nin mulungrîlngei nangni an minhar pe anghan, kei khom min minhar kêng. Ma anga mingei hih minlut rang rohoi piel an ni.
Asia ramhuol sûnga koiindangngei hin an chibaingei nangni an hong muthuona; Aquila le Priscilla male an ina koiindang inkhôm ngâingei hin Khristien chibaimûknangei nangni an hong muthuon.
Hi muna iempungei murdi khom chibaimûknangei nangni an hong muthuon. Intum inthiengin inkhat le inkhat inchibai inlôm roi.
Keima ku kut lelên mahi ki miziek ani: Paul renga chibaingei hi.
Tukhom Pumapa lungkham mu loi ngei chu an chunga khomâksâmna om rese! Marana tha Ei Pumapa, a juong!
Pumapa Jisua moroina hah nin kôm om rese.
Khrista Jisua sika nangni ku lungkhamna chu nin rênga nin kôm om rese.
Paul, Pathien lungdoa Khrista Jisua tîrton, le ei lâibungpa Timothy ngei renga han, Korinth taka Pathien koiindang, male Achaia ram pumpuia Pathien mingei murdi kôm han:
Pathien ei Pa le Pumapa Jisua Khrista'n moroina le inngêina nangni pêk rese.
Ei Pumapa Jisua Khrista Pathien le Pa, mulungjûrpuina sip Pa, sannangei murdi juongna Pathien kôm han râisânchong misîr ei tih u!
Ama'n ei intaknangei murdia mi san ngâia, masikin eini khom Pathien renga sanna ei man nanâk hah mangin midangngei an intakna murdia ei san thei ani.
Khrista tuongna tamtak ngei han rangtum ei dôn anghan Khrista jârin Pathien sanna lien khom han rangtum ei dôn ani.
Kin tuongin chu, mahah sanna le sanminringna nin manna rang ania; sannin kin omin chu, hanchu nangni khom sannin nin oma male tuongna kin tuong hah tuongdierna dôna tuong rangin râtna pêkin nin om ani.
Masikin nangni kin sabeina hah innîk tet ngâi mak; kin tuongnangeia rangtum nin dôn anghan sanna kin manna ngei khoma hin rangtum nin dôn sa tiin kin riet.
Lâibungngei le sarnungei Asia ramhuol sûnga intakna kin tong roi hah nangni minrietnôk kin nuom. Kin chunga puokrikngei hah alien rai sik le arik rai sikin la ring rangin sabeina reng dôn khâi mak me.
Kin chunga thina rangin roi an jêkmasat angin kin riet. Hannirese maha chu keinia hin minngam loiin Pathien mithi kaithoi nôkpu kôm kin minngam theina rang sika alei ni.
Ma anga thina chiruoi inrîngomngei renga hah mi sanminring zoia, mi la sanminjôk atih, male kin sabeina ama chunga kin minngama, ama'n mi la sanminring nôk atih,
nangni khom kin ta rangin chubaithonangeia mi nin san anghan. Masikin kin ta ranga chubaithona tamtak ngei hah thuonin om a ta, male Pathien'n sat mi vur a ta; male mi tamtakin kin ruthûlin a kôm râisânchong misîr an tih.
Hi rammuola kin ringnuna leh aliekin nangni le kin inkainangei han munisi vârna sika ni loiin Pathien moroina sinthotheina sikin Pathien-pêk ngamna le takintâinân roi ajêka mi mindeta kin sielesarietnân mi ril sikin kin inpâkpui ani.
Nin pore thei le nin rietthei kai kêng nin kôm kin miziek. Nikhomsenla atûn hin la rietthei sabak no khom ungla, mi la rietthei tatak nin tih, tiin ka sabei ani, ei Pumapa Jisua Nikhuo han nangni kin minpâk anghan mi nin minpâk theina rangin.
